The United States has imposed sanctions against companies related to Wagner PEC

Author: ['АРМІЯINFORM']

Time: 2023-06-28T30:00:00-04:00

Description: The USSTAMIT FISTRICTION FISTRICATIVED AND REALLY ABOUT THE REALLY SANKISIA OF CHOTIROKh FISHNICH TA ... War with Ukraine 2022, War with Ukraine Latest News today, News War with Ukraine 2022 Last today, will there be a war between Ukraine and Russia and when, the war with Ukraine in 2022 Whether there will be a year or not, will there be a war with Ukraine in the near future, they say, the war with Ukraine, Ukraine’s news today, Ukrainian news in Ukrainian media in Russian

Images: ['45_main.jpg']

Tags: ['ПВК "ВАГНЕР"', 'САНКЦІЇ РФ', 'США']

Category: News

The US Department of Finance has announced sanctions against four -physic and one legal entity related to Wagner's private military company and its founder and leader Eugene Prigogin.

About this it is referredNasyti of the US Finance.

"The Wagner group uses safety vulnerability around the world, commits and criminal acts that threaten order, proper management, prosperity and human rights," the statement said.

The US Ministry of Finance stated that under the restriction, the companies of the Ventral African Republic, the United Arab Emirates and Russia, to participate in illegal transactions with gold to fund "Wagner" to provide its weapons, including in Ukraine and Africa.

It is a mining company Midas Resources Sarlu, based in the king is related to Prigogin. It is argued that at the expense of profit from the sale of the sales gold finances the activities of the Wagnerians both in the country and its possessions.

Another South African company Diamville participated in the scheme of gold, which provided for its conversion to US dollars, which was planned to be reached after the US sanctions against several Russian financial institutions were introduced.

The Dubai Distributor of the Industrial Resources General Trading provided a financial support for Prigogine through trade with Diamville and assisted from transferring to Russia. The Russian company LLC "DM" also participated in the scheme.

The sanctions were also imposed against Russian citizen Andrey Ivanov, the head of the Wagner group of companies, which in the spring of 2023 was working closely with Prigogine AFRica Politology and high -ranking government officials for the sale of weapons and mining companies.

News Source: https://armyinform.com.ua/2023/06/28/ssha-zaprovadyly-sankcziyi-proty-kompanij-povyazanyh-z-pvk-vagner/

Author: ['АРМІЯINFORM']

Time: 2023-06-28T38:00:00-04:00

Description: 27 Chervye 2023 Roku єvrrada reached the first house, the war with Ukraine 2022, the war with Ukraine is the latest news today, the news war with Ukraine 2022 is the last for today, will there be a war between Ukraine and Russia and when, the war with Ukraine in 2022 Whether there will be a year or not, will there be a war with Ukraine in the near future, they say, the war with Ukraine, Ukraine’s news today, Ukrainian news in Ukrainian media in Russian

Images: ['weapons.jpg']

Tags: ['EDIRPA', 'ЄВРОПЕЙСЬКА РАДА', 'УРСУЛА ФОН ДЕР ЛЯЄН']

Category: News

Illustrative photo

On June 27, 2023, the Euro Council reached a preliminary agreement with the European Parliament to strengthen the European Defense Industry through a common law on procurement(Edirpa). Регламент стимулюватиме країни-члени ЄС доспільного закупівлі зброї, забезпечуючи тим самим оперативну сумісність,економію за рахунок масштабу і, зрештою, сильну європейську обороннупромисловість.

Про це йдетьсяin the message of the press service of the European Council.

“I congratulate yesterday's political agreement on Edirpa, a common tool for the European Defense Industry. Strengthening of the European Obron Industry by means of a joint law on the purchase of the Dustrobonorone industry greater predictability. It will also help to increase the volume to Ukraine. And will bring us closer to the European Defense Union, ”notedThe President of the European Commission Ursula von der Lien.

The Minister of Defense of Ukraine Oleksiy Reznikov thanked the US Defense Minister Lloydostin for a new defense assistance package for Ukraine.

About this it is referredIn his Twitter.

It will contain additional ammunition for air defense systems, HIMARS reactive systems, as well as Stinger anti-aircraft complexes, Javelin and AT-4 anti-tank complexes and anti-tank missiles.

NATO Secretary General met with seven members of the Alliance to prepare the Vilnius Summit

Author: ['АРМІЯINFORM']

Time: 2023-06-28T42:00:00-04:00

Description: General Secretary of NATO єns Stoltenberg at the Haazi is tolerated by the Lider Lider Krayan ... War with Ukraine 2022, War with Ukraine Latest News Today, News War with Ukraine 2022 Last today, will there be a war between Ukraine and Russia and when, the war with Ukraine in It will be or not, whether there will be a war with Ukraine in the near future, the war with Ukraine, Ukrainian news today, Ukrainian news in Ukrainian media in Russian will be in Russian

Images: ['meet.jpg']

Tags: ['ВІЛЬНЮСЬКИЙ САМІТ', 'ЄНС СТОЛТЕНБЕРГ', 'НАТО']

Category: News

NATO Secretary General Jens Stoltenberg met with seven Alliance leaders in Hague to help prepare the summit in Vilnius.

This is stated in messagePreschool.

The meeting was organized in conjunction with the Prime Minister of the Netherlands Mark Ruttei was attended by Prime Minister Albania Edie Rama, Prime Minister Belgiumiexander de Kroo, President of Lithuania Gitanas Nauseda, Prime Minister Norwegionasa Gar Storeo, President Poland Andrzej Duda and Romania President Clause.

Jens Stoltenberg noted that the summit will send a clear report of Ukraine's commitment. He thanked the Netherlands and other members of the Alliance of the Cutting of extremely important support, including a contribution to the comprehensive NATO package and the training of Ukrainian pilots on F-16 aircraft. He noted that the Vilnius Summit will be agreed by a long -term program for Ukraine and political relations will be further advanced, bringing Ukraine closer to its legal place in NATO.

"Russia's war in Ukraine demonstrates that we cannot take peace for granted, and we must invest more in our defense," Jens Stoltenberg said.

Images: ['ryutte-1.jpg']

Tags: ['ДОПОМОГА ПАРТНЕРІВ', 'КОРОЛІВСТВО НІДЕРЛАНДІВ', 'МАРК РЮТТЕ', 'СВІТ ПІДТРИМУЄ УКРАЇНУ']

The Prime Minister of the Netherlands Mark Rutte stressed that the country will continue to support Ukraine as much as it would be needed for it to be expelled from its land and to win in its struggle.

“This support includes bilateral weapons, as well as humanitarian and financial assistance. Moreover, we will continue to help build a modern Ukrainian army, which operates according to NATO standards and is capable of resisting Russia from Russia, ”saidMark Ruttettete during the meeting of NATO Secretary General Jens Stoltenberg with the Semomaliders of the Alliance.

Recall the Netherlands expressedWillingness to ensure the preparation of Ukrainian pilots on F-16 fighters.

Author: ['АРМІЯINFORM']

Time: 2023-06-28T46:00:00-04:00

Description: The camp on the wounds of 28 worms in RiCtzi at the deposit of the post “Kherson” RIVENSH VOVISHOV ... Images: ['oip-3.jpg']

Tags: ['ДНІПРО', 'ПІДРИВ КАХОВСЬКОЇ ГЕС', 'ХЕРСОН']

Category: News

As of the morning of June 28, in the Dnieper River, in the creation of the post "Kherson" the level of water in the natural channel, fluctuations of level correspond to the natural fluctuations of this time of year.

About it reportsHeadquarters for the elimination of consequences by Russian terrorists of the Kakhovka hydroelectric power station.

It is noted that 2 settlements in the right birch and 17 settlements in the temporarily occupied territory remain flooded.

During the last day, 72 thousand tons of water from 56 cellars were pumped. Over 373 008 tons of water have been pumped out of the beginning of work from 923 houses and cellars.

In addition, 59 tons of water were brought, 23 tonnes of drinking, 36 tonnes.

"From different types of weapons - mortars, tanks, artillery, RSZV, SDR, UAV, strategic and tactical aviation - 117 settlements and 163 objects of infrastructure were attacked," the statement reads.

There are killed and injured among civilians, the number of victims is clarified.

Ukrainians proved that worthy of having a sovereign state that will certainly take a proper place in the world - Alexei Reznikov

Author: ['АРМІЯINFORM']

Time: 2023-06-28T50:00:00-04:00

Description: Zachist sovereign і Teriteriynoye Ukrainian, forgetting ї Ekononichny that ... War with Ukraine 2022, War with Ukraine Latest news today, News War with Ukraine 2022 The last for today, will there be a war between Ukraine and Russia and when, the war with Ukraine in 2022 Whether there will be a year or not, will there be a war with Ukraine in the near future, they say, the war with Ukraine, Ukraine’s news today, Ukrainian news in Ukrainian media in Russian

Images: ['356388861_714628997340121_4292757859307740312_n-e1687945627183.jpg']

Tags: ['ДЕНЬ КОНСТИТУЦІЇ УКРАЇНИ', 'ОЛЕКСІЙ РЕЗНІКОВ', 'ОФІЦІЙНО']

Category: News

Protection of Ukraine's sovereignty and territorial integrity, ensuring its economic and information security are the most important functions of the state, the cause of the entire Ukrainian people.

About it on the occasion of the Constitution Day of Ukraine notedMinister of Defense of Ukraine Alexei Reznikov.

“Protection of the Motherland, Independence and Territorial Integrity of Ukraine, honoring its state symbols is a duty of Ukrainian citizens.

Citizens serve military service in accordance with the law. Today, everyone misses these norm -constitution of Ukraine through themselves.

Ukrainians have proven that they are worthy of having their own, sovereign and independent state. As anemaging, he will take a proper place in the world, ”he stressed.

According to the Minister of Defense of Ukraine, our duty to modern generations is to build a free, democratic, legal, wealthy country. For Ukrainians to be happy on their land, which is defended today.

“We fulfill our duty to previous and future generations.

The victory will be. Happy Constitution Day!Glory to Ukraine!" - Greetings of Ukrainians Alexei Reznikov.

Category: News

Illustrative photo

About it reportsGovernment portal with reference to Mozkraine data.

“From the first day of a large -scale war, the Russian army continues to aim at the medical infrastructure of Ukraine. The enemy is systematically destroyed, outpatient clinics, maternity hospitals.

Since the full -scale invasion of Russian missiles and shells, the large -scale 184 objects of medical institutions and another 1,376 objects have been destroyed, ”the testimony said.

It is noted that medical infrastructure of Kharkiv, Kherson, Donetsk, Mykolaiv and Kyiv region suffered the greatest losses.

“However, despite the constant bombing, Ukraine continues to restore the departments, as the restoration of medical infrastructure is one of the key tapricular aspects to ensure the availability of medical care.

In particular, as of the end of June 2023, 333 objects of medical institutions have already been completely restored and 357 other objects were partially restored.

Most restored medical institutions - in Mykolaiv region, Dnipropetrovsk, Kyiv, Kharkiv and Chernihiv.

Thus, despite the daily shelling and loads facing the Medical Harmony of Ukraine, the Ministry of Health, together with partners and will be given to restore the Ukrainian medical infrastructure after war, ”the message reads.

On June 29, there will be a discussion panel "The Rebellion of Prigogine and its Impact on the Political Situation in the Russian Federation"

Author: ['АРМІЯINFORM']

Time: 2023-06-28T56:00:00-04:00

Description: 29 worm 2023 Rock about 10:00 Military Media Center, the Diskkusna Panel is ... War with Ukraine 2022, War with Ukraine Latest news today, News War with Ukraine 2022 Last today, will there be a war between Ukraine and Russia and when, war With Ukraine in 2022 it will be or not, will there be a war with Ukraine in the near future, they say, the war with Ukraine, Ukrainian news today, Ukrainian news in Ukrainian media in Russian

Images: ['big-mmc.jpg']

Tags: ['БРИФІНГ', 'ВІЙНА', 'ЄВГЕН ПРИГОЖИН']

Category: News

Briefing

June 29 2023 at 10:00 in Military MediacenterThere will be a discussion panel "The Rebellion of Prigogine and its impact on the political situation in Russia and the course of the Ukrainian war."

Among the issues will be discussed: • the place and role of the "Wagner PVC" in the military-political system of Putin Russia, the attitude of the Russians to this formation on the basis of social survey; • declared and probable causes of the march to Moscow, its information and ideological design; • Why Lukashenko Prigogine? • Possible consequences of rebellion on the transformation of the Kremlin's political regime and it is influential into the course of the Russian-Ukrainian war.

Participants of the discussion panel: • Oleksandr Musienko, Chairman of the Board of the NGO "Centrivistic and Legal Research"; • Alexei Mustafin, Media Expert and Media Factor; • Igor Popov, political expert, Ukrainian Institute of the Future; • Yaroslav Chernogor, Director of the Russian and Belarussian Studies Program, Ukrainian Prism Rada; • Oleksandr Shulga, Head of the Institute of Conflictology and Analysis of Russia.

Accreditation of media representatives is required and will last until 09:00 on June 29!

To send accreditation applications to an email address: psmodu@post.mil.gov.uaindicating the magazine, name and patronymic of the journalist, name of the publication, contact telephone.

Follow the news and announcements in the Military Media Center Telegrams-https://t.me/militaryMediacenter.

Category: News

The Croatian Parliament recognized the Holodomor of 1932-1933 by the genocide of the Ukrainian Narode.

About it reportedForeign Minister of Ukraine Dmytro Kuleba.

The head of the foreign policy department expressed gratitude to the Croatian deputies.

“I am grateful to the Croatian Parliament for honoring the memory of millions of victims with cystic vote. The global recognition of the famine genocide continues to grow, ”he said.

Dmytro Kuleba emphasized that by November 2022, 15 countries were recognized as the Holodomorgenocide of the Ukrainian people. Since then, 12 more have joined them.

"I thank them for what we heard our requests and invite others to join. Identification honors the victims and warns future generations from genocide," the Foreign Minister wrote.

What to do if the activity of a missing person is revealed

Author: ['АРМІЯINFORM']

Time: 2023-06-28T65:00:00-04:00

Description: Yakshcho with the telephone of the zesposti people of the people above the dzvinok, SMS-povidolennya chi is navigated ... War with Ukraine 2022, war with Ukraine latest news today, news war with Ukraine 2022 The last for today, will there be a war between Ukraine and Russia and when, war with In 2022, Ukraine will be or not, will there be a war with Ukraine in the near future, they say, the war with Ukraine, Ukraine’s news today, Ukrainian news in Ukrainian media in Russian

Images: ['8abe8007-ae6f-40a9-a94c-44322a259471-1.jpg']

Tags: ['ОЛЕГ КОТЕНКО', 'УПОВНОВАЖЕНИЙ ЗІ ЗНИКЛИХ БЕЗВІСТИ']

Category: News

If a call has received a call from the phone, SMS has been reported to social networks, you should contact the investigator who will investigate the criminal proceedings. He needs to file a petition for the location of the radio electronic agent.

About it informsOleg Kotenko, a commissioner of quitting persons missing in special circumstances.

Within three working days, the investigator or goes to the court for providing a permit for information from mobile operators, abandon the request and submits a refusal.

If the petition is granted, then native persons need:

  • familiarize yourself with the case file and get the information from the mobile operator; * Provide a copy of the information from the operator to the Ombudsman missing in special circumstances by calling the hotline: 0 800 339 247; * Report the information received to the National Information Bureau by phone: 16-48.

It should be noted that the petition to the investigator can help to make a lawyer of the system of legal aid. You can get advice on the hotline: 0800 213 103.

News Source: https://armyinform.com.ua/2023/06/28/shho-robyty-yakshho-vyyavleno-aktyvnist-telefonu-znykloyi-bezvisty-lyudyny/

Author: ['АРМІЯINFORM']

Time: 2023-06-28T66:00:00-04:00

Images: ['verhovna-rada-e1634729714540.jpg']

Tags: ['ВЕРХОВНА РАДА УКРАЇНИ', 'ВСТУП УКРАЇНИ ДО НАТО', 'ЗАКОНОПРОЄКТ', 'ЗВЕРНЕННЯ', 'САМІТ НАТО']

Category: News

The Verkhovna Rada of Ukraine approved the appeal to the participants of the self -Atlantic Alliance in Vilnius.

About this it is referredLegaloproecti No. 9430, for which 279 people's deputies voted.

The Council suggested that the Alliance Summit to support the formula of Presidential Ukrainian Peace Volodymyr Zelensky for the establishment of a comprehensive, fair tastal peace in Ukraine for global security, as well as the creation of mechanism of curricisal consultations with Ukraine on the basis of the principles of Article 4 Ukraine or any other state-member.

The Ukrainian Parliament also urged the participants of the summit to celebrate the significant and political assistance to the Ukrainian people, which divides the general human democratic values, seeks to be an active participant of the eubyroatlantic space, as well as the success of Ukraine on the actual achievement of the compatibility of military standards of Ukraine with NATO standards.

In addition, the Council has called for a commitment to granting Ukraine full membership in the organization of the North Atlantic Treaty and to foresee the mechanism of invitation of Ukraine to NATO.

The application of the Ukrainian Parliament also calls for participants to develop effective mechanisms of peace and security guarantees in Europe and legally conscious security guarantees for non -nuclear Ukraine, which will not become a fate of Ukraine's membership in the Alliance.

At the same time, the Council calls on NATO a summit to continue the use of coordinated states to meet the needs of Ukraine in military and defense equipment, to promote Ukraine in strengthening defense capability and military potential of Ukraine, including land, marine and air components, complete renewal of Ukraine. the year.

The document emphasizes the need to coordinate further interaction within the framework of the NATO comprehensive assistance for Ukraine aimed at overcoming the full operational of the Armed Forces with the Alliance and the implementation of a complex transition to NATO standards, as well as its synchronization of the Alliance.

Author: ['АРМІЯINFORM']

Time: 2023-06-28T69:00:00-04:00

Tags: ['АГРЕСІЯ РФ', 'ВТОРГНЕННЯ РФ', 'ДСНС УКРАЇНИ', 'РОЗМІНУВАННЯ']

Category: News

Illustrative photo

During the day, pyrotechnic units of the State Service of Ukraine for Extraordinary Situation 146 times were involved in the execution of demining tasks.

About it reportsSESU of Ukraine.

Pyrotechnical units revealed, seized and disposed of 323 extinguishing objects . The territory of 41.54 hectares was surveyed.

Most often pyrotechnic units worked: in the Kharkiv region - 19 787 times, Kyiv region - 8 522, Donetsk region - 6 318, Mykolaiv region - 5 283, Kherson region - 5 875, Chernihiv - 4 745, Sumy - 2 230, Cherkasy region - 1 127.

Reference: In total since the beginning of a large -scale military invasion of the Russian Federation, the territory of Ukraine has been disposed of 405 430 430 -hazardous objects and 2 891 kg of explosive substance, in particular 3 043 Aviation bombs . The territory of more than 90 638 hectares was surveyed.

We would like to remind you if you find suspicious objects similar to wreckage from rockets or rockets, in no case touch your finds yourself and do not allow it to be tired. And:

  • Do not move objects, do not try to disassemble them, bring them into the premises, bury them in the ground, throw them in reservoirs, etc.

Immediately report the finding of the SES units - 101 or police - 102. Report experts and indicate the location of the suspicious name.

Illustrative photo

Today, on June 28, in the morning Russian troops fired four times the border areas of Chernihiv and Sumy regions.

About it reportsOperational Command "North".

In the Chernihiv region from 05:40 to 06:00 there were 3 parishes, probably a change of 120 mm, in the area of the settlement of Leonivka.

In the Sumy region the enemy opened fire three times:

  • from 01:00 to 01:10 3 parishes were recorded, probably the artillery, in the area of the settlement of Nova Guta; * from 01:20 to 01:35 3 parishes were recorded, probably 120 mm mortar, in the area of the settlement of Novovasylivka; * From 05:00 to 05:05 4 parishes were recorded, probably a mortar, in the area of the settlement of Vovkivka.

There were no losses on the loss of the local population or damage to civilian infrastructure.

No one has the right to determine the fate of Ukraine without asking our heroes - Volodymyr Zelenskyy

Author: ['АРМІЯINFORM']

Time: 2023-06-28T74:00:00-04:00

Description: At the 27th RICHNINY of the Constitutions of Ukraine, the president, having advocated before the talk of Oriyntiri ... The war with Ukraine 2022, the war with Ukraine is the latest news today, the News War with Ukraine 2022 Last today, will there be a war between Ukraine and Russia and when, the war with Ukraine in It will be or not, whether there will be a war with Ukraine in the near future, the war with Ukraine, Ukrainian news today, Ukrainian news in Ukrainian media in Russian will be in Russian

Images: ['80a6454f82dd9e0223fca3f0ce75a537_1687952459_extra_large.jpeg', 'b7ab92bfa51996de20e7229d9ebd8ca1_1687952453_extra_large.jpeg', 'da6c54a62dfe46cb5743349f4ed19664_1687952451_extra_large.jpeg', '5b61b9e909566a6b5da3c2b7328c7631_1687952459_extra_large.jpeg']

Tags: ['STOPRUSSIA', 'ВОЛОДИМИР ЗЕЛЕНСЬКИЙ', 'ПРЕЗИДЕНТ УКРАЇНИ']

Category: News

On the 27th anniversary of the Constitution of Ukraine, the President proposed to the discussion of the future Ukrainian doctrine and presented state awards. About it reportsThe official website of the representative of Ukraine.

President of Ukraine Volodymyr Zelensky took part in the plenary meeting of the 27th anniversary of the adoption of the Constitution of Ukraine, during a time proposed for a nationwide discussion the main guidelines of the nominative Ukrainian doctrine.

The meeting was also attended by Prime Minister Denis Shmigal, Head of the Office President Andriy Yermak, Commander-in-Chief of the Armed Forces of Ukraine Valeryzluzhny, Secretary of the National Security and Defense Council Alexei Danilov, Prosecutor General Andriy Kostin, government officials and representatives.

According to Volodymyr Zelenskyy during his speech in the session ash, Ukrainians have already shown that courage gives freedom, and prove that it is a success. "We will do it a Ukrainian axiom: freedom is successful," he said.

The President congratulated all the citizens on the Constitution of Ukraine, which despite its free soul and is guided by its people.

Volodymyr Zelensky is convinced that Ukrainian society needs new systems, new rules and new opportunities, because for a long time state institutions and representatives of the state have treated Ukrainians cruelly, disdainful Takhizhka.

“We will create a new and much stronger Ukraine!What to be the victorious Ukraine-let us all together. Just as we defend freedom and independence together, ”the President said.

"As a constitution lays the foundations, we need doctrine for our country. For Ukraine, which goes to victory. Tuplya Ukraine-winner. This doctrine should respond to all the fundamental wards on Ukraine and our future - both to us, our neighbors, and every world, ”the head of state said.

Separately, Volodymyr Zelenskyy invited to discuss the provisions of the provisions of the Ukrainian soldiers: from soldiers, sailors and sergeantivo generals.

“No one has the right to determine the fate of Ukraine without asking them, our heroes. And I am everyone and everyone in the defense and security forces of Ukraine - as far as the conditions of war allow - to participate in our general national discussion on the Ukrainian doctrine, ”the heads said.

As a guarantor of the Constitution of Ukraine, the President proposed to the beginning of the general discussion about the Ukrainian doctrine five the main abractions.

The first is the philosophy of our victory.

The second is the globality of Ukrainian security.

The third is the heroes policy.

The fourth is justice policy.

Fifth - Transformation for 10 years(New foreign policy, economy, relations between the state and society, development of territories, education and science, culture, level of security and freedom in Ukraine).

«Це – напрями, які можуть бути розкриті тими чи іншими конкретними пунктами,які нація визначить як важливі», – заначив Президент.

«Свобода – це дитя небайдужості, а безпека – побратим сміливості. Українаперемоги буде країною, достойною своїх героїв», – наголосив Глава держави.

Після виступу Володимир Зеленський вручив ордени «Золота Зірка»військовослужбовцям, яким присвоєно звання Героя України, та передав орденичленам сімей воїнів, удостоєних цього звання посмертно.

Зокрема, з рук Президента отримав орден полковник Сергій Яременко. З початкуповномасштабного вторгнення Росії на територію нашої країни підрозділизенітної ракетної бригади під його керівництвом знищили загалом майже 490ворожих цілей.

Глава держави вручив «Золоту Зірку» Героя України командиру штурмової роти ЗСУлейтенанту Олександру Коваленку. У серпні 2014-го він приєднався додобровольчого батальйону «Айдар», у складі якого захищав суверенітет ітериторіальну цілісність України. Після початку повномасштабної агресії РФпроти нашої держави багато разів завдавав противнику значних втрат у живійсилі й техніці, особисто взяв у полон військовослужбовця російської армії.Неодноразово керував штурмовими діями роти на Донбасі. Територію, яку піхотаПВК «Вагнер» захоплювала чотири місяці, штурмова рота на чолі з ОлександромКоваленком звільнила за чотири дні.

Володимир Зеленський також передав ордени рідним військовослужбовців, які булиудостоєні звання Героя України посмертно.

The Golden Star of Hero of Ukraine also handed over to the family of the commander of the tank platoon the chief sergeant Alexei Senyuk, who, after the start of the full -scale offensive of Russia, participated in the protection of the city of Chernihiv and died on February 27, 2022 during the combat task.

The highest state award was also transferred to the mother of the deputy commander of the anti -aircraft missile battery of Lieutenant Vitaliy Movchan. On the day of the commencement of full -scale maintenance of Russia, the anti -aircraft missile service under the leadership of the lieutenant identified the enemy's air goals, which bombed the positions of Ukrainian Yavysk in the Donbass. However, enemy Mi-24 helicopters, using a complex area of the area, struck Vitaliy Movchan's fighting car.

The head of state passed the Order and Mother of Junior Lieutenant Yuri Blokh, who waged on March 2, 2022 in Mykolaiv region. He provided the platoon's departure, which saved the life of the personnel, but as a result of the enemy mortar, he was injured, incompatible with life.

The award was handed over to the family of artillery player, a senior soldier Alexander Labunsky, who, together with the commander of the reactive artillery battery, destroyed the colony troops in the Kiev direction and came under hostile shelling. During the combat mission, the serviceman was killed.

The Order also received the mother of Lieutenant Bohdan Korniychuk, who from 2020 participated in the operation of the Joint Forces in the Donbass and stood on the protection of Ukraine during a full -scale invasion of Russia. At the beginning of March 2022 in Donetsk region, he removed the military equipment of the unit from the prices of Russian artillery, entered into an unequal battle with the enemy, was injured, but at the cost of his own life provided the rest of the tank company warehouse with the opportunity to regroup and give the occupants.

The Head of State passed the "Golden Star" to the family headquarters Sergey Kulik, an instructor for the preparation of artillery units of the Training Center of Training of Units of the International Center for Peacekeeping and Security of the Hetman Petro Sahaidachny Land Forces. In early March 2022, during the battle of the city of Bucha, the city of Bucha, during the battle of Rabbit invaders, Sergei Kulik took fire and saved the life of the fellow people. Thanks to his courageous actions, a massive attack of the enemy was reflected, the living force and equipment of the Russian army were destroyed.The President passed the Order to the native commander of a mechanized platoon Litenanthalian Stupak, who died in early March 2022 during the release of the Pottonic Point of Husarivka, Kharkiv region. The lieutenant personally destroyed the enemy, which made it possible to reach the units. Lately supported the cover of the platoon and heroically died, retaining the life of the personal composition.

The attendees paid a moment of silence to the memory of the dead in the battles for Ukraine.

Volodymyr Zelensky also presented the honors of the President of Ukraine "Cross of Fighting Zaslug" by Senior Sergeant Galina Kozachenko, Senior Sergeant Dmitry Gnev, Soldier Sergey Kolim, Lieutenant Colonel Vasily Krasovsky, Major Bogdanuk, Colonel Ivan Lukashevich.

The Ministry of Finance urges Russia to recognize high -risk jurisdiction for financing Wagner PECs

Author: ['АРМІЯINFORM']

Time: 2023-06-28T76:00:00-04:00

Description: Minsky Castle of the Ukrainian Ukrainian, to the miversity, vanish to vange to the Russian jurisdiction ... War with Ukraine 2022, war with Ukraine Latest news today, News War with Ukraine 2022 The last for today, will there be a war between Ukraine and Russia and when, the war with Ukraine in 2022 Will it be or not, will there be a war with Ukraine in the near future, they say, the war with Ukraine, Ukraine’s news today, Ukrainian news in Ukrainian media in Russian

Images: ['11c4e5a45ecde146cfafdc83ffddc41e_l.jpg']

Tags: ['АГРЕСІЯ РФ', 'МІНІСТЕРСТВО ФІНАНСІВ УКРАЇНИ', 'МІНФІН', 'ПВК ВАГНЕРА']

Category: News

The Ministry of Finance of Ukraine calls for an international community to recognize a high risk of Russian and provide appropriate market recommendations in order to avoid facilitating the financing of terrorism and organized crime, in particular, Wagner PEC from the State Budget of the Russian Federation. About it reportsGovernment portal.

Yesterday, Russian President Putin in his speech stated that Russia fully financialized the Wagner PEC from the federal budget and paid "86 262 000 000 rubles(about $ 1 billion)monetary support and rewards <…> and 110179 000 000 rubles(about $ 1.3 billion)Insurance payments »Mad year.

Wagner PVC is a military organization founded in 2014, which uses a growing tactic around the world. Estonia, Lithuania and Parliament of France have identified it with a terrorist organization. The French Parliament has called on the Esophically to recognize the Russian group of "Wagner" mercenaries terrorist, and it is a sign that the United Kingdom also plans to recognize this company terrorist. Shazazavaded sanctions against Wagner as a transnational criminal organization.

The Wagner group uses Russian government funds to spread around the world and people's deaths. The company's mercenaries committed numerous crimes in Ukraine, supported the bloody Bashar al -Assad regime in Syria in the TAZs are accused of committing numerous atrocities and war crimes in Mali, Central African Republic, Sudan and Libya.

Considering that the company is funded directly from the Russian State Budget, any company operating within the Russian jurisdiction is at risk of facilitating terrorism and financing for organized traffic. International companies that continue to conduct business and pay taxes in Russia indirectly contribute to Wagner's financing. Financial institutions and other entities outside Russia, which deals with the funds received from in different countries, assistance in the supply and financing of a criminal group, as well as participation of non -consumer trade.At the same time, a group of mercenaries is illegal in Russia, according to the Criminal Code of Ukraine. "The fact that a group of" Wagner "was funded from the State Budget contrary to Russian laws and norms, once again demonstrates that there is no more than a smoke curtain that covers the ineffective system of seizure/counteracting the financing of terrorism and criminal organizations. , - the Minister of Finance of Ukraine added.

For violation of the rights of children of the United Nations, the Russian Federation included as a side of armed conflict, in the "List of Shame"

Author: ['АРМІЯINFORM']

Time: 2023-06-28T78:00:00-04:00

Description: The General Secretary of the Organized National National National Association of Zvoti Skodi Datey has a Zbroini ... War with Ukraine 2022, War with Ukraine Latest News today, News War with Ukraine 2022 Last for today, will there be a war between Ukraine and Russia and when, War with In 2022, Ukraine will be or not, will there be a war with Ukraine in the near future, they say, the war with Ukraine, Ukraine’s news today, Ukrainian news in Ukrainian media in Russian

Images: ['47_big.jpg']

Tags: ['ДІТИ', 'ДІТИ ВІЙНИ', 'ООН', 'ОФІС ГЕНЕРАЛЬНОГО ПРОКУРОРА УКРАЇНИ', 'ПОРУШЕННЯ ПРАВ ДІТЕЙ', 'РОСІЯ', 'СПИСОК ГАНЬБИ']

Category: News

Illustrative photo

The Secretary General of the United Nations in his report on children of armed conflict for 2023 considers Russia and its settings responsible for the murder of Ukrainian children, as well as for attacks at hospital and school. About it reportsOffice of the Prosecutor General of Ukraine.

The inclusion of the Secretary General of Russia-P5 member in the annual "List of Shame" as parties of the armed conflict responsible for serious violations of children is an important notice to the aggressor state and criminals involved in the committing atrocities in relation to children: such actions are not permitted and are not worried.

The report also refers to the movement of Ukrainian children to Russia and the navigated territories with a call to Russia to act in the best interests of the child - to contribute to the reunification of the family, while guaranteeing that their citizenship is not building. This is in line with the problem of compulsory deportation of Ukrainian children in Russia - an international crime, which was in fact that the international criminal judgment was arrested for the arrest of President Putin this year.

We urge the United Nations to closely monitor Russia's actions, and as well as the measures that it pledged to take to improve the protection of Ukrainian children under its effective control.

There is currently no such progress: according to our latest estimates, in the beginning of full -scale aggression of Russia against Ukraine, 493 children were killed and 1033 were injured, almost 20,000 children have been forcibly deported. These are only those cases that are listed in criminal proceedings. These figures do not include temporarily occupied territories, so real figures can be significantly high. In total, in Ukraine, law enforcement agencies are investigating more than 3,000 rays against children.

The international community should be remembered that the desire for peace can not be identified by the victim and the aggressor, since the act of aggression of Russia has led to an armed conflict and continuous commission of cruel crimes in Ukraine by its forces and settings.The Office of the Prosecutor General is working closely with the UN International International Investigation Commission on Ukraine, providing information on the forced movement of Ukrainian children and other serious violations of children's rights from September 2022. Two meetings have been carried out and one request for information was provided. crimes committed against children in the course of Russian aggression.

In Ukraine, a working group was created at the state level on interaction of the special representative of the UN Secretary General for Children and Armed Conflicts. In the course of its work, the Office of the Prosecutor General provides information on severe violations of children by Russia.

Our prosecutors are in contact with experts of the International Criminal Court. More than 40 volumes of cases of cases have been transferred to the Ministry of Internal Affairs, more than 30 requests for the protection of evidence, information and investigative actions have been fulfilled.

We also cooperate with the experts of the Moscow OSCE mechanism. The latest report of the Soming mechanism was dedicated to the protection of the rights of deported Ukrainian children. During its training, the OSCE experts held meetings with prosecutors who carry out procedural guidance in criminal proceedings on the deportation of children and other international crimes committed against children.

News Source: https://armyinform.com.ua/2023/06/28/za-porushennya-prav-ditej-oon-vklyuchylo-rf-yak-storonu-zbrojnogo-konfliktu-do-spysku-ganby/

The President of Ukraine proposes the Verkhovna Rada to formally consolidate the status of English

Author: ['АРМІЯINFORM']

Time: 2023-06-28T79:00:00-04:00

Description: President of Ukraine Volodymyr Zelensky, having submitted to the Supreme for the sake of bills No. 9432 “About ... war with Ukraine 2022, war with Ukraine latest news today, news war with Ukraine 2022 Last today, will there be a war between Ukraine and Russia and when, the war with Ukraine In 2022 it will be or not, will there be a war with Ukraine in the near future, they say, the war with Ukraine, Ukraine’s news today, Ukrainian news in Ukrainian media in Russian

Images: ['1000_545_1665856209-9432.webp']

Tags: ['АНГЛІЙСЬКА МОВА', 'ВЕРХОВНА РАДА УКРАЇНИ', 'ВОЛОДИМИР ЗЕЛЕНСЬКИЙ']

Category: News

President of Ukraine Volodymyr Zelensky has submitted to the Verkhovna Rada a bill No. 9432"On the application of the English language in Ukraine", which proposes to officially consolidate the statusanglian as one of the languages of international communication in Ukraine.

The project normalizes the use of English in the work of bodies of state and local authorities, local self -government bodies, subdivision -extruded assistance to the population, during the crossing of the state border, in spherehokhors, culture, transport, health care, etc.

"Transformation of the status of English in Ukraine is the need for an histategic step to the full membership of our country in the EU, because knowledge of the English language is a key competence in the conditions of globalization changes" _, _ - it is saida relevant note to the bill.

The document proposes to identify the categories of positions whose candidates are obliged to develop English. Requirements for compulsory English are set for persons claiming positions:

  • State Service of Category A; * State Service of Categories "B" and "B", the list of which is established by the Cabinet of Ministers; * heads of local state administrations, their first deputies and deputies; * officers of officers who are contracting military service , the list of which is established by the Cabinet of Ministers; * police of the Middle and High Composition of the National Police of Ukraine, positions of the commanding staff of other law enforcement agencies, positions of the commanding staff of the Civil Protection Service, the list of which is established by the Cabinet of Ministers of Ukraine; * prosecutors; * in the tax and customs authorities, the list of which is established by the Cabinet of Ministers; * Heads of economic sector of economy, whose list is established by the Cabinet of Ministers.

News Source: https://armyinform.com.ua/2023/06/28/prezydent-ukrayiny-proponuye-verhovnij-radi-oficzijno-zakripyty-status-anglijskoyi-movy/

Images: ['71801aef48dd2bd615767e42dc0d2c875774f96f.jpg', '814cd97c2d60a9dbe4e28c9d549f59fff2da74cd.jpg', '349dd7f9aeae06998a3bbffe277ed2eff54c536b-150x150.jpg', 'fa6012f551e89f5a12eaf8ba9529d6b9302a2a76-150x150.jpg', '1a912a88f24a9058e85f72b85e6f878992f024d5-150x150.jpg', '6d6ed8b8685cadea04db589c69b3c6130fe6b4ec-150x150.jpg', '13f178725dfef556bebbeacbbbba5b085fd0a527-150x150.jpg', '0ec0c50a921023d7e01d2afbdee1a4ccdf439188-150x150.jpg', '256486ae1d56780f7e0a00e45cab104d950ebc74-150x150.jpg']

Category: News

The Minister of Defense of Ukraine Alexei Reznikov on the occasion of the Constitution Day of Ukraine has heard state awards and departmental honors to servicemen and civil workers of the components of defense forces, civil servants, as well as volunteers.

"Since the beginning of the war in 2014, and especially after the large -scale invasion of HRF, such concepts of basic law as" territorial integrity "," dignity "," duty of a citizen of Ukraine to defend the Motherland "became for society, united it for the reproach of the aggressor. Everyone in their place will protect the values that are recorded in the Constitution of Ukraine, - Oleksiresnikov said.

The minister noted that the world believed in the victory of Ukraine. Our partnerships are supporting and weapons. We have tanks, artillery, and systems. Now, as never before, there is a question of Ukraine's rapid accession to joint -safe architecture to become a panel of Europe.

Alexei Reznikov thanked and noted the contribution of each of the present victory.

!(Images/AРМІЯINFORM/2023-06-28T80-00-00-04-00/349dd7f9aeae06998a3bbffe277ed2eff54c536b-150x150.jpg)

“I have no doubt that we will be gathered more than once and greeted one after our victory, which has already been written in history. It is written because we create it and already know not only the enemies but also the partners who are in our victory, ”the Minister of Defense emphasized.

Alexei Reznikov handed over to the father of the deceased hero-volunteer Alexei Kazimiraordin "for courage" of III degree. In addition, the Medal of the Cross-Navy was presented for the first time. It was received by the captain of the third rank of river Fleetilivms of the Armed Forces Sergey Odinets.

Derello: Ministry of Defense of Ukraine

Colonel Sergei Yaremenko was awarded the title Hero of Ukraine

Author: ['Анастасія Олехнович']

Time: 2023-06-28T81:00:00-04:00

Description: Syogodnі, 28 worms, the day of the constitutes of Ukraine, President Volodymyr Zelenskiyi Assigned ... War with Ukraine 2022, War with Ukraine Latest News Today, News War with Ukraine 2022 Last today, will there be a war between Ukraine and Russia and when, war with In 2022, Ukraine will be or not, will there be a war with Ukraine in the near future, they say, the war with Ukraine, Ukraine’s news today, Ukrainian news in Ukrainian media in Russian

Images: ['1-51.jpg', '2-57-1536x1023-1.jpg', '840fb41b-ef74-461b-9b58-a7476dc194da.jpg']

Tags: ['ВТОРГНЕННЯ РФ', 'ГЕРОЇ НЕСКОРЕНОЇ УКРАЇНИ!', 'ГЕРОЙ УКРАЇНИ', 'ППО ЗСУ']

Category: News

Today, on June 28, on the Day of the Constitution of Ukraine, President Vladimirzelensky awarded the title of Hero of Ukraine to the colonel Sergiuyaremenko, commander of the 96th Anti-aircraft missile brigade of the Center Air Command.

Since the beginning of a large -scale invasion, Sergei Yaremenko heads a team that kicks off air attacks on the central and northern regions of Ukraine. And most importantly - provides air protection of the capital of our country.

It was the anti-aircraft command under the command of Sergiy Yaremenko on the call sign "Granite" withstood the crazy air attacks on Kiev in May-June, not allowing any more than 200 goals to accurately hit objects, and destroyed 13 "invincible" aerobalist missiles X-47 "dagger". They have mastered modern anti-aircraft missile complexes of different manufacturers and bypassed probability theory, increasing more than a 100 percent result.

  • I always say thanks to the whole brigade after every destroyed purpose, - a commander. - Excellent results can be achieved, of course, thanks to arms, and above all - the skills of the anti -aircraft stations, which are almost never underdeveloped template. Our people have a truly invaluable experience, and I am completely unparalleled. I am sure that we will outline it in books that will study new -stients. Due to the whole set of measures of introduction into the fuel, constant change of positions, different tactical techniques, we managed to take a system of probability theory.

Sergiy Yaremenko noted that the air defense a year ago and now - these are dramatically different things. The office hopes that in a year we will see an even more powerful level of re -empty defense.

  • I am sure that the whole "legacy of the USSR" will gradually become history, and the brigade will be re -armed with modern technology. I am convinced that it is already clear how important it is to invest in the country's air protection.

News Source: https://armyinform.com.ua/2023/06/28/polkovnyku-sergiyu-yaremenku-prysvoyeno-zvannya-geroj-ukrayiny/

Author: ['Дмитро Горбунов']

Time: 2023-06-28T82:00:00-04:00

Description: On the Tsomo, a peremnic intercessor of the Ministra of Ukrainian, Lieutenant General Olensandr ... Images: ['oleksandr_pavlyuk.jpg']

Tags: ['ОЛЕКСАНДР ПАВЛЮК', 'ПЕРЕВІРКА ТЦК І СП', 'ТЦК', 'ТЦК І СП']

Category: News

This was emphasized by the First Deputy Minister of Defense of Ukraine General-General Pavlyuk during the "Uniform News" Tele scale.

  • Yes, I have got the task from the President of Ukraine to create a working group. This is very important, because there is a lot of negative activity in the information space. The working group has already been created by the power block, namely: NAPC, DBR, SBU and National Police, which will be able to check on its issues. A group of armed forces has also been created to analyze the performance of service tasks - reported Pavlyuk.

He added that law enforcement agencies, among other things, will carefully check the responsibility of the lifestyle of the CCC and JV officials to those data in their declarations.

  • The main thing in this work is not to interfere with the task of mobilizing. Why? First of all, we know well what was more attention to the Russian agency in 2014. It was to the mobilization processes. At the end of 2013, the system of military enlistment offices was only destroyed, which was not able to perform these important tasks. Therefore, it is not possible to allow this check to harm the execution of the basic tasks,-said Lieutenant General Oleksandr Pavlyuk.

According to him, the Russian agency still works in the direction of creation of fakes in the activities of the Tax Code and JV. Therefore, it is necessary to check any information only by official sources. Unfortunately, some Ukrainian media fall into the information hook of the invaders.

  • When analyzing all these processes, one must carefully approach the truth of other information. There are now many measures to improve confidence. Thus, 253 people have been gaminated for various reasons for various reasons. But it's not dogma. After all, just the replacement will be ineffective if the system does not work correctly, - said the defender of Ukraine.

He said that the servicemen of the Tax Code and JV were constantly sent to the front by a landing replacement with those who had a fighting or a fighting injury there.

The Council allowed the military to use cars with the right location of the steering wheel

Author: ['АРМІЯINFORM']

Time: 2023-06-28T83:00:00-04:00

Description: The Verkhovna Rada of Ukraine adopted the Law "On Amendments to Article 29 of the Law of Ukraine

Images: ['img_top.jpg']

Tags: ['ВЕРХОВНА РАДА УКРАЇНИ', 'ЗАКОНОПРОЄКТ']

Category: News

The Verkhovna Rada of Ukraine approvedThe Law "Drawing on Article 29 of the Law of Ukraine" On Traffic "on the provision of a permit for servicemen during the legal regime of the military regime of the Military Stanition to use transport with the right location of the steering wheel".

About this it is referredon the Facebook page of the Verkhovna Rada of Ukraine.

“They granted permission to the servicemen during the martial law, to use the car traffic with the right location of the steering wheel. Such changes are increased by the defense forces of Ukraine properly and effectively to fulfill the assigned tasks for the protection of the country, ”Ruslan Stefanchuk commented the adoption of the Law of the Governor of Ukraine.

He specified that they supported the legislative initiative immediately as a result and as a whole.

As noted in explanatory record, changes in dosourcing provide permission to servicemen during the martial law within 90 days after its cancellation to use vehicles with the right steering wheel.

Illustrative Photo 🔥 Situation on Russian invasion

About it reportsThe General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine.

“The enemy continues to focus the main efforts in the Liman, Bakhmut Tamarin directions, and heavy battles are ongoing. There were about 20 fight collisions during the day.

In Volyn and Polissya directions Operational situation without significant changes. No signs of formation of offensive groups were detected.

In the Siversky and Slobozhansky directions the enemy was struck by the Aviation strike of the Russian Loza Kharkiv region. Carried out mortar Tartilerian shelling of more than 25 settlements, in particular, it is the Leonivka Chernihiv region; Novovasilovka, Znob-Novgorod, Nova Guta, Vovkasum region, as well as veterinary, Kozacha Lopan, small aisles, Gatyshche, Pletenivka, Bochkovo, Unterty, Round and Budarka in Kharkiv.

In the Lyman direction, the enemy performed unsuccessful offensive actions in the district of Razdolivka. He struck air strikes in the areas of Bigorivka of the Luhansk region of Tasvanivka and Sea - Donetsk. More than 10 painted points, including Nevskoye, Bigorivka of Lugansk region Tatatsky, Verkamyanskoye, Rozdolivka of Donetsk region, have suffered artillery shelling.

In the Bakhmut direction, the enemy conducted unsuccessful offensive actions in the regional and Vasilivka district, Bogdanivka, White Mountain and struck an aviation strike in the district York York of Donetsk region. From enemy artillery shellings, there are 15 settlements, including Vasyukivka, Orikhovo-Vasylivka, Markovo, Chrome, Yar, Ivanivske, Ivanovskaya, Southern in Donetsk region.In the Mariinsky direction, our defenders repelled all the attacks of the enemy in the Marinka's city, at the same time, the enemy struck the aviation strike within this disaster. At the same time, he made artillery shelling in the districts of 10 settlements, including Marinka and Victory of Donetsk region.

In the mineral direction the enemy performed unsuccessful offensive actions in the departure of Novomikhailivka. He struck aviation in the Tamakarivka Donetsk region. He fired at more than 15 settlements, including Konstantinovka, Paraskovka, Novomikhailivka, Prychistivka, Zolotaniv, Free Field, Storozhevo, Blessed, Makarivka, Rivnopil Donetsk region.

In Zaporizhzhya and Kherson directions the enemy concentrates the main assets on preventing the promotion of our troops. The enemy caused aviation shot areas of Levadny and Little Tokmachka of Zaporizhzhya region. About 30 settlements are carried out. In particular, levadne, Olgivske, Guliaypole, railway, charming Zaporizhzhya region came under the fire; Mikhailivka, Gavrilovka, Obradokamyanka, Mykolaivka, Olgivka, Burguka, Lviv, Ivanivka, Naddnipryansk, Antonovka, Kherson, Komyshany, Dnipro, Amber, Berehove, Tomina Balka, Sofiyivka of Kherson region.

For servicemen increased the duration of leave to 30 days

Author: ['АРМІЯINFORM']

Time: 2023-06-28T85:00:00-04:00

Description: Syogodnі, 28 Chervnya, Verkhovna Rada of Ukraine brought the prolact No. 9342 VD 05/29/2023 “Law ... War with Ukraine 2022, war with Ukraine Latest news today, News War with Ukraine 2022 Last for today, will there be a war between Ukraine and Russia and Russia and Russia and Russia and Russia and Russia and Russia and Russia and Russia and Russia and Russia and Russia and Russia and Russia and Russia and Russia and Russia and Russia and Russia and Russia and Russia and Russia When the war with Ukraine in 2022 will be or not, will there be a war with Ukraine in the near future, the war with Ukraine, Ukraine’s news today, Ukrainian news in Ukrainian media in Russian

Images: ['photo_5370758786224079735_y.jpg']

Tags: ['ВІДПУСТКА', 'ВРУ', 'ГРОШОВІ ВИПЛАТИ']

Category: News

Today, June 28, the Verkhovna Rada of Ukraine adopted the project # 9342dated 29.05.2023 “The Law on Amendments to Certain Legislative Acts of Ukraine on Separate Requests related to the passage of military service during the military station”, according to which the annual leave is increased for servicemen. Also, monthly additional remuneration is provided for servicemen time of combat(special)tasks.

About it reportsThe press service of the Verkhovna Rada of Ukraine.

“Changes are suggested to allow servicemen to use part of the annual leave duration 30 -calendar days with the possibility of division into parts in the course of action.(To date - 10 Calendar Days)», - the message reads.

In addition, during the martial law, military personnel are paid monthly remuneration from 30 to 100 thousand hryvnias proportional to combat execution(special)tasks in order, size and on the conditions established by the Cabinet of Ministers of Ukraine.

Urgent military service is paid on a monthly basis for a monthly reward of 6 thousand hryvnias in proportion to the time of military service.

Servicemen who were injured(injury, injury, injury)related to the protection of the Motherland during the fighting and which are being identified at the disposal of the relevant commander during the temporary container of military service, established by the Military Medical Commission, an additional remuneration of the 6 thousand UAH is paid on a monthly basis.

Cadets of higher military educational institutions, as well as higher educational establishments, which have military institutes in their composition, faculties of military preparation, departments of military preparation are paid on a monthly basis additional Babinorod in the amount 2 350 UAH in proportion to the training time.

News Source: https://armyinform.com.ua/2023/06/28/dlya-vijskovosluzhbovcziv-zbilshyly-tryvalist-vidpustky-do-30-dniv/

Author: ['Дмитро Горбунов']

Images: ['ganna-malyar.jpg']

Tags: []

Category: News

The Deputy Ministers of Ukraine Anna Malyar informed about it on the air of the only news.

  • It is necessary to understand well that the Russians are not going to just give the thumbnails that have already captured. They use all tools: blasting Dambikakhovsky hydroelectric power plant, nuclear rhetoric, mines and more. Here it is important to correctly evaluate our offensive actions. It is not only the measurement of a kilometers of targeting the number of released settlements. The military is performing considerable tasks. For example, they perform the task of reducing the offensive of the enemy. If we talk about last week, 110 places of concentration of Russian army were destroyed by our armed forces. Also eliminated 11 management and 7 field warehouses with Russian weapons, - told the painter.

She also noted that the enemy continues to resist in all directions of linefront.

  • The armed forces are now confidently moving Mariupol and Berdyansk. Every day there is a forward promotion. For example, to speak Prokhnopil, on the one hand - it is a small settlement, but our arms have first have to fix themselves there. That is, some distance we have passed, Apothim is given several days to fix. This should be taken into account when you read the news about a counter -offensive. Therefore, everything lasts according to the plan. Literally in front of Cimfir, I contacted the commander of individual areas. Therefore, I can say that now Rivnopil is fully controlled, - Hannamaars assured.

She reported that the main direction of the enemy's offensive remains East.

  • The invaders are suffered by significant losses there. But here it should be understood that by the word "loss" our military implies: the fallen invaders wounded in captivity. Speaking about the current composition of the invaders, the Wagner PEC does not fight on the front. By the way, the Wagnerivtsi was threatened with shooting and periodically. Instead, other PECs and regular Russian, as we know, do not use such "motivation". The occupiers will be less confident in the war for them if they are undone in the back, - said the Deputy Minister of Defense of Ukraine.

Tags: ['ІРИНА ВЕРЕЩУК', 'МІНРЕІНТЕГРАЦІЇ', 'НЕБЕЗПЕКА ПІДРИВУ ЗАЕС']

Category: News

Viceremier-Minister Irina Vereshchuk participated in the preparatory meeting of the military crisis. About it reportsMinistry of Reintegration of Temporarily Occupied Territories.

The event was chaired by the Minister of Energy Herman Galushchenko. Nanoma was also attended by the Minister of Environmental Protection and Natural Resources River Sagittarius, President of NNEGC "Energoatom" Petro Kotin, Head of the State Inspectorate of Nuclear Regulation of Ukraine Oleg Korikov, representatives of the SES, as well as Zaporozhye, Dnipropetrovsk, Mykolaiv and Kherson regional administrations.

The main purpose of the staff is to analyze information on the situation on the occupied occupiers of the ZPP, modeling different scenarios for the development of events of targeting on them in the event of a possible terrorist attack.

For prompt response, the headquarters receives data from sensors that use energy, SES and the State Inspectorate of Nuclear Regulation. Four IAEA experts are also released at the station. It is important that they take an active position on the reports and monitoring of the situation.

The meeting stated that one of the blocs continues to operate the hot stop. The invaders deliberately block it into a cold stop mode. This significantly increases the risk of a terrorist threat on a nuclear object.

Instead, all emergency services are ready for possible development. Developed protocols of joint actions.

In order to work out their detailed work, the crisis headquarters made a decision to conduct relevant large -scale exercises with the involvement of central, regional and local importance.

Currently, military personnel of the Armed Forces of Ukraine are training in rapid European countries, participating in military maneuvers in the United Kingdom. The training of the SI breeze series, which involves the personnel of the assembly of the Navy of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, started.

In total, 24,000 Ukrainian soldiers have been trained in the EU countries.

Weapons and military equipment supplied by partner countries contains almost all technical documentation in English.

I believe that if earlier the issue of studying English servicemen was renowned in nature, it should now be enshrined at the legislative level, ”Sergey Naev said.

Volodymyr Zelenskyy met with Presidents of Poland and Lithuania in Kiev

Author: ['АРМІЯINFORM']

Time: 2023-06-28T89:00:00-04:00

Description: President of Ukraine Volodymyr Zelensky Zustvich Iz President of Polshchi ... War with Ukraine 2022, War with Ukraine Latest News today, News War with Ukraine 2022 Last for today, will there be a war between Ukraine and Russia and when the war with Ukraine in 2022 Will it be or not, will there be a war with Ukraine in the near future, they say, the war with Ukraine, Ukraine’s news today, Ukrainian news in Ukrainian media in Russian

Images: ['26062f3b5525ad34b0d1372f8c784b6e_1687959586_extra_large.jpeg']

Tags: ['ВОЛОДИМИР ЗЕЛЕНСЬКИЙ', 'ПРЕЗИДЕНТ ЛИТВИ ГІТАНАС НАУСЕДА', 'ПРЕЗИДЕНТ ПОЛЬЩІ АНДЖЕЙ ДУДА', 'ПРЕЗИДЕНТ УКРАЇНИ']

Category: News

President of Ukraine Volodymyr Zelensky held a meeting with Poland President Andrzej Duda and the President of the Republic of Lithuania, who came to our country on a visit.

Welcoming friends and partners of Ukraine, Volodymyr Zelenskyy noted the importance of his visit today - on the day of the Constitution of our country.

“Such a meeting is an obvious signal of support for both our freedom and our Europe, our desire to live freely and in accordance with the law. I want to thank, Gitanas, you. Very grateful for everything. I thank you, Andzeya. I thank the peoples to the Stores, Lithuania and Poland, for the extremely significant daily support of Ukraine - armed, political, economic and humanitarian, ”said the Head of State, addressing the leaders of Lithuania and Poland during a joint meeting with media reporters in Kiev.

Separately, Volodymyr Zelenskyy thanked for the powerful decision of Lithuania to buy two NASAMS air defense establishments for transfer to Ukraine.

"We really need it, our people - Ukrainians, Ukrainians," he said.

During the meeting, the leaders of the three countries discussed the whole set of topical issues. Volodymyr Zelensky informed his colleagues about the active action of Ukrainian troops at the front, which allow them to release the landlords step by step.

The parties discussed the preparation for the NATO Vilnius Summit.

“There is a real opportunity to make a summit decision really needed for the entire Yevrop. It depends only on whether these decisions will be in the interests of the Alliance, that is, aimed at inviting Ukraine to NATO, ”the president of Ukraine emphasized.

The attention of European integration of Ukraine was also paid to. Volodymyrzelensky emphasized that our state is expecting the beginning of the EU membership this year and thanked the partners for their support.

“Of course, we talked about the formula of peace and our preparation for the global mitigation of peace, which will unite different states for the sake of one purpose - the real rejection of Russian aggression. Russia is losing this war, no one in Europe is doubting. And we will gain peace and real long safety for our people. All together, in unity, strengthening each other, strengthening our alliances, in particular NATO, strengthening the European Union and our common European way of life, ”the head of the Ukrainian state said.For his part, the President of Poland Andrzej Duda congratulated Volodymyrzellensky and all the Ukrainian people on the Constitution Day and noted that his president of Lithuania today's visit once again attests to Ukraine that Ukraine is a seven, independent, proud, free and so, because he wins the war. . He expressed his hope that the war would end with Ukraine with all its territories within the framework of internationally recognized borders.

Among the most important tasks of the Vilnius summit, Andrzej Duda called the provision of safety of Ukraine on the way to obtaining a full membership of the Educational Alliance.

“They are deeply convinced that Ukraine's security is the safety of all of us. These are our common interests - to make NATO in our part of Europe as much as possible. And in a completely unnecessary future-that Ukraine becomes a full member of the Alliance, one of the armies of the association, which will spread to the 5th Article of NATO Article 5, ”he said.

The President of Poland also assured of the support of our country as a Statabase of a full member of the European Union.

The leader of the Republic of Lithuania stressed that its country supports Ukraine's membership in NATO, and the future summit in Vilnius should accelerate the accession of our Ukraine to the Alliance.

Hitanas Nausede also expressed his hope that the Ukrainian state will start negotiations on joining the European Union this year.

The President of Lithuania stressed that he admires the power of the spirit of Ukrainians, which will demonstrate a decisive desire for our people to win the enemy.

Hitanas Nausedea noted that in the near future, two launchers of the NASAMS anti-aircraft missile complex will arrive in Ukraine, which its country has purchased for the defense of the Ukrainian sky.

“We have to support Ukraine as much as we need to win. This is the decision of our country and our people. Lithuania will provide weapons to Ukraine and will participate in recovery. People who were forced to leave Ukraine will feel very well in Lithuania, ”the leader of the Lithuanian Republic stressed.

Volodymyr Zelensky expressed his gratitude for the defense assistance provided by Poland to Ukraine

Author: ['АРМІЯINFORM']

Time: 2023-06-28T90:00:00-04:00

Description: President of Ukraine Volodymyr Zelensky Dvoille Zustych Iz President ... War with Ukraine 2022, War with Ukraine Latest news today, News War with Ukraine 2022 Last today, will there be a war between Ukraine and Russia and when, the war with Ukraine will be in 2022 Or not, will there be a war with Ukraine in the near future, they say, the war with Ukraine, Ukraine’s news today, Ukrainian news in Ukrainian media in Russian

Images: ['b942a0f95ce007f3f3d8adccf8e1d123_1687963810_extra_large.jpeg']

Tags: ['STOPRUSSIA', 'АНДЖЕЙ ДУДА', 'ВОЛОДИМИР ЗЕЛЕНСЬКИЙ', 'ДВОСТОРОННЯ ЗУСТРІЧ ПРЕЗИДЕНТІВ УКРАЇНИ ТА ПОЛЬЩІ', 'ОФІС ПРЕЗИДЕНТА УКРАЇНИ', 'ПРЕЗИДЕНТ ПОЛЬЩІ', 'ПРЕЗИДЕНТ УКРАЇНИ']

Category: News

President of Ukraine Volodymyr Zelensky held a bilateral meeting with the Republic of Poland Andrzej Duda, who is on a visit in Kiev.

The head of the Ukrainian state noted that the presence of Andrzej Duda in Ukraine in the afternoon of the Constitution is an important signal of support for our country, special before NATO Summit in Vilnius.

Volodymyr Zelensky expressed his gratitude for the defense assistance that Poland is provided by the state. The President of Ukraine also praised the leadership of Warsaw to establish a tank coalition and active participation in the aviation coalition, in particular readiness to teach Ukrainian pilots on F-16 aircraft.

The head of the Ukrainian state informed in detail the Polish colleague about the situational battle and key needs of Ukraine at the front to accelerate the liberation of Ukrainian territories from Russian invaders.

Leaders coordinated positions on the eve of NATO Summit in Vilnius. Volodymyrzelensky praised the position of the President of Poland on the political invitation of Ukraine to NATO membership.

The heads of state discussed a number of topical issues of bilateral development separately.

“We have repeatedly found solutions for difficult issues. This will meet the high level of relations and the spirit of the strategic partnership of the intersection of states, ”the President of Ukraine summed up.

A commission was formed to check the state of bridges in Ukraine - Alexander Kubrakov

Author: ['АРМІЯINFORM']

Time: 2023-06-28T92:00:00-04:00

Description: For Viconnya Rishnnya, for the sake of national nonsense, the defense of the wid 23 worms 2023 Rock Rock ... War with Ukraine 2022, War with Ukraine Latest news today, News War with Ukraine 2022 Last today, will there be a war between Ukraine and Russia and when, war with In 2022, Ukraine will be or not, will there be a war with Ukraine in the near future, they say, the war with Ukraine, Ukraine’s news today, Ukrainian news in Ukrainian media in Russian

Images: ['3j0a4277_id53947_1300x820_1300x820.jpg']

Tags: ['КОМІСІЯ ДЛЯ ПЕРЕВІРКИ СТАНУ МОСТІВ В УКРАЇНІ', 'ОЛЕКСАНДР КУБРАКОВ', 'РНБО', 'РНБО УКРАЇНИ']

Category: News

In accordance with the decision of the National Security and Defense Council of June 23, 2023, the government created a commission to check the state of bridges in Ukraine. Oleksandr Kubrakov, the Minister of Community Development, Territories and Infrastructure.

The task of the commission is to check the transport and operational state of roads on public roads and railway bridges.

“Supporting bridges in a proper condition is, first and foremost, the issue of basic safety people they move. During the martial law, the bridge became an important defense capability of the country, as well as ways for humanitarian evacuation and export logistics. Our task now is to find out the real technical condition of the construction. After that, in conjunction with balancing holders(city and regional administrations)Identify ways to solve problems. I believe that safety and defense should be a top priority for the authorities of any level, ”Alexander Kubrakov reported.

The commission will include representatives of the Ministry of Recovery, the Ministry of Defense, the Ministry of Internal Affairs, the Ministry of Reintegration of the Occupied Territories, the Agency of Restoration, Ukrtrans Security, the State Inspectorate of Architecture and Urban Planning, the State Service of Ukraine of Official Situations, Regional and Kyiv City Military Administrations.

_ What will the commission work? _

To determine the technical condition of the bridges is planned:

· Analysis of primary technical and operational documentation;

· Conducting inspection and inspection of structures;

· Finding the real strength of the materials of the bridge elements;

· Performing checks of load capacity;

· Establishment of real characteristics of elements of elements.

The results of the inspection of the bridges will be entered in a single information analytical and expert system of Aesum to form further steps to restore them.

As of 2023, there are about 28.5 thousand road bridges in Ukraine.

According to the profile research institute "State Dorndi"-the average vicious car bridges-more than 60 years, more than 30% of bridges in critically. About 350 - destroyed or damaged as a result of hostilities.

Derelo: Government portal

News Source: https://armyinform.com.ua/2023/06/28/utvoreno-komisiyu-dlya-perevirky-stanu-mostiv-v-ukrayini-oleksandr-kubrakov/

Russia and its accomplices should feel that the price of their terror will only increase for them - President of Ukraine

Author: ['АРМІЯINFORM']

Time: 2023-06-28T96:00:00-04:00

Description: Road Ukrainians, Ukrainian!Before the Uzo - the Vchorashnoy Rosigi strike on ... the war with Ukraine 2022, the war with Ukraine is the latest news today, the news of the war with Ukraine 2022 is the last for today, will there be a war between Ukraine and Russia and when, the war with Ukraine will or not will or not , Will there be a war with Ukraine in the near future, they say, the war with Ukraine, Ukrainian news today, Ukrainian news in Ukrainian media in Russian

Images: ['e00403e1693dd96910e142a9929dbb59_1687980023_extra_large.png']

Tags: ['ЗВЕРНЕННЯ ПРЕЗИДЕНТА УКРАЇНИ']

Category: News

_ Dear Ukrainians, Ukrainians!_

First of all - about yesterday's Russian blow to Kramatorsk. Work on the site of the terrorist attack continued this. Unfortunately, the death toll increased. My muddy native. More than 60 people were injured and injured.

Today, the Security Service of Ukraine, together with the police special forces, had a person who adjusts this blow to terrorists. Just on the cafe of Uzramatorsk, on the popular pizzeria. Damaged neighboring homes, shops, dressing. Ordinary city, ordinary life. Under the rubble can still be people.

Anyone who helps Russian terrorists destroy life deserves a naximal punishment. And this applies not only to some collaborators there. Everything is clear. These are people without humanity. Everyone in the world who does not understand that it is impossible to be an accomplice of a terrorist state must respond to the entire international community. The corrector is under the article on state treason. Punishment - including lifelong. The accomplices of the terrorist state should be considered as traitors of humanity and humanity.

We will continue our work to strengthen international sanctions against Russia's accomplices. They should feel that the price of their terror for them will be increased. And we will continue our global legal work so that the international instruments have worked for the punishment of all Russian terrorists and the aggressor state itself.

Today, in an appeal to the Verkhovna Rada of Ukraine, on the occasion of the Constitution Day, he was about justice. Internal justice is a responsibility for violation of law in Ukraine. And about the justice of communicating with the Russian-Ukrainian war is about the responsibility of the Russian war. Justice policy will be one of the basics of Ukrainian Dokrin - a fundamental document that will determine the course of our country of the year.Ukraine and all in the world who stands with us in defense of freedom will also stand on protection of justice. Justice for all whose lives were exposed to Russian terror, whose fate was broken by the Russian war. Eternal memory of all people, all Ukrainian children who were killed by Russian inhumans!

I want to report the day briefly now.

Presidents of Lithuania and Poland were a visit - Hitanas Nausede and Andrzej Duda.

A very timely and useful visit - on the eve of Vilnius. The format of negotiations is span and bilateral. Weapons for Ukraine. By the way, thank you, Gitanas, a panel, for the decision to buy and pass the NASAMS systems, it is very necessary. They discussed common political challenges - both in the region and international countries. Of course, they also talked about the beginning of negotiations on Ukraine's membership in the European Union, which we expect this year.

He met with the main master-holder of the 47th separate mechanized brigade "Magura" Valery Marcus. They talked to him about the war, about our warriors, I will have a defense.

They discussed, in particular, the accounting reform in military structures. Less paper of bureaucracy, more digitalization. They discussed the reform of the Sergeant Corps. Khorosh conversation. Thank you for the chevrons!

Today, on the Day of the Constitution of Ukraine, I was honored to reward our soldiers and to transmit state awards to our heroes. Very emotionally, very honorable. I worship our warriors!I am grateful for everything and for the saved life of Ukraine!

I congratulate everyone on the Constitution Day and, most importantly, I wish us all, everyone and every one of the state, only to multiply the will, glory and independence of Ukraine!And so will it!

I also congratulate all Muslims of Ukraine and the world on the beginning of the Kurban Bayram holiday. We will all get peace for our country, for our countries, for our children.

Thank you all who are fighting and working for Ukraine!I thank everyone and everyone who is in battle, at combat posts and positions. Thank you, warriors, for new promotion first!

Glory to Ukraine!

The capital presented monographs on Sofia Kyiv and Vladimir the Great

Authors: Ukrinform (Person)

Publisher: Укринформ (Organization)

Published Time: 2023-06-29T-10:56:00+03:00

Modified Time: 2023-06-29T19:56:00+03:00

Description: In Sofia, Kyiv historian Nadiya Nikitenko presented her monographs "Saint Sofia of Kiev 1011 - 1018" and "Sofia of Kiev Vladimir the Great". - Ukrinform.

Images: ['630_360_16880...']

Tags: ['Книги', 'Культура', "Пам'ятка", 'Софія Київська']

Type: Article

In the Sophia Histor's historian, Nadiya Nikitenko presented her monographs "St. Sofiakiyivska 1011 - 1018" and "Sofia of Kiev Vladimir the Great".

This was reported by Ukrinform correspondent.

"I feel that when I stop studying Sofia and write about it, it is no longer life, because it will not be interested. Such a lifestyle. I think that we are dying to study this monumentTo tell us what a wonderful temple we have, ”Nikitenko said.

The author outlined her scientific research in the monograph "Holidays Sofia Kiev1011 - 1018". According to Nikitenko, the cathedral was laid by Vladimir in 1011, and consecrated Yaroslav in 1018. The scientist noted that the date of 1011 rifles indicates that Sofia of Kiev appeared on the whole human generation of Sofia earlier in Polotsk(The middle of the 11th century.)and Novgorod(1050)that destroys Mifro "three brotherly people from one cradle."The historian emphasized that the answer to the time of the founding of Sofia finds the Cathedral. In her opinion, only a comprehensive approach - a simultaneous study of the architecture, written sources, graffiti, mosaics and murals, can cover the first years of the existence of this monument, because "it was created as a unicorn complex, according to the outlook of the time."

In particular, such a methodology was embodied in both the first and second monograph "Sofiakivska Vladimir the Great". The latter contains about 600 pages of detailed text and illustrations.

"The image of Vladimir is not invented on the cover. He is taken from the frescoy archangel Michael Jesus.

Colleagues and friends came to greet the scientist. During the event, the Outgovist soloist soloists also made. Musicians performed some choral works, in particular, "Rejoice, Righteous!" Maxim Berezovsky and "Prayer of Zukraine" Mykola Lysenko.

*!(https://www.ukrinform.ua/rubric-culture/3670441-naukovci-doslidili-mikrobni-poskodzenna-fresok-sofii-kiivskoi-sob-zberegti-pamatku.html)Nadezhda Nikitenko is a Ukrainian historian-culturalist, museum studies, doctoral sciences, researcher Sofia Kyiv. Professor. Honored Worker of Culture of Ukraine. Among her work is the books "Baroque Sophia of Kiev", "Mosaica of the Fresco of Sofia of Kiev", "Angels Sophia of Kiev. Pilgrimage to the shrine", "St. Sophia of Kiev: History in Art".

It was reported that the first 30 volumes of the Kiev Christianity of Kyiv were presented in Sofia, which covered the history of theology of the Middle Ages and early modern times of Kyiv Mitropolis.
