The Czech Republic has imposed sanctions against the Russian oligarch Yevtushenko and his son

Authors: Ukrinform (Person)

Publisher: Укринформ (Organization)

Published Time: 2023-06-29T-12:01:00+03:00

Modified Time: 2023-06-29T18:01:00+03:00

Description: The Czech Republic has submitted to the national list of sanctions of Russian entrepreneur Vladimir Yevtushenko and his son Felix, who sponsor the military-industrial complex of the Russian Federation. - Ukrinform.

Images: ['630_360_16880...']

Tags: ['Антиросійські санкції', 'Чехія', 'Олігархи', '#stoprussia']

Type: Article

The Czech Republic Vladimirivtushenko and his son Felix, who sponsor the military-industrial complex of the Russian Federation, to the National Sanctions of Russian Entrepreneur Vladimirivtushenko and his son Felix, who sponsor the military-industrial complex.

About it reports Radio Prague International, reports Ukrinform.

Inclusion in the sanctions list means that these persons are forbidden to enter Czech Republic, conducting any financial operations through Czech structures and freezing in the country of all assets. At the same time, the Czech Republic proposes to include names in the list of EU sanctions.

Czech Foreign Minister Jan Lipavsky reported that Yevtushenkov had or may have property in the Czech Republic. “The issue of financial analysis may be addressed, in particular, which can be managed by these assets. In addition, it is worth noting that business(Yevtushenkov - ed.)In the Russian Federation is part of the military-industrial complex, ”the Czech Minister said.

Jan Lipavsky described Vladimir Yevtushenko as a leading Russian businessman who, together with his son, provides the Russian government with considerable resources. "In the past, he has repeatedly stopped in the Czech Republic, and now he will not be able to do so," Lipavsky said.

According to the document submitted, Yevtushenkov has a long-standing close relations with drops and is a member of several commercial and industrial chambers, contributing to the work of strategic sectors of the Russian economy, which are important sources of income for the Russian state and the government.

"Companies that have long been associated with the concern of the APC" System ", which was founded by Volodymyr Petrovich Yevtushenkov and in which it has a significant share, produce weapons systems for the armed forces of the Russian Federation," the document reads.

Read also: SBU reported suspicion to Russian oligarch that supplied raw materials for "calibers"In April 2022, fearing Western sanctions, Yevtushenkov left the heads of the Board of Directors of the System. He handed over part of the AFC stock package to his symbol of Felix.

The Czech National List is made in accordance with its own "lawmark", adopted in January this year in order to securely ensure the protection of human rights.

Ukraine sue

Authors: Ukrinform (Person)

Publisher: Укринформ (Organization)

Published Time: 2023-06-29T-13:01:00+03:00

Modified Time: 2023-06-29T18:01:00+03:00

Description: Ukraine and other participants of the International Coordination Group submit to the UN International Court of Justice against Iran for the beating of the PS752 flight aircraft.

— Укрінформ.:

Images: ['630_360_15786...']

Tags: ['Авіа', 'Іран', 'МАУ', 'МЗС', 'Позов', 'Міжнародний суд ООН']

Type: Article

Ukrainian participants of the International Coordination Group submit to the International Court of Justice a lawsuit against Iran for knocking down the PS752 aircraft.

This was reported in FacebookForeign Ministry spokesman Oleg Nikolenko, reports Ukrinform.

"We, members of the International Group on Assistance to Victims of PS752, represent Canada, Sweden, Ukraine and the United Kingdom, note that Iran and the coordination group have not reached an agreement on the organization of the Arbitration Activities. Civil Aviation ", - saysin the text of a common statement.

"Accordingly, the Coordination Group intends to continue collective efforts to bring Iran's prosecution for the illegal confinement of the PS752 Airlines" International Airlines of Ukraine "through the fastest a dispute to the UN International Court of Justice as soon as possible," the statement said.

As it was reported, on January 8, 2020 in the sky above Iran was a shot aircraft of the UIA, which operated the flight PS752 on the route Tehran - Kiev. On board there were citizens of Iran, Canada, Ukraine, Sweden, Afghanistan and the United Kingdom.

Read also: Canadian court did not allow victims' relatives PS752 to confiscate Iranian propertyAll 176 people were killed, among them - eleven Ukrainians(Nine Members and Two Passengers). Після кількох днів заперечень іранська владавизнала, що український літак був помилково збитий зенітно-ракетним комплексомпротиповітряної оборони.

5 січня 2021 року міністр закордонних справ Дмитро Кулеба заявив, що Українаотримала від Ірану проєкт технічного звіту щодо обставин катастрофи літака.

На початку 2022 року Іран офіційно відмовився від продовження переговорів щодорозслідування наслідків катастрофи. Тегеран заявив Канаді, Швеції, Україні таБританії, що відмовляється вести переговори щодо катастрофи літака МАУ.

Канада, Швеція, Сполучене Королівство та Україна у спільній заяві 29 грудня2022 року закликали Іран погодитися на арбітражний розгляд спору, пов’язаногозі збиттям літака рейсу PS752 авіакомпанії «Міжнародні авіалінії України».

April 16 this year the court in IranVasrooks 10 Iranian servicemen in connection with the catastrophe of the Ukrainian passenger aircraft over Tehran in 2020.

The International Group on Coordination of Victims of PS752 believes that Iran's Judicial Proceedings in the U.S. UIA was not impartial and transparent, and states that he would make every effort to ensure fairness.

Foto: aa

News Source: https://www.ukrinform.ua/rubric-polytics/3729422-ukraina-podae-pozov-do-miznarodnogo-sudu-oon-proti-iranu-za-zbitta-litaka-mau.html

Norway has provided $ 190 million grants for Ukraine's rebuilding

Authors: Ukrinform (Person)

Publisher: Укринформ (Organization)

Published Time: 2023-06-29T-15:20:00+03:00

Modified Time: 2023-06-29T17:20:00+03:00

Description: Norway has made a grant contribution to the targeted support, restoration, reform and reform of Ukraine (URTF) of the World Bank for 2 billion Norwegian Crops ($ 190 million). - Ukrinform.

Images: ['630_360_16751...']

Tags: ['Норвегія', 'Україна', 'Грант', 'Відбудова']

Type: Article

Norway has made a grant contribution to the targeted support fund, restoration, reform of Ukraine(URTF)World Bank for 2 billion Norwegian crowns(190mln. USA).

Як передає Укрінформ, про це повідомили у Світовому банку.

"The Norwegian Government has made a grant contribution to the targeted support fund, restoration, renewal and reform Ukraine (URTF)World Bank worth 2 billion Norwegian crowns($ 190 million USA)To support the ability of the Government of Ukraine to provide services, including investments in repair of the destroyed infrastructure, " -goes in the message.

It is noted that this is the second tranche provided by the URTF Norway after a grant -hat of $ 100 million, the agreement of which was signed in December 2022.

Thanks to the contribution of Norway, the URTF budget reached more than $ 1.1 billion, which emphasizes the responsibility of the international community of Ukraine's restoration.

“The current assistance will support critical infrastructure and daily of major public services. Our assistance through the World Bank is also a reform process, which is needed to promote economic growth, as well as for the reconstruction and European integration after the war, ”said Norway Minister Annikin Guitfeldt.

According to her, this contribution is part of a five -year support for Norway Ukraine, that is, help is long -term.

URTF has been reported to be a multi-donor trust fund, created to interfere with grant resources from donor partners into the most important sectors of Ukraine. URTF is focused on supporting such critical services as transport, energy and health care.

Read also: Norway allocates 250 million crowns for nuclear security in UkraineURTF was created in December 2022. The Foundation supports Ukraine in planning the targeting program of restoration, sustainable reform and reforms. Using a frame approach, the URTF provides the ability of the Ukrainian authorities to effectively and a large scale to attract numerous sources of financing.URTF participants include Austria, Canada, Iceland, Japan, Latvia, Lithuania, the Netherlands, Norway, Sweden, Switzerland.

News Source: https://www.ukrinform.ua/rubric-vidbudova/3729399-norvegia-nadala-190-miljoniv-grantu-na-vidbudovu-ukraini.html

Danilov about ZPP: Ukraine is preparing for any scenarios, the world's response should be instantaneous

Authors: Ukrinform (Person)

Publisher: Укринформ (Organization)

Published Time: 2023-06-29T-1:04:00+03:00

Modified Time: 2023-06-29T22:04:00+03:00

Description: The Secretary of the National Security and Defense Council Alexei Danilov states that Ukraine is carefully preparing for any scenarios for developments around Zaporizhzhya NPP. - Ukrinform.

Images: ['630_360_16446...']

Tags: ['Теракт', 'Данілов', 'Запорізька АЕС', 'Війна з Росією', 'Єдині новини']

Type: Article

Oleksiy Danilov, Secretaries of National Security and Defense, states that it is preparing Ukrainian for any scenarios to develop events around Zaporizhzhya AAP.

He said this on the broadcasting of the only news, Ukrinform reports.

"As for the situation at the Zaporizhzhia NPP. We are preparing very carefully for any scenarios that can take place. There are some training. We are working on the procedure we have. how to act, " - said Danilov.

Read also: in the event of a ZPP accident can evacuate about 300 thousand people from four areas

At the same time, he expressed the opinion that the world's response to the events around the NPP had a stiff and instant.

"If, God forbid, such events(The terrorist attack on ZAES - Ed.)It will happen, then we need to talk about in which world we live when the terrorist country can make a-kindly nuclear stroke in a country that has nothing to do with it, and I wondered that this reaction of the world should be instant to put a point in this question ", - said NSDC Secretary.

Read also: Lyashko about the threat of a terrorist attack at the ZPP: Kiev is located in the limits of radiation influence

He is convinced that the sooner Ukraine will win over the terrorist country, the faster the world community will exhale and will understand what is safe.

"The existence of Russia in the limits in which it exists today is a threat to the whole civilized world. And those events that took place there in the last days of Wagner's participation, say that this country is uncontrolled ... in which many private groups receive . And they can capture any nuclear object and any nuclear weapons at any time, "Danilov said.

Read also: lack of a powerful response of Europe to the undermining of hydroelectric power plants can be armed for Russia about Zelensky

"They can move beyond Russia on planes. Well, how can it be?"- asked the NSDC Secretary.

NAPC found corruption risks in public procurement during martial law

Authors: Ukrinform (Person)

Publisher: Укринформ (Organization)

Published Time: 2023-06-29T-4:59:32+03:00

Modified Time: 2023-06-29T21:59:32+03:00

Description: The National Anti -Corruption Agency (NAPC) has conducted a comprehensive study "Corruption Risks during Public Procurement in Martial Law" and identified a number of corruption risks. - Ukrinform.

Images: ['630_360_15608...']

Tags: ['НАЗК', 'Корупція', 'Публічні закупівлі']

Type: Article

National Anti -Corruption Agency(NACC)conducted a comprehensive investigation "Corruption Risks during Public Procurement of Martial Vowels" and identified a number of corruption risks.

As Ukrinform reports, this is stated on NAPC site.

"This issue has become especially relevant because of the desire of Ukrainian socialization for anti -corruption reforms, even in the conditions of war, which is impossible to develop further European and Euro -Atlantic integration of Ukraine," the agency said.

The NAPC has set a number of such corruption risks as the ability to submit thudder offers at a price higher than the expected value; abuse of electronic catalog; the use of "artificial obstacles" for giving preference to the necessary participant; corruption abuse of direct contracts; inability to challenge decisions, actions of customers during simplified procurement procedures; others(Non -price)Criteria for evaluating proposals as a tool for abuse.

Read also: The Council named the priorities of public procurement - defense, civil protection, food and fuelIn October last year, in response to the threats created by the full -scale protection of the Russian Federation and in order to avoid the publicity of information owned by national security internships, the transparency of procurement was reduced in Ukraine and restrictions on their accountability.

According to the results of the study, NAPC experts have developed and provided recommendations for minimization and elimination of corruption factors.

As it was reported, in response to aggression of the Russian Federation and in the interests of national security, governmentUkraine adopted the institution "On approval of the peculiarities of public procurement, works and services for customers provided by the Law of Ukraine" Public Procurement "for the period of the legal regime of martial law in Ukraine within 90 days from the date of its termination or cancellation".

News Source: https://www.ukrinform.ua/rubric-economy/3729533-nazk-viavilo-korupcijni-riziki-v-publicnih-zakupivlah-pid-cas-voennogo-stanu.html

The OP explained in which circumstances Zelensky would not come to NATO's summit to Vilnius

Authors: Ukrinform (Person)

Publisher: Укринформ (Organization)

Published Time: 2023-06-29T-6:51:00+03:00

Modified Time: 2023-06-29T21:51:00+03:00

Description: President Volodymyr Zelenskyy will not go to Vilnius to the July NATO Summit, if the leaders of the Alliance Member States do not demonstrate courage and do not give a clear signal to the Ukraine accession process. - Ukrinform.

Images: ['630_360_16874...']

Tags: ['НАТО', 'Саміт', 'Саміт НАТО', 'Україна', 'Зеленський', 'Жовква']

Type: Article

The Presidential Lordir Zelensky will not go to Vilnius to the July NATO Summit, if the Alliance leaders do not demonstrate courage and do not give a clear signal to the Ukraine accession process.

The deputy head of OP Igor Zhovkva said this Reuters, reports Ukrinform.

According to him, Ukraine wants to get an invitation to begin the process of joining Natona of the military alliance summit next month.

"This application(Ukraine - ed.)NATO leaders are now considering. The Summit would be a very good start to respond to this application. We mean an invitation to membership, which is only the first stage, "he said.

Read also: Zelensky met with Penso - discussed the security and membership of Ukraine in NATO

The deputy head of the OP noted that what Ukraine asks is to "start a process".

"If there is no result at the Summit in Vilnius, he has(President of Zelensky - Ed.)There is no reason and time to go, "Zhovkva said.

Answering the question of what is the minimum conditions of the presence of the Zelensky NATO Summit, Zhovkva referred to his speech in parliament, in which the Ukrainian leader spoke about the importance of courage in the modern world.

"The president will not go ... to the summit, if the leaders tend to demonstrate or develop a shortage of courage, while Ukraine with all their courage, will, power and high battle is fighting against Russian aggression," Zhovkva said.

Read also: NATO should consider the simplification of the Procedure of Ukraine in the Alliance - Volles

He mentioned the Case of Finland and Sweden, who last year applied for Vanto membership. Since then, Finland has already joined the Alliance.

"When Finland and Sweden filed a member of membership last year, the Allies responded to the application at once ... inviting them to NATO's membership," he said.

Answering the question of how close Ukraine is now to receive the request, Zhovkva said: "We are closer than they were half a year ago."As reported by Ukrinform, on July 11-12, 2023 in Vilnius there will be a summit NATO. Among the main issues will be the continuation of assistance for Ukraine in the fight against Russian aggression. Ukraine expects specific decisions from this meeting to identify the country of NATO membership and to provide Ukraine with safety guarantees for a fell to the probable repetition of Russian aggression in the future.

Read also: Estonia Prime Minister: The only security guarantee for Ukraine- NATO Membership

President Volodymyr Zelenskyy insists that NATO's Summit in Vilnius is Ukrainian to get modalities about the future in the Alliance. He recalled that at a time until Ukraine is a member of NATO, it must receive security guarantees.

News Source: https://www.ukrinform.ua/rubric-polytics/3729532-v-op-poasnili-za-akih-obstavin-zelenskij-ne-priide-na-samit-nato-u-vilnus.html

The possible base of "Wagnets" in Belarus will be considered at the meeting of the rates - Danilov

Authors: Ukrinform (Person)

Publisher: Укринформ (Organization)

Published Time: 2023-06-29T-7:48:08+03:00

Modified Time: 2023-06-29T21:48:08+03:00

Description: At the nearest meeting, the Supreme Commander -in -Chief's rates will consider the issues of the possible base of the Wagnets in Belarus. - Ukrinform.

Images: ['630_360_16807...']

Tags: ['Білорусь', 'ПВК "Вагнера"', 'Данілов', 'Війна з Росією', 'Єдині новини']

Type: Article

Natali meeting of the Supreme Commander -in -Chief's meeting will consider the opening of the possible base of the Wagnets in Belarus.

The President of Ukraine gave the corresponding order, told the NSDC Secretary Alexei Danilov on the broadcasting of the NSDC, Ukrinform reports.

"We will carefully observe the movement of the Wagner.

According to him, there is currently information that 8 - 8.5 thousand "Wagnerians" can burst in Belarus, and it is unclear what the purpose of such base is.

Read also: satellite shows the probable databases of Wagner PEC in Belarus -Reuters"Let's see where they will find themselves. What are the goals that will be threats. There will be an understanding that the number of Wagnerians - 8 - 8.5 thousand will be in Belarus. Let us look at what they will do. We will observe what will happen further. Whether it is to reproduce Lithuania, or to annoy Poland, or to have our cities that are located on the border with Belarus, "the NSDC said.

As reported by Ukrinform, the leader of the Wagner PEC Yevgeny Prigogin was on June 23, a demarche against the Russian military leadership, in particular the Russian Defense Defense Sergei Shoigu.

Read also: Poland strengthens its border with Belarus through " Wagner "Oleksandr Lukashenko negotiated with Prigogin, after which he stated that the groups of the group return to the field camps.

On Tuesday, Lukashenko confirmed Prigogine's arrival in Belarus.

President Volodymyr Zelenskyy is convinced that the contingent of PEC "Wagner" will be insignificantsince more than 20,000 Wagnerians have already been destroyed by Ukrainian defense forces.

The commander of the Air Intelligence Unit "Magyara Birds" was awarded with an honorary badge

Authors: Ukrinform (Person)

Publisher: Укринформ (Organization)

Published Time: 2023-06-29T0:06:00+03:00

Modified Time: 2023-06-29T22:06:00+03:00

Description: Robert Magyar received an honorary badge "For the development of Transcarpathia". - Ukrinform.

Images: ['630_360_16880...']

Tags: ['Нагорода', 'Військові', 'Війна з Росією']

Type: Article

Robert Magyar received an honorary badge "For the development of Transcarpathia".

About it in telegramVictor Nikita said Headakarpathian Ova, Ukrinform reports.

“Today in the area of fighting in the east of the country was honored by the horseshoe sign“ for development Transcarpathia»To our countryman, the commander of the legendary unit of the Air Intelligence" Birds of the Magyara "Robert Brove," - said Viktor Nikita.

The chairman of the Ova noted that his wife joined the Brody now to bring the victory together in the Armed Forces in the Armed Forces.

Read also: in Kiev military and volunteers were handed a distinctive headRobert Brody is a businessman, an entrepreneur(At one time he was the deputy preservation of the food and grain corporation, in recent years invested in reconciliation and real estate), also a well-known collector of painting, a philanthropist who has promoted the Silver Molbert project in Transcarpathia years ago-a competition for young artists from all over the country. He fell to the war as a troover - Robert Brody enrolled in Terrobron before invading in February, a pond. Together with the unit for the year, he passed the hottest points: Kyiv region, Kherson counter-offensive, now-Donetsk region, Bakhmut direction. In general, the Brody unit is performing air intelligence and correction of fireartillery, as well as with the help of drones-Kamikadze independently dismisses explosives.

• Indicate from whom the appeal

• expect SMS with a solution

Now the service works in test mode.

The IMF has improved expectations for Ukraine's macroeconomic prospects in 2023

Authors: Ukrinform (Person)

Publisher: Укринформ (Organization)

Published Time: 2023-06-29T10:11:00+03:00

Modified Time: 2023-06-29T23:11:00+03:00

Description: The positive decision of the first revision of the Extended Financing Facility Facility (EFF) is associated with improving the expectations of Ukraine's macroeconomic prospects in 2023. - Ukrinform.

Images: ['630_360_16655...']

Tags: ['Мінфін', 'МВФ', 'Україна', 'Прогноз']

Type: Article

Positive first viewing of the extended financing program for Ukraine(Extended Fund Facility - EFF)It is related to the improvement of the expectations of the Ukrainian -making prospects of Ukraine in 2023.

This was reported [press service of the Ministry of Finance of Ukraine]](https://mof.gov.ua/uk/news/imf_executive_board_completes_the_first_review_under_the_extended_fund_facility_eff_arrangement_for_ukraine-4085), reports Ukrinform.

"The revision has noted the significant progress of the Government of Ukraine in fulfilling the obligations by the EFF program. Ukraine has fulfilled all the relevant quantitative criteria for April and structural landmarks as of the end of June," the message will be reported.

In particular, changes to the state [budget] were approved(https://www.ukrinform.ua/tag-budzet)that meet the needs of Ukraine, a bill on improvement of the Budget Code and the completion of the first preparatory stage for the development of the national income strategy have been prepared.

It is emphasized that the experts of the Fund improved expectations for macroeconomic promises in 2023.

Successful revision of the extended financing program allows Ukraine to get the second tranche in the amount of $ 890 million in the near future.

“I am grateful for the constructive cooperation of experts and the IMF leadership, the Government of Ukraine and the National Bank, which allowed to achieve a successful review of the program. The conditions provided for EFF contribute to the strengthening of Ukraine's economic and financial politics, as well as the mobilization of financial resources for budgetary need to restore the country. After the first revision, we will continue to actively work over the implementation of jointly defined reforms to ensure macroeconomic compatibility, strengthening public administration, supporting efforts to recover, ultimately, European integration of Ukraine, " - said the Minister of Finance of Ukraine Sergey Marchenko.

Read also: [Shmigal expects the Board of Directors the IMF as soon as possible will declare an extended lending agreement] as soon as possible](https://www.ukrinform.ua/rubric-economy/3723157-smigal-ocikue-so-rada-direktoriv-mvf-aknajsvidse-shvalit-ugodu-sodo-rozsirenogo-kredituvanna.html)As reported by Ukrinform, at the end of March, the IMF approved the EFF extended financing program for Ukraine of $ 15.6 billion, designed for 48 months.

The first IMF tranche within this program is 2 billion of special lawsuit, or in the amount of about $ 2.7 billion was received in early April 2023.

News Source: https://www.ukrinform.ua/rubric-economy/3729552-mvf-pokrasiv-ocikuvanna-sodo-makroekonomicnih-perspektiv-ukraini-u-2023-roci.html

Authors: Ukrinform (Person)

Publisher: Укринформ (Organization)

Published Time: 2023-06-29T11:20:00+03:00

Modified Time: 2023-06-29T23:20:00+03:00

Description: Ukraine is affecting the power of Europe, so it is time to intensify the unity of Europe through the beginning of negotiations on Ukraine's membership in the EU. - Ukrinform.

Images: ['630_360_16856...']

Tags: ['Євросоюз', 'Україна', 'Зеленський', 'Війна з Росією']

Type: Article

Ukrainian has been Ukrainian, so it is time to strengthen the unity of Europe over the beginning of negotiations on Ukraine's membership in the EU.

President of Ukraine Volodymyr Zelenskyy said this in his evening video., reports Ukrinform.

"Ukraine affects the power of Europe is a fact. And this year, it is time to increase unity in Europe on the basis of this and other similar facts - in particular, the beginning of the membership of Ukraine in Ukraine in the European Union," the President said.

Read also: Russia should feel that the price of terror for it will be raised - Zelensky

He said he had a speech at a meeting of the European Council today.

"It is traditionally for Ukraine to be among the EU Member States. The agenda is obvious - our defense in this war, our path to victory, the support of our partners' security," Zelensky said.

UN leadership on the Radbezi once again indicated Russia that she was receiving weapons from abroad

Authors: Ukrinform (Person)

Publisher: Укринформ (Organization)

Published Time: 2023-06-29T12:29:00+03:00

Modified Time: 2023-06-29T23:29:00+03:00

Description: The Deputy Secretary General for the Disarmament of Isumi Nakamitsa at a Council-convex meeting for attempts to "condemn" the supply of Western weapons to Ukraine once again indicated that she was receiving weapons from abroad to Moscow. - Ukrinform.

Images: ['630_360_14450...']

Tags: ['Україна', 'Зброя', 'Радбез ООН', 'Війна з Росією']

Type: Article

The Deputy Secretary-General for Disarmament of Isumi Nakamitsa Nazidani Radbeza, convened by Russia for attempts to "condemn" the supply of Western Armed for Ukraine, once again indicated to Moscow that she herself was receiving weapons from abroad.

According to Ukrinform, she noted that open sources report to Ukraine's tanks, armored vehicles, combat aircraft, helicopters, large -caliber artillery systems, missile complexes and UAVs, as well as Dystanti -controlled ammunition, small arms and light weapons.

Deliveries weaponsAnd the ammunition was jumped and expanded on the eve of the report of the counter -off -Ukrainian forces, explained Nakamitz.

“At the same time,” she said, “there is a report that states are planning to transfer weapons such as UAVs and ammunition, Russian armed for use in Ukraine. Moreover, the media reported the transmission of conventional types of ordinary weapons ... Other armed groups that take part in the war in Ukraine. "

The Deputy Secretary General reminded that since the beginning of the full -scale invasion of Russia, Ukraine's Office of the High Commissioner of the UN Human Rights has recorded 24 862 sacrifice among civilians in Ukraine: 9083 - killed and 15 779 - wounded. Although the actual figures of the victims are probably much higher, she added.

The vast majority of civilian victims are the result of the use of explosive arms with a large area of damage. An example is the Kramatorsk attack center on June 27, which killed 12 people, she said.

According to Nakamitz, the destruction of the Kakhovsk Dam, "perhaps the most significant sizes, which has caused damage to civilian infrastructure from the beginning of the war."

She stressed that "the UN strongly condemns the attacks on civilians and civilinefrastructure and calls for their immediate termination."

Read also: Russia can produce rockets bypassing the sanctions -Ignati

As reported Ukrinform, The UN Security Council gathered on Friday, at the request of Russia to discuss the supply of Western weapons.

Russia receives drones from Iran, also reported the supply of weapons of North Korea in the Russian Federation.

The IMF explained which reforms expected from Ukraine to highlight the next tranches

Authors: Ukrinform (Person)

Publisher: Укринформ (Organization)

Published Time: 2023-06-29T13:37:00+03:00

Modified Time: 2023-06-29T23:37:00+03:00

Description: The International Monetary Fund expects that in the next stage of the extended EFF funding program, the Ukrainian authorities will adopt as a matter of agreed by the laws to improve government and fight corruption. - Ukrinform.

Images: ['630_360_16655...']

Tags: ['Економіка', 'МВФ', 'Україна', 'Боротьба з корупцією']

Type: Article

The International Monetary Fund expects that in the next stage of the EFF extended financing program, the Ukrainian authorities will pass the laws to improve government and fight corruption within the agreed terms.

This was stated on Thursday in response to the question of his own correspondent -Ukrainian in Washington, the head of the IMF mission in Ukraine Gavin Gray.

“For the next half of a year we will look at the structural reforms that are qualified(in Ukraine - ed.)», - said the representative of the fund.

Read also: IMF completed the first view of the program: Ukraine will get $ 890 million

In this context, he drew attention to government reforms as well as in the fight. According to him, "they will be one of the most important", which will experience both the IMF and other international institutions working with Ukraine.

In particular, by the end of July, the Fund is awaiting the restoration of compulsory procedures for officials for officials in Ukraine. In addition, before the same term, it is necessary to complete the procedure of adoption of Law 8401 on the change of the Tax Code.

Read also: IMF has improved expectations for the macroeconomic promise of Ukraine in 2023

At the end of September, the program defined a "landmark" to make appropriate changes to the Ukrainian legislation on the fight against money laundering and terrorism. The IMF also expects that in December in Ukraine there will be adoption of a nostructured basic legislation, which should strengthen the autonomy of the Anti -Corruption Prosecutor's Office.

"These are all important reforms," the Fund's representative said.

Read also: $ 1.2 billion grant and Finland have been received to the budget

In addition, he said, during the next stage of the EFFD program of Ukraine, the budget development for 2024, which is to meet the goals of the program, as well as macroeconomic stability policy, remains the key task.

News Source: https://www.ukrinform.ua/rubric-economy/3729557-mvf-poasniv-akih-reform-ocikue-vid-ukraini-dla-vidilenna-nastupnih-transiv.html

Partners noted the sustainability of the Ukrainian economy - lush

Authors: Ukrinform (Person)

Publisher: Укринформ (Organization)

Published Time: 2023-06-29T14:43:00+03:00

Modified Time: 2023-06-29T23:43:00+03:00

Description: The decision of the IMF on the allocation of the second tranche under the extended EFF funding program means not only budget financing, but also a high assessment of the stability of the Ukrainian economy. - Ukrinform.

Images: ['630_360_16651...']

Tags: ['Економіка', 'МВФ', 'Нацбанк', 'Андрій Пишний']

Type: Article

Adoption of the IMF on the allocation of the second tranche under the expanded EFF program means not only the budget financing, but also a high assessment of the stability of the Ukrainian economy.

The head of the National Bank of Ukraine Andriy Pyshny wrote about it in Facebook, reports Ukrinform.

"This means not only budget financing that is critical today. It means that our partners have noted the sustainability of Ukrainian economy (By the way, the Foundation improved the GDP of Ukraine this year to the range of 1-3%)But the ability of Ukrainian authorities to work effectively and quickly and, including the ability to provide NBUSCLACK Macroeconomic and financial stability in a full -scale war, " - commented Andrei Pishny.

According to him, Ukraine has fulfilled all structural beacons and quantitative criteria for efficiency under the program within the prescribed time.

The National Bank, in particular, has clearly started assessing the state of the banking sector, and approved the strategy of mitigation of currency restrictions, the transition to a flexible exchange rate and returning to inflation.

"This successful first revision is a direct confirmation that the Ukrainian castor is serious about the obligations.

He also thanked his colleagues for the productive work, and for the International Monetary Fund for support - both financial and political and expert.

Read also: IMF Improved expectations for the macroeconomic viability of Ukraine in 2023As reported by Ukrinform, at the end of March, the IMF approved the EFF extended financing program for Ukraine of $ 15.6 billion, designed for 48 months.

The first IMF tranche within this program is 2 billion of special lawsuit, or in the amount of about $ 2.7 billion was received in early April 2023.

Volodymyr Zelensky proposed the main directions of transformation that Ukraine should be carried out in decades

Author: ['АРМІЯINFORM']

Time: 2023-06-29T16:00:00-04:00

Description: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky Proponiti in Ukrainian doctrine ... War with Ukraine 2022, War with Ukraine Latest News today, News War with Ukraine 2022 Last today, will there be a war between Ukraine and Russia and when the war with Ukraine will be in 2022 Or not, will there be a war with Ukraine in the near future, they say, the war with Ukraine, Ukraine’s news today, Ukrainian news in Ukrainian media in Russian

Images: ['b8b46ae8d04b1e2c34024e4af1968cff_1687952434_extra_large.jpeg']

Tags: ['ВОЛОДИМИР ЗЕЛЕНСЬКИЙ', 'ПРЕЗИДЕНТ УКРАЇНИ', 'УКРАЇНСЬКА ДОКТРИНА']

Category: News

President of Ukraine Volodymyr Zelensky proposes to anticipate in the Ukrainian Doktrin the main directions of transformation that our state has to go through ten years. He stated this by presenting the benchmarks of the future document with the Polyar Session of the Verkhovna Rada on the occasion of the Constitution Day of Ukraine. About it reportsThe official website of the President of Ukraine.

"We have to go during this time such a path that other peoples have overcome for decades. Ukraine will have special attention, special trust in the world, and every manifestation of attention and trust should be focused on the development of Ukraine and all aspects in our country," the president stressed.

The first specific purpose for Ukraine, Volodymyr Zelenskyy called the GDP's achievement in a trillion dollars, and the potential of our country is able to suggest.

The second point is the rejection of the idea, as if the cheap work of Ukrainians is a competitive advantage.

"We aim to reach such a level of remuneration that could be brought to the formula" neighbors in the European Union plus 30%. " This is a fair goal, a war of war. Ukraine of victory will be a bet on qualified work. Aotge, for education, ”the Head of State said.

The President also emphasized the need to spread English, because it is a language of global cooperation, business, and science of taglobal communication.

The third crucial task, Volodymyr Zelenskyy, identified the return of the home of a large number of our citizens who went beyond the state. It is necessary to create as many jobs as possible.

"The transformation of every sector of the economy, any social practice and all spheres of public administration should answer the question: how many new workplace will give Ukraine a specific decision, a specific initiative," he said.

The President also advocated the formation of a new policy of support of paternity. According to the head of state, the second and third child in the family should be happiness, not restriction of opportunities.

To help families, a special application "Dream" will be created, which will support everything concerning parents and children: services that are needed for children, the child for development, education, security, contact with the state, etc. The digital transformation team of Ukraine will present the application in the fall, Vladimir Zelensky reported.“Everyone who creates new jobs in Ukraine creates the basis for economic leadership of Ukraine. Ukraine of victory will protect every person's ability to work as much and as a person desires. We need to summarize the labor legislation, ”he said.

The seventh point of transformation of the state, according to the President, has a stalkin rational tax agreement between the state and society and the real -alienation of property.

“I am a supporter of tax reductions. But now, during such a war and the obvious dependence of Ukraine on cooperation with financial donors, we cannot allow ourselves to reduce taxes. But when Ukraine of victory itself becomes a member for the world, our level of opportunity will be higher. Reduced taxes have to determine the increased tax honesty, ”said Volodymyr Zelenskyy.

He noted that digitalization gives enormous opportunities to simplify the relation of taxes, customs and other industries, where there is a meeting or any contact between a citizen and an official, a businessman and an official. Therefore, we need to seek automatic digital procedures in these areas.

There will be a reconstruction of Ukraine within the transformation, so after the victory, the country will become the largest construction site in Europe.

“We need to rebuild hundreds of cities and villages, thousands of infrastructure, hundreds of thousands of houses. This will give your impetus to the economy. We have to forget about our own exporter of raw materials. Victory Ukraine is a country of high cost goods. It is a country in which regulations are allowed to develop any business innovators in their fields, in their directions, and in which it is protected by intellectual property. Ukraine Victory is a country that exports security, services, experiences, culture and in general the results of intellectual activity, technological products more than any raw material, ”the President said.

Our state will also develop cooperation and economic relations with all maklobal players, including India, Africa, Latin America, the Arab world, with China, and Ukraine's energy potential allows you to be one of Europe's energy security guarantors, in particular through the development President.

In addition, Ukraine's victory should become a country that has implemented a pension reform so that anyone who works today has decent support in the future. In this context, Volodymyr Zelensky addressed the MPs with a job to implement steps to ensure this reform.“Now the cultural sphere requires at least a percentage of GDP a year - as a basic level for survival. But it is clear that the industry must and should be more ambitious. Ukrainian courage really awakened the enormous interest of people of the various countries in us, to us, to Ukrainians, to our cities and villages. Every such interest is opportunities, ”he said.

According to the Head of State, Ukrainian society also requires a new policy of public space protection in cities and communities, a new museum tamemorial policy, a new policy of books and book publishers, writing, translations, translations for Ukraine foreign books and dissemination in the world of Ukrainian, Ukrainian books, and Ukrainian books. digital subscriptions, rethinking of our libraries and more.

In addition, Ukraine needs a new movie policy and film support, asvates should make films about Ukraine and Ukraine.

The Head of State also drew attention to the need for a new policy of the territories for the closest from the Russian occupation of the region. It must be its own, descended and at the same time a coherent, visionary transformation policy.

The President emphasized the internal security.

“Russian aggression has shown what security standards are needed for life. The accessibility of shelters is maximum. School - with shelter. Hospital - with shelter. Business - with shelter. Ukrainians will trust specific things that give specific security, ”he stressed.

In this context, there is a need to regulate the issue of weapons that will and people, demining and providing needs for its conduct, the issue of daily safety of the population, etc.

The final landmark Volodymyr Zelenskyy called the neighborhood policy.

"Strong neighborhood is always the result of very different, very deep things. Phactically successful neighborhood we can summarize any other successes of the countryside, in our region and in global relations. Economy such culture. Defense and safety. Transport and communication. Education and attitude of prehistory. Interaction between states and interaction between us, between people ... All it determines the quality of the neighborhood. Determines whether there is an understanding between neighbors, ”the Glava of State summarized.

News Source: https://armyinform.com.ua/2023/06/29/volodymyr-zelenskyj-zaproponuvav-osnovni-napryamy-transformacziyi-yaku-ukrayina-maye-zdijsnyty-za-desyatyrichchya/

In Kharkiv, the tractor exploded on ammunition

Authors: Ukrinform (Person)

Publisher: Укринформ (Organization)

Published Time: 2023-06-29T16:49:04+03:00

Modified Time: 2023-06-29T16:49:04+03:00

Description: In the village of Cherneshchyna, Kharkiv region, the tractor exploded on the ammunition, the driver did not receive damage. - Ukrinform.

Images: ['630_360_16787...']

Tags: ['Вибух', 'Харківщина', 'Боєприпаси', 'Трактор']

Type: Article

In the village of Kharkiv region, the tractor exploded on the ammunition, did not receive a driver.

According to Ukrinform, the State Emergency Service reports on Facebook.

“29 червня у с. Чернещина Ізюмського району стався черговий підривсільськогосподарської техніки на невідомому вибуховому пристрої. Внаслідокнаїзду причепа трактора на боєприпас стався вибух”, - the message reads.

According to preliminary data, the tractor driver did not receive and did not need further hospitalization.

MKIP requires information on the reconstruction of the Dniester Hotel from the Ivano-Frankivsk OVA

Authors: Ukrinform (Person)

Publisher: Укринформ (Organization)

Published Time: 2023-06-29T17:04:00+03:00

Modified Time: 2023-06-29T17:04:00+03:00

Description: Minister of Culture and Information Policy Oleksandr Tkachenko demands that Ivano-Frankivsk OVA provide information on the reconstruction of the Dniester Hotel-Ukrinform.

Images: ['630_360_16880...']

Tags: ['Івано-Франківськ', "Пам'ятка", 'Ткаченко', 'Готель', 'МКІП ']

Type: Article

Minister of Culture and Information Policy Oleksandr Tkachenko demands from Ivano-Frankivsk OVA to provide information on the reconstruction of the Dniester Hotel "

According to Ukrinform, Tkachenko reported in telegram .

According to Tkachenko, the house of the Dniester Hotel in Ivano-FrankivskIt was taken into account for the memory of architecture and history of local importance: architectural monument - "Austria Hotel", from 1921-1939 - Hotel "Warsaw", 1913; Memorial History - "A House in which the Ukrainian National Council of ZUNR approved Aktzluky ZUNR and UNR", 1919.

The MKIP emphasized that this is a prominent historical monument of the Ukrainian history of liberation competitions of the twentieth century and one of the iconic architectural objects of Frankivsk.

“The scientific and design documentation of the MKIP did not come to the MKIP. However, according to the Law of Ukraine "On the Protection of Cultural Heritage", such works are carried out on the monument of local importance in the presence of a permission of the regional body of protection of cultural settlement, which is issued on the basis of the approved regional body of scientific and design documentation ", - Tkachenko said.

Read also: Sharivsky Palace in Kharkiv Region - Over a year without security, looters began to visit the buildingBy law, if such work is carried out without permission, or whether their implementation can be damaged, whether it has already led to damage to the monument, the regional organized orders and a regulation on the protection of a monument of local value and termination of work on the monument.

“The MKIP immediately appealed to the Ivano-Frankivsk Regional State Administration to provide information about work in the monument. Since cases have increased recently to the ICIP on the monuments of Ivano-Frankivsk region, which lead to their damage, the MKIP will in the near future will hold a work meeting in the Ivano-Frankivsk statement on the state of preservation of the Ivano-Frankivsk Region Status ”,” Tkachenko proclaimed.The work meeting will organize the involvement of problems and representatives of professional unions and monuments of public organizations in the discussion. The corresponding assignment will be provided to the regional body of the protection of the election heritage.

As it was reported, residents of Ivano-Frankivsk were outraged by the "restoration" of the Dniester Historical Hotel. According to the activists, the restorers changed the appearance of buildings, which is forbidden by law. In addition, the undercover space was glazed.

Foto: Irina Bandura

News Source: https://www.ukrinform.ua/rubric-regions/3729389-mkip-vimagae-vid-ivanofrankivskoi-ova-informacii-pro-rekonstrukciu-gotelu-dnister.html

Most Ukrainians have relatives or friends who died or injured in the war

Authors: Ukrinform (Person)

Publisher: Укринформ (Organization)

Published Time: 2023-06-29T17:13:00+03:00

Modified Time: 2023-06-29T17:13:00+03:00

Description: Almost 80% of Ukrainians have close relatives or friends who have died or were injured due to a Russian invasion. - Ukrinform.

Images: ['630_360_16880...']

Tags: ['Опитування', 'Поранені', 'Загибель', 'Військові', 'Війна з Росією']

Type: Article

Almost 80%of Ukrainians have close relatives or friends who have died or injured the Russian invasion.

This is evidenced by the poll results](https://kiis.com.ua/?lang=ukr&cat=reports&id=1254&page=1)Conducting the International Institute of Sociology, reports Ukrinform.

“The vast majority of Ukrainians - 78% - have close relatives or friends who have been injured or died through a Russian invasion. Among those who are home to close relatives or friends, on average(Media was used)It was called number 7. That is, on average, such respondents have 7 close relatives or friends who were injured or died, ”the testimony said.

At the same time, 64% of Ukrainians have at least one close relative or friend who was injured(On average have 5 wounded loved ones)and 63%have at least one close relative or friend who died(an average of 3 dead loved ones).

За даними соціологів, цей показник схожий у всіх регіонах України - від 70% насході до 80% на заході.

Читайте також: Більшість українців готові терпітитруднощі через війну з Росією задля перемогиThe deputy director of KIIS Anton Hrushetsky, commenting on the results of the survey, noted that Russia's war against Ukraine formed a tragic collective experience in the absolute majority of Ukrainians. In all corners of Ukraine, the majority of grievance has relatives or friends who were injured or killed by a inter -Russian invasion.

According to the sociologist, “the strong emotional color of this experience is a tinfactor, who, on the one hand, very brings different Ukrainians and allows you to better understand each other. On the other hand, it contributes to the uniting of Ukrainians for joint work on the expulsion of the enemy and achieving justice - punishment has been caused by hurt. "

Formally under normal circumstances a statistical error of such sample(with a probability of 0.95 and taking into account design effect 1.1)does not exceed 2.4%.

As reported by Ukrinform, more than 80% of Ukrainians consider Ukraine a successful state.

Фото: Christopher Furlong/Getty Images

Type: Article

Russian Federation has started collecting civilian data for the alleged acceleration of the process of refining them.

The Verkhovna Rada Committee can view duplicate in the British Bill

Authors: Ukrinform (Person)

Publisher: Укринформ (Organization)

Published Time: 2023-06-29T17:21:00+03:00

Modified Time: 2023-06-29T17:21:00+03:00

Description: The Verkhovna Rada Committee on Humanitarian and Information Policy plans to review the rule on film doubling in the bill "On the use of English in Ukraine" (No. 9432). - Ukrinform.

Images: ['630_360_16195...']

Tags: ['Кіно', 'Українська мова', 'Верховна Рада', 'Англійська мова', 'Потураєв', 'Дубляж']

Type: Article

The Committee on Humanitarian and Information Policy plans to review the rule on film doubling in the draft law "On the application of the English language in Ukraine"(№9432).

Про це голова комітету Микита Потураєв (Parliamentary faction of the "servant of the people")He told in a comment to Ukrinform.

"This provision raises the issue in our committee. We are set to review it. Let's be discussing the discussion on it," Potrajev said.

He specified that the discussion will take place in two directions, because the answer has two problematic aspects - economic and providing right -handed citizens.

"In order to solve the economic problem, it is necessary to gather translators, the rolling officers of the film industry and listen to what they think about the impact of this norm on their business," - said the chairman of the humanitarian parliamentary committee.

Read also: Ukrainian Culture should become an export industry - ZelenskyIn his opinion, the adoption of this rule "will not kill Ukrainian duplication", since the largest dubs of dubs - these are streaming platforms and television, aquinoatters to a lesser extent.

"I do not think that this norm will affect the Ukrainian film doubling, but I can see that we need to understand. We need to gather all those involved in this process and talk to it," the People's Deputy added.

In the context of securing the rights of Ukrainian citizens, Podtraev noted that at least two categories of people who are not very good at English, and people who are not very well -versed in English, and people who may not know English and not be able to read subtitles, will be injured. He stressed that the development of English in Ukraine should be promoted, but people cannot be deprived of the right to view moviesUkrainian in cinemas.

At the same time, the Chairman of the Verkhovna Rada Committee on Humanitarian and Information Policy emphasized that the legislative initiative "On the use of English in Ukraine"(№9432)"very good". He also expressed beliefs that it would not be a problem with its revision, including in the film.As reported by Ukrinform, June 28 President of Ukraine Volodymyr Zelenskyyregistered with the Verkhovna Rada the bill "On the use of English speaking to Ukraine"(№9432).

У розділі законопроєкту про використання англійської мови в сфері культурийдеться про те, що іноземні фільми, мовою оригіналу яких є англійська, маютьдемонструватися в кінозалах мовою оригіналу із субтитруванням державною мовою.Ця норма викликала неоднозначну реакцію в суспільстві. The People's Deput also emphasized the need to "thoroughly" refine the relevant document.

In Lviv region, an illegal scheme of grain exports to Poland was exposed

Authors: Ukrinform (Person)

Publisher: Укринформ (Organization)

Published Time: 2023-06-29T17:35:00+03:00

Modified Time: 2023-06-29T17:35:00+03:00

Description: Employees of the Lviv Border Detachment exposed an enterprise that was engaged in export of grain by lowering the income tax and non -payment of payments to the state budget. . - Ukrinform.

Images: ['630_360_16880...']

Tags: ['Експорт', 'Львівщина', 'Польща', 'Прикордонники', 'Зерно']

Type: Article

Employees of the Lviv Border Detachment exposed the enterprise, which exported the grain by lowering the income tax and non -payment to the state budget. .

This is stated in the message DPSU, reports Ukrinform

Law enforcement officers found that last year the enterprise was exported to Poland's products(Wheat, corn)in large volumes of negotiations confirming the acquisition of grain. In order to hide illegality and to create conditions for export of products, the director of the enterprise has drawn up fictitious supply contracts.

In addition, the company did not reflect in the reporting income. In this way, the director disappeared the income tax on the payment of taxes for almost 3.8 million hryvnias, the message said.

Read also: Ukrainian Grain : Poland initiates Meeting agrarian ministers n ' yat countries * EU with Solsky **According to the results of the sanctioned searches, documents have been identified and removed, which indicate involvement in the offense.

The pre -trial investigation is completed, the case is sent to court.

As reported by Ukrinform, in the current marketing year(From July 1, 2022, on June 12, 2023)Ukraine exported 46.748 million tonnes of grain hip crops.

Фото: ДПСУ

The EU may start negotiating with Ukraine on December entry

Authors: Ukrinform (Person)

Publisher: Укринформ (Organization)

Published Time: 2023-06-29T17:44:00+03:00

Modified Time: 2023-06-29T17:44:00+03:00

Description: The European Union may begin negotiations on Ukraine's membership in December, provided the country fulfills all the necessary criteria. - Ukrinform.

Images: ['630_360_15786...']

Tags: ['Євросоюз', 'Україна', 'Мецола']

Type: Article

The European Union may begin negotiations on Ukraine's membership in December, the Conditions of fulfilling the country with all the necessary criteria.

This was announced today in Brussels during a press conference as a result of the meeting by the EU states and governments of the EU countries, the President of the European Parliament -Production of Metzola, answering the question of Ukrinform correspondent.

“There is an understanding that joining negotiations should start this year. I am considering that the European Council in December will be the place and at the time that the if this step can be taken. I clearly noted - each country has their own. When we talk about Ukraine, it is not just about the speed at which you exceed the execution of primary requests, or the speed at which you answered. All this happens during the war. This should be recognized, ”Matzola said.

She noted that her position, as well as the position of the European Parliament, were so strong: when the reforms are implemented, in particular, in the judicial sphere, the consolidation of freedom of speech or the protection of minorities, then the EU should take an adequate step to reward these efforts.

Read also: Introduction to the EU: Stefanyshyn predicts that Ukraine up to Autumn fulfill the rest *Tasks European Commission “I am, let's just say, optimistic after the statements that I heard from both during the European Council and in the course of our conversations with them. There is a moment, the moment, and this point will not be stopped, as Insha is not stopped, ”the European Parliament President added.

It was reported that on June 29-30 in Brussels there is another summit of the EU, the first issue of the agenda of which is the situation in Ukraine and the assistance of the EU to withdrawing its right to self-defense against Russian aggression.

Ukraine consistently follows seven recommendations European CommissionWith regard to reforms on the way to the membership, he hopes to get a positive evaluation of these efforts during the autumn report on expansion. This should be opened for Ukraine and the EU for the decision to start negotiating Ukraine's membership in the EU by the end of the year.

News Source: https://www.ukrinform.ua/rubric-polytics/3729412-es-moze-rozpocati-peregovori-z-ukrainou-pro-clenstvo-u-grudni.html

The return of cultural values from the Russian Federation depends when and on what conditions Ukraine wins - MKIP

Authors: Ukrinform (Person)

Publisher: Укринформ (Organization)

Published Time: 2023-06-29T17:46:00+03:00

Modified Time: 2023-06-29T17:46:00+03:00

Description: The resolution of the issue of the return of cultural values illegally exported to Russia will depend on when and on what conditions Ukraine will win the aggressor. - Ukrinform.

Images: ['630_360_16880...']

Tags: ['Україна', 'Росія', 'Мистецтво', 'Культурні цінності', 'МКІП ', 'УІНП']

Type: Article

Deciding on the return of cultural values, illegally exported to Ukraine, will depend on when and on what conditions Ukraine wins the aggressor.

Kateryna Chueu, Deputy Minister of Culture and Information Policy, said about it on a roundtable in Ukrinform on the topic "Heritage stolen: find and return".

She noted that the issue of return culturalValues in Ukraine “not new, in the same for state bodies”. According to her, the Ministry has been gathering information for many years, which in different ways are submitted by appropriate experts.

“There were attempts to organize different, including international, commissions, were qualified for restitution issues. Because in reality, if we talk about the cultural heritage of Ukraine, we have some part of the countries where the diaspora cematures, and some of them representatives of the Diaspora also wanted to blame here. There are such cases of transmission. There are subjects, the right of Ukraine to be proved at least, because it was, for example, the sales of the Soviet power, requisitions of Ukrainian museums, objects sold abroad, museum objects of high value, high artistic quality, historical value, etc. And there is, of course, what has settled in Russia, and the array of objects that is there, we do not even know exactly, ”Chueva said.

At the same time, according to her, Ukraine is aware of archaeological collections, qualified in the times of the Russian Empire, and was taken away from excavations in Ukraine. They also climbed to exhibitions from Ukrainian museums and did not return.

Read also: Ukraine is talking about the free return of Scythian gold - Tkachenko

In the context of legal prospects for the return of Ukrainian values heard the case of "Scythian gold".

“From the point of view of legal practice, I think that many countries have observed the subject matter and analyzed the decisions of the Dutch courts of different levels. And now we have a decision of the Supreme Court in favor of Ukraine, it has a thorough analysis of Ukrainian and international legislation. The role -based legislation, which can be relied upon by foreign courts of international instance in making such decisions, is also extremely important, ”Chuev's emphasized.

Read also: Russia cannot appeal the decision to return the Scythian Gold to Ukraine - Ministry of JusticeIt emphasized the importance of synchronization of Ukrainian legislation by the expectors of the EU countries, the implementation of international conventions in Ukrainian legislation, the availability of a mechanism for the implementation of national heritage protection. According to its words, all this matters in the process of returning cultural values in Ukraine.

“What will relate to a return from Russia and even the moments of detecting these subjects, I think it will be much more difficult than we would like. And it depends on when and on what conditions Ukraine wins ... And what is the point that Russia itself will be at the time of the victory of Ukraine, I think, many will be determined in further processes, ”Chueva said.

Vladimir Tilishchak

In his turn, the deputy chairman of the Ukrainian Institute of the National Memorial Overadimir Tilishchak expressed the opinion that the unleashed war of Russia against the Ukrainians was primarily against the Ukrainian identity and aims to destroy its reconciling the Ukrainian heritage.

He emphasized that "speaking of those crimes committed today, we cannot and have the right to forget about the crimes of anti -cultural heritage in all its dimensions."

According to him, it is not only about the destruction of museums, cultural institutions, but "and outright looting, a candid robbery, which is carried out by the occupiers not over the last year or two, but in fact since 2014, with the beginning of the Russian-Ukrainian war, with the occupation of Crimea."“In fact, this robbery of cultural heritage is a purposeful activity of the occupies, is a systematic component of their occupation policy. And not just a robbery, but above all appropriation. And this appropriation of inheritance is really one of the goals of the war, because the war, which is unleashed by Russia with anti -Ukraine, it is solved primarily against Ukrainian identity and has to destroy this identity. And including because of the appropriation of its fall, ”Tilishchak said.

As it was reported, on June 9, 2023, the Supreme Court of the Netherlands [fully conflict with the claim of the state of Ukraine]](https://www.ukrinform.ua/rubric-crimea/3720487-povernenna-skifskogo-zolota-verhovnij-sud-niderlandiv-stav-na-bik-ukraini.html)Having obliged the Allard Pearson Museum to pass the Museum exhibits from the exhibition "Crimea - the Golden Island of the Exercise Sea" to the National Museum of Ukrainian History.

News Source: https://www.ukrinform.ua/rubric-culture/3729411-povernenna-kulturnih-cinnostej-iz-rf-zalezit-koli-i-na-akih-umovah-ukraina-peremoze-mkip.html

Authors: Ukrinform (Person)

Modified Time: 2023-06-29T17:47:46+03:00

Tags: ['Радіація', 'Віктор Ляшко', 'Запорізька АЕС', 'Війна з Росією']

Type: Article

Ukraine's governments are pressed on international partners in order to influence the Natrospian Federation in order to prevent a terrorist act at the Zaporizhzhya atomic power plant.

About it in an interview with the TV channel “We are Ukraine”Health Minister Lyashko said, Ukrinform reports.

"We click on international partners so that they press on the Russian Federation. The main one is to prevent any terrorist attack of Russian aggressors in the territory of the state. will be used by the authorities to protect the maximum of people who will fall into the area of a potential terrorist attack, ”Lyashko said.

Read also: in the Ministry of Health told that it should be in the first aid kilos of the 1950-kilometer zone around the ZPPHe added that in the near future, regular training of the Minister of Internal Affairs will be conducted to find out how much all algorithms work.

With regard to safety measures, including whether to take potassium iodide, the Minister has not been followed that the recommendations that the authorities will be given by the authorities if Russia still commit a terrorist attack at the ZPP.

Read also: overdose of potassium iodide can lead to death - MOHHe added that there are two types of reactors, and in the event of an emergency, there are different scenarios on how to act.

"As for potassium iodide, I advise you to listen only to official recommendations for every specific situation. It is impossible to predict what will be the explosion, it will be possible ... If something happens, state authorities, MOHThey will come out with the communication what to do, what is priority, ”Lyashko said.

On March 4, 2022, the Russians occupied the ZPP. On June 22, 2023, the Presidential Lordir Zelensky announced Russia's plans to arrange a terrorist attack for Zaporizhzhya.

South Africa will accept Summit Brix, despite the arrest of Putin

Authors: Ukrinform (Person)

Publisher: Укринформ (Organization)

Published Time: 2023-06-29T17:54:00+03:00

Modified Time: 2023-06-29T17:54:00+03:00

Description: South Africa will accept the Brix Bloc Summit in August as planned. This decision was made against the backdrop of assumptions about transferring a summit to China so that Russian President Vladimir Putin could be present in South Africa. - Ukrinform.

Images: ['630_360_16787...']

Tags: ['ПАР', 'Путін', 'Ордер', 'БРІКС']

Type: Article

South Africa will accept the Brix Bloc Summit in August as planned. This decision was made against the backdrop of the transfer of the summit to China so that Presidentials Vladimir Putin could be present in South Africa.

As Ukrinform reports, it reports ReutersWith reference to the power of South Africa.

South Africa as a signator to the International Criminal Court(MKS)obliged to(https://www.ukrinform.ua/tag-putin)If it takes the negotiations between the leaders of Brazil, Russia, India and China, in connection with the arrest by the ZArdor through the deportation of children from Ukraine.

"South Africa will host the 15th Brix summit at the Sandton, Johannesburg Conference Center, from August 22 to August 24, 2023," the Department of International Relations said.

Vincent Magveny Prescriber Vincent Magveny confirmed that this means that the summit, including the main part with the participation of the heads of state Brix, will take place in South Africa.

He and the representative of the Department of International Relations refused to comment on whether Putin was present at the summit.

On Tuesday, the Minister of International Relations of South Africa, Naddy Pandorized, that Putin had not yet responded to the invitation sent before I was charged on March 18.

Read also: South Africa will give Putin's immunity for possible participation in the summit Brix According to Pandor, China President Xi Jinping, India Prime Minister Nazendrama and Brazil's President Luis Inasio Lula da Silva plan to be present in the event.

South Africa states that it adheres to neutrality in the Ukrainian conflict, but is criticized by the Western states for friendship with Russia. In particular, for receiving Foreign Minister Sergei Lavrov and conducted joint naval exercises.

As reported Ukrinform, German Minister of Law, Annna Berbok, before a visit to the South African Republic, called on the citizens of this country to understand the position of Ukraine, which was protected from the Russian invasion.

Community Development: The Council adopted a law on voting for projects in "Action"

Authors: Ukrinform (Person)

Publisher: Укринформ (Organization)

Published Time: 2023-06-29T17:55:00+03:00

Modified Time: 2023-06-29T17:55:00+03:00

Description: The Verkhovna Rada of Ukraine adopted a bill that will allow Ukrainians to choose with the help of "actions" the projects of development of their own communities, which will be funded by the State Regional Development Fund. - Ukrinform.

Images: ['630_360_16701...']

Tags: ['Тергромада', 'Закон Савченко', 'Верховна Рада', 'Додаток “ДІЯ”', 'Відбудова']

Type: Article

The Verkhovnarad of Ukraine adopted a bill that will allow Ukrainians to elect the "actions" of the development of their own communities, which will be funded by the State Fund for Regional Development.

About it reports Ukrinform with reference to the press service of the Ministry of Development of Socials, territories and infrastructure in Facebook.

"Сьогодні, 29 червня, Верховна Рада України ухвалила в другому читаннізаконопроєкт №9165. Він надає громадянам України можливість самостійно обиратив Дія проєкти розвитку власних регіонів, які будуть профінансовані зДержавного фонду регіонального розвитку (DFRR)", - the message says.

Viceremier-Minister for Recovery of Ukraine-Minister of Community Development, Infrastructure Alexander Kubrakov noted that this instrument is one zelechmics of the policy of involving citizens in reconstruction.

"Together with the profile committee, we are already developing a number of decisions of electronic tamis democracy to ensure the transparency and accountability of the local authorities to citizens. We also plan to systematically revise the specialics and mechanisms of use of FDRs, together with the initiated state -based statement and re -enactment. Countries, "Kubrakov said.

The document stipulates that central, local executive authorities and bodies of self -government now submit their projects for consideration by regional components. They will be able to do this through a specialized online platform that will provide a transparent and impartial selection of projects at a regional level.

*!(https://www.ukrinform.ua/rubric-vidbudova/3726446-minvidnovlenna-zaklikae-gromadi-do-aktivnoi-ucasti-u-procesah-vidbudovi.html)After that, regional commissions carry out a preliminary assessment of the projects for a number of criteria. The score will take place with the point system, with the small -scale projects with a population of up to 50 thousand people will receive an additional score. Projects, which are injected at least 25 points, are transferred to the commissions of the Ministry, which checks their compliance with the law and submits them for interviewing in "actions".As it was reported, in the first reading of the Bill No. 9165 on amendments to the dosecone of Ukraine “On the State Budget of Ukraine for 2023” on the use of the states of the State Regional Development Fund Verkhovna RadaApril 11, 2023.

Foto: Minisfra

News Source: https://www.ukrinform.ua/rubric-vidbudova/3729417-rozvitok-gromad-rada-uhvalila-zakon-pro-golosuvanna-za-proekti-v-dii.html

The invaders do not give their native bodies killed in Berdyansk teens

Authors: Ukrinform (Person)

Publisher: Укринформ (Organization)

Published Time: 2023-06-29T17:58:00+03:00

Modified Time: 2023-06-29T17:58:00+03:00

Description: Today, on June 29, in Berdyansk they had to spend the last path killed by a hostile sniper of boys. But the invaders do not give their bodies to their relatives. - Ukrinform.

Images: ['630_360_16684...']

Tags: ['Бердянськ', 'Похорон', 'Вбивство', 'Війна з Росією']

Type: Article

Today, on June 29, in Berdyansk they had to spend the last path killed by enemy sniper honops. But the invaders do not give their bodies to their relatives.

About it in telegramThe Berdyansk city administration reports, Ukrinform reports.

"This was to be expected from the Rashists. Berdyansk teenagers, Tigranaoganaoganisian and Nikita Khanganov, who were killed by the invaders, have not yet been buried," -will be in the post.

It is noted that the date when the funeral will be unknown.

Earlier it was reported with reference to telegram channelBerdyansk today, which in Berdyansk on Thursday, June 29, will be a farewell to Nikita Khanganov and Tigran Ogannisyan, who were killed by Russian invaders for the pro -Ukrainian position.

On June 24, the occupied Berdyansk invaders declared "the liquidation of two -Ukrainian terrorists." One of them is 16-year-old Tigran Ogannisyan. A video recorded by Tigran appeared on the network. On it the guy says, "All, it's death, a guy. Farewell. Glory to Ukraine". Then the recording breaks.

Tigrana Ogannisiana was abducted in September 2022. He was accused of terrorism together with another underground, Nikita Khanganov. They were threatened with 20 years of imprisonment.

Read also: after the murder of teenagers in Berdyansk Russians terrorize children in Zaporozhye - Melitopol mayorIn June this year, the European Parliament demanded that the Russian authorities stop the process against children and allow them to leave the territory controlled by Ukraine.

Human rights activists are convinced that the boys shot a hostile sniper. The native tigranos have not seen the boy's body. He was allegedly recognized by Nikita's relatives.

The prosecutor's office denied the fake that the Metropolitan of the UOC -MP Pavel did not continue house arrest

Authors: Ukrinform (Person)

Publisher: Укринформ (Organization)

Published Time: 2023-06-29T17:59:00+03:00

Modified Time: 2023-06-29T17:59:00+03:00

Description: Information that the former rector of the Kiev-Pechersk Lavra did not continue the measure of restraint, is not true. - Ukrinform.

Images: ['630_360_16820...']

Tags: ['Домашній арешт', 'Фейк', 'Прокуратура', 'УПЦ МП', 'Київська Лавра', 'Митрополит УПЦ МП Павло']

Type: Article

Information about the former rector of the Kiev-Pechersk Lavra does not extend the west, is not true.

According to Ukrinform, the Kyiv Regional Prosecutor's Office reports in telegram.

“Низка телеграм-каналів та медіа поширили інформацію про те, що митрополиту УПЦ МП , the suspect in the ignition of religious hostility and justification of the actions of the Russian Federation, did not continue the preventive proceedings. The specified information is not true, ”the message reads.

The prosecutor's office reminded that the former rector of the Kiev-Pechersk Lavra was a chosen-riding measure in the form of a 24-hour house arrest with wearing a memerticron control, which ends on July 1.

Read also: Police in the Kyiv region did not allow the conflict to be healed during the transition of believers UOC MP to PCCAccording to the court order, the suspect is obliged to wear electronic control and refrain from communicating with witnesses and victims.

In addition, on June 26, the prosecutor filed a petition with the court to continue the period of the said preventive measure.

"The court hearing was scheduled for June 30, 2023 at 11:00 pm in the Solomenskiy District Court of Kyiv," the prosecutor's office said.

The suspect arrived in the Main Directorate of the Security Service in the Kyiv region today at the call of the investigator for investigative actions, and a request for extension of the precautionary exposure was repeatedly awarded.

Read also: in Nizhyn could not ban the activity of UOC MPAs reported by Ukrinform, at the end of April the Kyiv Court of Appeal was left under the 24-hour arrest(Moscow Patriarchate)Paul(Lebidy).

The Czech Republic will give Ukraine about € 1.8 million to help displaced persons and demining

Authors: Ukrinform (Person)

Publisher: Укринформ (Organization)

Published Time: 2023-06-29T18:00:00+03:00

Modified Time: 2023-06-29T18:00:00+03:00

Description: The Czech Republic will send Ukraine 45 million crowns (about EUR 1.8 million) to assist internal refugees and to mine some territories of the country. - Ukrinform.

Images: ['630_360_16276...']

Tags: ['Чехія', 'Переселенці', 'Розмінування', 'допомога']

Type: Article

Czechscarespulika will send Ukraine 45 million crowns to Ukraine(about 1.8 million euros)to assist internal refugees and to mine some territories of the country.

About it reports Radio Prague InternationalWith reference to the Czech Ministry of Internal Affairs, Ukrinform reports.

As noted, Ukraine will receive two subsidies from Czech Republic. The first in the amount of 25 million crowns(More than 1 million euro)The Dnipropetrovsk region will receive. The funds are directed to the help who was forced to leave their homes through the Russian invasion.

"Despite the fact that Russia is still fighting in Ukraine, we are already trying to help stabilize the situation in the country as soon as possible," the Czech Minister of Internal Affairs Vita Rakushan emphasized.

The second subsidy will help to exchanging Ukrainian territories. It is assumed that the project will promote the safety of residents and allow people to return to their homes.

!millions *](https://www.ukrinform.ua/rubric-society/3726302-cehia-planue-cogoric-nadati-ukraini-gumanitarnoi-dopomogi-na-2025-miljoniv.html)Also 15 million crowns(about 625 thousand euros)It will be directed to Moldova to the border guard. The allocation of funds under the field of "assistance on the ground" is approved by the law, the Czech Ministry of Internal Affairs reports.

Moldova's funds will help protect the land border of Ukraine better, which has crossed over 800,000 binders since the beginning of the Russian invasion.

As reported by Ukrinform, the Czech Republic called on Russia to return to collocyivized countries and stop killing civilians in Ukraine .

News Source: https://www.ukrinform.ua/rubric-society/3729410-cehia-nadast-ukraini-blizko-18-miljona-na-dopomogu-pereselencam-ta-rozminuvanna.html

Category: News

The total fighting loss of the enemy from 24.02.22 to 29.06.23 are oriented:

Personnel - * 227780(+680)persons eliminated tanks - 4038(+2) combat armored vehicles - 7857(+10) Artillery Systems - 4116(+27) RSZV - 627(0) air defense - 388(+1) aircraft - 315(+1) helicopters - * 308(0) UAV Operative Tactical Level- 3513(+14) Winged missiles - 1261(0) ships / boats - * 18(0) Automobile equipment and tanks - 6780(+6) Special equipment - 569(+6)The data is specified ...

Beat the occupier!Let's win together!Our strength is in truth!

Source: General Staff of Armed ForcesAs of 29.06.23.

In the Kherson region, the invaders have placed about a hundred entrepreneurs in custody - they require ransom

Authors: Ukrinform (Person)

Publisher: Укринформ (Organization)

Published Time: 2023-06-29T18:01:00+03:00

Modified Time: 2023-06-29T18:01:00+03:00

Description: In the captured territory of Kherson region, the invaders were placed in custody about 100 local entrepreneurs to receive ransom. - Ukrinform.

Images: ['630_360_15207...']

Tags: ['Арешт', 'Херсонщина', 'Окупація', 'Викрадення людей', 'Російські військові', 'Війна з Росією']

Type: Article

The invaders of Kherson region were placed in custody of about 100 place entrepreneurs for redemption.

The speaker OK "South" Vladislav Nazarov in [Telegram] reported this(https://t.me/Nazars_look/15065), reports Ukrinform.

"Under the pretext of holding counterintelligence measures are carried out arrestsCitizens, mostly from the number of entrepreneurs and other wealthy local residents, are a formal basis for which cooperation with the forces of Ukraine's defense forces. The delayed occupants demand considerable amounts of money from their relatives or relatives, "Nazarov said.

Read also: by offers about " Redemption From captivity " can stand special services Office Ombudsman *He added that as of the beginning of this week in the settlement of the Lower Grayoziz, the invaders were put into custody about a hundred such a person.

As reported by Ukrinform, on the evening of June 22 [armed military Russian military stopped directly in Kakhovka a local resident of Vladimir Reulu] in Kakhovka](https://www.ukrinform.ua/rubric-regions/3727976-v-okupovanij-kahovci-rosiani-vikrali-miscevogo-zitela.html).

The Armed Forces of the Armed Forces liberated the right -bank part of the Kherson region, in particular the cityharson. Part of the region, located on the left bank of the Dnieper, is temporarily seized by Russian troops.
