Additional sensors were installed in Kiev to measure radiation level

Authors: Ukrinform (Person)

Publisher: Укринформ (Organization)

Published Time: 2023-06-29T18:05:00+03:00

Modified Time: 2023-06-29T18:05:00+03:00

Description: In Kiev, an automatic network of radiation measuring sensors was supplemented with two additional devices that were installed in Holosiiv and Svyatoshinsky districts. - Ukrinform.

Images: ['630_360_16880...']

Tags: ['Радіація', 'Київ', 'Київ Цифровий']

Type: Article

In the KyivAvtomatic Network of the radiation measurement sensors supplemented with two -tale devices that were installed in Holosiivskyi and Svyatoshinskyi.

According to Ukrinform, it reports Kyiv City State Administration.

"Зараз у столиці діє сім датчиків, які в режимі реального часу передаютьінформацію про рівень радіації Kyiv digital, - the message reads.

According to the deputy chairman of the KSCA Petro Panteleev, “even in the conditions of war, we continue to develop a system of monitoring by the state of air. And so, the city's project is joined by patrons and the public, further displays the importance and relevance of this work. ”

“After all, the results of the monitoring give us quality information about the real -beast ofmosphere, periods of deterioration by different types of substances. We can both take and plan these data in the basis of these data, implementing them into long -term programs and strategies, ”Panteleev said.

According to the Director of the Department of Environmental Protection and Adaptation to the KSCA Changes Alexander Vozny, additional radiation devices were established at the expense of patrons without raising budgetary funds.

He explained that "to get information about the radiation background in the capital, it is necessary to go to the section of monitoring the quality of air in the application" Kyiv -Cycifrova ". The user can view the addresses of the installed sensors, as well as the level of radiation recorded on each of them. "

"Use this function and trust only official sources of information about the environment in the city," Vozny said.

Read also: US do not see an increase in level Radiation around Zinc - White House

As recalled in the KSCA, a network of seven precision is operating in Kiev(Reference)the points of observation of the state of the atmospheric air of the European sample.

The data from the items are fixed every minute and stored on the server for further analyzing.

In addition to the reference, there are 46 indicative entities in all parts of the capital, which complement the precision. Data from both types of points are monitoring users of the Kyiv digital application.

Foto: kyivcity.gov.ua

News Source: https://www.ukrinform.ua/rubric-kyiv/3729423-u-kievi-vstanovili-dodatkovi-datciki-dla-vimiruvanna-rivna-radiacii.html

In the event of a terrorist attack, special alert systems - Lyashko will work

Authors: Ukrinform (Person)

Publisher: Укринформ (Organization)

Published Time: 2023-06-29T18:09:47+03:00

Modified Time: 2023-06-29T18:09:47+03:00

Description: The Minister of Health of Ukraine Viktor Lyashko assures that in the case of a terrorist attack at Zaporizhzhya NPP and even in the absence of the Internet, special systems of notification of the population will work. - Ukrinform.

Images: ['630_360_16760...']

Tags: ['Радіація', 'Віктор Ляшко', 'Запорізька АЕС', 'Війна з Росією']

Type: Article

The Ministers of Health of Ukraine Viktor Lyashko asserts that in the case of a terrorist attack of Nazaporozhye NPPs and even in the absence of the Internet, specialist disposals of the public alert will work.

He said this in an interview with the TV channel “We are Ukraine”, reports Ukrinform.

"There are appropriate notification systems that have worked, operate and work in the case, God forbid, a terrorist attack at the ZPP.

According to him, it is very important not to create panic in a particular situation to follow all the recommendations of the authorities.

"It is very important to listen to recommendations from the authorities, which are given at the time that is tied to a particular situation and radiation monitoring. The clear adherence to such recommendations is actually saved by life," Lyashko proclaimed.

Read also: for a radiation accident cannot be prepared so as to protect everyone 100% - LyashkoAs reported by Ukrinform, large -scale training in the Zaporizhzhia, Dnipropetrovsk, Mykolaiv Tachson regions began to overcome the consequence terrorist attack at the Zaporizhzhia NPP.

On March 4, 2022, the Russians occupied the ZPP. June 22, 2023 PresidentVolodymyr Zelensky declared Russia's offices to arrange a terrorist attack at the Zaporizhzhya NPP.

News Source: https://www.ukrinform.ua/rubric-society/3729425-u-razi-teraktu-na-zaes-pracuvatimut-specialni-sistemi-opovisenna-lasko.html

Authors: Ukrinform (Person)

Publisher: Укринформ (Organization)

Published Time: 2023-06-29T18:13:00+03:00

Modified Time: 2023-06-29T18:13:00+03:00

Description: State forestry of the Nikolaev and Odessa regions will receive the first six tractors purchased by SE "Forests of Ukraine" through the system of centralized purchases. - Ukrinform.

Images: ['630_360_16880...']

Tags: ['Ліс', 'Держзакупівлі', 'Трактор']

Type: Article

State forestry of the Nikolaev and Odessa regions will receive the first six tractors purchased by SE "Forests of Ukraine" through the system of centralized procurement.

According to Ukrinform, the press service of SE "Forests of Ukraine" reports in Facebook.

«Перша партія тракторів від централізованої закупівлі ДП « ЛісиUkraine ”arrived in the southern forestry. These six units of new technology will be broken down in the branches of the Nikolaev Taodesse regions, ”the message reads.

A total of 11 tractors were purchased through the ProZorro state system, but new tractors delivered to foresters were through fair competition.

According to the state -owned enterprise, for some forestry, this will be the first filling of the fleet in the last 12 years.

Read also: in Ukraine will improve the fight against illegal rublesIt is noted that the renewal of the park in state forestry was made possible by the reform of the forest industry. After all, the formation of a single enterprise made it possible to stake investments in spawning regions.

As reported, in the State Enterprise "Forests of Ukraine" began a work preparation for the creation of a strategy of development of the industry in order to attract external investments.

Modified Time: 2023-06-29T18:13:29+03:00

Images: ['630_360_16880...']

Tags: ['фігурне катання']

Type: Article

The International Skating Union(ISU)Included Russians and Belarus in the preliminary record of judges and starters of the competition for the season-2023/24.

This was reported press serviceISU, reports Ukrinform.

The document lists the names of Russian and Belarussian specialists from the short-track of skating.

It is also noted that the official representatives of the Skating Unions of Russia Tabilorus can still not participate in international competitions, championships and other ISU events.

The lists of judges will be approved for the next season on August 1.

Zelensky met with business representatives

Authors: Ukrinform (Person)

Publisher: Укринформ (Organization)

Published Time: 2023-06-29T18:15:00+03:00

Modified Time: 2023-06-29T18:15:00+03:00

Description: President Volodymyr Zelenskyy met with business representatives. - Ukrinform.

Images: ['630_360_16880...']

Tags: ['Бізнес', 'Зеленський']

Type: Article

Presidential lodge Zelensky met with business representatives.

According to Ukrinform, Zelensky reports in telegram.

"Meeting with business representatives. Many pressing topics. The state's ability to stimulate economic activity. The Esosel Program and Participation Business. Recovery topics. The tax sphere of possibility of reforming it. Verification. Law enforcement. Coordination of this mud for solving problems. A useful offer of a business of simple coordination tools, "the President said.

Video: Presidential Presidential Telegram channelAccording to him, the main priority now is the victory in the war.

"The main priority is always the power of Ukraine. Thank you everyone and everyone who gives Ukraine forces, who stores and creates new jobs, who strengthens the economy and helps the development of our institutions," - said thezelensky.

Read also: cancellation of fuel tax benefits: what will be the star and pricesAs reports Presidential site, Zelensky also called that the reconstruction of Ukraine is a major project, and the priority will be the participation of Ukrainian and foreign business, which worked and works in Ukraine, especially during the war.

"But the doors will be opened for many companies. We need hundreds and thousands of companies to come," the head of state added.

During the meeting, they agreed on joint efforts, designed to reduce the problems of law enforcement agencies, discussed the situation in the tax sphere and perpetrator of its reform, touched on the issues of tax audits, increased efficiency of bodies that should stimulate the development of the economy.

A prospective program of accessible lending to the Housing "Esosel", initiated by the President of Ukraine, and the importance of its further scaling was noted.As reported by Ukrinform, on June 28, Zelensky, during a speech at the Supreme Council, emphasized that Ukraine has sufficient potentialto grow a gross -intruding product(GDP)Up to $ 1 trillion.

Foto: on

News Source: https://www.ukrinform.ua/rubric-economy/3729430-zelenskij-zustrivsa-z-predstavnikami-biznesu.html

InnovateUkraine Green Innovation Fund begins work - Ministry of Energy

Authors: Ukrinform (Person)

Publisher: Укринформ (Organization)

Published Time: 2023-06-29T18:22:00+03:00

Modified Time: 2023-06-29T18:22:00+03:00

Description: As part of the cooperation of Ukraine and the United Kingdom, the InnovateUkraine Green Innovation Fund begins operations. It will provide grants to support business in the development of innovative, sustainable energy technologies and business models. - Ukrinform.

Images: ['630_360_16880...']

Tags: ['Енергетика', 'Інновації', 'Міненерго', 'Україна']

Type: Article

In terms of Ukraine and the United Kingdom, the InnovateUkraine Fund is launched. It will provide grants to support business in the development of innovative, sustainable energy technologies and business models.

About it reports Ukrinform with reference to the press service Ministry of Energy.

“It is necessary to accelerate the innovations needed to restore the energy system of Ukraine. These innovations should promote Ukraine's energy security and the country's pure transition from hydrocarbons. We have the necessary conditions to deploy in Ukraine the factories for the production of equipment for ecological transition, video production of steel - to wind power plants, from solar panels to energy storage, ”the message reads.

It is noted that the main purpose of creating the Innovate Ukraine Foundation is to strengthen energySafety. Its total volume is £ 62 million. The initial contribution will be £ 10 million, other funds will be directed in 2025.

Financing will go to energy innovations that will accelerate the process of reconstruction and restoration of Ukrainian energy infrastructure. Grant competition is open to business from both the UK and other countries. Applications are accepted by September 15.

Read also: Preparation for Winter and Formation of Equipment Stocks: Ministry of Energy hopes for cooperation with USAIDAs reported, On June 21, the Ministry of Energy of Ukraine and the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Great Britain signed a memorandum on energy partnership. Within the framework of this work, the creation and launch of the Innovation Fund is envisaged.

Foto: mev.gov.ua

News Source: https://www.ukrinform.ua/rubric-economy/3729435-fond-zelenih-innovacij-innovateukraine-rozpocinae-robotu-minenergo.html

The Council named the priorities of public procurement - defense, civil protection, food and fuel

Authors: Ukrinform (Person)

Publisher: Укринформ (Organization)

Published Time: 2023-06-29T18:23:34+03:00

Modified Time: 2023-06-29T18:23:34+03:00

Description: Among the priorities of public purchases during the war - the needs of protecting Ukrainians at the front and in the rear, as well as the purchase of food and fuel. - Ukrinform.

Images: ['630_360_15832...']

Tags: ['Верховна Рада', 'Держзакупівлі']

Type: Article

Public expense purchases during the war - the needs of protecting Ukrainian at the front and in the rear, as well as the purchase of food and fuel.

About it during a public discussion on "not on the drum: what are the purchases of one in wartime", which took place at the Media Center Ukraine - Ukrinform, said Dmitry Natalukha Committee on Economic Development.

According to him, it is absolutely natural that in the first place during the war booze purchases. Further priority - providing Ukrainians with foods and fuel.

"It is also related to the provision of defense forces or physical protection for civilian citizens. As, for example, the issue of plants. The first is safety at the front, the second is the rear in the rear, as well as everything that enhances this security," - said the MP.

As for the criteria of the priority of the corresponding costs and their expediency, the most opinion is suggested by common sense.

"Common sense did not suggest why the drums in the shelters, so the cestioned a number of discussions and scandals. The same applies to repair during the war of stadiums. As for me, intuition should be required. Therefore, the first thing that will come to mind the ordinary person, which will be forced, what he needs to feel protected, is what the state has to have a state, "Natalukha explained.

Read also: at Boryspil Airport explained why they ordering almost ₴ 52 millionAt the same time, he spoke for some displacement of emphasis in the defense system. After all, the percentage of expenses for the purchase of UAV and sea drone is much lower than when purchased heavy weapons.

"Although, from the point of view of the impetus for certain engineering, the state could direct a more resource to stimulate producers of this industry. If they have noted that there is a state defense order, they could plan production volumes to finance research development. I think we will soon be" - the parliamentarian is convinced.

News Source: https://www.ukrinform.ua/rubric-polytics/3729436-u-radi-nazvali-prioriteti-derzzakupivel-oborona-civilnij-zahist-harci-j-palne.html

Vinnytsia received four more generators from German Foreign Ministry

Authors: Ukrinform (Person)

Publisher: Укринформ (Organization)

Published Time: 2023-06-29T18:27:00+03:00

Modified Time: 2023-06-29T18:27:00+03:00

Description: On Thursday, June 29, Vinnitsa received four more generators from German Foreign Ministry. - Ukrinform.

Images: ['630_360_16796...']

Tags: ['Німеччина', 'Вінниця', 'допомога', 'генератор']

Type: Article

On Thursday, June 29, Vinnitsa received four more generators from German Foreign Ministry.

About it in telegramVinnytsia Chairman Sergey Morgunov Reported, Ukrinform Reports.

“It's Schvinnitziasch(https://www.ukrinform.ua/tag-vinnica)Foreigners from German Foreign Ministry have also arrived. One of them with a capacity of 60 kW, one - 100 kW of dads of 300 kW, ”Morgunov wrote.

According to him, the obtained energy equipment is directed to an objectical infrastructure for use in the event of a tablet.

On Monday, June 26, Vinnitsa received nine generators from German Foreign Ministry.

*!(https://www.ukrinform.ua/rubric-regions/3728309-es-vidpraviv-500-generatoriv-dla-likvidacii-naslidkiv-pidrivu-kahovskoi-ges.html)The equipment obtained by the city is another tranche of humanitarian aid by Germany's foreign affairs, German Embassy in Kiev, Tanimetsky Society of International Cooperation GIZ. It will increase the readiness for emergencies that may occur during the heating season.

Riots in France: The number of detainees increased to 180

Authors: Ukrinform (Person)

Publisher: Укринформ (Organization)

Published Time: 2023-06-29T18:28:00+03:00

Modified Time: 2023-06-29T18:28:00+03:00

Description: In France, the number of detainees throughout the country caused by shooting between police and teenager of African descent in Paris has increased to 180 people. - Ukrinform.

Images: ['630_360_14603...']

Tags: ['Франція', 'Протест', 'Вбивство', 'Затримання']

Type: Article

Ufranius, the number of detainees throughout the country, caused by a shooting between police and a teenager of African descent in suburbanparis, has increased to 180 people.

As Ukrinform reports, it reports ReutersWith reference to the French Ministry of Internal Affairs.

According to the Minister of Internal Affairs of the country Geralda Darmanin, police took into custody180 people in the second night of riots.

French President Emmanuel Macron held a crisis meeting with ministers about the shooting. Subsequently, Prime Minister Elizabeth Bourne rejected the calls of some politicians to declare a state of emergency.

The 17-year-old guy was killed during a shooting in Nanter. According to the local prosecutor, an official investigation was launched against the officer for deliberate murder.

Read also: riots through a teenager murder: in France Mobilize 40,000 police officersAs reported UkrinformIn Paris protests and riots took place after the police shot a 17-year-old boy who did not stop by order of the police.

Previously reported 150 detainedas a result of protests.

News Source: https://www.ukrinform.ua/rubric-world/3729402-zavorusenna-u-francii-kilkist-zatrimanih-zrosla-do-180.html

Zelenskaya told her support during the war

Authors: Ukrinform (Person)

Publisher: Укринформ (Organization)

Published Time: 2023-06-29T18:28:12+03:00

Modified Time: 2023-06-29T18:28:12+03:00

Description: President's wife, Elena Zelenskaya, during a full -scale war of Russia against Ukraine, supported herself through work, hope and Ukrainians, as well as inspired by the work of rescuers. - Ukrinform.

Images: ['630_360_16700...']

Tags: ['Україна', 'Олена Зеленська', 'Війна з Росією']

Type: Article

The president's wife, Olena Zelenskaya, during a full -scale war of Russia against Ukraine, supports herself through work, hope and Ukrainians, as well as inspired by the work of rescuers.

She told about it in Pokcast "simple words", reports Ukrinform.

" First, really holds the work. Because when you get up in the morning and understand that you have a lot and depends on you the performance of these ones, people hope for you, then it at least lifts out of bed and makes you move, ”the First Lady said.

Also, she said, hopes.

"It is impossible to go such a long way and then put my hands and say that I can, I can, do not want to wait more," - explained Zelenskaya.

She also emphasized that Ukrainian people are "crazy", their actions are the difficult moments we are constantly experiencing, and the work of SES employees.

Read also: Zelenskaya: We have a lot of work, but I believe in the ultraumatic growth“Every time I look at our SESN, for some reason, they are constantly attracted to my attention. I look at their faces: they are so cute, just inspired by people: a person chose a profession - to save, knew that every day it would be emotionally and physically difficult to work. They do it daily, pull people out of the rubble of homes, they fight, ”the first lady shared.

She added that first to look at every such photo physically hurt, and then there is a motivation to go and do something.

In addition, Zelenskaya noted that in order to switch and restart, it can be selected, in particular, to disassemble things, books, to engage in physical education and sports, to wash dishes.

"This is not my permanent task, there is a dishwasher and I don't have to do it every day. If it was, as before, it would not be so pleased when I was washed again, again a mountain of plates. But sometimes you will wash the dishes and this is such a meditative thing: warm water and another cool thing that at this point is wet hands and you cannot keep the telephone, ”Zelenska said.It will contain ten episodes on how to take care of mental physical health in war. The presenters will choose ten problems that are indirectly or indirectly affecting trauma during the war, they will be able to overcome these injuries together with guests - authors by the participants of the All -Ukrainian Mental Health Program "Are You How?"

"Simple words" is a podkast about psychology, which is published since 2019. The presenter of the project is Sofia Terlaz, clinical psychology, paired and family -therapist, and Mark Livin, journalist and writer.

Read also: contracts of support of patients with mental disorders have more than 500 polyclinics - ZelenskElena Zelenskaya, the initiator of the All -Ukrainian Mental Health Program "Tyak?", Became a guest of the first issue of a special season.

The guest of the second issue will be the head of the Ministry of Health Viktor Lyashko. Sleep, food, water, sensitivity, hormones, medicines and other important mental and physical health will be topics.

News Source: https://www.ukrinform.ua/rubric-society/3729438-zelenska-rozpovila-so-ii-pidtrimue-pid-cas-vijni.html

Zelenskaya told her support during the war

Authors: Ukrinform (Person)

Publisher: Укринформ (Organization)

Published Time: 2023-06-29T18:28:12+03:00

Modified Time: 2023-06-29T18:28:12+03:00

Description: President's wife, Elena Zelenskaya, during a full -scale war of Russia against Ukraine, supported herself through work, hope and Ukrainians, as well as inspired by the work of rescuers. - Ukrinform.

Images: ['630_360_16700...']

Tags: ['Україна', 'Олена Зеленська', 'Війна з Росією']

Type: Article

The president's wife, Olena Zelenskaya, during a full -scale war of Russia against Ukraine, supports herself through work, hope and Ukrainians, as well as inspired by the work of rescuers.

She told about it in Pokcast "simple words", reports Ukrinform.

" First, really holds the work. Because when you get up in the morning and understand that you have a lot and depends on you the performance of these ones, people hope for you, then it at least lifts out of bed and makes you move, ”the First Lady said.

Also, she said, hopes.

"It is impossible to go such a long way and then put my hands and say that I can, I can, do not want to wait more," - explained Zelenskaya.

She also emphasized that Ukrainian people are "crazy", their actions are the difficult moments we are constantly experiencing, and the work of SES employees.

Read also: Zelenskaya: We have a lot of work, but I believe in the ultraumatic growth“Every time I look at our SESN, for some reason, they are constantly attracted to my attention. I look at their faces: they are so cute, just inspired by people: a person chose a profession - to save, knew that every day it would be emotionally and physically difficult to work. They do it daily, pull people out of the rubble of homes, they fight, ”the first lady shared.

She added that first to look at every such photo physically hurt, and then there is a motivation to go and do something.

In addition, Zelenskaya noted that in order to switch and restart, it can be selected, in particular, to disassemble things, books, to engage in physical education and sports, to wash dishes.

"This is not my permanent task, there is a dishwasher and I don't have to do it every day. If it was, as before, it would not be so pleased when I was washed again, again a mountain of plates. But sometimes you will wash the dishes and this is such a meditative thing: warm water and another cool thing that at this point is wet hands and you cannot keep the telephone, ”Zelenska said.It will contain ten episodes on how to take care of mental physical health in war. The presenters will choose ten problems that are indirectly or indirectly affecting trauma during the war, they will be able to overcome these injuries together with guests - authors by the participants of the All -Ukrainian Mental Health Program "Are You How?"

"Simple words" is a podkast about psychology, which is published since 2019. The presenter of the project is Sofia Terlaz, clinical psychology, paired and family -therapist, and Mark Livin, journalist and writer.

Read also: contracts of support of patients with mental disorders have more than 500 polyclinics - ZelenskElena Zelenskaya, the initiator of the All -Ukrainian Mental Health Program "Tyak?", Became a guest of the first issue of a special season.

The guest of the second issue will be the head of the Ministry of Health Viktor Lyashko. Sleep, food, water, sensitivity, hormones, medicines and other important mental and physical health will be topics.

News Source: https://www.ukrinform.ua/rubric-society/3729438-zelenska-rozpovila-so-ii-pidtrimue-pid-cas-vijni.html

Death of people near the shelter: the court released the guard of the clinic under house arrest

Authors: Ukrinform (Person)

Publisher: Укринформ (Organization)

Published Time: 2023-06-29T18:32:00+03:00

Modified Time: 2023-06-29T18:32:00+03:00

Description: The Kyiv Court of Appeal applied house arrest in a certain period of the day against the guard of one of the polyclinics of the Desnyanskiy district of Kyiv, a suspect in a closed shelter in the clinic, near which three people were killed on June 1. - Ukrinform.

Images: ['630_360_16880...']

Tags: ['Домашній арешт', 'Загибель', 'Укриття', 'Війна з Росією']

Type: Article

The Kyiv Appeal Court applied house arrest in a certain period of the relative of the relative of one of the polyclinics of the Desnyanskiy district of Kiev, suspected of a closed shelter in the polyclinic, near which Tithovians were killed on the night of June 1.

According to Ukrinform, the Court of Appeal reports this on Facebook.“On June 29, the panel of judges of the Judicial Chamber for consideration of the criminal court appellate court considered the appeals filed by the party to the decision of the investigating judge of the Holosiivskyi district court KyivFrom June 3, which satisfied the request of the National Police of the National Police in Kyiv and was applied to M. Precautionary measure in the form of detention by the term of July 30, 2023, ”the message reads.

As they informed in court, the appeal of the appeal, presented by the defense party, which operate in the interests of the suspect M. was partially informed. The decision of the investigating judge of the Holosiivskyi District Court of Kyivid on June 3 was canceled.

A new decision was made by which the petition of the investigator of the Main Directorate of Kyiv to apply a preventive measure in the form of detention with respect to the suspect M. was partially satisfied.

Read also: the government has instructed Kamyshyn to immediately develop a solution to improve the situation with shelter we“Applied to the suspect M. Precautionary measure in the form of a house arrests, having left his place of residence at a defined manner, from 22 hours to 6 hours of the next day with the exception of receiving non -disposable medical care and staying in shelters during the airline, until July 30, 2023 - The message is reported.

The suspect of M. was released from custody from the courtroom to put on the suspect M. the duties under Part 5 of Art. 194 Criminal and Processual Code of Ukraine.

The court reminded that citizen M. is suspected of committing a criminal offense under Part 3 of Art. 135(leaving in danger)Criminal Code of Ukraine.As reported by Ukrinform, on June 1, Russian troops were once again attacking rockets. The enemy released in the direction of the capital 10 "Iskander". All destroyed a prototype defense.

As a result of rocket stroke affected19 people, three of them were killed, including the 9th year.

A resident of the Desnyanskiy district, whose wife died during the attack of the Russians, told the public that people had come to shelter at the clinic at night, but no one opened them.

On June 1, three officials of the district state administration were detained in Kyiv. They were suspected.

Three officials - the first deputy Desnyansk Regional State Administration, the Director of the Oblast and his deputy were chosen precautions in the form of tontoral house arrest. The guard of the medical facility was chosen in the form of detention without determining the alternative.

_ Photo: lattice_

News Source: https://www.ukrinform.ua/rubric-kyiv/3729442-zagibel-ludej-bila-ukritta-sud-vidpustiv-ohoronca-polikliniki-pid-domasnij-arest.html

Four countries have reservations on EU security for Ukraine

Authors: Ukrinform (Person)

Publisher: Укринформ (Organization)

Published Time: 2023-06-29T18:37:00+03:00

Modified Time: 2023-06-29T18:37:00+03:00

Description: Austria, Ireland, Malta and Cyprus want their neutral status to be taken into account in the final statement of the EU summit on future security obligations from the European Union for Ukraine. - Ukrinform.

Images: ['630_360_16438...']

Tags: ['Євросоюз', 'Україна', 'Агресія РФ', 'Безпека']

Type: Article

Austria, Ireland, Malta and Cyprus want their neutral status to be taken into account by the EU Summit's statement regarding future security obligations by the Evro Union for Ukraine.

According to Ukrinform's own correspondent, Austrian Chancellor Karl Nevammer stated this before the start of the European Council in Brussels.

"Of course, there will still be a discussion about this. But there is a lot to do to know the wording, which will also be acceptable for neutral countries," -said the unmistakable issue of future obligations in the field of security [EU] EUFor Ukraine.

According to him, Austria, Ireland, Malta and Cyprus "have declared their clear knowledge about this." "It is important for us that our role as neutral Ukrainians is also mentioned," the Nevemmer added.

Read also: EU and NATO retain unity in support of Ukraine Tarevagation to events in Russia - Michelle ](https://www.ukrinform.ua/rubric-world/3729321-es-i-nato-zberigaut-ednist-u-pidtrimci-ukraini-ta-reaguvanni-na-podii-u-rosii-misel.html)The Austrian news agency of ARA reported that at the EU summit on June 29-30, the heads of states and governments will discuss future security obligations from the ECE for Ukraine. At the same time, Austria, Ireland, Malta and Cyprus have stated their neutrality, and therefore proposed to include a pre-projection of the final document of the summit, which would emphasize the "complete registration of security and defense policy and defense of individual Member States."

It is noted that according to the project of the document, the EU Summit should confirm the prepared readiness of the EU "to provide viable military assistance to Ukraine as much as it will be needed."

The safety obligations to Ukraine at this stage are not defined. As the ARA, in the project of the summit, it is emphasized that "the European Union of the Id states-Member are ready to make a contribution to future security obligations of Ukraine, which will help Ukraine to protect themselves in long-term perpetrator, prevent acts should be considered as soon as possible.

Read also: [EU will double the support of Ukraine's support on the background(https://www.ukrinform.ua/rubric-polytics/3729336-es-podvoit-zusilla-z-pidtrimki-ukraini-na-foni-zakolotu-v-rosii-fon-der-laen.html)

News Source: https://www.ukrinform.ua/rubric-polytics/3729445-cotiri-kraini-maut-zasterezenna-sodo-bezpekovih-zobovazan-es-dla-ukraini.html

The National Bank has approved a strategy for moving to a more flexible exchange rate

Authors: Ukrinform (Person)

Publisher: Укринформ (Organization)

Published Time: 2023-06-29T18:38:53+03:00

Modified Time: 2023-06-29T18:38:53+03:00

Description: On June 29, 2023, the Board of the National Bank of Ukraine approved a strategy for mitigating currency restrictions, the transition to greater flexibility of the exchange rate and returning to inflation targeting. - Ukrinform.

Images: ['630_360_16835...']

Tags: ['Курс гривні', 'Нацбанк']

Type: Article

On June 29, 2023, the Board of the National Bank of Ukraine approved the strategy of currency restrictions, the transition to greater flexibility of the exchange rate of and the reverse of inflationary targeting.

According to Ukrinform, this was reported NBU press service.

"The strategy consists of three main directions. This is a mitigation of currency, transition to greater flexibility of the rate and return to the principles inflationTargeting. Everyone contains a general description of the sequence of stages, key priorities, principles and proper prerequisites for the implementation of the strategy, " - the testimony reads.

At the same time, the NBU emphasized, the steps to implement the strategy will be tied to specific dates. The National Bank "will implement a strategy consistently, based on the necessary prerequisites."

For example, the established prerequisites made it possible to soften the low restrictions in June. At the same time, the preconditions for the next steps are still forming, the regulator states.

Read also: in the National Bank declared the loss of popularity of currency installationsWhen implementing the National Bank Strategy will take into account the results of analyzing the effectiveness of previous steps, as well as other aspects of macroeconomic policy(In particular, fiscal position and debt resilience).

Завдяки такому підходу повернення у перспективі до інфляційного таргетування зплаваючим обмінним курсом відбуватиметься у "впорядкований" спосіб.

Також НБУ зберігатиме "жорсткі монетарні умови шляхом підтримання достатньовисокого рівня процентних ставок у реальному вимірі".

"Підготовка стратегії є одним зі структурних маяків у межах програмирозширеного фінансування з Міжнародним валютним фондом, виконання якого булопередбачено до кінця червня 2023 року", - зауважили у пресслужбі.

Читайте також: Глава Нацбанку сподівається, що цьогоріч вдастьсяуникнути емісії гривні The public version of the document will be published by the National Bank by July 7, 2023.

News Source: https://www.ukrinform.ua/rubric-economy/3729446-nacbank-uhvaliv-strategiu-perehodu-do-bils-gnuckogo-obminnogo-kursu.html

Lyashko states that there is no "magic pill" that will protect against radiation

Authors: Ukrinform (Person)

Publisher: Укринформ (Organization)

Published Time: 2023-06-29T18:49:00+03:00

Modified Time: 2023-06-29T18:49:00+03:00

Description: Potassium iodide has already been distributed to people who are in the potential zone of exposure, but everyone should understand that this drug protects only the thyroid gland, a magic pill that protects against radiation. - Ukrinform.

Images: ['630_360_16519...']

Tags: ['Аварія', 'МОЗ', 'Радіація', 'Віктор Ляшко', 'Запорізька АЕС']

Type: Article

Iodidcalium has already been distributed to people who are in the potential zone of exposure to the ZPEU, Aleus should understand that this drug protects only the thyroid gland, a charming pillar, which will protect against radiation.

About it in an interview with the TV channel “We are Ukraine”Health Minister Lyashko said, Ukrinform reports.

"Drugs(iodide Kaliy - ed.)Already handed over to people living in a potential zone of influence(Rabbit - order.). У подальшому треба буде стежити, куди може пітихмара радіоактивного пилу, а це буде залежати від кліматичних умов, і тодівизначатимуться інші зони впливу. Але ми маємо розуміти, що ця пігулка незахищає від впливу радіації , it only protects the thyroid gland. There is no magic pill that could be taken to be protected from radiation, "Lyashko said.

That is why he noted, the MoH has developed clear recommendations for people who live in the area of influence, what drugs should be in the first aid kit.

In addition, the minister noted, special plans for emergency response have been developed for each nuclear power station. Now they are actualized wartime.

Read also: in the case of a terrorist attack on the ZPPU will work special systems - Lyashko Lyashko also noted that all the people who are now in the potential influential zone and for some reason have not received potassium iodide, may see a surprise family doctor or call the MoH hotline.

"We have drugs available to distribute and protect everyone who will need it," he summarized.

Read also: for a radiation accident cannot be prepared so as to protect everyone 100% - Lyashko As reported by Ukrinform, in Zaporizhzhya, Dnipropetrovsk, Mykolaiv Tacherson regions conducted large -scale training to overcome the consequence terrorist attack at the Zaporizhzhia NPP .

News Source: https://www.ukrinform.ua/rubric-society/3729448-lasko-zaavlae-so-ne-isnue-carivnoi-pigulki-aka-zahistit-vid-radiacii.html

Lyashko states that there is no "magic pill" that will protect against radiation

Authors: Ukrinform (Person)

Publisher: Укринформ (Organization)

Published Time: 2023-06-29T18:49:00+03:00

Modified Time: 2023-06-29T18:49:00+03:00

Description: Potassium iodide has already been distributed to people who are in the potential zone of exposure, but everyone should understand that this drug protects only the thyroid gland, a magic pill that protects against radiation. - Ukrinform.

Images: ['630_360_16519...']

Tags: ['Аварія', 'МОЗ', 'Радіація', 'Віктор Ляшко', 'Запорізька АЕС']

Type: Article

Iodidcalium has already been distributed to people who are in the potential zone of exposure to the ZPEU, Aleus should understand that this drug protects only the thyroid gland, a charming pillar, which will protect against radiation.

About it in an interview with the TV channel “We are Ukraine”Health Minister Lyashko said, Ukrinform reports.

"Drugs(iodide Kaliy - ed.)Already handed over to people living in a potential zone of influence(Rabbit - order.). У подальшому треба буде стежити, куди може пітихмара радіоактивного пилу, а це буде залежати від кліматичних умов, і тодівизначатимуться інші зони впливу. Але ми маємо розуміти, що ця пігулка незахищає від впливу радіації , it only protects the thyroid gland. There is no magic pill that could be taken to be protected from radiation, "Lyashko said.

That is why he noted, the MoH has developed clear recommendations for people who live in the area of influence, what drugs should be in the first aid kit.

In addition, the minister noted, special plans for emergency response have been developed for each nuclear power station. Now they are actualized wartime.

Read also: in the case of a terrorist attack on the ZPPU will work special systems - Lyashko Lyashko also noted that all the people who are now in the potential influential zone and for some reason have not received potassium iodide, may see a surprise family doctor or call the MoH hotline.

"We have drugs available to distribute and protect everyone who will need it," he summarized.

State Audit initiates legislative changes to control the cost of rebuilding

Authors: Ukrinform (Person)

Publisher: Укринформ (Organization)

Published Time: 2023-06-29T18:51:55+03:00

Modified Time: 2023-06-29T18:51:55+03:00

Description: The State Audit Service of Ukraine initiates changes to the legislation to ensure effective control over financing of the country's reconstruction works. - Ukrinform.

Images: ['630_360_16562...']

Tags: ['Держаудит', 'Війна з Росією', 'Відбудова']

Type: Article

The State Audit Service of Ukraine initiates changes to the legislation to ensure the effective control over the financing of the country's reconstruction.

About it during a public discussion on the topic: "Not on the drum: what purchases are in the wartime period" she said, answering the question of correspondentukrukrueform, Head of the State Audit Service Alla Basaleva.

She recalled that in a letter of intentions signed by Kyiv with the International Bulk Fund, the State Audit Service was determined by the main body that will control the issue of restoration.

"And we will initiate changes to the legislation that will effectively control the spending of funds. This is a common task(Executive Ico -Power - Ed.). Тому проситиму про зустрічі з усімапарламентськими фракціями й доводитиму свою позицію. Ми повинні зробитиконтроль в цій частині ефективним", - пояснила Басалаєва.

Йдеться, за її словами, про дуже чутливе для українського суспільства питання.Також важливо не втратити довіру міжнародних партнерів.

"Останнім часом була велика кількість міжнародних зустрічей. Теза партнерівєдина: "Гроші ми дамо - за належного фінансового контролю. Покажіть, яківажелі ви матимете у процесі відновлення", - наголосила очільницяДержаудитслужби.

При цьому моніторинг закупівель — єдиний в арсеналі служби інструмент, щопрацює превентивно, тобто, дозволяє запобігати порушенням, а не виявляти їхвже постфактум.

Одним з дієвих механізмів унеможливлення зловживань Басалаєва назвалаблокування Держказначейством руху грошей, якщо при проведенні закупівель булодопущено суттєві порушення. Пропонується законодавчо затвердити перелік такихпорушень.

“Якщо ми їх виявимо, це зазначатиметься в системі Прозорро й буде сигналом дляказначейства. Бо що відбувається зараз? ГрошіThey went, they are very quickly mastered. Then our audits and audits will find that they are spent ineffectively. Transamation of law enforcement agencies. There will be criminal cases, there will be fixed collections, one of the suspects will sit in Vienna, but there is no money ... ”, - says the head of the State Audit Service.

Deputy Minister of Economy Nadiya Bigun, who also participated in the discussion of UMediacenter Ukraine-Ukrinform, agreed with the need to strengthen the control of public funds. At the same time, she warned against the "bends", and the tenders will be stopped for formal reasons - for example, because of mistakes.“We believe that the mechanism of locking payments by the Treasury must be made. After all, we see that within the framework of monitoring of public procurement - especially for the following periods - attention was often focused on formal violations, including procedural, which do not affect the economic effect. In fact, it is not a ground for termination of payments, ”the official is convinced.

According to the runner, all the procedures necessary for the reconstruction should be about time and compliance with time to purchase even difficult conditions.

“There is a request for recovery to be fast, people don't have time to wait. Therefore, it is necessary to find a mechanism for which payments would be stopped only at real risks, and not by any formal drive, which will certainly negatively indicate the tights of the work, ”the runner summed up.

Read also: Norway has provided $ 190 million grants for rebuilding UkraineAs reported, during the International Conference on the Recovery of Ukraine last week in London, foreign partners promised to provide about $ 60 million in the form of grants, loans and credit guarantees. One of the conditions is clear control by Ukraine on the use of these funds.

News Source: https://www.ukrinform.ua/rubric-vidbudova/3729449-derzaudit-iniciue-zakonodavci-zmini-dla-kontrolu-vitrat-na-vidbudovu.html

The budget received $ 1.2 billion grant funds from the US and Finland

Authors: Ukrinform (Person)

Publisher: Укринформ (Organization)

Published Time: 2023-06-29T18:54:00+03:00

Modified Time: 2023-06-29T18:54:00+03:00

Description: Ukraine has received $ 1.2 billion in the United States and $ 15 million from Finland through the World Bank Target Multidoon Fund from the United States and $ 15 million. - Ukrinform.

Images: ['630_360_15350...']

Tags: ['Фінляндія', 'Мінфін', 'США', 'Україна', 'Світовий банк', 'допомога']

Type: Article

Ukraine has arranged $ 1.2 billion -grant from the United States and $ 15 million through the World Bank Target Multidoon Fund from the World Bank.

According to Ukrinform, this was reported Ministry of Finance.

"Сьогодні до державного бюджету України надійшли грантові кошти в розмірі$1,215 мільярда доларів США через Цільовий фонд багатьох донорів Світовогобанку. Ukraine received $ 1.2 million from the United States and $ 15 million from the Finland Republic, "the statement said.

It is noted that grant funds are provided as part of the fifth additional financing within the project “Supporting government expenditures to secure a state administration in Ukraine”(PEACE in Ukraine).

Метою проєкту є часткова компенсація видатків державного бюджету, зокремасоціальних та гуманітарних, що не пов’язані зі сферою безпеки і оборони.

Читайте також: МВФ сьогодні обговорить виділення нового траншуУкраїні Involved grant financing will be aimed at remuneration(IDPs, persons with disiniteness, low-income families and payment of housing and communal sugars).

“Вдячний урядам США, Фінляндії та команді Світового банку за плідну співпрацюі вагому підтримку у частині забезпечення гуманітарних та соціальних видатківпід час повномасштабної війни. Фінансування у формі грантів дозволяє незбільшувати боргове навантаження та сприяє фінансовій стабільності України”, -зазначив міністр фінансів Сергій Марченко.

Читайте також: Україна вже отримала $22 мільярди від Світового банку такраїн-донорів

News Source: https://www.ukrinform.ua/rubric-economy/3729450-do-budzetu-nadijsli-12-milarda-grantovih-kostiv-vid-ssa-ta-finlandii.html

Events in Russia have an impact on all European security - Metzola

Authors: Ukrinform (Person)

Publisher: Укринформ (Organization)

Published Time: 2023-06-29T18:56:00+03:00

Modified Time: 2023-06-29T18:56:00+03:00

Description: The attempt of the military rebellion that took place in Russia at the end of last week has a serious impact on the Russian war against Ukraine, as well as the entire European security system. - Ukrinform.

Images: ['630_360_16425...']

Tags: ['Євросоюз', 'Україна', 'Агресія РФ', 'Росія', 'Переворот', 'Безпека', 'Мецола']

Type: Article

The attempted rebellion that took place in Russia at the end of last week has a serious impact on the Russian war against Ukraine, as well as on all system -European security.

This was stated by President of the European Parliament, Robertamezol, Ukrinform correspondent reported in Brussels during a press conference after a meeting with the heads of the heads of states and governments of the EU countries.

"We talked very fruitfully with the heads of state and governments, including Ukraine. The event in Russia has raised a number of questions. First, about internal dynamics in Russia itself. It affects the invasion(RF)In Ukraine and Naurovian safety as a whole. At the same time, we can be sure that it is Ukraine to remain our priority number one, ”the Presidential Parliament said.

She noted that the EU policy on Russia is producing results, it allowed Putin to weaken and gave Ukraine the opportunity to effectively defend the anti -Russian aggression. In this connection, Motzola congratulated the adoption of the 11th package and allocation of additional € 50 billion to support Ukraine's efforts in the EU's long-term budget, which was announced last week.

Read also: four countries have reservations on EU security for Ukraine“We must adhere to our promises to open negotiations(Class - order.). Українські зусилля у сфері реформ були надзвичайними,особливо у часи війни», - зауважила Президент Європарламенту.

Коментуючи пропозиції щодо внесення змін у багаторічний бюджет ЄС на 2024-2027роки, вона зауважила, що ЄС має привести цей документ у відповідність до новихреалій. Це передбачає продовження допомоги для України, підтримкуконкурентоспроможності європейських підприємств та бізнесу, вирішеннянагальних проблем у сфері міграції.

Як повідомлялося, 29-30 червня у Брюсселі відбувається черговий саміт ЄС,першим питанням порядку денного якого є ситуація в Україні та допомога ЄС удотриманні її права на самооборону проти російської агресії.

Читайте також: Європейський Акт із спільного замовлення боєприпасівухвалять на початку липня – Мецола

News Source: https://www.ukrinform.ua/rubric-world/3729456-podii-u-rosii-maut-vpliv-na-vsu-evropejsku-bezpeku-mecola.html

From July 1, "available medicines" will release again by e-recipe

Authors: Ukrinform (Person)

Publisher: Укринформ (Organization)

Published Time: 2023-06-29T19:04:00+03:00

Modified Time: 2023-06-29T19:04:00+03:00

Description: Since July 1, drugs under the Affordable Medicines will be released again according to an electronic prescription. - Ukrinform.

Images: ['630_360_16141...']

Tags: ['Доступні ліки', 'МОЗ', 'Віктор Ляшко', 'Рецепт']

Type: Article

From July 1, the Affordable Medicines Program will be released again by electronic recipe.

About it in an interview with the TV channel “We are Ukraine”Health Minister Viktor Lyashko said, Ukrinform reports. "By February 24, 2022 " Available Medicines "They were released in Ukraine according to an electronic recipe. During the war, these medicines were allowed to be released both by electronic and paper recipe. We saw an analysis of how many of these medicines were allowed according to different recipes. And we do not see now that there is an growth of paper recipes with Taporoblems with the prescription of electronic prescriptions for those drugs that are available in the program "Available Medicines". Therefore, in the territory where there are no fighting, we quietly allow from July 1 to return to the situation that was, " - the Minister.

*!(https://www.ukrinform.ua/rubric-society/3697841-u-nszu-rozpovili-do-kogo-zvertatis-za-receptom-na-dostupni-liki.html)According to Ukrinform, according to the State Service, the requirement for the release of medical preparations by electronic prescription will operate throughout the country. The exceptional settlements will be excluded. The norm for the release of drugs with "Available Medicines" comes into force on July 1.

The State Service said that the paper recipe will remain only in temporary or frontal territories.

News Source: https://www.ukrinform.ua/rubric-society/3729454-z-1-lipna-dostupni-liki-vidpuskatimut-znovu-za-ereceptom.html

From July 1, "available medicines" will release again by e-recipe

Authors: Ukrinform (Person)

Publisher: Укринформ (Organization)

Published Time: 2023-06-29T19:04:00+03:00

Type: Article

From July 1, the Affordable Medicines Program will be released again by electronic recipe.

About it in an interview with the TV channel “We are Ukraine”Health Minister Viktor Lyashko said, Ukrinform reports. "By February 24, 2022 " Available Medicines "They were released in Ukraine according to an electronic recipe. During the war, these medicines were allowed to be released both by electronic and paper recipe. We saw an analysis of how many of these medicines were allowed according to different recipes. And we do not see now that there is an growth of paper recipes with Taporoblems with the prescription of electronic prescriptions for those drugs that are available in the program "Available Medicines". Therefore, in the territory where there are no fighting, we quietly allow from July 1 to return to the situation that was, " - the Minister.

Greta Tunberg came to Kiev

Authors: Ukrinform (Person)

Publisher: Укринформ (Organization)

Published Time: 2023-06-29T19:20:00+03:00

Modified Time: 2023-06-29T19:20:00+03:00

Description: The Swedish eco -activist Greta Tunberg said the world and the international community should be held accountable for Russia for its crimes. - Ukrinform.

Images: ['630_360_16880...']

Tags: ['Україна', 'Тунберг', 'Війна з Росією', 'Екоцид']

Type: Article

The Swedish Ecoactivist Greta Tunberg stated that the world and the international community should bring Russia to justice for its crimes.

She said this at a briefing at the President's office as a result of the meeting of the International Working Group on the environmental consequences of the Russian war, Ukrinform correspondent reports.

"We need to put dots over and. Danger, threats of war, suffering humanities, ecocide - this is all very connected. None of us should leave the hopelessness of what is happening in Ukraine now, those crimes committed Russiahere. I very much hope that we can select evaluations of this from the authorities, environmental organizations to determine the environment of the environment of Ukraine. We have to hold Russia accountable for its collaboration, and Ukraine must be able to recover, " - - Razayatunberg.

She noted that in her opinion, the reaction of the world to ecocide in Ukraine is not bullet. "I don't think the reaction is sufficient. We must talk louder about it," Tunberg said.

She added that the ecocide that Russia is committing in Ukraine is only one example of crimes that the Russian Federation is committing in our country.

Read also: Greta Tunberg participated in a rally against ecocide in UkraineAs reported Ukrinform.

News Source: https://www.ukrinform.ua/rubric-polytics/3729471-greta-tunberg-priihala-do-kieva.html

Zelensky spoke at a meeting of the European Council

Authors: Ukrinform (Person)

Publisher: Укринформ (Organization)

Published Time: 2023-06-29T19:21:00+03:00

Modified Time: 2023-06-29T19:21:00+03:00

Description: This is a historical time to start negotiations on Ukraine's membership in the EU, President Volodymyr Zelenskyy said during a speech at a meeting of the European Council. - Ukrinform.

Images: ['630_360_16880...']

Tags: ['Європейська рада', 'Зеленський']

Type: Article

Tseistorical time to start negotiations on Ukraine's membership in the EU, Volodymyr Zelenskyy said during a speech at a meeting of the European Council.

Ukrinform cites the full text of the speech with reference to the site of the Head of State.

Дорогий Шарлю, дорогі колеги!

Дуже дякую!Вітаю всіх вас, дякую за запрошення!

Цей тиждень я почав поїздкою на фронт у дві наші області – Донецьку таЗапорізьку. Там зараз зосереджено найбільше бойових операцій – якнаступальних, так і оборонних. Висока інтенсивність боїв, найвищий героїзмнаших людей!

Наші воїни – абсолютні молодці, і я пишаюся ними, кожним і кожною, хто заразна позиціях, хто відбиває російські штурми та знищує російських терористів.Нам вдається звільняти від окупантів нашу землю та людей, і це найголовніше.

Що успішнішими зараз будуть наші воїни, то надовше Росія перестане бутинебезпечною і для України, і для всієї нашої Європи.

History demonstrates that unsuccessful aggression always makes dictatorships weak. We are now we see in Russia - we see such weakness we need. The weakness of Russia will be safe for others, and its defeat overcomes the problem of this war.

Dear colleagues, partners!

I am grateful to all of you who help our defense against Russian aggression!Thank you every air defense system - they really save lives. It's true. Thank the European initiative for a million shells for Ukraine, for our tanking and for all the defensive packages that were provided to our country. This is all really historical cooperation to protect Europe.

In particular, Ukraine is grateful to Lithuania and Poland, and we will not allow Russia or its terrorist groups to even try to break the safety and Polish peoples from Belarus. For Ukraine, partners' safety is also safety.

Yesterday, a visit to Ukraine was Mr. President of Lithuania Nausede and Mr President Duda, and we exchanged with them assessments of the situation in the territory of Belarus Tanavana.Another thing that is important to say today in a security context is sanctions.

I am grateful for the recently adopted eleventh sanctional package of the European Union, which prejudice the fair pressure policy on anyone who makes aggression possible and terror.

It is important not to stop in sanctions. The smaller the pauses, the less Russia will adapt to the pressure on it and come up with less than how to bypass sanctions. Thank you that the111 sanction package pays attention to the efforts of Russia to bypass the sanctions across the country, and this attention should be strengthened in the 12th EU sanction package.

Unfortunately, many rockets that Russian terrorists now use against life in Ukraine have recently been produced and contain critical components that are made by the free world companies. You cannot put up with this. We must combine the use of the free world technologies for the sake of aggression opposite freedom.

It is impossible to endure what Russia does with our Zaporizhzhya nuclear plant. Let me remind you that it is the largest nuclear power plant in Europe. Russian terrorists found it. We have specific information from our intelligence, and we have presented, in particular, diplomats of European countries. As it is, by the way, information of Russia's prosecution for foreign components for missile production. The Russian anatomical industry deserves sanctions in response to Russian radiation blackmail.

Dear colleagues!

Tomorrow is coming to the EU Swedish presidency, and I want to thank Sweden to Mr. Prime Minister Christverson for their effective work. For these six months, it became stronger. I am sure of that.

On behalf of all Ukrainians, I want to thank you, dear leaders, and you, Charles, you, Ursulo, you, Roberto, for making extremely important economic and political decisions that help us protect freedom and Europe.

Unfortunately, there are things that don't help us. But if solidarity is sufficient, if our security and economic cooperation is not broken by artificial illegal restrictions, if the long -term and principled decisions of Europe, Ynadali, will signals the world that Europe believes in peace, then this war will definitely be worried.Finally, a few thoughts about the next six months for Europe. I believe that this Saturday, on the first day of Spain's presidency in the EU, for my request, Ukraine will visit Mr. Prime Minister of Spain Sanchez. It is a lot about how important it is for our Europe.

It is a historical time to start negotiations on Ukraine's membership in the European Union. Evrop of values, free and strong Europe, Europe of peace is unthinkable without Ukraine. We are ready for membership negotiations, and our progress is necessary to record the European Commission. Ukraine is set up as soon as possible to prepare for the start of merging about membership, and we will do it.

Peace has no alternatives. Therefore, the maximum unity in Europe has no alternatives.

Thank you for your attention!Thank you for the support, friends!

Glory to Ukraine!

_ photo: op _

News Source: https://www.ukrinform.ua/rubric-polytics/3729458-zelenskij-vistupiv-na-zasidanni-evropejskoi-radi.html

Zelensky spoke at a meeting of the European Council

Authors: Ukrinform (Person)

Publisher: Укринформ (Organization)

Published Time: 2023-06-29T19:21:00+03:00

Modified Time: 2023-06-29T19:21:00+03:00

Description: This is a historical time to start negotiations on Ukraine's membership in the EU, President Volodymyr Zelenskyy said during a speech at a meeting of the European Council. - Ukrinform.

Images: ['630_360_16880...']

Tags: ['Європейська рада', 'Зеленський']

Type: Article

Tseistorical time to start negotiations on Ukraine's membership in the EU, Volodymyr Zelenskyy said during a speech at a meeting of the European Council.

Ukrinform cites the full text of the speech with reference to the site of the Head of State.

Дорогий Шарлю, дорогі колеги!

Дуже дякую!Вітаю всіх вас, дякую за запрошення!

Цей тиждень я почав поїздкою на фронт у дві наші області – Донецьку таЗапорізьку. Там зараз зосереджено найбільше бойових операцій – якнаступальних, так і оборонних. Висока інтенсивність боїв, найвищий героїзмнаших людей!

Наші воїни – абсолютні молодці, і я пишаюся ними, кожним і кожною, хто заразна позиціях, хто відбиває російські штурми та знищує російських терористів.Нам вдається звільняти від окупантів нашу землю та людей, і це найголовніше.

Що успішнішими зараз будуть наші воїни, то надовше Росія перестане бутинебезпечною і для України, і для всієї нашої Європи.

History demonstrates that unsuccessful aggression always makes dictatorships weak. We are now we see in Russia - we see such weakness we need. The weakness of Russia will be safe for others, and its defeat overcomes the problem of this war.

Dear colleagues, partners!

I am grateful to all of you who help our defense against Russian aggression!Thank you every air defense system - they really save lives. It's true. Thank the European initiative for a million shells for Ukraine, for our tanking and for all the defensive packages that were provided to our country. This is all really historical cooperation to protect Europe.

In particular, Ukraine is grateful to Lithuania and Poland, and we will not allow Russia or its terrorist groups to even try to break the safety and Polish peoples from Belarus. For Ukraine, partners' safety is also safety.

Yesterday, a visit to Ukraine was Mr. President of Lithuania Nausede and Mr President Duda, and we exchanged with them assessments of the situation in the territory of Belarus Tanavana.Another thing that is important to say today in a security context is sanctions.

I am grateful for the recently adopted eleventh sanctional package of the European Union, which prejudice the fair pressure policy on anyone who makes aggression possible and terror.

It is important not to stop in sanctions. The smaller the pauses, the less Russia will adapt to the pressure on it and come up with less than how to bypass sanctions. Thank you that the111 sanction package pays attention to the efforts of Russia to bypass the sanctions across the country, and this attention should be strengthened in the 12th EU sanction package.

Unfortunately, many rockets that Russian terrorists now use against life in Ukraine have recently been produced and contain critical components that are made by the free world companies. You cannot put up with this. We must combine the use of the free world technologies for the sake of aggression opposite freedom.

It is impossible to endure what Russia does with our Zaporizhzhya nuclear plant. Let me remind you that it is the largest nuclear power plant in Europe. Russian terrorists found it. We have specific information from our intelligence, and we have presented, in particular, diplomats of European countries. As it is, by the way, information of Russia's prosecution for foreign components for missile production. The Russian anatomical industry deserves sanctions in response to Russian radiation blackmail.

Dear colleagues!

Tomorrow is coming to the EU Swedish presidency, and I want to thank Sweden to Mr. Prime Minister Christverson for their effective work. For these six months, it became stronger. I am sure of that.

On behalf of all Ukrainians, I want to thank you, dear leaders, and you, Charles, you, Ursulo, you, Roberto, for making extremely important economic and political decisions that help us protect freedom and Europe.

Unfortunately, there are things that don't help us. But if solidarity is sufficient, if our security and economic cooperation is not broken by artificial illegal restrictions, if the long -term and principled decisions of Europe, Ynadali, will signals the world that Europe believes in peace, then this war will definitely be worried.Finally, a few thoughts about the next six months for Europe. I believe that this Saturday, on the first day of Spain's presidency in the EU, for my request, Ukraine will visit Mr. Prime Minister of Spain Sanchez. It is a lot about how important it is for our Europe.

It is a historical time to start negotiations on Ukraine's membership in the European Union. Evrop of values, free and strong Europe, Europe of peace is unthinkable without Ukraine. We are ready for membership negotiations, and our progress is necessary to record the European Commission. Ukraine is set up as soon as possible to prepare for the start of merging about membership, and we will do it.

Peace has no alternatives. Therefore, the maximum unity in Europe has no alternatives.

Thank you for your attention!Thank you for the support, friends!

Glory to Ukraine!

For 33 Vodokanals and Ukrzaliznytsia set new water tariffs

Authors: Ukrinform (Person)

Publisher: Укринформ (Organization)

Published Time: 2023-06-29T19:23:00+03:00

Modified Time: 2023-06-29T19:23:00+03:00

Description: The National Commission for State Regulation in the Fields of Energy and Utilities has set new water tariffs for 33 water utilities and Ukrzaliznytsia JSC. Weighted average growth was 32%. - Ukrinform.

Images: ['630_360_15803...']

Tags: ['НКРЕКП', 'Тариф', 'Вода', 'Укрзалізниця']

Type: Article

The National Commission for State Regulation in the Fields of Energy of such Services has set new water tariffs for 33 water utilities and Ukrzaliznytsia JSC. Weighted average growth was 32%.

The corresponding decision was made during regulator meetingJune 29, Ukrinform reports.

“At the open meeting of the commission, the projects of resolutions are approved by the setting of tariffs on centralized water supplyand centralized drainage for 2023. After their approval, tariff calculations were updated. They have accustomed compensation for the cost of electricity from the beginning of 2023, which has fallen into growth. The weighted average growth was 32%, by some enterprises - above average, ”said the Director of the Department of Relations in the Field of Centralized Water Supply and Drainage Fartam Chumak.

He specified, such businesses are asked to set tariffs in two stages. On the first(July 1 to 31 August 2023)Tariffs will be affected by such generators as: increasing the cost of electricity; increase in the cost of reagents; change in sales volumes. On second(September 1 2023): change of payment; Updating expenses for fulfillment of obligations under the loan agreements of the Snowdrop by Financial Organizations. Read also: Vodokanals call NERCEP Increase tariffs from July 1As it was reported, on June 27, the National Commission for State Irregulation in the fields of energy and utilities set new granical prices in the market "a day in advance", as well as the intra -daily tabulating market.

News Source: https://www.ukrinform.ua/rubric-economy/3729459-dla-33-vodokanaliv-ta-ukrzaliznici-vstanovili-novi-tarifi-na-vodu.html

For 33 Vodokanals and Ukrzaliznytsia set new water tariffs

Authors: Ukrinform (Person)

The weighted average growth was 32%, by some enterprises - above average, ”said the Director of the Department of Relations in the Field of Centralized Water Supply and Drainage Fartam Chumak.

A two -party delegation of US senators will join NATO Summit in Vilnius

Authors: Ukrinform (Person)

Publisher: Укринформ (Organization)

Published Time: 2023-06-29T19:24:00+03:00

Modified Time: 2023-06-29T19:24:00+03:00

Description: Six American senators who represent both parties plan to join NATO Summit next month, which will focus mainly on Russia's war against Ukraine. - Ukrinform.

Images: ['630_360_14996...']

Tags: ['Саміт НАТО', 'США', 'Сенат']

Type: Article

Six -American senators, representing both parties, plan to join the next month in NATO Summit in Vilnius, which will focus mainly on Russia's war against Ukraine.

This is stated in the message The HillWith reference to the statement of lawyers, Ukrinform reports.

“We are proud of we will lead this two -party group of senators to send a river message to the international community that the United States- Regardless of party affiliation - they are on the side of the Alliance in counteracting our common challenges of global security, ”the co -chair of the delegation Gin Shahin and Tomtilis stressed in this connection.

Legislators recalled that the NATO Alliance responded unity to Putin's full -scale -scale acquisition to Ukraine, as well as the Barbarian Violence Campaign.

The delegation from the US Senate includes Democrats Gin Shahin, Dick dingbite Non -partisan legislator Angus King, as well as Republicans Tom Tillis, Pete Ricetts and Dan Sullivan.

Read also: Zelensky held a meeting on NATO summitAs reported by Ukrinform, the NATO summit, which will take place in Vilnius on July 11-12, will consider the continuation of assistance for Ukraine in its struggle in the opposite of Russian aggression. Ukraine from this meeting expects specific decisions to define the country's journey to NATO membership and to provide the Ukrainian safety to Ukraine to prevent the probable repetition of Russian aggression to the intelligent aggression.

News Source: https://www.ukrinform.ua/rubric-world/3729463-dvopartijna-delegacia-senatoriv-ssa-dolucitsa-do-samitu-nato-u-vilnusi.html

A two -party delegation of US senators will join NATO Summit in Vilnius

Authors: Ukrinform (Person)

Publisher: Укринформ (Organization)

Published Time: 2023-06-29T19:24:00+03:00

Modified Time: 2023-06-29T19:24:00+03:00

Description: Six American senators who represent both parties plan to join NATO Summit next month, which will focus mainly on Russia's war against Ukraine. - Ukrinform.

Images: ['630_360_14996...']

Tags: ['Саміт НАТО', 'США', 'Сенат']

Type: Article

Six -American senators, representing both parties, plan to join the next month in NATO Summit in Vilnius, which will focus mainly on Russia's war against Ukraine.

This is stated in the message The HillWith reference to the statement of lawyers, Ukrinform reports.

“We are proud of we will lead this two -party group of senators to send a river message to the international community that the United States- Regardless of party affiliation - they are on the side of the Alliance in counteracting our common challenges of global security, ”the co -chair of the delegation Gin Shahin and Tomtilis stressed in this connection.

Legislators recalled that the NATO Alliance responded unity to Putin's full -scale -scale acquisition to Ukraine, as well as the Barbarian Violence Campaign.

The delegation from the US Senate includes Democrats Gin Shahin, Dick dingbite Non -partisan legislator Angus King, as well as Republicans Tom Tillis, Pete Ricetts and Dan Sullivan.

Read also: Zelensky held a meeting on NATO summitAs reported by Ukrinform, the NATO summit, which will take place in Vilnius on July 11-12, will consider the continuation of assistance for Ukraine in its struggle in the opposite of Russian aggression. Ukraine from this meeting expects specific decisions to define the country's journey to NATO membership and to provide the Ukrainian safety to Ukraine to prevent the probable repetition of Russian aggression to the intelligent aggression.

News Source: https://www.ukrinform.ua/rubric-world/3729463-dvopartijna-delegacia-senatoriv-ssa-dolucitsa-do-samitu-nato-u-vilnusi.html

Ecological consequences of war: Zelensky met with members of the International Working Group

Authors: Ukrinform (Person)

Publisher: Укринформ (Organization)

Published Time: 2023-06-29T19:25:00+03:00

Modified Time: 2023-06-29T19:25:00+03:00

Description: The President of Ukraine met with members of the International Working Group on the Environmental Consequences of the Russian War. - Ukrinform.

Images: ['630_360_16880...']

Tags: ['Екологія', 'Зеленський', 'Єрмак', 'Війна з Росією']

Type: Article

The President of Ukraine met with members of the International Working Group on the Environmental Reliances of the Russian War.

About it in telegramThe head of the office manager Andriy Yermak wrote, Ukrinform reports.

"Today, the President has met with members of the International Working Group of Ecological Consequences of the War, which will work to evaluate the effects of the environment-both existing and future; develop recommendations for punishment of the aggressor state for environmentalCrimes, "the post reads.

Viso: op

Yermak noted that for undermining the Kakhovskaya hydroelectric power station and ecocide Russia should pay dear.

"An effective mechanism must be created to overcome environmental consequences, and this is part of the President Vladimir Zelensky's formula," - writes.

He added that at the meeting with the President were, in particular, the former European Commissioner of Environmental Research and Sweden Foreign Affairs Margotvalstre, Vice President of the European Parliament, Gaidy Gutala, Presidentialland in 1990-1997, Mary Robinson and eco -activist.

According to Yermak, Volodymyr Zelensky noted that the international working group is working out a wide range of issues related to the influence of the Russian aggression of Ukraine's ecological system.

The head of state attracted the attention of the interlocutors to the catastrophic consequences of the heating of the Dams of the Kakhovka Hydroelectric Power Plant, which the residents of Kherson region collided. This crime also caused significant damage to the agricultural sphere and biodiversity.

The President noted the importance of initiatives of representatives of the international working group on Russia's environmental crimes and emphasized that the aggressor has a doubtful responsibility for ecocid crime in our country.

According to the co -chair of the International Working Group Margot Walstrom, it is important to ensure the widest possible world support for the main activities of the international working group. In particular, the assessment of the harm caused by Russia.

Read also: Greta Tunberg participated in a rally against ecocide in Ukraine

In her turn, Hautala noted that the invasion of the Russian Federation into Ukraine demonstrated crimes against the environment throughout the war, and in the Ukrainian extent it is uniquely ecocide. The issue of responsibility for these crimes should be linked at both national and international levels, stressed.

The meeting was also attended by Prosecutor General Andriy Kostin, Deputy Head of the Head of State Rostislav Shurma, adviser to the head of the Office President Dariya Zarivna.

Foto: op

News Source: https://www.ukrinform.ua/rubric-polytics/3729457-ekologicni-naslidki-vijni-zelenskij-zustrivsa-iz-clenami-miznarodnoi-robocoi-grupi.html

The Council ratified Ukraine's participation in the EU program "Fiscalis"

Authors: Ukrinform (Person)

Publisher: Укринформ (Organization)

Published Time: 2023-06-29T19:25:49+03:00

Modified Time: 2023-06-29T19:25:49+03:00

Description: Parliament ratified the Agreement on Ukraine's Participation in the European Union for cooperation in Fiscalis. - Ukrinform.

Images: ['630_360_16215...']

Tags: ['Євросоюз', 'Мінфін', 'Податки', 'Україна', 'Верховна Рада']

Type: Article

The parliamentratratic agreement on Ukraine's participation in the European Union for Fiscalis Taxation Program for Fiscalis.

According to Ukrinform, this was reported Ministry of Finance.

"Сьогодні Верховна Рада України ратифікувала Угоду між Україною таЄвропейським Союзом про участь України у програмі Європейського Союзу дляспівробітництва в галузі оподаткування “Fiscalis,” the message reads.

As explained in the ministry, the entry into force will create the legal ground of accession of Ukraine to the said EU program.

Read also: Council ratified the EU Agreement on Ukraine's Participation "The Single Market"The main purpose of the program is to cooperate between the tax administrations of its Ukrainians in matters of tax fraud, evasion of taxes and aggressive tax planning.

Ukraine's participation in the program is expected to help combat taxes and improve tax administration in Ukraine, as well as support the implementation of EU legislation on taxation.

Read also: in Ukraine legalized production of craft alcoholIt is also envisaged that participation in the program will stimulate cooperation between tax authorities of Ukraine and EU countries, in particular, on the exchange of tax information, development of institutional potential, human competence, information and electronic systems.

As reported by Ukrinform, on June 29, the Verkhovna Rada ratified the Agreement of the Junior and the European Union on [participation in the Customs Program]](https://www.ukrinform.ua/rubric-economy/3729268-spivpraca-z-es-rada-ratifikuvala-ugodu-pro-ucast-ukraini-u-programi-mitnica.html)which involves cooperation between the parties in the customs sphere.

News Source: https://www.ukrinform.ua/rubric-economy/3729460-rada-ratifikuvala-ugodu-pro-ucast-ukraini-u-programi-es-fiscalis.html

On three directions of the front per day - more than 20 combat clashes

Authors: Ukrinform (Person)

Publisher: Укринформ (Organization)

Published Time: 2023-06-29T19:32:00+03:00

Modified Time: 2023-06-29T19:32:00+03:00

Description: There were 22 fighting collisions during the Liman, Bakhmut and Mariinsky directions. - Ukrinform.

Images: ['630_360_16880...']

Tags: ['Бахмут', 'Генштаб', 'Лиман', 'Війна з Росією']

Type: Article

The Nalimansk, Bakhmut and Marinsky directions took place during the day.

According to Ukrinform, the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine reported on Facebook.

«Сьогодні противник застосував 6 зенітних керованих ракет С-300 по об’єктахцивільної інфраструктури міст Запоріжжя та Чугуїв. Крім того, протягом добиворог завдав 23 авіаційних ударів, здійснив близько 46 обстрілів з реактивнихсистем залпового вогню по позиціях наших військ та населених пунктах.Ймовірність завдання ракетних та авіаційних ударівthroughout Ukraine remains high, ”the message reads.

The Russian army continues to focus the main efforts on the Liman, Bakhmut and Marinsky directions - about 22 fighting collisions took place during the day.

On Volynskyi and Polissya directions operational situation of non -significant changes.

At Siverskyi and Slobozhansky the enemy was carried out by mortar shelling of more than 10 settlements, in particular, these are Karpovichi Yomonovichi of Chernihiv region and the middle-Buda, Znob-Novgorod Iyakovka of Sumy region.

On Kupyansky the aggressor struck the aggressor in rayoniclislivka. Kislivka and Berestovetovets region were suffered by artillery and mortar shelling.

On the Liman the enemy performed unsuccessful offensive actions by the widows of Rozdolivka and Bigorivka. He struck aviation strikes near the Belogovsky region and Liman and Razdolivka in Donetsk region. More than 5 settlements, in particular, Luhansk region and Verkhnyamyanskoye and Rozdolivka - Donetsk, have suffered artillery.On Shakhtar the enemy performed unsuccessful offensive actions in the Novomikhailivka. He has struck in the areas of Coal, Zolotonyiva, Makarivka and Equy of Donetsk region. He fired at about 10 painting points, including Prychistivka, Village, Golden Niva and the graceful Donetsk region.

*!(https://www.ukrinform.ua/rubric-ato/3729236-na-tavrijskomu-napramku-sili-oboroni-prosuvautsa-vpered-za-dobu-znisili-majze-tri-roti-rosian.html)Aviation of defense forces per day made 11 beats in the areas of concentration of the personal staff of the enemy.

The missile troops and artillery units were struck by two points of management, a radar station and an artillery unit at a fire service.

As reported Ukrinform, Deputy Minister of Defense Anna Malyar stated that the Nabakhmut direction of defense had taken the operational initiative.

Foto: General Staff of the Armed Forces

News Source: https://www.ukrinform.ua/rubric-ato/3729464-na-troh-napramkah-frontu-za-dobu-ponad-20-bojovih-zitknen.html

Pension Reform: Shmigal held a meeting on the implementation of mandatory savings

Authors: Ukrinform (Person)

Published Time: 2023-06-29T19:37:45+03:00

Modified Time: 2023-06-29T19:37:45+03:00
