Images: ['630_360_16880...']

Tags: ['Пенсійна реформа', 'Уряд', 'Шмигаль', 'Накопичувальна пенсія']

Type: Article

Prime Minister of Ukraine Denis Schmigal held a meeting on the implementation of compulsory pensions.

He wrote about it in telegram ,transmits Ukrinform.

"Work is underway to implement compulsory pension accumulation. The Ministry of Social Policy, the Ministry of Finance, representatives of the Parliament and the Office of the President," Shmigal said.

According to him, during the meeting they considered the development in this direction.

"As a result of the reform, every Ukrainian must receive his own pension -copies. This will provide a fair and worthy pensionfor citizens, " - emphasized Premier.

As reported Ukrinform, on April 17, the Project of the Law on Cumulative Pensions was registered on April 17.

Duda: Ukrainians and Poles jointly honor the victims of the Volyn tragedy

Authors: Ukrinform (Person)

Publisher: Укринформ (Organization)

Published Time: 2023-06-29T19:40:00+03:00

Modified Time: 2023-06-29T19:40:00+03:00

Description: Poland and Ukraine bring their positions closer to complex historical issues and plan joint measures to honor the victims of the Volyn tragedy in July. - Ukrinform.

Images: ['630_360_16766...']

Tags: ['Дуда', 'Польща', 'Україна', 'Волинська трагедія']

Type: Article

Poland Jukraina brought together their positions in understanding complex historical issues, jointly honoring the victims of the Volyn tragedy in July.

About it in an interview with the Polish edition interia.plPolish President Andrzej Duda said after his visit to Kiev, Ukrinform reports.

As Duda noted, now PolishThe party can already carry out search and exhumation works of Polish victims in Ukraine, which could not be done a few years ago. According to him, "it shows a qualitative change: today's Ukrainian authorities have a more understanding of the whole execution than its predecessors several years ago."

Duda noted that during his visit to Kiev, he discussed the issue of a difficult history with President of Ukraine Volodymyr Zelensky, Prime Minister Schmigal and the Chairman of the Verkhovna Rada of Ukraine Ruslan Stefanchuk.

“We have different measures here that are in the preparatory stage: we have expected with the Ukrainian side that we do not yet disclose the details in the media. Therefore, sorry that I do not reveal the details, but yes, the 80s of the Volyn cutter will bring us a number common Polish-Ukrainian events, ”- said Doduda.

He expressed the opinion that the topic of the Volyn tragedy would return, but it is important to build relations between the two peoples, which will be based on "historical, elementary justice, mutual understanding and mutual management."

In Poland, the 80th anniversary of the Volyn tragedy at the state level will be celebrated on July 11.

Read also: Poland counts on the restoration of victim exhumation Volyn tragedy in May-JuneIt is known that the topic of the Volyn tragedy is one of the most controversial in Ukrainian-Polish relations. The views of Kiev and Warsaw on the reasons, responsibility and number of victims on both sides are somewhat different. The Polish castor insists that the exclusive responsibility for the crime committed in 1943-1944 in Volyn is bearing the Ukrainian side, but instead the Ukrainian side assures that both sides should be responsible and the apology should be prisoner.

The theme of the Volyn tragedy in recent years is now actively using Russian propaganda to quarrel Ukraine and Poland.

News Source: https://www.ukrinform.ua/rubric-polytics/3729468-duda-ukrainci-i-polaki-spilno-vsanuut-zertv-volinskoi-tragedii.html

Duda: Ukrainians and Poles jointly honor the victims of the Volyn tragedy

Zelensky: The weakness of Russia will make it safe for others

Authors: Ukrinform (Person)

Publisher: Укринформ (Organization)

Published Time: 2023-06-29T19:43:00+03:00

Modified Time: 2023-06-29T19:43:00+03:00

Description: President of Ukraine Volodymyr Zelensky is convinced that Russia will make it safe for other countries, and its defeat will overcome the problem of war in Ukraine. - Ukrinform.

Images: ['630_360_16880...']

Tags: ['Євросоюз', 'Європейська рада', 'Зеленський', 'Війна з Росією']

Type: Article

President of Ukraine Volodymyr Zelenskyy is convinced that Russia will make it dangerous for other countries, and its defeat will overcome the problem of war in Ukraine.

According to Ukrinform, he emphasized on this, acting as a European Council, informs on the Presidential website"History demonstrates that unsuccessful aggression always makes dictatorships weak. We are now we see in Russia now - we see such weakness we need. The weakness of Russia will be safe for others, and its defeat will overcome the problem of this war, "the President said.

ZelenskyHe noted that this time began a trip to the front to two regions - Donetsk and Zaporizhzhya, Desaraz the most combat operations - both offensive and defensive, high -intensity of fighting and the highest heroism of our people.

"Our warriors are absolute fellows, and I am proud of them, everyone who is contagious, who reflects Russian assaults and destroys Russian terrorists. We manage to release our land and people from the occupiers, and this is the most important thing," the President emphasized.

Read also: Ecological consequences of war: Zelensky met with ranges of the International Working GroupAccording to him, that our warriors will now be more successful, then Russia is a long time to be dangerous for both Ukraine and the whole of Europe.

As reported by Ukrinform, the President Volodymyr Zelenskyy reactedThe rebellion of the Wagner PEC against the Russian authorities and stated that the weakness of the Russian Federation is obvious. In words, Ukraine is able to protect Europe from spreading the Russian evil chaos.

Foto: Presidential Office

News Source: https://www.ukrinform.ua/rubric-polytics/3729472-zelenskij-slabkist-rosii-zrobit-ii-bezpecnou-dla-insih.html

Yermak called the task of the International Working Group on Ecological Crimes of

Authors: Ukrinform (Person)

Publisher: Укринформ (Organization)

Published Time: 2023-06-29T19:44:00+03:00

Modified Time: 2023-06-29T19:44:00+03:00

Description: The newly created international working group on Russia's environmental crimes should focus on evaluating Russia's crimes, developing certain mechanisms to bring it accountable and restore the ecosystem of Ukraine. - Ukrinform.

Images: ['630_360_16880...']

Tags: ['Росія', 'Єрмак', 'Офіс Президента', 'Війна з Росією', 'Екоцид']

Type: Article

The newly created International Working Group on Russia's Environmental Crimes should be used to evaluate Russia's crimes, develop certain mechanisms to bring it accountable and restore the ecosystem of Ukraine.

The co -chairman of the working group, the head of the Presidential Ukrainian Office Andriy Yermak said this at a briefing, Ukrinform correspondent reports.

"It is very important that today the first, constituent meeting of the newly created international working group on Russia's environmental crimes.(https://www.ukrinform.ua/tag-ermak).

According to him, three things should be the task of the working group: the evaluation of the crime, the development of certain mechanisms for the prosecution of the Russian Federation of Spauce these crimes and the restoration of the ecosystem of Ukraine.

"We have to solve three main things: the assessment of those crimes and harm that were in the ecosystem of Ukraine from Russian aggression. It is very important that they can calculate everything. The second is the development calculate how much time will be required to restore all the damage caused. And everything will be to work out the group. And the third is the recovery. We must restore all the way it was, and to do everything in the best examples in the world, as well as our country was an example of friendly attitude to nature. And we want to use all the best world specimens for this, " - said OP.

*!(https://www.ukrinform.ua/rubric-polytics/3729190-ermak-obgovoriv-iz-sallivanom-situaciu-na-fronti-i-zustric-u-kopengageni.html)He noted that the results of the group's work should be developed by low -exocates - a kind of Kiev ecological compass. "It will be composed with the recommendations of the world experts," Yermak stressed.

According to him, the first meeting of the group was extremely fruitful, and this became a "powerful signal of world support for Ukraine".

"The world has to hear what is happening in Ukraine every day," the OPE said.

Read also: Putin's attempts to revive the USSR finally failed - Ermak

The Swedish eco-activist of Greta Tunberg was a special guest of the event.

Foto: Presidential Office

News Source: https://www.ukrinform.ua/rubric-polytics/3729476-ermak-nazvav-zavdanna-miznarodnoi-robocoi-grupi-sodo-ekologicnih-zlociniv-rosii.html

The prosecutor asks the court to announce the international search of the muravitsky blogger

Authors: Ukrinform (Person)

Publisher: Укринформ (Organization)

Published Time: 2023-06-29T19:54:00+03:00

Modified Time: 2023-06-29T19:54:00+03:00

Description: At a meeting of the Korolevsky District Court of Zhytomyr, who examines the case of the accused in the state treason of the journalist and blogger Vasyl Muravitsky, prosecutor Vadim Levchenko filed a request to declare the defendant in the international wanted. - Ukrinform.

Images: ['630_360_16880...']

Tags: ['Блогер', 'Розшук', 'Держзрада', 'Прокурори']

Type: Article

Nazisidniy, the Korolev District Court of Zhytomyr, who considers the case of a journalist and blogger Vasyl Muravitsky, the prosecutor Vadim Levchenko made a request for announcement of the defendant.

The correspondent of Ukrinform reports from the courtroom.

“I have a petition to announce the accused in international wantedand election of a pre -trial detention in the form of detention, ”Levchenko said.

According to him, according to the information of the State Border Guard Service, Muravitsky left the territory of Ukraine on June 10, 2021 and left for the Finnish Republic, where he is now. The exact location of the accused is unidentified. At the time of leaving the country to Muravitsky, a personal event was applied in the form of a personal obligation.

Instead, Muravitsky's lawyer Marina Sholodko made a request for a visitor.

The panel of judges postponed the prosecutor's request until the accurate address of the accused was set.

The court also considers the petition of the party to defense the prosecutor as premature, since the meeting is absent and his position is unknown to the judges.

The panel of judges also raised the question that it is unknown whether Sammuravitsky was sending letters to the e -mail address, as they arrived by a spacious electronic signature. Judges emphasize that there are at least 5 different addresses, of which communication with the court on behalf of Muravitsky.

Read also: journalist statement Muravitsky : Instead of punishment - political asylum in Finland? As it was reported, in August 2017, the SBU exposed the Zhytomyr journalist Vasyl Muravitsky, who published anti -Ukrainian materials of Naproian sites. He was accused of treason. Initially, he was guarded, but in the future he gradually weakened the measure of restraint.

In his request to the Korolev District Court of Zhytomyr Muravitsky, he informed that he was in the territory of the European Union.

According to the Center for Legal Aid "Sotapostastorians", he received a political asylum in Finland .

News Source: https://www.ukrinform.ua/rubric-society/3729473-prokuror-prosit-sud-ogolositi-u-miznarodnij-rozsuk-blogerazradnika-muravickogo.html

In Kramatorsk declared a three -day mourning for the dead during a rocket stroke

Authors: Ukrinform (Person)

Publisher: Укринформ (Organization)

Published Time: 2023-06-29T19:56:00+03:00

Modified Time: 2023-06-29T19:56:00+03:00

Description: In Kramatorsk, a three -day mourning (June 30, July 1 and July 2) was announced for all who died as a result of a hostile rocket strike on June 27. - Ukrinform.

Images: ['630_360_16880...']

Tags: ['Краматорськ', 'Жалоба', 'Війна з Росією', 'Ракетний удар']

Type: Article

Ukramatorsk declared a three -day mourning(June 30, July 1 and 2)For all who quit as a result of a hostile rocket strike on June 27.

According to Ukrinform, the corresponding decision was signed by the mayor of Kramatorsk Oleksandr Goncharenko, reports in telegramCity Council.

“Today, on June 29, the head of the city military administration is signed on the announcement on June 30, 1 and 2 July for the other day the mourning for all who died as a result of the missile strike on KramatorskJune 27, ”the testimony reads.

As it is noted, 12 people were killed. As a sign of sorrow for the next days, the State Flag of Ukraine with the Black Shot on the buildings and structures of state executive authorities, local assurances, enterprises, institutions and organizations will be released in Kramatorsk.

Read also: rocket stroke damaged in Kramatorsk nearly 140 buildingsAlso, from June 30 to July 2, the sound of entertainment music, other establishments and public transport is prohibited.

As reported by Ukrinform, Russian troops on the evening of June 27 struck the blows on Kramatorsk. One rocket hit the pizzeria in the city center. Among the dead is a girl of 17 years and two 14 -year -old sisters. The second rocket hit the village.

60 people, including an eight -month -old child, were injured.

Foto: Kramatorsk City Council

News Source: https://www.ukrinform.ua/rubric-regions/3729474-u-kramatorsku-ogolosili-tridennu-zalobu-za-zagiblimi-pid-cas-raketnogo-udaru.html

Bypassing sanctions and atomic industry: Zelensky calls the EU to increase pressure on Russia in a new package

Authors: Ukrinform (Person)

Publisher: Укринформ (Organization)

Published Time: 2023-06-29T19:58:00+03:00

Modified Time: 2023-06-29T19:58:00+03:00

Description: President of Ukraine Volodymyr Zelensky called the European Union in the next, 12th sanctional package to strengthen attention to the counteraction to Russia's circumstance of sanctions through third countries and to impose restrictions on the nuclear industry of the Russian Federation. - Ukrinform.

Images: ['630_360_16578...']

Tags: ['Антиросійські санкції', 'Євросоюз', 'Атомна енергетика', 'Зеленський']

Type: Article

President of Ukraine Volodymyr Zelensky called the European Union in the next, 12th sanction package to increase attention to the counteraction of bypassing by Russia of sanctions through the third countries of Ivved restrictions on the nuclear industry of the Russian Federation.

According to Ukrinform, the head of state emphasized this, acting as a European Council, according to Presidential website.

"I am grateful for the recently approved eleventh sanctionThe EU package, which prejudits a fair pressure policy on anyone who makes aggression possible. It is important not to stop in sanctions. The smaller the pauses, the less Russia will adapt to the pressure on it and come up with less than how to bypass sanctions. I thank you that the111 sanction package pays attention to the efforts of Russia to bypass the sanctions across the country, this attention should be strengthened in the 12th EU sanction package, "Zelensky said.

He noted that, unfortunately, many rockets used by Russian terrorists have been recently produced and containing critical components made by the free world companies.

"It is impossible to put up with this. We must completely stop the use of the free world for the sake of aggression against freedom," the president emphasized.

According to him, it is also impossible to endure what Russia is doing with our Zaporozhye nuclear power plant. The President recalled that it is the largest nuclear power plant in Europe, and Russian terrorists have been replaced.

"We have specific information from our intelligence, and we have presented it, in particular, to the diplomats of European countries. As well as, by the way, information of Russia's prosecuting for foreign components for missile production. The Russian anatomic industry deserves sanctions in response to Russian radiation groove," Zelensky said. .

Read also: in the next package should be sanctions against "Rosatom" - NaussedAs reported Ukrinform, The European Union, on June 23, approved and published details of the 11th package of sanctions against Russian federation.

In particular, it contains a mechanism for combating Russia's restrictions, which is influenced by Russian MIC and their ability to produce rockets.

News Source: https://www.ukrinform.ua/rubric-polytics/3729481-obhid-sankcij-ta-atomna-galuz-zelenskij-zaklikae-es-posiliti-tisk-na-rosiu-u-novomu-paketi.html

The IMF has completed the first view of the program: Ukraine will receive a tranche of $ 890 million

Authors: Ukrinform (Person)

Publisher: Укринформ (Organization)

Published Time: 2023-06-29T1:08:00+03:00

Modified Time: 2023-06-29T22:08:00+03:00

Description: The International Monetary Fund has approved the decision to allocate the next tranche to Ukraine within the framework of an extended financing program worth $ 890 million.

— Укрінформ.:

Images: ['630_360_15785...']

Tags: ['МВФ', 'Україна', 'Гроші']

Type: Article

The International Bullet Fund approved the decision to allocate the next tranche to Ukraine within the ratio of extended funding in the amount of $ 890 million.

This is stated in the official message of the FundHe published Thursday, reports Ukrinform.

“Executive Council IMFcompleted the first view of the Agreement under the Extended Financing Program(EFF)For Ukraine, which enables the Ukrainian authorities to receive about $ 890 million, ”the message said.

It is noted that the funds are aimed at supporting the budget of Ukraine.

“Despite the war, Ukraine's economy demonstrates better stability than expected, after a sharp decline in 2022. GDP growth was increased to 1-3 percent in 2023, while internal demand is being restored, inflation is slowing down, and foreign currency reserves are significant against the background of a stable currency exchange rate, ”the document said.

It is emphasized that the Ukrainian authorities "have made significant progress in the fulfillment of the EFF under difficult circumstances, fulfilling all the constant such criteria for efficiency as of the end of April." By the end of June, all structural controls were also achieved, including the second additional budget, and the strengthening of the Budget Code by the pasvering of the development of national income strategy.

Read also: [Shmigal expects the Board of Directors the IMF as soon as possible will declare an extended lending agreement] as soon as possible](https://www.ukrinform.ua/rubric-economy/3723157-smigal-ocikue-so-rada-direktoriv-mvf-aknajsvidse-shvalit-ugodu-sodo-rozsirenogo-kredituvanna.html)As reported by Ukrinform, at the end of March, the IMF approved the EFF extended financing program for Ukraine of $ 15.6 billion, designed for 48 months.

News Source: https://www.ukrinform.ua/rubric-economy/3729537-mvf-pogodiv-vidilenna-ukraini-novogo-transu-na-890-miljoniv.html

Zelensky: If someone is threatening the people of Europe, we need to intercede for this people

Authors: Ukrinform (Person)

Publisher: Укринформ (Organization)

Published Time: 2023-06-29T20:00:00+03:00

Modified Time: 2023-06-29T20:00:00+03:00

Description: The position of Ukraine is quite clear: any attempt to blackmail Europe should be perceived equally to the whole of Europe, and if someone is somewhere threatening the people of Europe, one should join this people and eliminate the threat. - Ukrinform.

Images: ['630_360_16880...']

Tags: ['Європа', 'Зеленський', 'Безпека', 'Війна з Росією']

Type: Article

The position of Ukraine is quite clear: any attempt to blackmail Europe should be perceived by the whole of Europe, and if someone is somewhere threatening the people of Europe, to tremble for this people and to eliminate the threat.

According to Ukrinform, the President of Ukraine Vladimirzelensky emphasized this, speaking at a meeting of the European Council, it is reported Nadysty of the Head of State. "The position of Ukraine is quite clear: any attempt to blackmail Europe, any passage of something against Europe should be perceived equally to the whole of Europe. If someone will threaten a particular people in Europe somewhere, then it is absolutely natural-to go for this people and eliminate the threat,"-he said, " President.

He expressed his gratitude to all who helps Ukraine in defense against Russian aggression: for each of the air defense system provided, for the European initiative for millionators for Ukraine, for the tank coalition and for all defense packages that were produced by our country. "This is all a truly historical cooperation to protect Yevrop," Zelensky stressed.

Read also: Zelensky made at a European Council meetingHe expressed gratitude to Lithuania and Poland separately, assuring that Ukraine would not permit Russia or its terrorist groups to even try to break the safety of Lithuanian and Polish peoples from the territory of Belarus. "For Ukraine, safety of partners is our safety," the President said.

In this context, he recalled that on June 28, on a visit to Ukraine, presidents of Lithuania and Poland were exchanged during the meeting, the parties exchanged evaluations of confidence in the territory of Belarus and available challenges.

As reported by Ukrinform, Volodymyr ZelenskyyHe met on June 28 in Kyiv with Poland and Lithuania.

Foto: op

News Source: https://www.ukrinform.ua/rubric-polytics/3729478-zelenskij-akso-htos-zagrozue-narodu-evropi-treba-zastupitisa-za-cej-narod.html

Author: ['АРМІЯINFORM']

Time: 2023-06-29T20:00:00-04:00

Description: General Valeriy Zalulny, General Valeriy Zaluzhny ... War with Ukraine 2022, the war with Ukraine, the latest news today, News War with Ukraine 2022, will be the last ones for today, will there be a war between Ukraine and Russia and when, the war with Ukraine and when, the war with Ukraine. In 2022 it will be or not, will there be a war with Ukraine in the near future, they say, the war with Ukraine, Ukraine’s news today, Ukrainian news in Ukrainian media in Russian

Images: ['zaluzhnyj-milli-e1688017320875.jpg']

Tags: ['ВАЛЕРІЙ ЗАЛУЖНИЙ', 'ГОЛОВНОКОМАНДУВАЧ ЗС УКРАЇНИ', 'МАРК МІЛЛІ']

Category: News

On Wednesday, June 28, the commander -in -chief of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, General Valeryzluzhny, held a telephone conversation with the chairman of the United States Committee on US Chiefs of Standard General Milly.

General Valery Zaluzhny wrote about it in his telegram.

«Обговорили ситуацію на фронті. Нам вдалося перехопити стратегічну ініціативу,Сили безпеки і оборони України продовжують ведення наступальних дій, маємопросування. Противник чинить потужний спротив, у той же час зазнає великихвтрат. Намагається втриматися на позиціях за рахунок суцільного мінуваннямісцевості», — зазначив Головнокомандувач Збройних Сил України.

За словами генерала Валерія Залужного, він також розповів генералу Міллі проактуальні потреби нашого війська в озброєнні, боєприпасах та засобахрозмінування.

«Принагідно подякував за пакет військовоїдопомогиwhich the United States was ahead of the United States. They agreed to continue to be sorted for the sake of de -occupation of the Ukrainian territory. Together - to victory!” - said General Valery Zaluzhny.

NATO should consider the simplification of Ukraine's accession to the Alliance - Wallace

Authors: Ukrinform (Person)

Publisher: Укринформ (Organization)

Published Time: 2023-06-29T20:02:00+03:00

Modified Time: 2023-06-29T20:02:00+03:00

Description: The head of the UK Ministry of Defense Ben Volles believes that NATO should consider the simplification of the procedure of registration of membership for Ukraine in the Alliance. - Ukrinform.

Images: ['630_360_15229...']

Tags: ['НАТО', 'Україна', 'Бен Воллес']

Type: Article

Glavinistry of Defense of the United Kingdom Ben Volles believes that NATO should consider the simplification of the procedure of registration of membership for Ukraine in the Alliance.

He said this at a joint press conference with his Canadian colleague Vlondoni, Ukrinform reports, citing Sky News.

According to him, the Alliance should consider the possibility for Ukraine to "miss" a plan of action for membership in NATO.

"I think we need to consider the possibility of missing planning about membership," Wallace said.

Read also: NATO membership in NATO will discuss after the summit in Vilnius - StoltenbergHe added that the direction of movement should be aimed at promoting Ukraine's dawn in NATO.

At the same time, Volles acknowledged that all issues related to the country's joining the Alliance would not be resolved quickly. He also considers it unlikely that all issues of safety for Ukraine will be resolved before the July NATO summit.

As reported by Ukrinform, on July 11-12, 2023 in Vilnius a summit will take place NATO. Among the main issues will be the continuation of assistance for Ukraine in the fight against Russian aggression. Ukraine expects specific decisions from this meeting to identify the country of NATO membership and to provide Ukraine with safety guarantees for a fell to the probable repetition of Russian aggression in the future.

News Source: https://www.ukrinform.ua/rubric-polytics/3729480-nato-mae-rozglanuti-sprosenna-proceduri-vstupu-ukraini-v-alans-volles.html

Authors: Ukrinform (Person)

Publisher: Укринформ (Organization)

Published Time: 2023-06-29T20:07:00+03:00

Modified Time: 2023-06-29T20:07:00+03:00

Description: A rocket danger to the southeastern regions of Ukraine and Kirovograd region has been announced. - Ukrinform.

Images: ['630_360_16702...']

Tags: ['Ракета', 'Повітряні сили ЗСУ', 'Війна з Росією']

Type: Article

Announced danger to the southeastern regions of Ukraine and the Kirovograd region.

According to Ukrinform, the air forces report in telegram.

"WARNING!Tu-22m3 was recorded. Southeastern regions and Kirovograd region. Missile danger, ”the message reads.

As reported by Ukrinform, on June 29, the head of the united coordination of the Press Center of Defense of South of Ukraine Natalia Humeniuk stated that there is a sign of Russia's preparing for rocket strikes .

Stefanchuk discussed the Ukrainian peace formula with the Knesset speaker Israel

Authors: Ukrinform (Person)

Publisher: Укринформ (Organization)

Published Time: 2023-06-29T20:18:00+03:00

Modified Time: 2023-06-29T20:18:00+03:00

Description: The Chairman of the Verkhovna Rada of Ukraine Ruslan Stefanchuk had a telephone conversation with the Kneset speaker of Israel Amir Ohana. - Ukrinform.

Images: ['630_360_16880...']

Tags: ['Ізраїль', 'Спікер', 'Стефанчук', 'Формула миру']

Type: Article

Ruslan Stefanchuk Ruslan Stefanchuk has a telephone conversation with the Speaker of the State of Israel Amir Ohana.

According to Ukrinform, Stefanchuk reports on Facebook.

“Провів телефонну розмову зі спікером Кнесету Держави Ізраїль Аміром Оханою.Акцентував, що Україна продовжує самовіддано протистояти неспровокованійповномасштабний збройній агресії РФ. Для нас важлива допомога Ізраїлю”, - he wrote.

The parties also discussed the formula of peace of President of Ukraine Volodymyrazellensky. Stefanchuk hopes for the participation of Israel in the implementation of one formula.

The VRU Chairman thanked the state of Israel and its citizens for humanitarian aid. “I count on its continuation. Ukraine is also interested in expanding the rehabilitation of Ukrainian servicemen, ”he added.

Read also: Yermak is surprised by the neutral position Israel Mountains of the Russian Federation against UkraineAccording to Stefanchuk, Speaker Kneset noted that Israel is considering Ukraine as an important partner and welcomes the sanctions imposed on Ukraine against Iran.

As reported Ukrinform, the Embassy of Ukraine in the State of Israel was the Israeli government to change its position on the Russian Federation and to support Ukraine by Ukraine in the fight against the aggressor.

The absence of a powerful response of Europe to undermining HPP can give Russia the arrogance of the Zelensky

Authors: Ukrinform (Person)

Publisher: Укринформ (Organization)

Published Time: 2023-06-29T20:18:56+03:00

Modified Time: 2023-06-29T20:18:56+03:00

Description: President of Ukraine Volodymyr Zelensky is convinced that if the European leaders and countries do not have a powerful reaction to the crime of the Russian Federation at the Kakhovka hydroelectric power station, it can add arrogance to Russian terrorists against Zaporizhzhya NPP. - Ukrinform.

Images: ['630_360_16878...']

Tags: ['Євросоюз', 'Зеленський', 'Запорізька АЕС', 'Війна з Росією']

Type: Article

President of Ukraine Volodymyr Zelensky is convinced that if the European leaders of the countries will not be a powerful response to the crime of the Russian Federation at the Kakhovsky hydroelectric power station, it can be armed for Russian terrorists against Zaporizhzhya NPP.

According to Ukrinform, he emphasized on this, acting as a European Council, informs on the Presidential website"Note: if there will be no powerful reaction of European leaders and countries to the Russian Zlochin at Kakhovskaya hydroelectric power station, then it can add arrogance to Russian terrorists about the Zaporizhzhya NPP. And in any case, it is destructively, Hlybius uses NPPs for radiation blackmail and at the same time discusses the EU EU Construction of new atomic blocks. How can you entrust the terrorist construction of atomic blocks? Sorry, but this is a rhetorical question, "Zelensky said.

He noted that tomorrow the Swedish presidency in the EU was coming to an end, and in this communication he expressed his gratitude to Sweden and personally Prime Minister of Sweden, Ulfutrissone for their effective work. "In this half a year, Europe has become stronger. I am sure this," the President said.

Read also: in the event of a abroad ** can be evacuated about 300,000 people from four areasHe thanked the European Union for making extremely important economic and political decisions that help Ukraine defend freedom and Europe.

But at the same time, the President noted that, unfortunately, there are things that do not help Ukraine. However, he expressed his conviction that if solidarity continues to work as "our security and economic cooperation will not break artificial and illegal restrictions, if long -term and principled decisions of Europe will continue to give a light that Europe believes in peace, then this war will not be delayed."

"In particular, I am grateful for the continuation for another year of our free trade with Europe, our transit. Every manifestation of solidarity, every manifestation of unity is now - rescue. I am grateful for the proposal of a long -term financial instrument of 50 billion euros, which was announced by Ms. Presidential . Read also: The Council has called on the world to strengthen sanctions against Russia through a nuclear catastrophe on ZPP "This terrorist attack has led to the greatest ecocide in Europe, and must be guilty. It is important that the European Council condemns a terrible Russian terrorist attack and an ecocide to the Kakhovskaya hydroelectric power station," the President stressed.

As reported by Ukrinform, Russian occupation troops on the night of June 6 under the Kakhovsky Hydroelectric Ttrost.

The dam is completely destroyed and is not recoverable. The destruction of Kakhovskaya hydroelectric power plant and the damage caused to this environment is the largest ecocid with the beginning of the full -scale invasion of Russia into Ukraine.

On March 4, 2022, the Russians occupied the ZPP. June 22, 2023 PresidentVolodymyr Zelensky declared Russia's offices to arrange a terrorist attack at the Zaporizhzhya NPP.

Prometheus will represent Ukraine in a basketball European Cup

Authors: Ukrinform (Person)

Publisher: Укринформ (Organization)

Published Time: 2023-06-29T20:21:31+03:00

Modified Time: 2023-06-29T20:21:31+03:00

Description: The Ukrainian Basketball Club "Prometheus" will play in the European Cup of the 201023/24 season. - Ukrinform.

Images: ['630_360_16880...']

Tags: ['Баскетбол']

Type: Article

The Ukrainian Basketball Club "Prometheus" will play in the European Cup of the 201023/24 season.

In total, 20 clubs will be played in the new tournament draw, which will be divided into 10 teams, Ukrinform reports.

The two best teams from each group will be released to the 1/4 finals of the Euro Cup. The teams that will take 3-6 places will play in the 1/8 finals.

The confrontation of the first stages of the playoffs will be single. The semi-finals and final-tier will be held in the BEST-O-3 series format(up to two victories).

Учасники Єврокубку-2023/24: «Гран-Канарія», «Ховентут» (Both are Spain), Venice, Trento(Both are Italy), "Besiktas", "Turk Telecom»(Both -Turkey), "Ulm", "Hamburg"(Both are Germany), «Burs», "Paris"(Both -France), Litkabelis, Vulvz(Both are Lithuania), «Prometheus»(Ukraine), “Aris”(Greece), "London Lyons(England), “Future”(Montenegro), «Udevita '(Olympia, Slovenia), «Hapoel»(Tel Aviv, Israel), “Schlonsk”(Poland), "Clizh-Napoka"(Romania).

Читайте також: Ілля Шевляк, президент Спортивного комітету УкраїниWe will remind, last season "Prometheus" reached the semi -finals of the European Cup.

Photo: prometeybc.com.

News Source: https://www.ukrinform.ua/rubric-sports/3729487-prometej-predstavlatime-ukrainu-v-basketbolnomu-evrokubku.html

In the Kherson region, the map of the needs of the victims from the terrorist attack at the hydroelectric power station was developed

Authors: Ukrinform (Person)

Publisher: Укринформ (Organization)

Published Time: 2023-06-29T20:21:32+03:00

Modified Time: 2023-06-29T20:21:32+03:00

Description: In the Kherson region, an interactive map was developed, which reflects the urgent needs of the victims of the Kakhovka Hydroelectric Power Plant. - Ukrinform.

Images: ['630_360_16861...']

Tags: ['Херсонщина', 'Тергромада', 'Каховська ГЕС', 'Мапа', 'Підтоплення']

Type: Article

The Uherson region developed an interactive map, which reflects the victims of the Kakhovka Hydroelectric Power Plant.

About it in telegramKherson reported, Ukrinform reports.

“A map of the needs of each community on the Right Bank has been developed. It will allow our efforts, to direct the help to where it is primary, ”the message reads.

MapIt consists of layers where the needs for convenience are broken into categories. The information will be updated daily. Currently, only the needs of the treatment of the hydroelectric power station are located here.

It is noted that the interactive map of the Kherson Ova developed jointly by the Helping to Leave.

Read also: in Kherson region can halve the number of people's Chervodes blasting hydroelectric power plants - expert“The region also has a contact center that coordinates the help you receive. Need something to clarify about the needs? Call 0800 101102, ”Ova added.

As reported by Ukrinform, on the night of June 6 the Russian army undermined the damKakhovskaya hydroelectric power plant, causing the flooding of part Khersonand the Nikolaev region and at the same time - a critical grounding of the Kakhovka reservoir. Currently, the Uherson region flooded remain18 settlements.

In Ukraine tomorrow is forecast to +25 °, with rains and thunderstorms

Authors: Ukrinform (Person)

Publisher: Укринформ (Organization)

Published Time: 2023-06-29T20:29:00+03:00

Modified Time: 2023-06-29T20:29:00+03:00

Description: In Ukraine, short-term rains, thunderstorms and wind gusts up to 20 m/s are expected on Friday, at night 12-17 °, 20-25 ° in the afternoon. - Ukrinform.

Images: ['630_360_15282...']

Tags: ['Дощ', 'Гроза', 'Погода', 'Літо']

Type: Article

In Ukraine, short-term rains, thunderstorms and gusts of wind up to 20m/s are expected in Ukraine, at night 12-17 °, in the afternoon 20-25 °.

Ukrinform was reported at the Ukrainian Hydrometeorological Center.

"At night in the Eastern, most northern and Poltava regions, places. Rain, in the rest of the territory; In the afternoon, there are short -term rains in Ukraine, sometimes thunderstorms. The wind is northwest, 7-12 m/s, on the Left Bank of gusts 15-20 m/s. Temperature at night 12-17 °, on the coast of the seas up to 20 °; in the afternoon 20-25 °, in the southwestern part24-29 °; In the Carpathians at night 6-11 °, in the afternoon 15-20 ° ",-the message reads.

There will be light rain in Kiev and the region at night; In the afternoon, temperate rain, sometimes thunderstorms. Northwest wind, 7-12 m/s. Upbuards temperature at night 13-15 °, in the afternoon 22-24 °, in Kyiv region at night 12-17 °, in the afternoon 20-25 °.

Forecasters are not predicted on July 1 on July 1 in Ukraine, thunderstorms are expected in the Western Tyazhimir regions only in the western Tyazhimir regions; On July 2, in the western, northern, Vinnytsia, day and in most central and Odessa regions, short -term rains, thunderstorms, in the rest of the territory without precipitation. Witter, southwestern, 5-10 m/s.

Zelensky met with Penso - discussed the security cooperation and membership of Ukraine in NATO

Authors: Ukrinform (Person)

Publisher: Укринформ (Organization)

Published Time: 2023-06-29T20:32:00+03:00

Modified Time: 2023-06-29T20:32:00+03:00

Description: President of Ukraine Volodymyr Zelensky met with the 48th Vice President Michak Penso, discussed security cooperation and the issues of Ukraine's membership in NATO. - Ukrinform.

Images: ['630_360_16880...']

Tags: ['Пенс', 'США', 'Зеленський']

Type: Article

President of Ukraine Volodymyr Zelensky met with the 48th Vice President of USA Michamops, discussed security cooperation and the issues of Ukraine's membership in NATO.

According to Ukrinform, the head of the Ukrainian state reported this in telegram. "Today in Kyiv, the 48th Vice president of the United States Mike Pence has discussed our defense, the interaction between our peoples, security cooperation and the importance of determination and determination of partners regarding the future membership of Ukraine in NATO," the president said.

Video: Presidential Office

He emphasized that the support of the United States, all Americans, every American family, all public forces, congress - both parties and a native palate - for our struggle for freedom is vital. "And of course, the support of the United States President Joe Biden. I thank for this support!" Zelensky stressed.

As noted on the President's website,The head of state stressed that Ukraine is not very important for Ukraine, as the United States also provides financial assistance, humanitarian and political support.

"We appreciate that both major US parties - republican and democratic - are united in support of Ukraine. And, of course, we feel powerful support of the United States people," said Zelensky.

In this context, he thanked for recent defense aid packages of $ 22.1 billion. and $ 500 million, allocated by the United States on June 6 and June 27, respectively, and also emphasized on the unprecedented total support provided, which since February last year reached $ 43.1 billion.

The Head of State separately expressed gratitude for the loud voice of Mike Pens in support of Ukraine in the Republican Party of the United States.

The President shared his expectations from the NATO Vilnius Summit. He stated that the partners should demonstrate determination and give Ukraine the certainty of the daily membership.

“This is what our people will motivate. And it is also a weapon, only political. It is even more powerful than rockets. To do this, we must see our NATO, ”the Head of State emphasized.

Read also: Zelensky: We must be sure that after the war, Ukraine will become a member of NATOZelensky told Penssa about the humanitarian situation that developed in the Southern Regions of Ukraine after the destruction of the Kakhovskaya HEES by Russian invaders. In this context, the President thanked the American charity organizations that help to provide the victims of this crime with drinking water.

As reported by Ukrinform, former US Vice president Mike Pence made an unannounced visit to Ukraine, becoming the first current candidate for the Republican Party President, who met with Vladimir Zelensky during the Campaign - 2024.

.(https://www.ukrinform.ua/rubric-polytics/3729432-majk-pens-priletiv-v-ukrainu-z-neogolosenim-vizitom.html)- Three cities that were expelled and devastated by Russian troops, as well as to meet Zelensky's pre -resident.

As reported by Ukrinform, in the United States there is a President's election campaign - 2024. Mike Pension is one of the candidatesfrom the US Republican Party.

Foto: op

News Source: https://www.ukrinform.ua/rubric-polytics/3729493-prezident-zustrivsa-z-majkom-pensom.html

US government approached Ukraine's ATCMS missiles - WSJ

Authors: Ukrinform (Person)

Publisher: Укринформ (Organization)

Published Time: 2023-06-29T20:36:51+03:00

Modified Time: 2023-06-29T20:36:51+03:00

Description: The US administration was approaching a positive decision to provide Ukraine with a larger ATACMS missile system. - Ukrinform.

Images: ['630_360_16782...']

Tags: ['Ракета', 'США', 'Україна', 'Війна з Росією', 'ATACMS']

Type: Article

The US administration was approaching a positive decision to provide Ukraine with a larger ATACMS radius.

About it writes on Thursday edition The Wall Street JournalWith reference to American Tai -European officials, Ukrinform reports.

“USAconsider the possibility of making a decision about(Transmission - ed.)The missile system of the far radius of Ukraine, ”the message said.

According to the sources, this decision must yet be approved at the highest level.

This happens at the moment when Russia was challenged within its own system after a rebellion, initiated by Wagner PEC, as well as on the shadows for Russian forces on the battlefield, pays attention to the publication.

*!(https://www.ukrinform.ua/rubric-ato/3728774-mozlivist-peredaci-ukraini-raket-atacms-dosit-visoka-amerikanskij-cenator.html)Army tactical missile system was reported(ATACMS)has a radius of action about 190 miles(more than 300 km)What is sufficient to defeat the Russian units of Russian goals far beyond the front line. Earlier, the administration was distorted in the supply of these systems to Ukraine. However, lately, White has dumped to change its attitude and has come to an understanding of the "urgent need" to support Ukraine in its struggle against the Russian invasion.

Modified Time: 2023-06-29T20:37:00+03:00

Type: Article

"Kramatorsk, a memorial near the Ria restaurant, which was hit by Russian rocketJune 27. The photo - 7 dead workers of the institution. The place of honoring memory was arranged by their colleagues. People are brought there flowers and toys, ”the inscription reads under a photo of this correspondence.

HELP FOR UKRAINE Helps to equip shelter in the capital

Authors: Ukrinform (Person)

Publisher: Укринформ (Organization)

Published Time: 2023-06-29T20:40:59+03:00

Modified Time: 2023-06-29T20:40:59+03:00

Description: Volunteers of the Help For Ukraine Charitable Organization deliver everything necessary for the shelves of Kiev - fire extinguishers, chairs, disinfection solutions, paraffin candles and dry closets. - Ukrinform.

Images: ['630_360_16880...']

Tags: ['Благодійність', 'Київ', 'Укриття', 'Help for Ukraine']

Type: Article

The volunteer -sacrificing organization "Help for Ukraine" deliver everything necessary for the Kiev - fire extinguishers, chairs, disinfection solutions, paraffin and dry closets.

This assistance, in particular, is provided at the request of the leadership of the Obolon Regional State Administration, Ukrinform reported in the Fund. The help, emphasized, will be redistributed in shelters and hiding places not only of schools and kindergartens, but of household houses - exactly where it is not.

According to official data, of 4.6 thousand shelters and repositories in KievAlmost 2,6 thousand are suitable, another 683. In Obolon district, 16%were not suitable for protection during air threats. These are 66 premises out of 425. According to the head of the Obolon Regional State Administration Cyril Fesik, only 37 such shelters were equipped with 59 million UAH.

"Cover," emphasizes the Ambassador of the Foundation Yevgen Koshovy, "accordingly equipped with everything necessary for their long stay. It should be until the war is over. Moreover, from the beginning of full -scale interaction, shelters have become temporary homes for thousands of people. "

"The war continues, and the state of shelters in Ukraine, unfortunately, leaves the desirable for various reasons," says the President of the Foundation Stepan Aslanian. - Although, the longer the war lasts, the more problems lies on the shoulders of ordinary people and local self -government bodies. Therefore, our team has given priority to help equip shelters for the Obolon Regional State Administration. That at a time when a alarm map is barely "red", every inhabitant was calm: in its area there is a safe place where you can wait for a break, and they are provided with the most necessary. "

Read also: in one of the capital's clinical hospital hospitals, the surgical ward

The satellite shows the likely bases of Wagner PVC in Belarus - Reuters

Authors: Ukrinform (Person)

Publisher: Укринформ (Organization)

Published Time: 2023-06-29T20:47:00+03:00

Modified Time: 2023-06-29T20:47:00+03:00

Description: Satellite images of a military base to the southeast of the capital of Belarus show new objects built in recent days. This fact indicates the rapid construction of the base for the Wagner PEC, which was behind the unsuccessful rebellion in the Russian Federation. - Ukrinform.

Images: ['630_360_16795...']

Tags: ['Білорусь', 'Супутник', 'ПВК "Вагнера"', 'Пригожин']

Type: Article

Satellite images of a military base to the southeast of the capital of Belaruside renovated new objects built in recent days. This fact is evidenced by the simple construction of the base for the Wagner PEC, which was behind the unsuccessful VRF rebellion.

As Ukrinform reports, it reports Reuters.

It is noted that PVC "Wagner", whose leader arrived in Belarus on Tuesday, can create a new base for an assaulty military facility near the city of Assypovichi, about 90 km Rizyska.

The pictures taken on June 27 by the Sentinel 2 European Space Agency satellite shows the series of long structures in the neighboring village of Cell. This field is June 14(According to the pictures - ed.)looked empty.

The publication notes that it was unable to check the origin of construction. However, the shots are openly available through search on ESA site.

Read also: Poland sees a threat in moving in Belarus nuclear weapons and " Wagner Ivtsi" - MEVEREPATATATATATEAs reported Ukrinform, the head of Ukrainian intelligence Kirill Budanov in a comment to the media stated that, according to intelligence, among the consequences of "Wagner's rebellion" for Ukraine are the compromising of the Russian leadership and the fact that the subordinates of Eugene Prishozhina will no longer fight against Ukraine.

Germany unfolds in Vilnius Patriot as part of preparation for NATO summit

Authors: Ukrinform (Person)

Publisher: Укринформ (Organization)

Published Time: 2023-06-29T20:53:00+03:00

Modified Time: 2023-06-29T20:53:00+03:00

Description: Germany unfolds in Vilnius the air defense system of the Far Radium of Patriot in preparation for NATO summit in July. - Ukrinform.

Images: ['630_360_16880...']

Tags: ['Литва', 'Німеччина', 'Саміт НАТО', 'Patriot ']

Type: Article

Germany develops in Vilnius the air defense system of the long -range radius of the Patriot action as part of preparation for the NATO summit in July.

This was reported on the website of the Lithuanian Armed Forces, reports Ukrinform.

“The Bundesver unfolds in Vilnius the Dalnorath Dalnorath Dalnal Radium defense system. Together with our allies, the armed forces of Lithuania support the training for safety, strengthening of protection on land, territorial waters and in the world to NATO summitJuly 11-12 in Vilnius, ”the message reads.

It is noted that the Patriot system for the first time performs combat missions in Lithuania. In addition, other fighting will be deployed in accordance with pre -developed plans, procedures, communication and logistics concepts.

During the summit, the Armed Forces of Lithuania, together with the allies, will supplement the air defense, protection of critically important objects of and routes, protection of individuals, checking of premises and transport vehicles, as well as the search for explosives at objects.

Read also: in Hague started a preparatory event for Summit NATO In total, Lithuanian armed forces sent more than 3,000 servicemen to ensure NATO safety safety in Vilnius.

As reported Ukrinform, Spain will be thrown into Lithuania to protect the airspace during NATO in Vilnius Nasams anti-aircraft missile complex from military basilier in neighboring Latvia.

Authors: Ukrinform (Person)

Publisher: Укринформ (Organization)

Published Time: 2023-06-29T20:54:00+03:00

Modified Time: 2023-06-29T20:54:00+03:00

Description: Artist Yuri Zhuravel completes the preparation of the second volume of the book from the series "Know ours". - Ukrinform.

Images: ['630_360_16880...']

Tags: ['Історія', 'Книги', 'Україна', 'Художник']

Type: Article

The artist Crane completes the preparation of the second volume of the book from the series "Know ours".

Crane told about it by the correspondent of Ukrinform in Zhytomyr during the discovery of the patriotic and educational exhibition of graphic portraits of "Dating".

“I drew illustrations for the second volume of" Know ours "by 89%. Now we work over text, ”said artist.

In particular, the characters of the second volume will be Attila, Ilya Muromets, Ulas Samchuk, Oleg Olzhich, Olena Teliga, Mikhail Zabrodsky.

According to Zhuravl, in general, for the series "Know ours" was selected about 300 persons and decided to give it toms.

The first book presents 59 characters and 118 illustrations.

Foto: horyn.info

News Source: https://www.ukrinform.ua/rubric-culture/3729506-hudoznik-urij-zuravel-gotue-drugij-tom-knigi-znaj-nasih.html

Virgin Galactic for the first time in history made a commercial flight to space

Authors: Ukrinform (Person)

Publisher: Укринформ (Organization)

Published Time: 2023-06-29T21:07:00+03:00

Modified Time: 2023-06-29T21:07:00+03:00

Description: On Thursday, Virgin Galactic made its first commercial flight in history, sending four passengers to the suborbital space and turning them back to the ground. - Ukrinform.

Images: ['630_360_16880...']

Tags: ['Космос', 'Технології', 'Virgin Galactic']

Type: Article

In the fourth Company, Virgin Galactic made its first commercial flight in history, sending four passengers to the suborbital space and turning them back.

As Ukrinform reports, it reports Space.com.

The departure came from spaceThe Port "America" in New Mexico at 17:40 Kiev time. Space aircraft reached the suborbital space after about 58 minutes.

After a few minutes of planning at an altitude of 83 kilometers, the space aircraft made a space and landed at 18:45 Kiev time.

The launch of SpaceShiptwo comes from the VSS unity carrier at a height of approximate 15 kilometers. The mission was called "Galactic 01".

The liner passengers are in weightless for several minutes and can see the ends of the space of space. The planting of the vessel occurs approximately 90 minutes after the start.

Galactic 01 was attended by Italy Air Force and Italy's National Research Council, who ordered a journey into space in 2019 in order to conduct suborbital studies.

According to Virgin Galactic, hundreds of people have booked a trip on boardspaceshiptwo, which costs $ 450,000 for a place.

Read also: SpaceX sent tourists to the ISSThe next commercial flight of the company will take place in early August, from this moment Virgin Galactic plans to launch them on a monthly basis.

As reported Ukrinform, Virgin Galactic has successfully implemented the fifth test cosmic flight.

Foto: Virgin Galactic

News Source: https://www.ukrinform.ua/rubric-technology/3729510-virgin-galactic-vperse-v-istorii-zdijsnila-komercijnij-rejs-u-kosmos.html

The first movie "Culture during the War", created with EU support, showed the first movie

Authors: Ukrinform (Person)

Publisher: Укринформ (Organization)

Published Time: 2023-06-29T21:13:00+03:00

Modified Time: 2023-06-29T21:13:00+03:00

Description: The documentary series "Culture during the War" was presented in Kyiv - a joint project of the EU Delegation in Ukraine and the Ukrainian Educational Community. - Ukrinform.

Images: ['630_360_16880...', '1688062109-44...', '1688062111-34...', '1688062110-86...', '630_360_16880...']

Tags: ['Євросоюз', 'Кіно', 'Культура', 'Війна з Росією']

Type: Article

The documentary series "Culture during the War" - a joint project of the EU in Ukraine and the educational multimedia community of the Ukrainian.

According to Ukrinform correspondent, Remi DUFLO was among the participants - the Deputy Chairman of the Representative Office of the European Union in Ukraine.

The movie collection will consist of five separate films made according to the results of the socio -cultural expeditions to the north, south, east, west of Ukraine and the state. Everyone will show the most prominent cultural events, institutions and artists in the context of a full -scale war: as museums became a Volodynian hub, where exhibits, artists, writers, writers, and for what. The project is implemented on the boundaries of the communication campaign “We store together. Together, we create ”that will inform the support of Ukrainian culture and art by the European Union in the armed Russian aggression.

The first presented the tape "Culture during the war. West ”, in which the stories of artists from Lviv, Chernivtsi, Lutsk, Uzhgorod are reported.

Read also: [Documentary movies about TRO(https://www.ukrinform.ua/rubric-culture/3727919-dokumentalni-filmi-pro-tro-hocut-pokazuvati-na-miznarodnih-kinofestivalah-seitablaev.html)"Today the first movie is being presented, which will appear on the network in a week," commented the founder of the UKRAINER and the author of the documentary tape Bogdan Logvinenko. "The third is now being filmed. The shooting "..." lasted about 10 days. They masked the simplest. Because in the east and south it will be much more complicated, taminatically greater the consequences of the war. "

Before the premiere viewing, an expert discussion "Documentary Cinema is worth conservation and rethinking of the Ukrainian cultural heritage" was held.

News Source: https://www.ukrinform.ua/rubric-culture/3729512-u-kievi-pokazali-persij-film-ciklu-kultura-pid-cas-vijni-stvorenogo-za-pidtrimki-es.html

Prime Minister of Spain will visit Ukraine on the first day of EU Council

Authors: Ukrinform (Person)

Publisher: Укринформ (Organization)

Published Time: 2023-06-29T21:14:00+03:00

Modified Time: 2023-06-29T21:14:00+03:00

Description: Spain Prime Minister Pedro Sanches will visit Ukraine on the first day of EU Council. President of Ukraine Volodymyr Zelensky is convinced that this is a historical time to start negotiations on Ukraine's membership in the European Union. - Ukrinform.

Images: ['630_360_15640...']

Tags: ['Іспанія', 'Україна', 'Санчес', 'Рада ЄС']

Type: Article

Spain Prime Minister Pedro Sanchez will visit Ukraine on the first day of presidency in the radium. President of Ukraine Volodymyr Zelensky is convinced that this is a historical time to start negotiations on Ukraine's membership in the European Union.

According to Ukrinform, the head of state emphasized this, acting as a European Council, according to Presidential website.

"I consider it symbolic that this Saturday, on the first day of presidency SpainIn the EU, at my invitation, the Ukrainian Prime Minister of Spain Sanchez will be served with a visit. For the first time, the beginning of the country's heading in the EU will be emphasized by a visit to Ukraine. And this is very much about how important for our Europe will be these half a year, "the President said.

He is convinced that this is a historical time to start negotiations on Ukraine's membership in the European Union.

"Europe of values, free and strong Europe, Europe of peace is unthinkable without Ukraine. We are ready for membership negotiations, and our progress in compliance with the European Commission Recommendations should be fixed. Ukraine is set to prepare as soon as possible before the starting of membership, and we will do it,"

Read also: Spain announced new assistance to restore UkraineAccording to him, peace has no alternative, and therefore the maximum unity in Europe has alternatives.

As reported Ukrinform, On July 1, Spain will begin its six-year presidency in the EU Council in accordance with the dose of rotation between 27 Member States.

News Source: https://www.ukrinform.ua/rubric-polytics/3729513-premer-ispanii-vidvidae-ukrainu-v-persij-den-golovuvanna-v-radi-es.html

The new doctrine of Ukraine envisages new policies in the field of culture - Tkachenko

Authors: Ukrinform (Person)

Publisher: Укринформ (Organization)

Published Time: 2023-06-29T21:19:00+03:00

Modified Time: 2023-06-29T21:19:00+03:00

Description: The new doctrine of Ukraine, as in its speech in the Verkhovna Rada on the occasion of the Constitution, said the President of Ukraine, provides new policies in the field of culture. - Ukrinform.

Images: ['630_360_16753...']

Tags: ['Культура', 'Ткаченко', 'Україна']

Type: Article

Novadokrin of Ukraine, as in his speech in the Verkhovna Rada on the occasion of the Constitution, the President of Ukraine provides new policies in sphericulture.

About it on the air of the national telephone "The only news" of the Minister of Culture and Information Policy Oleksandr Tkachenko, reports.

"We are now talking about writing a doctrine of Ukraine, where a significant proportion will be given to culture. Therefore, for the first time since independence, it has been made from the Vuzpresident - not only spending money on culture, which is an extremely large sum of -1% of GDP, but also attracting private funds, collaboration with the civilized world. So important factors are the creation of new museum spaces, including the Ivming Heroes of the Ukrainian -Russian War, the creation of museums dedicated to Ukrainian -Russian -Russian war. Similarly, new politicians in cinema, reading, book publishing, in our spiritual sphere, "Tkachenko said.

Read also: Return of cultural values from the Russian Federation depends when other conditions Ukraine win - MKIP

He added that the MKIP is now working on all these aspects.

Tkachenko emphasized that after February 24, we cannot afford to return to the post -Soviet attitude to the culture and remnants of Soviet centuries.

"We need to become one of the leaders of the world cultural process," - said Tikachenko.

Read also: in Kiev showed the first movie "Culture during Time" Created with EU Support

He added that now Ukrainian culture is extremely interesting to the world, according to him, thousands of performances, exhibitions, and cultural stocks have taken place last year. But it is not only about it, but also about the invitation to the cultural disabilities of the world's leading cultural figures for the creation of a peculiar cultural hub inside the country. Read also: vandalism and looting: Russia's war against the cultural population of Ukraine

News Source: https://www.ukrinform.ua/rubric-culture/3729518-nova-doktrina-ukraini-peredbacae-novi-politiki-u-sferi-kulturi-tkacenko.html

Similarly, new politicians in cinema, reading, book publishing, in our spiritual sphere, "Tkachenko said.

The victims from flooding began to receive assistance from the UN - Ministry of Reintegration

Authors: Ukrinform (Person)

Publisher: Укринформ (Organization)

Published Time: 2023-06-29T21:25:00+03:00

Modified Time: 2023-06-29T21:25:00+03:00

Description: The victims of flooding as a result of the exploration of the Russians of the Kakhovsky Hydroelectric Power Plant began to receive financial assistance from the International UN Migration Organization. - Ukrinform.

Images: ['630_360_16864...']

Tags: ['ООН', 'допомога', 'Каховська ГЕС', 'Мінреінтеграції']

Type: Article

The victims of flooding as a result of the exploration of the Russians of the Dams of the Kakhovskaya Hesp were to receive financial assistance from the International UN Migration Organization.

According to Ukrinform, the Ministry of Reintegration of the Temporarily -Coupled Territories of Ukraine reports this in telegram.

"In particular, financial assistance has already been received by residents Mykolaiv regionwhich were affected by the heating of the enemy of the Kakhovskaya hydroelectric power station, "the Ministry of Reintegration noted.

On June 29, one -time financial assistance in the amount of 6600 hryvnias of the International Migration Organization(My)paid for the total amount of 105 600 UAH. Payments are made by UkrPoshta.

To obtain consultations and registration, you must contact the hot linenumintegration at 15-48 or for the IDP Commissioner for IDPs:(066)813-62-39.

"It should be reminded that all departments of social protection of the population in Ukraine are obliged to accept applications for monetary care from the victims due to underwear," - the Ministry of Reintegration emphasized.

Read also: Vereshchuk: Victims From the flooding residents of Kherson region and Mykolaiv region will receive a one -time paymentAs reported Ukrinform, at night, on June 6, the Russian army undermined the dam of the Kakhovka hydroelectric power station, causing flooding of the Kherson and Mykolaiv regions and at the same time - critical grinding of the water reservoir.

Foto: SNNS

News Source: https://www.ukrinform.ua/rubric-regions/3729516-postrazdali-vid-zatoplenna-pocali-otrimuvati-dopomogu-vid-oon-minreintegracii.html

Lyashko about the threat of a terrorist attack on the ZPE: Kiev is outside the radiation exposure

Authors: Ukrinform (Person)

Publisher: Укринформ (Organization)

Published Time: 2023-06-29T21:26:59+03:00

Modified Time: 2023-06-29T21:26:59+03:00

Description: Minister of Health of Ukraine Viktor Lyashko stated that Kiev is outside the radiation influence. - Ukrinform.

Images: ['630_360_16519...']

Tags: ['МОЗ', 'Радіація', 'Київ', 'Віктор Ляшко', 'Запорізька АЕС']

Type: Article

The Minister of Health of Ukraine Viktor Lyashko stated that Kiev is outside the radiation influence.

He said this in an interview with the TV channel “We are Ukraine”, reports Ukrinform.

"Now according to the forecasts that are, Kiev beyond the limit of influence(radiation influence -ed.). Ми повинні чітко розуміти - давайте робити все можливе, щоб запобігти(probable leakage radiation\ -R.). Друге - не створювати паніки і штучного ажіотажу. Навіть якщо щосьстається, слухати рекомендації, оскільки рекомендації в конкретний період часуприв'язані до конкретної ситуації і радіаційного моніторингу", - сказав Ляшко.

Читайте також: До радіаційної аварії неможливо підготуватися так, щобзахистити всіх на 100% - Ляшко The minister added that it is currently urgent to prevent outbreaks that may occur due to water pollution due to the healing of the Kakhovskaya hydroelectric power station by Russian troops.

As reported by Ukrinform, the Minister of Health of Ukraine Viktor Lyashkostauiabi was that in the case of a terrorist attack at the ZPP and even in the absence of the Internet there will be special public alert systems.

Read also: in the event of a ZPP accident can evacuate about 300 thousand people from four regionsOn March 4, 2022, the Russians occupied the ZPP.

On June 22, 2023, President Volodymyr Zelensky declared plans for a terrorist attack at the Zaporizhzhia NPP.

Authors: Ukrinform (Person)

Publisher: Укринформ (Organization)

Modified Time: 2023-06-29T21:28:00+03:00

Description:

Голову Тернопільської Обласної Ради Михайла Головка, Якого Викрили На Хабарі, Звільнили З-Під Варти. — Укрінформ.:

Images: ['630_360_16880...']

Tags: ['Застава', 'Тернопільщина', 'Михайло Головко']

Type: Article

Mykhailo Golovka, the chairman of the regional council, who was exposed on a bribe, was released from custody.

As Ukrinform reports, about it publicThe lawyer Alexander Tananakin told his phone.

The lawyer stated that the head was introduced pledgeso he is released from custody.

"When the next court session is unknown, it is too early to talk about it," the lawyer said.

As reported by Ukrinform, on June 26 Chairman of the Ternopil Regional Council and two-deputies of the head of the Ternopil Military-Civilian Administration exposed the undue benefit from the volunteer businessman.

Read also: WAKS arrested another deputy chairman of TernopilAccording to the investigation, the detainees required almost UAH 1.8 million from the owner of the enterprise for signing acts of completed works on construction and repair of infrastructure objects by the municipal enterprise of the Ternopil Regional Council.

On the same day, the officials were suspected of demanding the volunteer entrepreneur.

June 28 Higher Anti -Corruption Court elected the head of Ternopil Regional Council Chief Precautionary EventIn view of detention with the possibility of making 805 thousand UAH of collateral.

In Kherson, the residents of the Island were forbidden to approach the river for 30 meters

Authors: Ukrinform (Person)

Publisher: Укринформ (Organization)

Published Time: 2023-06-29T21:31:00+03:00

Modified Time: 2023-06-29T21:31:00+03:00

Description: Residents of the Ostrov residential district were forbidden to stay on the territory of the coastal strip 30 meters from the river. - Ukrinform.

Images: ['630_360_16865...']

Tags: ['Херсон', 'Міна', 'Ріка', 'Заборона']

Type: Article

Residents of the Mimicrod "Ostrov" were forbidden to stay on the territory of the coastal strip 30 meters from the river.

About it in telegramRoman Mrochko reported to the heads of the City Military Administration, Ukrinform reports.

«Dear residents of mc. Island!From the circle Hydropark on both sides along the Maria Fortus Street, it is forbidden to stay exclusively on the territory of the coastal strip 30 meters from river", -goes in the message.

He noted that the specified territory is still checked by representatives of the SESA.

*!(https://www.ukrinform.ua/rubric-regions/3723951-u-hersoni-zijsla-voda-v-mikrorajoni-ostriv-akij-najbilse-postrazdav-vid-zatoplenna.html)Mrochko also released a map where a forbidden zonudyl stay was noted in red.

According to Ukrinform, since the beginning of the rescue operation, the corresponding specialists have already found in Kherson and eliminated 62 mines.

Greece's Expremier left the post of head of the opposition party after defeat in the election

Authors: Ukrinform (Person)

Publisher: Укринформ (Organization)

Published Time: 2023-06-29T21:37:06+03:00

Modified Time: 2023-06-29T21:37:06+03:00

Description: Former Prime Minister of Greece, Alexis Tsipras, resigned from the post of chairman of the main opposition party Siriz. - Ukrinform.

Images: ['630_360_16880...']

Tags: ['Ципрас', 'Греція', 'Вибори']

Type: Article

Former Greek Minister Alexis Tsipras resigned from the post of chairman of the head opposition party Siriz.

As Ukrinform reports, it reports AP.

"The leader of the left opposition of Greece, Alexis Tsipras, on Thursday, announced his decision to take resignation after a devastating defeat in the elections," the message reads.

The 48-year-old Tsipras held the post of Prime Minister GreeceFrom 2015 to 2019, in the political years, when the country tried to stay in the euro zone and terminated international assistance.

As reports Euractiv, his decision, Tsipras made after defeat, he was policy in the parliamentary elections in Greece. In the election, Siriz received 48 seats in a 300-bed parliament.

Tsipras explained that it was necessary to "invent a new Siriz" that would understand the new and meet new expectations.

Read also: Prime Minister Greece introduced a new governmentAs reported by Ukrinform, on Sunday, May 21, parliamentary abyss took place in Greece. According to the calculation of almost all votes, New Democracy Party gained 40.78% (145 out of 300 seats).

Через день після парламентських виборів не вдалося сформувати однопартійнийуряд.

28 травня 300 депутатів парламенту, обраних унаслідок виборів, склали присягу.Після цього новий парламент, у якому жодна партія не отримала більшості, обравспікера та віцеспікера у понеділок. Потім парламент мали розпуститипрезидентським указом у понеділок або вівторок, а нові вибори оголосити на 25червня.

The border from Lviv region won the "gold" of the European Championship

Authors: Ukrinform (Person)

Publisher: Укринформ (Organization)

Published Time: 2023-06-29T21:39:00+03:00

Modified Time: 2023-06-29T21:39:00+03:00

Description: At the final of the European Championship for youth among young people up to 21, Manola Skobelsk won a rival from Germany. - Ukrinform.

Images: ['630_360_16880...']

Tags: ['вільна боротьба']

Type: Article

At the Finally Tocal of European University among young people up to 21, Manolaskobelsk won a rival from Germany.

About it in telegramMaxim Kozytsky, reported by the Lviv Ova Ova, reports.

“The marathon of positive sports news is ongoing. Bochinya from Lviv region Manolaskobelsk has just won the gold of the European Championship, ”the presentation reads.

It is noted that at the European Championships for the free fight among young people before the 21st Manol competed for awards in the weight category up to 68 kg.

Initially, the athlete won the representative of Lithuania with a score of 8: 0, having passed the 1/4 of the Championship finals. In the quarterfinals, she met with a representative of Romania, which she defeated with a score of 11: 0.

In the semifinals, she won a Greek athlete with a score of 10: 0. Now, June 29, in the finale of Manol won a rival from Germany with a counting 13: 0!

Orest Skobelsky and Alexander Tkach train the Ukrainian athlete.

"For a brilliant performance at the athlete championship will receive a monetary reward in a size of 36 thousand hryvnias from the management of youth and sports of Lviv Ova," -David Maxim Kozytsky.

The consequences of rebellion in Russia will be discussed at a summit in Vilnius - State Department

Authors: Ukrinform (Person)

Publisher: Укринформ (Organization)

Published Time: 2023-06-29T21:40:00+03:00

Modified Time: 2023-06-29T21:40:00+03:00

Description: The topic related to the armed rebellion of the Wagner PEC, as well as the further development of events in the Russian Federation will be one of the topics of discussions during the NATO Member States Summit in Vilnius next month. - Ukrinform.

Images: ['630_360_16849...']

Tags: ['Саміт НАТО', 'Держдеп', 'Війна з Росією', 'Заколот']

Type: Article

The topic related to the armed rebellion of the Wagner PEC, as well as the further development of the events of the Russian Federation will become one of the topics of discussions during the NATO leaders in Vilnius of NATO leaders in Vilnius.

This belief was expressed on Thursday during a briefing in Washington by a spokesman of the US Department of US Matthew Miller, reports his own correspondent.

"I am sure that the events of the last few days will certainly become a topic for talk," the US foreign policy said.

At the same time, according to him, this does not mean that this issue will be distinguished by a separate item on the agenda.

He also noted that the United States has performed consultations with allies in recent days, including within the NATO Alliance on the development of activity in Russia.

At the same time, Miller emphasized that this did not affect the volume of support of Ukraine from the United States.

In this connection, he said that the conversations between leaders continue.

As reported Ukrinform, a two -party group of US senators also plans to participate in Vilnius to demonstrate complete unity of America with other North Atlantic Alliance in Russian aggression in Europe.

Type: Article

The MKIA PLACE THE DECATIONS ON THE Preservation of Cultural Heritage Objects before their entry state of the State Register of Real Estate Monuments of Ukraine.

The Ministry of Culture and Information Policy reported this in telegram, reports Ukrinform.

"The situation around the mosaic of 1970 dedicated to firefighters in the Pavilionaidssens on VDNH once again showed the urgent need of in -depth study, inventory and urgent legal protection The procedures of acceptance, which should be transparent, professional and impartial, " -will be in the message.

Read also: invaders destroyed the mosaic panel at Umariupoli Station

The MKIP noted that the capture of objects is now possible in case of existence and consolidated position of the professional community. The Ministry is currently working on an optimal and prompt decision that would allow the reconcperteous community and save the objects before being entered in the Register.

As it was reported, on June 26, a mosaic panel was removed on a building on the expocenter on the territory of the expocenter, which was depicted by a mosaic panel, which depicted firefighters.

Images: ['630_360_16880...']

Tags: ['Буча', 'Ірпінь', 'Пенс', 'США']

Type: Article

Former United States President Mike Pence visited the cities of Bucha Tairpin, Kyiv region, which were temporarily captured by Russian troops.

According to Ukrinform, Ruslan Kravchenko, the head of the Kyiv Regional Military Administration, stated, KOVA reports in telegram.

“With a visit to Kyiv regionVice president of the United States Mike Pence. Within the framework of the visit, the delegation visited the village of Moshchun, where fierce battles in the Khodoborons of Kyiv region were going on. The former Vice president also visited Bucha and Irpen - places where Russian occupation troops committed terrible crimes of the anti -metric population, ”Kravchenko said.

The head of Kova expressed his gratitude to the former Vice President of the United States for his personalizer and support of Ukraine, which he publicly broadcasts from the first days of the full -scale invasion of Russia.

"Today's meeting is an important testimony to our unity and determination with the military aggression of the Russian Federation," Kravchenko emphasized.

The possible base of "Wagnets" in Belarus will be considered at the meeting of the rates - Danilov

Authors: Ukrinform (Person)

Publisher: Укринформ (Organization)

Published Time: 2023-06-29T21:48:08+03:00

Modified Time: 2023-06-29T21:48:08+03:00

Description: At the nearest meeting, the Supreme Commander -in -Chief's rates will consider the issues of the possible base of the Wagnets in Belarus. - Ukrinform.

Images: ['630_360_16807...']

Tags: ['Білорусь', 'ПВК "Вагнера"', 'Данілов', 'Війна з Росією', 'Єдині новини']

Type: Article

Natali meeting of the Supreme Commander -in -Chief's meeting will consider the opening of the possible base of the Wagnets in Belarus.

The President of Ukraine gave the corresponding order, told the NSDC Secretary Alexei Danilov on the broadcasting of the NSDC, Ukrinform reports.

"We will carefully observe the movement of the Wagner.

According to him, there is currently information that 8 - 8.5 thousand "Wagnerians" can burst in Belarus, and it is unclear what the purpose of such base is.

Read also: satellite shows the probable databases of Wagner PEC in Belarus -Reuters"Let's see where they will find themselves. What are the goals that will be threats. There will be an understanding that the number of Wagnerians - 8 - 8.5 thousand will be in Belarus. Let us look at what they will do. We will observe what will happen further. Whether it is to reproduce Lithuania, or to annoy Poland, or to have our cities that are located on the border with Belarus, "the NSDC said.

As reported by Ukrinform, the leader of the Wagner PEC Yevgeny Prigogin was on June 23, a demarche against the Russian military leadership, in particular the Russian Defense Defense Sergei Shoigu.

Read also: Poland strengthens its border with Belarus through " Wagner "Oleksandr Lukashenko negotiated with Prigogin, after which he stated that the groups of the group return to the field camps.

On Tuesday, Lukashenko confirmed Prigogine's arrival in Belarus.

President Volodymyr Zelenskyy is convinced that the contingent of PEC "Wagner" will be insignificantsince more than 20,000 Wagnerians have already been destroyed by Ukrainian defense forces.
