The OP explained in which circumstances Zelensky would not come to NATO's summit to Vilnius

Authors: Ukrinform (Person)

Publisher: Укринформ (Organization)

Published Time: 2023-06-29T21:51:00+03:00

Modified Time: 2023-06-29T21:51:00+03:00

Description: President Volodymyr Zelenskyy will not go to Vilnius to the July NATO Summit, if the leaders of the Alliance Member States do not demonstrate courage and do not give a clear signal to the Ukraine accession process. - Ukrinform.

Images: ['630_360_16874...']

Tags: ['НАТО', 'Саміт', 'Саміт НАТО', 'Україна', 'Зеленський', 'Жовква']

Type: Article

The Presidential Lordir Zelensky will not go to Vilnius to the July NATO Summit, if the Alliance leaders do not demonstrate courage and do not give a clear signal to the Ukraine accession process.

The deputy head of OP Igor Zhovkva said this Reuters, reports Ukrinform.

According to him, Ukraine wants to get an invitation to begin the process of joining Natona of the military alliance summit next month.

"This application(Ukraine - ed.)NATO leaders are now considering. The Summit would be a very good start to respond to this application. We mean an invitation to membership, which is only the first stage, "he said.

Read also: Zelensky met with Penso - discussed the security and membership of Ukraine in NATO

The deputy head of the OP noted that what Ukraine asks is to "start a process".

"If there is no result at the Summit in Vilnius, he has(President of Zelensky - Ed.)There is no reason and time to go, "Zhovkva said.

Answering the question of what is the minimum conditions of the presence of the Zelensky NATO Summit, Zhovkva referred to his speech in parliament, in which the Ukrainian leader spoke about the importance of courage in the modern world.

"The president will not go ... to the summit, if the leaders tend to demonstrate or develop a shortage of courage, while Ukraine with all their courage, will, power and high battle is fighting against Russian aggression," Zhovkva said.

Read also: NATO should consider the simplification of the Procedure of Ukraine in the Alliance - Volles

He mentioned the Case of Finland and Sweden, who last year applied for Vanto membership. Since then, Finland has already joined the Alliance.

"When Finland and Sweden filed a member of membership last year, the Allies responded to the application at once ... inviting them to NATO's membership," he said. Read also: Estonia Prime Minister: The only security guarantee for Ukraine- NATO Membership

President Volodymyr Zelenskyy insists that NATO's Summit in Vilnius is Ukrainian to get modalities about the future in the Alliance. He recalled that at a time until Ukraine is a member of NATO, it must receive security guarantees.

News Source: https://www.ukrinform.ua/rubric-polytics/3729532-v-op-poasnili-za-akih-obstavin-zelenskij-ne-priide-na-samit-nato-u-vilnus.html

The women's fencing team on swords took 5th place in team competitions, Ukrinform reports.

After a confident starting victory over the Czech Republic(45:19)"Blue and yellow" students gave way to Swiss(42:45)by beat in the tournament for 5-8 places israel(45:34)and Estonia(32:31).

NAPC found corruption risks in public procurement during martial law

Authors: Ukrinform (Person)

Publisher: Укринформ (Organization)

Published Time: 2023-06-29T21:59:32+03:00

Modified Time: 2023-06-29T21:59:32+03:00

Description: The National Anti -Corruption Agency (NAPC) has conducted a comprehensive study "Corruption Risks during Public Procurement in Martial Law" and identified a number of corruption risks. - Ukrinform.

Images: ['630_360_15608...']

Tags: ['НАЗК', 'Корупція', 'Публічні закупівлі']

Type: Article

National Anti -Corruption Agency(NACC)conducted a comprehensive investigation "Corruption Risks during Public Procurement of Martial Vowels" and identified a number of corruption risks.

As Ukrinform reports, this is stated on NAPC site.

"This issue has become especially relevant because of the desire of Ukrainian socialization for anti -corruption reforms, even in the conditions of war, which is impossible to develop further European and Euro -Atlantic integration of Ukraine," the agency said.

The NAPC has set a number of such corruption risks as the ability to submit thudder offers at a price higher than the expected value; abuse of electronic catalog; the use of "artificial obstacles" for giving preference to the necessary participant; corruption abuse of direct contracts; inability to challenge decisions, actions of customers during simplified procurement procedures; others(Non -price)Criteria for evaluating proposals as a tool for abuse.

Read also: The Council named the priorities of public procurement - defense, civil protection, food and fuelIn October last year, in response to the threats created by the full -scale protection of the Russian Federation and in order to avoid the publicity of information owned by national security internships, the transparency of procurement was reduced in Ukraine and restrictions on their accountability.

According to the results of the study, NAPC experts have developed and provided recommendations for minimization and elimination of corruption factors.

As it was reported, in response to aggression of the Russian Federation and in the interests of national security, governmentUkraine adopted the institution "On approval of the peculiarities of public procurement, works and services for customers provided by the Law of Ukraine" Public Procurement "for the period of the legal regime of martial law in Ukraine within 90 days from the date of its termination or cancellation".

News Source: https://www.ukrinform.ua/rubric-economy/3729533-nazk-viavilo-korupcijni-riziki-v-publicnih-zakupivlah-pid-cas-voennogo-stanu.html

NAPC found corruption risks in public procurement during martial law

Authors: Ukrinform (Person)

Publisher: Укринформ (Organization)

Published Time: 2023-06-29T21:59:32+03:00

Modified Time: 2023-06-29T21:59:32+03:00

Description: The National Anti -Corruption Agency (NAPC) has conducted a comprehensive study "Corruption Risks during Public Procurement in Martial Law" and identified a number of corruption risks. - Ukrinform.

Type: Article

National Anti -Corruption Agency(NACC)conducted a comprehensive investigation "Corruption Risks during Public Procurement of Martial Vowels" and identified a number of corruption risks.

As Ukrinform reports, this is stated on NAPC site.

"This issue has become especially relevant because of the desire of Ukrainian socialization for anti -corruption reforms, even in the conditions of war, which is impossible to develop further European and Euro -Atlantic integration of Ukraine," the agency said.

The NAPC has set a number of such corruption risks as the ability to submit thudder offers at a price higher than the expected value; abuse of electronic catalog; the use of "artificial obstacles" for giving preference to the necessary participant; corruption abuse of direct contracts; inability to challenge decisions, actions of customers during simplified procurement procedures; others(Non -price)Criteria for evaluating proposals as a tool for abuse.

According to the results of the study, NAPC experts have developed and provided recommendations for minimization and elimination of corruption factors.

As it was reported, in response to aggression of the Russian Federation and in the interests of national security, governmentUkraine adopted the institution "On approval of the peculiarities of public procurement, works and services for customers provided by the Law of Ukraine" Public Procurement "for the period of the legal regime of martial law in Ukraine within 90 days from the date of its termination or cancellation".

News Source: https://www.ukrinform.ua/rubric-economy/3729533-nazk-viavilo-korupcijni-riziki-v-publicnih-zakupivlah-pid-cas-voennogo-stanu.html

In Ukraine a moment of silence

Author: ['АРМІЯINFORM']

Time: 2023-06-29T22:00:00-04:00

Description: Zgіdnu by decree of the president of Ukraine Volodimir Zelensky No. 143/2022, Khvilina Movchannya ... War with Ukraine 2022, war with Ukraine Latest news today, News War with Ukraine 2022 The last ones for today, will there be a war between Ukraine and Russia and when, war with In 2022, Ukraine will be or not, will there be a war with Ukraine in the near future, they say, the war with Ukraine, Ukraine’s news today, Ukrainian news in Ukrainian media in Russian

Images: ['candle.gif']

Tags: ['STOPRUSSIA', 'АГРЕСІЯ РФ', 'ВТОРГНЕННЯ РФ', 'УКАЗ ПРЕЗИДЕНТА УКРАЇНИ', 'ХВИЛИНА МОВЧАННЯ']

Category: News

According to with Presidential DecreeVolodymyrazellensky No. 143/2022, a minute of silence is spent daily at 9:00, it is beyond the media.

“For the purpose of honoring light memory, civic courage and dedication, strength of spirit, stability and heroic feat of warriors who died in the performance of flew tasks for the protection of state sovereignty and territorial compatibility To initiate a day at 9 o'clock 00 minutes of a nationwide minute of silence to the songs, who were killed as a result of armed aggression of the Russian Federation in the contrary of Ukraine, which to declare in all media, regardless of ownership, ”the document reads.

News Source: https://armyinform.com.ua/2023/06/29/v-ukrayini-hvylyna-movchannya/

Authors: Ukrinform (Person)

Publisher: Укринформ (Organization)

Modified Time: 2023-06-29T22:04:00+03:00

Images: ['630_360_16446...']

Tags: ['Теракт', 'Данілов', 'Запорізька АЕС', 'Війна з Росією', 'Єдині новини']

Type: Article

Oleksiy Danilov, Secretaries of National Security and Defense, states that it is preparing Ukrainian for any scenarios to develop events around Zaporizhzhya AAP.

He said this on the broadcasting of the only news, Ukrinform reports.

"As for the situation at the Zaporizhzhia NPP. We are preparing very carefully for any scenarios that can take place. There are some training. We are working on the procedure we have. how to act, " - said Danilov.

Read also: in the event of a ZPP accident can evacuate about 300 thousand people from four areas

At the same time, he expressed the opinion that the world's response to the events around the NPP had a stiff and instant.

"If, God forbid, such events(The terrorist attack on ZAES - Ed.)It will happen, then we need to talk about in which world we live when the terrorist country can make a-kindly nuclear stroke in a country that has nothing to do with it, and I wondered that this reaction of the world should be instant to put a point in this question ", - said NSDC Secretary.

Read also: Lyashko about the threat of a terrorist attack at the ZPP: Kiev is located in the limits of radiation influence

He is convinced that the sooner Ukraine will win over the terrorist country, the faster the world community will exhale and will understand what is safe.

"The existence of Russia in the limits in which it exists today is a threat to the whole civilized world. And those events that took place there in the last days of Wagner's participation, say that this country is uncontrolled ... in which many private groups receive . And they can capture any nuclear object and any nuclear weapons at any time, "Danilov said.

Read also: lack of a powerful response of Europe to the undermining of hydroelectric power plants can be armed for Russia about Zelensky

"They can move beyond Russia on planes. Well, how can it be?"- asked the NSDC Secretary.

The IMF has completed the first view of the program: Ukraine will receive a tranche of $ 890 million

Authors: Ukrinform (Person)

Publisher: Укринформ (Organization)

Published Time: 2023-06-29T22:08:00+03:00

Modified Time: 2023-06-29T22:08:00+03:00

Description: The International Monetary Fund has approved the decision to allocate the next tranche to Ukraine within the framework of an extended financing program worth $ 890 million.

— Укрінформ.:

Images: ['630_360_15785...']

Tags: ['МВФ', 'Україна', 'Гроші']

Type: Article

The International Monetary Fund has approved the decision to allocate the following tranche to Ukraine with an extended funding program worth $ 890 million.

This is stated in the official message of the FundHe published Thursday, reports Ukrinform.

“Executive Council IMFcompleted the first view of the Agreement under the Extended Financing Program(EFF)For Ukraine, which enables the Ukrainian authorities to receive about $ 890 million, ”the message said.

It is noted that the funds are aimed at supporting the budget of Ukraine.

“Despite the war, Ukraine's economy demonstrates better stability than expected, after a sharp decline in 2022. GDP growth was increased to 1-3 percent in 2023, while internal demand is being restored, inflation is slowing down, and foreign currency reserves are significant against the background of a stable currency exchange rate, ”the document said.

It is emphasized that the Ukrainian authorities "have made significant progress in the fulfillment of the EFF under difficult circumstances, fulfilling all the constant such criteria for efficiency as of the end of April." By the end of June, all structural controls were also achieved, including the second additional budget, and the strengthening of the Budget Code by the pasvering of the development of national income strategy.

Read also: [Shmigal expects the Board of Directors the IMF as soon as possible will declare an extended lending agreement] as soon as possible](https://www.ukrinform.ua/rubric-economy/3723157-smigal-ocikue-so-rada-direktoriv-mvf-aknajsvidse-shvalit-ugodu-sodo-rozsirenogo-kredituvanna.html)As reported by Ukrinform, at the end of March, the IMF approved the EFF extended financing program for Ukraine of $ 15.6 billion, designed for 48 months.

News Source: https://www.ukrinform.ua/rubric-economy/3729537-mvf-pogodiv-vidilenna-ukraini-novogo-transu-na-890-miljoniv.html

In Ukraine, the issue of weapon production is actively moving - Danilov

Authors: Ukrinform (Person)

Publisher: Укринформ (Organization)

Published Time: 2023-06-29T22:17:00+03:00

Modified Time: 2023-06-29T22:17:00+03:00

Description: The Secretary of the National Security and Defense Council Alexei Danilov asserts that working on its own weapons production in Ukraine is actively progressing. - Ukrinform.

Images: ['630_360_16770...']

Tags: ['Україна', 'Зброя', 'Данілов', 'Єдині новини']

Type: Article

The Secretaries of National Security and Defense Alexei Danilov asserts that the work of the weapons production in Ukraine is actively progressing.

He told about it on the broadcast of the only news, Ukrinform reports.

“Production Work WeaponsOwn production is moving. The work is as active as possible. The enterprises of the MIC of both state and private ownership are gaining momentum, "Danivilov said.

At the same time, he noted that, despite the active work done in the military production, it should be borne in mind that this industry in our country was not in priority, so it is not easy to return it all over.

"But what concerns our missile program, ammunition program and combat missions, it is all moved from a dead point. Of course, we provide ourselves with a certain volume A huge number of weapons since the USSR. But we have been moving forward, "the NSDC secretary emphasized.

Read also: Reznikov told that he would produce Ukrainian MIC after the warHe also said that there was no meeting of the rate of the High Chief Commander, which would not consider the issue of domestic production of ammunition and equipment.

As reported Ukrinform, President Volodymyr Zelensky, during a speech by the Constitution Day, stated that Ukraine, a full -scale invasion of the Russian Federation, resumed the production of guns and shells, and also made NATO standards in service.

Authors: Ukrinform (Person)

Publisher: Укринформ (Organization)

Published Time: 2023-06-29T22:22:00+03:00

Modified Time: 2023-06-29T22:22:00+03:00

Description: President of Ukraine Volodymyr Zelensky has received the British non -governmental organization Royal Institute of International Relations Chatham House. - Ukrinform.

Images: ['630_360_16639...']

Tags: ['Нагорода', 'Зеленський', 'Chatham House']

Type: Article

President of Ukraine Volodymyr Zelensky received a distinction of the British non -governmental organization of the Royal Institute of International Relations Catham House.

According to the President of Ukraine in his appealTo Chatham House members, this conflict, indicates that the world believes in Ukraine, Ukrinform reports

"Ukrainian warriors, all our beautiful people really deserve the highest evidence. Millions of our people are fighting and working for our freedom, common freedom - not only Ukrainian but all free nations. I am sure, we will be a liberty. Another proof that the world believes in Ukraine, believes in Ukrainians, believes in our victory, "Zelensky said.

Viso: op

The President expressed confidence that the contribution of Ukrainians to global freedom will be determined by the legal recognition of our state by NATO ally.

"Security institutions, including Euro -Atlantic institutions, have a real protection of peace. And now it is real only with Ukraine - free, strong, unusually, in NATO," Zelensky said.

Government officials informed the International Working Group on the Ecological Crimes of the Russian Federation in Ukraine

Authors: Ukrinform (Person)

Publisher: Укринформ (Organization)

Published Time: 2023-06-29T22:36:00+03:00

Modified Time: 2023-06-29T22:36:00+03:00

Description: The office of the President of Ukraine has a briefing for members of the International Working Group on Russia's Environmental Crimes, dedicated to the situation in Ukraine. Ukrainian officials informed the International Working Group about the consequences of the war. - Ukrinform.

Images: ['630_360_16880...']

Tags: ['Екологія', 'Україна', 'Агресія РФ', 'Офіс Президента', 'Війна з Росією', 'Екоцид']

Type: Article

The Office of the President of Ukraine had a briefing for members of the International Working Group of Ecological Crimes of Russia, dedicated to the situation in Ukraine. Ukrainian government officials informed the international working group about the consequences of the war.

About it reportedOn the office of the office, reports Ukrinform.

“Ukraine is now the most replaced country in the world. First of all, we need to dismantle the state's capabilities to mine. Three thousand sappers, it is necessary to increase their number, ”Yulia Sviridenko said during a meeting of the Ministry of Ministers of Ukraine.

According to her, more than 100 thousand square meters have been replaced in our country. Km of the territory, in particular agricultural land, which adversely affects the agricultural sector, as a consequence, worsens the food situation in the world.

It noted the importance of developing a territorial demining strategy.

Read also: USA prepared criminal cases for Russians for military room against Americans

According to the Deputy Head of the Presidential Office Rostislav Shurma, the Kakhovskaya Hydroe President of Kakhovskaya Hydroe President caused significant losses to the agricultural economy of Ukraine, energy, housing stock, objects of transport infrastructure and the environment in general.

According to him, the calculation of direct losses from this disaster continues, now it is about $ 2 billion. USA.

“It is a matter of significant economic and environmental damage. Flora, fauna, agriculture, forestry, national landscape parks. It is value that is important to the world, for nature, ”added the deputy head of the OP.

Readmetas: environmental consequences of war: Zelensky met with the members of the International Working Group

Shurma also noted that humanitarian support is needed by people who live in the territories affected by a catastrophe at the Kakhovsky Hydroelectric Power Plant.The Minister of Environmental Protection and Natural Resources Ruslan Strezlan noted that 30% of Europe's biodiversity is concentrated in Ukraine. According to him, the Ministry of Environmental Protection, in the framework of work on bringing the Russian Federation of reference, prepared a methodology for assessing the damage caused to the natural resources of Ukraine by Russian aggression. More than 240 cases were registered.

Read also: lack of a powerful response of Europe to the undermining of hydroelectric power plants can be armed for Russia about Zelensky

He spoke about the work of the web resource and the mobile application "Eco -Zagrosis", which allows to determine the degree of damage to the temporarily occupied territories with the help of digital technologies.

Energy Minister Herman Galushchenko noted that the challenges of the war found weak in the Ukrainian energy system and showed the need to centralize energy distribution. The most fastest path to this minister called the transition to the use of renewable energy sources.

"The Russians destroyed more than ten mines, and this accelerated the transition to" green "energy," he stated.

Readmetas: Recovery of Ukraine: In the Ministry of Finance named the priority areas for financing

Galushchenko recalled that Ukraine has approved a new energy strategy, the purpose of refusing to use coal by 2035. Our state sees a potential for the use of solar and wind power. In particular, according to its words, after the victory in the war and the return of all territories, Ukraine has a memorial potential for the development of wind energy on the Black Seas coast.

Prosecutor General Andriy Kostin spoke about the work that the prosecutor's office is held accountable for environmental crimes.Therefore, the prosecutor's office attracts all available resources to determine the cost of damages of a connection between the act of aggression and environmental crime.

The Prosecutor General has invited members of the International Working Group to join the collection and determine the degree of damage as a result of the environmental crimes of Russia of Ukrainian.

Advisers Dariy Zarivna and Alexander Bevz also took part in the meeting on the Ukrainian side.

From the guests - Vice president of the European Parliament, Gaidi Hautala, the former environmental commissioner and experts of foreign affairs of Sweden Margotvalstre, President of Ireland in 1990-1997 Mary Robinson, Eco -Activist Tunerg, Jenior High School.(The EuropeanInstitute of Peace), CMI Program Manager(The Crisis Management Initiative)In Eurasia, Roksan Kristesska.

As reported by Ukrinform, on June 29, the President of Ukraine met with the People's Working Group members on the environmental consequences of the Russian war.

News Source: https://www.ukrinform.ua/rubric-polytics/3729541-uradovci-poinformuvali-miznarodnu-robocu-grupu-sodo-ekologicnih-zlociniv-rf-v-ukraini.html

Zelensky: Countering Ecocide is one of the points of the Ukrainian peace formula

Authors: Ukrinform (Person)

Publisher: Укринформ (Organization)

Published Time: 2023-06-29T22:42:00+03:00

Modified Time: 2023-06-29T22:42:00+03:00

Description: Ecocide counteraction is one of the points of the Ukrainian peace formula, and we have to implement each of its points, all aspects of peace. - Ukrinform.

Images: ['630_360_16880...']

Tags: ['Звернення', 'Агресія РФ', 'Зеленський', 'Війна з Росією', 'Екоцид']

Type: Article

Anti -coccid is one of the points of the Ukrainian peace formula, and we have to implement its point, all aspects of peace.

About it in your appealAt the end of the 491st of the war, President of Ukraine Volodymyr Zelensky said.

_ I wish health, dear Ukrainians!_

I finish the day in the Verkhovna Rada - meeting with our speaker Ruslanstefanchuk. We work.

And now the report for this day, a busy day. Very long.

The meeting of the European Council is traditionally for Ukraine to be among the members of the Evrosouz. The agenda is obvious - our defense in this war, our path, the support from our partners, our security support for them for our Europe. Ukraine influences the power of Europe. This is a fact. And this year, on the basis of this and other similar facts, unity in Europe, including the beginning of negotiations on Ukraine's membership in the European Union.

Meeting with Mike Penso, 48th vice-resident, senator ... American support for Ukraine is vital for Ukraine-from all Americans, every American family, all US public forces, all political leaders, congress-both parties, of course, from US President Biden. Thank you for your feast!

He discussed our defense with Mr. Penso, our interaction - from the very beginning, pre -days between the Ukrainian and American peoples. They talked about the weapons, the projection of our soldiers, about our common values.

Meeting with members of the International Working Group on the Environmental Consequences of the War - Greta Tumbberg, Margot Walstrom and others. They talked primarily about Russian thermal and ecocide at the Kakhovskaya hydroelectric power station and, in general, about the work of our group, which will be designed by those issues that are directly related to the destructive influence of Russian aggression on nature. Ecocide counteraction is one of the points of the Ukrainian peace formula, and we have to implement each of its points, all aspect.

Conversation with Guatemala President. The formula of peace, our collaboration with Latin asimate, help us in demining, it is very important - in the creation of a tribunal of Russian aggression.

Meeting with representatives of our business is very important, very meaningful. I am greeted. They discussed how to stimulate economic activity now, in the face of our conditions. They talked about how to give more business protection, more cooperation and business. Now the first priority is defense, and it is obvious. But icing is also important.And, of course, our warriors, our protection. Today, in the appeal to the community, this is one of the leading world, British intellectual centers - I told that three new new decrees were prepared, very important, and 419 soldiers were awarding our soldiers. In total, more than 49,000 Ukrainian Ukrainians have already been awarded during the full -scale state awards!

I thank everyone and everyone who protects our country!Thank you to everyone who now, who has given us the best news today - about the advancement of Ukrainian positions. Glory to you, our characters!

Thank you all in the world who really helps us!

Glory to Ukraine!

News Source: https://www.ukrinform.ua/rubric-ato/3729546-zelenskij-protidia-ekocidu-odin-iz-punktiv-ukrainskoi-formuli-miru.html

Authors: Ukrinform (Person)

Publisher: Укринформ (Organization)

Published Time: 2023-06-29T22:50:00+03:00

Modified Time: 2023-06-29T22:50:00+03:00

Description: President of Ukraine Volodymyr Zelensky celebrated more than 49,000 Ukrainians with high state awards during the full -scale war. - Ukrinform.

Images: ['630_360_16623...']

Tags: ['Нагорода', 'Військові', 'Зеленський', 'Війна з Росією']

Type: Article

President of Ukraine Volodymyr Zelensky, during a full -scale war, celebrated more than 49 thousand Ukrainians with high state awards.

He told about it in his evening video., reports Ukrinform.

"Today, in the appeal to the Chatham House community, it is one of the leading world, British intellectual centers - I told that three new new decrees were prepared, very important, about awardsOur soldiers - 419 soldiers. In total, more than 49 thousand Ukrainians and Ukrainian women have already been awarded state awards during the full -scale war, ”the President said.

Viso: op

He thanked everyone who defends Ukraine today. "Thank you to everyone who now, who also gave us the best news today - about promoting the Ukrainian positions. Glory to you, our heroes!" - said Zelensky.

Here, the Russian troops lost almost three mouths killed by the killed hypoatically, and 19 units of military equipment were destroyed.

Defense forces of Ukraine from February 24, 2022 to June 29, 2023 eliminated about 227 thousand 780 Russian invadersIn particular, 680 people are last day.

News Source: https://www.ukrinform.ua/rubric-society/3729545-za-cas-vijni-prezident-nagorodiv-ponad-49-tisac-ukrainciv.html

The UN Security Council gathered again at the request of the Russian Federation for discussing weapons supply to Ukraine

Authors: Ukrinform (Person)

Publisher: Укринформ (Organization)

Published Time: 2023-06-29T22:57:00+03:00

Modified Time: 2023-06-29T22:57:00+03:00

Description: The UN Security Council gathered on Friday for the next meeting at the request of Russia to discuss the supply of Western weapons to Ukraine. - Ukrinform.

Images: ['630_360_15112...']

Tags: ['Зброя', 'Агресія РФ', 'Росія', 'Кислиця', 'Радбез ООН', 'Війна з Росією']

Type: Article

The UN Security Council gathered on Friday for the next meeting at the request of Russia to refine the supply of Western weapons to Ukraine.

According to the Ukrinform correspondent in New York, the meeting began 15:00.

The Secretariat of the UN was made by the Deputy Secretary -General for the Disassembly of Isumi Nakamitz. Russia invited some experts whom Sergei Kyslytsia called "the most insidious defense of the invasion of Ukraine and dictatorial regimes in general", such as the American journalist Max Blumental, who is accused of receiving cops from the Russian Federation in the UN.

The IMF has improved expectations for Ukraine's macroeconomic prospects in 2023

Authors: Ukrinform (Person)

Publisher: Укринформ (Organization)

Published Time: 2023-06-29T23:11:00+03:00

Modified Time: 2023-06-29T23:11:00+03:00

Description: The positive decision of the first revision of the Extended Financing Facility Facility (EFF) is associated with improving the expectations of Ukraine's macroeconomic prospects in 2023. - Ukrinform.

Images: ['630_360_16655...']

Tags: ['Мінфін', 'МВФ', 'Україна', 'Прогноз']

Type: Article

Positive first viewing of the extended financing program for Ukraine(Extended Fund Facility - EFF)It is related to the improvement of the expectations of the Ukrainian -making prospects of Ukraine in 2023.

This was reported [press service of the Ministry of Finance of Ukraine]](https://mof.gov.ua/uk/news/imf_executive_board_completes_the_first_review_under_the_extended_fund_facility_eff_arrangement_for_ukraine-4085), reports Ukrinform.

"The revision has noted the significant progress of the Government of Ukraine in fulfilling the obligations by the EFF program. Ukraine has fulfilled all the relevant quantitative criteria for April and structural landmarks as of the end of June," the message will be reported.

In particular, changes to the state [budget] were approved(https://www.ukrinform.ua/tag-budzet)that meet the needs of Ukraine, a bill on improvement of the Budget Code and the completion of the first preparatory stage for the development of the national income strategy have been prepared.

It is emphasized that the experts of the Fund improved expectations for macroeconomic promises in 2023.

Successful revision of the extended financing program allows Ukraine to get the second tranche in the amount of $ 890 million in the near future.

“I am grateful for the constructive cooperation of experts and the IMF leadership, the Government of Ukraine and the National Bank, which allowed to achieve a successful review of the program. The conditions provided for EFF contribute to the strengthening of Ukraine's economic and financial politics, as well as the mobilization of financial resources for budgetary need to restore the country. After the first revision, we will continue to actively work over the implementation of jointly defined reforms to ensure macroeconomic compatibility, strengthening public administration, supporting efforts to recover, ultimately, European integration of Ukraine, " - said the Minister of Finance of Ukraine Sergey Marchenko.

Read also: [Shmigal expects the Board of Directors the IMF as soon as possible will declare an extended lending agreement] as soon as possible](https://www.ukrinform.ua/rubric-economy/3723157-smigal-ocikue-so-rada-direktoriv-mvf-aknajsvidse-shvalit-ugodu-sodo-rozsirenogo-kredituvanna.html)As reported by Ukrinform, at the end of March, the IMF approved the EFF extended financing program for Ukraine of $ 15.6 billion, designed for 48 months.

The first IMF tranche within this program is 2 billion of special lawsuit, or in the amount of about $ 2.7 billion was received in early April 2023.

News Source: https://www.ukrinform.ua/rubric-economy/3729552-mvf-pokrasiv-ocikuvanna-sodo-makroekonomicnih-perspektiv-ukraini-u-2023-roci.html

Authors: Ukrinform (Person)

Images: ['630_360_16856...']

Type: Article

Ukrainian has been Ukrainian, so it is time to strengthen the unity of Europe over the beginning of negotiations on Ukraine's membership in the EU.

President of Ukraine Volodymyr Zelenskyy said this in his evening video., reports Ukrinform.

"Ukraine affects the power of Europe is a fact. And this year, it is time to increase unity in Europe on the basis of this and other similar facts - in particular, the beginning of the membership of Ukraine in Ukraine in the European Union," the President said.

He said he had a speech at a meeting of the European Council today.

UN leadership on the Radbezi once again indicated Russia that she was receiving weapons from abroad

Authors: Ukrinform (Person)

Publisher: Укринформ (Organization)

Published Time: 2023-06-29T23:29:00+03:00

Modified Time: 2023-06-29T23:29:00+03:00

Description: The Deputy Secretary General for the Disarmament of Isumi Nakamitsa at a Council-convex meeting for attempts to "condemn" the supply of Western weapons to Ukraine once again indicated that she was receiving weapons from abroad to Moscow. - Ukrinform.

Images: ['630_360_14450...']

Tags: ['Україна', 'Зброя', 'Радбез ООН', 'Війна з Росією']

Type: Article

The Deputy Secretary-General for Disarmament of Isumi Nakamitsa Nazidani Radbeza, convened by Russia for attempts to "condemn" the supply of Western Armed for Ukraine, once again indicated to Moscow that she herself was receiving weapons from abroad.

According to Ukrinform, she noted that open sources report to Ukraine's tanks, armored vehicles, combat aircraft, helicopters, large -caliber artillery systems, missile complexes and UAVs, as well as Dystanti -controlled ammunition, small arms and light weapons.

Deliveries weaponsAnd the ammunition was jumped and expanded on the eve of the report of the counter -off -Ukrainian forces, explained Nakamitz.

“At the same time,” she said, “there is a report that states are planning to transfer weapons such as UAVs and ammunition, Russian armed for use in Ukraine. Moreover, the media reported the transmission of conventional types of ordinary weapons ... Other armed groups that take part in the war in Ukraine. "

The Deputy Secretary General reminded that since the beginning of the full -scale invasion of Russia, Ukraine's Office of the High Commissioner of the UN Human Rights has recorded 24 862 sacrifice among civilians in Ukraine: 9083 - killed and 15 779 - wounded. Although the actual figures of the victims are probably much higher, she added.

The vast majority of civilian victims are the result of the use of explosive arms with a large area of damage. An example is the Kramatorsk attack center on June 27, which killed 12 people, she said.

According to Nakamitz, the destruction of the Kakhovsk Dam, "perhaps the most significant sizes, which has caused damage to civilian infrastructure from the beginning of the war."

She stressed that "the UN strongly condemns the attacks on civilians and civilinefrastructure and calls for their immediate termination."

Read also: Russia can produce rockets bypassing the sanctions -IgnatiAs reported Ukrinform, The UN Security Council gathered on Friday, at the request of Russia to discuss the supply of Western weapons.

The IMF explained which reforms expected from Ukraine to highlight the next tranches

Authors: Ukrinform (Person)

Publisher: Укринформ (Organization)

Published Time: 2023-06-29T23:37:00+03:00

Modified Time: 2023-06-29T23:37:00+03:00

Description: The International Monetary Fund expects that in the next stage of the extended EFF funding program, the Ukrainian authorities will adopt as a matter of agreed by the laws to improve government and fight corruption. - Ukrinform.

Images: ['630_360_16655...']

Tags: ['Економіка', 'МВФ', 'Україна', 'Боротьба з корупцією']

Type: Article

The International Monetary Fund expects that in the next stage of the EFF extended financing program, the Ukrainian authorities will pass the laws to improve government and fight corruption within the agreed terms.

This was stated on Thursday in response to the question of his own correspondent -Ukrainian in Washington, the head of the IMF mission in Ukraine Gavin Gray.

“For the next half of a year we will look at the structural reforms that are qualified(in Ukraine - ed.)», - said the representative of the fund.

Read also: IMF completed the first view of the program: Ukraine will get $ 890 million

In this context, he drew attention to government reforms as well as in the fight. According to him, "they will be one of the most important", which will experience both the IMF and other international institutions working with Ukraine.

In particular, by the end of July, the Fund is awaiting the restoration of compulsory procedures for officials for officials in Ukraine. In addition, before the same term, it is necessary to complete the procedure of adoption of Law 8401 on the change of the Tax Code.

Read also: IMF has improved expectations for the macroeconomic promise of Ukraine in 2023

At the end of September, the program defined a "landmark" to make appropriate changes to the Ukrainian legislation on the fight against money laundering and terrorism. The IMF also expects that in December in Ukraine there will be adoption of a nostructured basic legislation, which should strengthen the autonomy of the Anti -Corruption Prosecutor's Office.

"These are all important reforms," the Fund's representative said.

Read also: $ 1.2 billion grant and Finland have been received to the budget

In addition, he said, during the next stage of the EFFD program of Ukraine, the budget development for 2024, which is to meet the goals of the program, as well as macroeconomic stability policy, remains the key task.

News Source: https://www.ukrinform.ua/rubric-economy/3729557-mvf-poasniv-akih-reform-ocikue-vid-ukraini-dla-vidilenna-nastupnih-transiv.html

Partners noted the sustainability of the Ukrainian economy - lush

Authors: Ukrinform (Person)

Publisher: Укринформ (Organization)

Published Time: 2023-06-29T23:43:00+03:00

Modified Time: 2023-06-29T23:43:00+03:00

Description: The decision of the IMF on the allocation of the second tranche under the extended EFF funding program means not only budget financing, but also a high assessment of the stability of the Ukrainian economy. - Ukrinform.

Images: ['630_360_16651...']

Tags: ['Економіка', 'МВФ', 'Нацбанк', 'Андрій Пишний']

Type: Article

Adoption of the IMF on the allocation of the second tranche under the expanded EFF program means not only the budget financing, but also a high assessment of the stability of the Ukrainian economy.

The head of the National Bank of Ukraine Andriy Pyshny wrote about it in Facebook, reports Ukrinform.

"This means not only budget financing that is critical today. It means that our partners have noted the sustainability of Ukrainian economy (By the way, the Foundation improved the GDP of Ukraine this year to the range of 1-3%)But the ability of Ukrainian authorities to work effectively and quickly and, including the ability to provide NBUSCLACK Macroeconomic and financial stability in a full -scale war, " - commented Andrei Pishny.

According to him, Ukraine has fulfilled all structural beacons and quantitative criteria for efficiency under the program within the prescribed time.

The National Bank, in particular, has clearly started assessing the state of the banking sector, and approved the strategy of mitigation of currency restrictions, the transition to a flexible exchange rate and returning to inflation.

"This successful first revision is a direct confirmation that the Ukrainian castor is serious about the obligations.

He also thanked his colleagues for the productive work, and for the International Monetary Fund for support - both financial and political and expert.

Read also: IMF Improved expectations for the macroeconomic viability of Ukraine in 2023As reported by Ukrinform, at the end of March, the IMF approved the EFF extended financing program for Ukraine of $ 15.6 billion, designed for 48 months.

The first IMF tranche within this program is 2 billion of special lawsuit, or in the amount of about $ 2.7 billion was received in early April 2023.

In the Bakhmut direction, our troops intercepted an operational initiative - Anna Malyar

Author: ['АРМІЯINFORM']

Time: 2023-06-29T24:00:00-04:00

Description: Triva Operations of our defense forces on Melitopolsky, Berdyanskoy Ta ... War with Ukraine 2022, War with Ukraine Latest News today, News War with Ukraine 2022 Last for today, will there be a war between Ukraine and Russia and when, the war with Ukraine in 2022 Whether there will be a year or not, will there be a war with Ukraine in the near future, they say, the war with Ukraine, Ukraine’s news today, Ukrainian news in Ukrainian media in Russian

Images: ['photo_5237687672758192066_y.jpg']

Tags: ['STOPRUSSIA', 'АГРЕСІЯ РФ', 'БАХМУТСЬКИЙ НАПРЯМОК', 'ВТОРГНЕННЯ РФ', 'ГАННА МАЛЯР']

Category: News

The offensive operation of our defense forces in Melitopol, Berdyansk and Bakhmut directions continues.

About it statedDeputy Minister of Defense of Ukraine Anna Malyar.

"Our" enemy "into the enemy every meter of land in a difficult duel. They have success. At the same time the enemy continues the offensive on Lymansky, Avdiivsky and Mariinsky Napryamk. Successful, ”she said.

Anna Malyar emphasizes that in the direction of Rivnopil - Volodya is successful, now fixed on the achieved limits and causes serious losses. In fact, they bleed the offensive potential of the enemy, destroying technology, warehouses, management points and personnel.

“In the Zaporizhzhya and Melitopol directions - we destroy the enemy. The enemy tightened all its reserves, even the Marine Corps Brigade, which had its time from Kherson, ”said the Deputy Minister of Defense of Ukraine.

In the Berdyansk direction, according to Anna Malyar, there is a promotion of 1300 meters. In the Bakhmut direction, our troops intercepted the operational initiative.

“The enemy tries to keep the occupied positions, holds counterattack, but in general retains after the losses incurred.

In the direction of the mite, 1200 meters advanced. In the direction of Kurdyumivka - by 1500 meters. The struggle continues on the flanks of the city. Ours are success. Now fixed on the liberated borders.

In general, in the Bakhmut direction again hot, fierce battles continue. He enemies reserves there and clings to Bakhmut with all her own strength, ”she has shown.

News Source: https://armyinform.com.ua/2023/06/29/na-bahmutskomu-napryamku-nashi-vijska-perehopyly-operatyvnu-inicziatyvu-ganna-malyar/

Ukraine will train emergency services to overcome the consequences of a possible terrorist attack at the ZPP

Author: ['АРМІЯINFORM']

Time: 2023-06-29T26:00:00-04:00

Description: PID Golovanni Minstra Yenershika Ukrainian Galushchenka Vidbulo Pіdgotovch ... War with Ukraine 2022, War with Ukraine Latest News today, News War with Ukraine 2022 Last today, will there be a war between Ukraine and Russia and when the war with Ukraine will be in 2022 Or not, will there be a war with Ukraine in the near future, they say, the war with Ukraine, Ukraine’s news today, Ukrainian news in Ukrainian media in Russian

Images: ['zaes.jpg']

Tags: ['ГЕРМАН ГАЛУЩЕНКО', 'НАВЧАННЯ', 'НЕБЕЗПЕКА ПІДРИВУ ЗАЕС']

Category: News

Under the chairmanship of the Minister of Energy of Ukraine, Herman Galushchenko, a preparatory meeting of the Interagency Crisis Headquarters was held. The main topic of the staff is an analysis of information on the situation on the temporarily occupied Russia of the Zaporozhye Eest Modeling Scenarios for Events in the event of a possible terrorist attack at a nuclear power plant.

This is stated in messagepress services of the Ministry of Energy of Ukraine.

Herman Galushchenko noted that one of the blocks continues to operate in the hot stop mode.

"The invaders deliberately block the translation of the fifth block into cold stop mode. This significantly increases the risk of a terrorist threat at a nuclear object," he said.

For prompt response, the headquarters receives data from sensors that use energy, SES, Diara. Separately, the minister noted the role of IAEA experts, which are at the ZPP.

“Four experts are physically on the station. It is important that they have an active position on the reports and monitoring of the situation, ” - said the energy department.

In turn, President of Energoatom Petro Kotin added that the company models different scenarios for the development of events at the NPP, their possible consequences and variants of the frequent overcoming.

“Our experts have worked out all the scenarios that the racists can implement NPPs. Therefore, according to the possible consequences, different response models will be worked out, ”Petro Kotin said.

Herman Galushchenko stressed that all emergency services are ready for possible development of events, the relevant joint action protocols have been developed.

In order to work out their detailed work, the crisis headquarters made a decision to conduct relevant large -scale exercises with the involvement of central, regional and local importance. During the exercises, measures will be worked out to overcome the consequences in the event of a blast by the Russian soldiers of one of the power units.

News Source: https://armyinform.com.ua/2023/06/29/ukrayina-provede-navchannya-ekstrenyh-sluzhb-z-podolannya-naslidkiv-mozhlyvogo-teraktu-na-zaes/

In Ukraine, the issue of weapon production is actively moving - Danilov

Authors: Ukrinform (Person)

Publisher: Укринформ (Organization)

Published Time: 2023-06-29T2:17:00+03:00

Modified Time: 2023-06-29T22:17:00+03:00

Description: The Secretary of the National Security and Defense Council Alexei Danilov asserts that working on its own weapons production in Ukraine is actively progressing. - Ukrinform.

Images: ['630_360_16770...']

Tags: ['Україна', 'Зброя', 'Данілов', 'Єдині новини']

Type: Article

The Secretaries of National Security and Defense Alexei Danilov asserts that the work of the weapons production in Ukraine is actively progressing.

He told about it on the broadcast of the only news, Ukrinform reports.

“Production Work WeaponsOwn production is moving. The work is as active as possible. The enterprises of the MIC of both state and private ownership are gaining momentum, "Danivilov said.

At the same time, he noted that, despite the active work done in the military production, it should be borne in mind that this industry in our country was not in priority, so it is not easy to return it all over.

"But what concerns our missile program, ammunition program and combat missions, it is all moved from a dead point. Of course, we provide ourselves with a certain volume A huge number of weapons since the USSR. But we have been moving forward, "the NSDC secretary emphasized.

Read also: Reznikov told that he would produce Ukrainian MIC after the warHe also said that there was no meeting of the rate of the High Chief Commander, which would not consider the issue of domestic production of ammunition and equipment.

As reported Ukrinform, President Volodymyr Zelensky, during a speech by the Constitution Day, stated that Ukraine, a full -scale invasion of the Russian Federation, resumed the production of guns and shells, and also made NATO standards in service.

Natalia Humeniuk: Damage to the Chongar Bridge is the prerequisite for creating the positive news we approach

Author: ['Оксана Уретій']

Time: 2023-06-29T30:00:00-04:00

Description: Syogodni in the Efiri National Marathon “єdini News” The chief of the Obnaya ... War with Ukraine 2022, War with Ukraine Latest News today, News War with Ukraine 2022 Last for today, will there be a war between Ukraine and Russia and when, the war with Ukraine In 2022 it will be or not, will there be a war with Ukraine in the near future, they say, the war with Ukraine, Ukraine’s news today, Ukrainian news in Ukrainian media in Russian

Images: ['3-nataliya-gumenyuk.jpg']

Tags: ['АНТОНІВСЬКИЙ МІСТ', 'ВТОРГНЕННЯ РФ', 'ЄДИНІ НОВИНИ', 'НАТАЛІЯ ГУМЕНЮК']

Category: News

Today, on the national marathon "Unified News", the head of the United Coordination Press Center of Defense forces of Southern Ukraine, captain of the 1st rank Nataliagumeniuk told about the consequences for the enemy's logistics after the "cotton" of the Odgar bridge, which happened on June 22.

Recall that the Chongar bridge that connects the occupied Crimea with Kherson region has suffered significant damage. This slowed down the logistics deliveries of the invaders.

Natalia Humeniuk noted that the pontoon crossing is not a full -fledged replacement of the stationary bridge.

  • This is an extreme way to replace the bridge. Given our experience in the Anatonivsky Bridge, the tactics of the occupiers are formaining the tactics of actions of the occupiers. We know what they will do, how they will try to build an alternative. The enemy is also aware of the fact that we will work methodologically by this crossing. It is clear that it complicates their logistics, supply, but the occupiers will continue to repair the bridge, taxam, as they did during our work on the release of the Right Bank by hypersenses across the Dnieper.

The officer noted that the enemy was in very difficult conditions. After all, the events that are now unfolding on the front line occur directly to the dry, and the bridge is located in the deep rear of the invaders themselves.

  • They will suffer again and again because it does not work fully. Therefore, the alternative way through Armenian is much closer to the positions of defense forces, and the invaders are aware that fire control is also powerful there. We can say that the damage to the Chongar Bridge is the prerequisite for the creation of quiet news to which we approach.

The head of the united coordination press center of the Defense Forces of the South of Ukraine has said that in the occupied part of Kherson region the enemy tries to maneuver, using even those areas where the water has only left a little. In this way, the conscience is trying to create the same fire they feel from the Zaporozhye direction, an additional tense front in the Dnieper direction.Natalia Humeniuk emphasized that it was necessary to realize that he had a large number of defense border and had time to replace large floors. This significantly constrains the pace of promotion of the Ukrainian army, but does not make them impossible.

  • We continue combat work, it is significantly complicated, the enemy tries to resist, but our promotion and effort is absolutely positive. We liberate the generic land.

Tags: ['ВЕЛИКА БРИТАНІЯ', 'ІНТЕРФЛЕКС', 'НАВЧАННЯ ВІЙСЬКОВИХ', 'ПІДГОТОВКА ЗС УКРАЇНИ']

Category: News

The chief secretary of the royal treasury, a member of the Parliament, John Glenn, events of the Interflex Operation, visited military personnel who are training in the United Kingdom.

About it reportsThe General Staff of the Armed Forces.

“I visited to see how Ukrainian troops were studying as part of the curls. I am inspired by seeing the courage of soldiers and knowing that we will play our role in supporting Ukraine in counteracting Putin's aggression, ”John Glen said.

The British Parliamentary examined as under the professional leadership of the instructor forces of the United Kingdom and Northern Ireland, the military personnel of the Armed Forces of Ukraine were engaged in fire training.

"The United Kingdom supports Ukraine in its fight against Putin's invasion," he said.

In the General Staff of the Armed Forces, the training is conducted on the objects of the educational and material base of the Ministry of Defense of the United Kingdom. Each training course lasts five weeks, they are headed by the 11th Brigade of Promotion of Security forces of Supporting Forces of the Armed Forces of the Armed Forces.

The Interflex Operation ** is a curriculum that is intended for the November Armored Forces of Ukraine with small or without military experience. Construction of the multinational Interflex educational operation in 2023 the best instructors and instructors of the armed forces of the United Kingdom and Northern Ireland, the Australian Union, Kingdom of Denmark, Canada, Lithuanian Republic, Kingdom of the Netherlands, Kingdom of Noritian, Nova Noritian, Kingdom of Noritian 20 thousand Ukrainian servicemen of the Tavi serviceman of the Armed Forces of Ukraine.

Military Accounting: What should you know not to “catch a fine”

Author: ['Сергій Лемеха']

Time: 2023-06-29T36:00:00-04:00

Description: Mayzhe Pivtor Roku Triva Trivna invoice of the Word of the Russian Federation, take our time ours ... War with Ukraine 2022, War with Ukraine Latest News Today, News War with Ukraine 2022 Last for today, will there be a war between Ukraine and Russia and when, War with Ukraine In 2022 it will be or not, will there be a war with Ukraine in the near future, they say, the war with Ukraine, Ukraine’s news today, Ukrainian news in Ukrainian media in Russian

Images: ['51e4b3518c509e8f0fdb583f6330b2b1_w960-e1688027527663.jpg']

Tags: ['ВТОРГНЕННЯ РФ', 'СОЦЗАХИСТ ПІД ЧАС ВІЙНИ']

Category: News

For almost a year and a half, a large -scale invasion of the Armed Forces of the Russian Federation has been ongoing, and all this time the Security is living in a martial law regime, which places certain obligations of a taza obligation for every citizen of Ukraine, determined by the legislative norms introduced long before the war with Russia. Every conscious citizen is a detail of the aggressor to repel the aggressor, our internal consolidation in cytgic times is an extremely important factor for victory over the aggressor. However, despite the fact that our society has already gone to "war" for more About the basic responsibilities of each Ukrainian in the current environment. In particular, it is even about such elementary things as the issue of compliance with military accounting rules in the Tax Code and the conscripts, conscripts and reservists.

The Armyinform appealed to the Head of the Public Relations Service of the Armed Forces of Ukraine Lieutenant Colonel Volodymyr Fity to remind the general public about the basic responsibilities of citizens of daily accounting, as well as to answer the most pressing questions, so "bureaucratic". of conscripts and reservists.

*!

  • The first document to mention is Constitution of Ukraine, where Article 17 states: "Protecting sovereignty and territorial integrity of Ukraine, ensuring its economic and information security are the most important functions of the state, the cause of the whole Ukrainian people."

"Three Whales" on which state policy on defense of the country, including reporting, which relates to military accounting, is the laws of Ukraine "Promobilization preparation of tamobilization"," About Defense of Ukraine"," About military duty and military service»,

In addition, on December 30, 2022, the Cabinet of Ministers of Ukraine approved resolutionNo. 1487 “On Approval of the Procedure of Organization and Military Accounting of Prisoners, Servicemen and Reservists”, which defines the mechanism of “organization and maintenance of“ military accounting(Further - public authorities), local authorities, military administration bodies(governing bodies), military units(units)Armed Forces and other military formations and law enforcement agencies of special purposes, territorial centers of staffing, enterprises, institutions and organizations, institutions of education, health care institutions regardless of subordination and formality.

So, today the mentioned documents are the alpha and omega of all processes, quality of military accounting of Ukrainian citizens.

*!

  • All conscripts, conscripts and reservists must independently update personal data in the CCC and JV, it is extremely important for the maintenance of military accounting, and therefore for the defense capability of our country.

Pursuant to paragraph 23 of the Cabinet of Ministers of Ukraine above mentioned above, conscripts, conscripts, and reservists must update the data in the event of changes:

names, name, patronymic;

dates and places of birth;

gender;

place of residence and stay;

information about parents, adoptive parents, guardians, guardians and other representatives(Full Name(in the presence), date of birth;

information about the marital status of the person and his family members(Full Name(in the presence), as well as children;

The details of the passport of the citizen of Ukraine and the passport of the citizen of Ukraine for exit abroad(series, number, date of issuing, issuing body, validity);

Citizenship information;

information on documents confirming the death of a person or recognition of a person or missing;

information on recognition of a person incapacitated or renewal of capacity;

employment information(Enterprise code, place of work, position);

registration number of the taxpayer's account card;

digitized image of the face of the person;information on education and specialty;

information about the health that is collected to determine the suitability for military service;

information on criminal prosecution;

information on the court of criminal case, the sentence that had entered the law;

Availability information(absence)criminal record;

a unique record number in a single state demographic register(in the presence);

Information on the right to defer from conscription for military service during mobilization.

I note that it is necessary to report or transmit new data of the TCC and JV during the days after the change of information.

** - What are the sanctions provided for by the current legislation for violation of the rules of military accounting?

  • First of all, I note that the military registration of all conscripts, servicemen and reservists is maintained at their place of residence.

Currently, according to the requirements of the Cabinet of Ministers of Ukraine dated 30.12.2022 No. 1487, every employer must provide personal military accounting of each male worker(except for citizens excluded from a military unit).

Для цього при прийнятті на роботу роботодавець отримує від працівникавідповідний військово-обліковий документ. Завдання роботодавця — перевіритинаявність відмітки про взяття на військовий облік у ТЦК та СП, органах СБУ абопідрозділах Служби зовнішньої розвідки.

Увесь перелік завдань, функцій та діянь, які зобов’язані здійснюватипідприємства, установи та організації всіх форм власності в межахмобілізаційної підготовки та мобілізації, встановлюють вказані вищенормативно-правові акти.

Відповідальність за порушення правил ведення військового обліку визначаєКодекс України про адміністративні правопорушення(KUPAP), in particular, of 210-1 "Violation of Defense Legislation, Mobilization Training Tamobilization" defines the amount of the fine in non-taxable minimum income citizens. Yes it is:

· For individuals(responsible persons for military accounting)- backward to two hundred non -taxable minimum incomes of citizens(1700–3400 UAH);

· For officials(executives)- from two hundred to three hundred non -taxable minimums of income of citizens(3400-5100 UAH).

For neglect of the requirements for military accounting, the fine may impose a duty of the enterprise, and for violation of the order of maintaining military accounting - both the head of the enterprise, and to the person responsible for keeping the military accounting in accordance with the order.

It should be noted that cases of violation of the legislation on mobilization preparation and mobilization and, accordingly, cases of violation of rules of military accounting(as a component of such a violation)Consider the Tax Code and the SP. This order is regulated by Article 235(https://zakon.rada.gov.ua/laws/show/80732-10#Text)Code of Ukraine on Administrative Offenses(KUPAP). Згідно з нею«Територіальні центри комплектування та соціальної підтримки розглядаютьсправи … про порушення призовниками, військовозобов’язаними, резервістамиправил військового обліку, про порушення законодавства про оборону,мобілізаційну підготовку та мобілізацію…»

Також хочу звернути увагу на такий важливий момент: керівники ТЦК та СП маютьправо розглядати справи про адміністративні правопорушення щодо порушенняправил військового обліку і накладати адміністративні стягнення за них.

News Source: https://armyinform.com.ua/2023/06/29/vijskovyj-oblik-shho-treba-znaty-shhob-ne-zlovyty-shtraf/

Seeed Russian auto parts for over UAH 26 million will be sent for the needs of the Armed Forces

Author: ['АРМІЯINFORM']

Time: 2023-06-29T38:00:00-04:00

Description: On the core of the birch 2023 Rokui Vygovy Vantazhovka Iz by Rosiykoy goods of the nursery ... War with Ukraine 2022, War with Ukraine Latest news today, News War with Ukraine 2022 Last today, will there be a war between Ukraine and Russia and when, the war with Ukraine in It will be or not, whether there will be a war with Ukraine in the near future, the war with Ukraine, Ukrainian news today, Ukrainian news in Ukrainian media in Russian will be in Russian

Images: ['dbr-rosijski-avtozapchastini-na-ponad-26-mln-griven-napravlyat-na-potrebi-zsu-2.jpeg']

Tags: ['ДБР', 'ЗАПЧАСТИНИ ДЛЯ ЗСУ']

Category: News

At the beginning of March 2023, two trucks with a Russian commodity cost 26 million 102 thousand hryvnias were found. It is established that spare parts for cars were purchased by a Russian firm in Romania before large -scale interruption. The details were to be delivered by the Russian carrier to Rfftransite through Ukraine.

About it reportsState Bureau of Investigations.

In total, more than 800 boxes and boxes of different sizes of goods were heading to the Russian Federation. Among the spare parts were sensors and fastenings, candle -burning of the engine, pedal, sleeve, mirrors, generators, video cameras and more.

However, after February 24, 2022, their transportation was suspended at one customs posts of Kamianets-Podilskyi district.

After hard work, the installation of spare parts and the completion of other legal procedures, the goods were removed and transferred to the Khmelnytsky Regional Type Administration. In the future, it will be directed to the needs of armed forces.

Zelensky received a Chatham House award

Authors: Ukrinform (Person)

Publisher: Укринформ (Organization)

Published Time: 2023-06-29T3:22:00+03:00

Modified Time: 2023-06-29T22:22:00+03:00

Images: ['630_360_16639...']

Tags: ['Нагорода', 'Зеленський', 'Chatham House']

Type: Article

President of Ukraine Volodymyr Zelensky received a distinction of the British non -governmental organization of the Royal Institute of International Relations Catham House.

According to the President of Ukraine in his appealTo Chatham House members, this conflict, indicates that the world believes in Ukraine, Ukrinform reports

"Ukrainian warriors, all our beautiful people really deserve the highest evidence. Millions of our people are fighting and working for our freedom, common freedom - not only Ukrainian but all free nations. I am sure, we will be a liberty. Another proof that the world believes in Ukraine, believes in Ukrainians, believes in our victory, "Zelensky said.

Viso: op

The President expressed confidence that the contribution of Ukrainians to global freedom will be determined by the legal recognition of our state by NATO ally.

"Security institutions, including Euro -Atlantic institutions, have a real protection of peace. And now it is real only with Ukraine - free, strong, unusually, in NATO," Zelensky said.

Last week, about 1,200 military personnel of the National Guard, 75-patrol cars and 45 cynologists with service dogs were joined in 34 settlements in 34 settlements of the state.

About this and other measures of the legal regime of martial law, which provides the National Guard of Ukraine, in a comment to the correspondent ArmyInform told the deputy director of the Department of Planning of the use of the main management Colonel Mykola Urshalovich.

Poland began to strengthen the eastern border due to the appearance in Belarus "Wagner"

Author: ['АРМІЯINFORM']

Time: 2023-06-29T42:00:00-04:00

Description: Viceper'yr-Minіster Polish-Kachavsky Kachinskiy Pizly Special Zavodanna Komitet for ... War with Ukraine 2022, War with Ukraine Latest News Today, News War with Ukraine 2022 Last for today, will there be a war between Ukraine and Russia and when, War with Ukraine In 2022 it will be or not, will there be a war with Ukraine in the near future, they say, the war with Ukraine, Ukraine’s news today, Ukrainian news in Ukrainian media in Russian

Images: ['kachynskyj.jpg']

Tags: ['КОРДОН ПОЛЬЩІ', 'МАРІУШ БЛАЩАК', 'ПВК "ВАГНЕР"', 'ЯРОСЛАВ КАЧИНСЬКИЙ']

Category: News

After a special meeting of the Council of Ministers of Ministers for National Security and Defense of Poland, Viceremier-Minister of Poland, Jaroslav Kaczynski, the head of the Polish defense department, Mariusz Blasche, approved the border in the east of the country due to the emergence of the so-called Wagner group.

About it reportsThe press service of the Ministry of National Defense of Poland.

It is an increase in the number of a military contingent, which constantly reassures on the border, as well as the expansion of different types of fortifications that protect the border.

“We have at least a potentially new situation in Belarus, the presence of Wagner Tamgroup. Based on the data we currently have, we can think that it will be about 8,000 mercenaries. It is a dangerous element for Ukraine, and Ukrainians are aware of it, it is potentially dangerous for Lithuania, and after all, it can be dangerous for us. It can mean a new stage of hybrid war, the stage is much more complicated than the one we still had to do. Therefore, we have made a decision to strengthen our defense on the Eastern border, both in part of some short -term projects and those that will be constantly constant, ” - saidYaroslav Kaczynski.

He also stressed that Poland is ready to reflect the attacks of even such dangerous, well -trained and decisive military group, which at the same time has signs of particularly deep demoralization.

“We strengthen the border of Poland, strengthen security. The border guard is responsible for the border's security, but Polish army is also involved. There will now be greater intensity of these joint measures, ”the Polish National Defense Minister Mariusz Blaschak said, and added that the border in the district Kalinigrad is also strongly protected.

News Source: https://armyinform.com.ua/2023/06/29/polshha-pochala-ukriplyuvaty-shidnyj-kordon-cherez-poyavu-v-bilorusi-vagnerivcziv/

  • 95 829 Military Crimes, * 17 084 Crimes against Ukraine's National Security.

  • 494 - Children were killed, * 1033 - the children were injured in varying degrees of severity.

The department emphasizes that these figures are not final, since work continues in their installation in places of active fighting, in temporarily occupied tangible territories.

For public prosecution of prosecutors of the Specialized Prosecutor's Office of the Diviskovskaya and Defense sphere of the Southern Region, he was found guilty of the state treason(Part 2 of Art. 111 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine).

Як свідчать матеріали слідства, екскерівник Миколаївської окружної прокуратуриспівпрацював із представниками силових структур рф. Для цього використовувавпосередника, щоб «відвести сліди від себе».

За наявними даними, він передавав інформацію про:

  • оперативну обстановку у Миколаєві та області; * загиблих військових і цивільних осіб, полонених, місця їх утримання; * результати обстрілів Миколаєва; * добові паролі на блокпости на території області тощо.

Щоб задокументувати зрадника, СБУ провела спецоперацію, в тому числі зімітації злочину. Через підставну особу українська спецслужба передалафігуранту імітовані списки загиблих військовослужбовців ЗСУ. Через декількаднів ці списки уже було зафіксовано у представника РФ, за яким також стежилаСБУ.

У результаті обшуків у фігуранта вилучено мобільний телефон, комп’ютернутехніку та флеш-носії, які містять докази його протиправної діяльності.

Government officials informed the International Working Group on the Ecological Crimes of the Russian Federation in Ukraine

Authors: Ukrinform (Person)

Publisher: Укринформ (Organization)

Published Time: 2023-06-29T4:36:00+03:00

Modified Time: 2023-06-29T22:36:00+03:00

Description: The office of the President of Ukraine has a briefing for members of the International Working Group on Russia's Environmental Crimes, dedicated to the situation in Ukraine. Ukrainian officials informed the International Working Group about the consequences of the war. - Ukrinform.

Images: ['630_360_16880...']

Tags: ['Екологія', 'Україна', 'Агресія РФ', 'Офіс Президента', 'Війна з Росією', 'Екоцид']

Type: Article

The Office of the President of Ukraine had a briefing for members of the International Working Group of Ecological Crimes of Russia, dedicated to the situation in Ukraine. Ukrainian government officials informed the international working group about the consequences of the war.

About it reportedOn the office of the office, reports Ukrinform.

“Ukraine is now the most replaced country in the world. First of all, we need to dismantle the state's capabilities to mine. Three thousand sappers, it is necessary to increase their number, ”Yulia Sviridenko said during a meeting of the Ministry of Ministers of Ukraine.

According to her, more than 100 thousand square meters have been replaced in our country. Km of the territory, in particular agricultural land, which adversely affects the agricultural sector, as a consequence, worsens the food situation in the world.

It noted the importance of developing a territorial demining strategy.

Read also: USA prepared criminal cases for Russians for military room against Americans

According to the Deputy Head of the Presidential Office Rostislav Shurma, the Kakhovskaya Hydroe President of Kakhovskaya Hydroe President caused significant losses to the agricultural economy of Ukraine, energy, housing stock, objects of transport infrastructure and the environment in general.

According to him, the calculation of direct losses from this disaster continues, now it is about $ 2 billion. USA.

“It is a matter of significant economic and environmental damage. Flora, fauna, agriculture, forestry, national landscape parks. It is value that is important to the world, for nature, ”added the deputy head of the OP.

Read also: environmental consequences of war: Zelensky met with members of the International Warm Group

Shurma also noted that humanitarian support is needed by people who live in the territories affected by a catastrophe at the Kakhovsky Hydroelectric Power Plant.The Minister of Environmental Protection and Natural Resources Ruslan Strezlan noted that 30% of Europe's biodiversity is concentrated in Ukraine. According to him, the Ministry of Environmental Protection, in the framework of work on bringing the Russian Federation of reference, prepared a methodology for assessing the damage caused to the natural resources of Ukraine by Russian aggression. More than 240 cases were registered.

Read also: lack of a powerful response of Europe to the undermining of hydroelectric power plants can be armed for Russia about Zelensky

He spoke about the work of the web resource and the mobile application "Eco -Zagrosis", which allows to determine the degree of damage to the temporarily occupied territories with the help of digital technologies.

Energy Minister Herman Galushchenko noted that the challenges of the war found weak in the Ukrainian energy system and showed the need to centralize energy distribution. The most fastest path to this minister called the transition to the use of renewable energy sources.

"The Russians destroyed more than ten mines, and this accelerated the transition to" green "energy," he stated.

Read also: Ukraine's restoration: the Ministry of Finance has named priority areas for financing

Galushchenko recalled that Ukraine has approved a new energy strategy, the purpose of refusing to use coal by 2035. Our state sees a potential for the use of solar and wind power. In particular, according to its words, after the victory in the war and the return of all territories, Ukraine has a memorial potential for the development of wind energy on the Black Seas coast.

Prosecutor General Andriy Kostin spoke about the work that the prosecutor's office is held accountable for environmental crimes.

Read also: flooded land and burned forests. As the Russians fight the environment in Ukraine Therefore, the prosecutor's office attracts all available resources to determine the cost of damages of a connection between the act of aggression and environmental crime.

The Prosecutor General has invited members of the International Working Group to join the collection and determine the degree of damage as a result of the environmental crimes of Russia of Ukrainian.

Advisers Dariy Zarivna and Alexander Bevz also took part in the meeting on the Ukrainian side.

From the guests - Vice president of the European Parliament, Gaidi Hautala, the former environmental commissioner and experts of foreign affairs of Sweden Margotvalstre, President of Ireland in 1990-1997 Mary Robinson, Eco -Activist Tunerg, Jenior High School.(The EuropeanInstitute of Peace), CMI Program Manager(The Crisis Management Initiative)In Eurasia, Roksan Kristesska.

As reported by Ukrinform, on June 29, the President of Ukraine met with the People's Working Group members on the environmental consequences of the Russian war.

News Source: https://www.ukrinform.ua/rubric-polytics/3729541-uradovci-poinformuvali-miznarodnu-robocu-grupu-sodo-ekologicnih-zlociniv-rf-v-ukraini.html

Dmytro Kuleba warned the OSCE of the risks of committing Russia

Author: ['АРМІЯINFORM']

Time: 2023-06-29T50:00:00-04:00

Description: Pension Ta Rizik, outdoor attacks on the Zaporizkiykiy Elektrostani Territory ... War with Ukraine 2022, War with Ukraine Latest News today, News War with Ukraine 2022 Last for today, will there be a war between Ukraine and Russia and when, the war with Ukraine in 2022 Whether there will be a year or not, will there be a war with Ukraine in the near future, they say, the war with Ukraine, Ukraine’s news today, Ukrainian news in Ukrainian media in Russian

Images: ['dmytro-kuleba.jpg']

Tags: ['ГЛАВА МЗС УКРАЇНИ', 'ДМИТРО КУЛЕБА', 'ЗАПОРІЗЬКА АЕС', 'ОБСЄ', 'ЯДЕРНА БЕЗПЕКА']

Category: News

Dmytro Kuleba. Photo: Carolyn Kaster / AFP

The occupation and risk of committing a terrorist attack in the Zaporozhye nuclear power plant threatens the entire OSCE space.

About it statedForeign Minister of Ukraine Dmitry Kuleba, speaking online at the OSCE Presidential Conference on Security Reviews.

“Today, Russia is threatening Ukraine and the entire OSCE space of the radiation -mining at the Zaporizhzhya Nuclear Power Plant. Whatever the Russian propaganda, Russia, and only Russia has today has motivation and means for it to commit an incident to the ZPP, ”he said.

Dmytro Kuleba emphasized that by paying the station and turning it into a militarybaz, Russia uses ZPEs as a nuclear blackmail tool.

"I do not know what else to happen for the OSCE States Parties to recognize the obvious: Russia is not a place at this table," he emphasized.

The Minister recalled that three weeks ago, Russia blew up the Kakhovsky Hydroelectric Prospection Dam, causing the largest technological disaster in Europe over the decades of Tazlochin ecocid.

The Minister expressed gratitude to the chairman of Northern Macedonia for the firm position of protecting the principles of the OSCE in the conditions of full -scale aggression of Russia anti -Ukraine.

“Russia cannot tolerate the impunity of Russia, the illegal maintenance of OBSCE employees, theft of more than 70 cars of the organization. There can be no discussion from Ukraine whose president is wanted by the ISS for the military crime of abduction of Ukrainian children. There can be no hope for a civilized dialogue with a country that causes intense rockets and drones on densely populated residential areas, resorts to mass atrocities, torture, rapes and intimidation of the population. There can be no search for an understanding with an aggressor that is declining to destroy Ukrainian statehood and national identity, ”Dmitry Kuleb said.

He also stressed that Ukraine has no choice, except for how to fight for its gravity and restore territorial integrity.

The Ministry of Foreign Affairs of Ukraine called on the OSCE to actively participate in the embodiment of the formula of peace.

“We live in the time of challenges when discussions without pragmatic decisions are no longer working. If we want to preserve the OSCE and our collective devotion to the principles of the Helsinki Final Act, we need to find a way to suspend Russia in the OSCE, ”the minister summed up.
