Tags: ['НАВЧАННЯ У БРИТАНІЇ', 'НАВЧАННЯ УКРАЇНСЬКИХ МЕДИКІВ', 'ТАКТИЧНА МЕДИЦИНА']

Category: News

About it reportedGeneral Staff of the Ukrainian.

“This world -class medical training is another fantastic example of how the armed forces of Great Britain and our international partners are successfully operating to support Ukraine's struggle against the illegal tape -provoked invasion of Russia. Our support of Ukraine will continue as much as it will be required - from providing combat training to free transfer of equipment and ammunition, which Ukraine is urgent Instructors from Britain, the Netherlands of Taisland for 49 servicemen and military personnel of armed force.

The military personnel of the Armed Forces of Ukraine study vital skills of life on the battlefield on the first of their kind of combat training, which is conducted by the British army and its international partners.

!(Images/AРМІЯINFORM/2023-06-29T51-00-00-04-00/356647122_613474257632323_7896844699036819464_n-150x150.jpg)

During the five -week course, which began on May 29, Ukrainian physicians were critically important, such as: providing medical care, monitoring high blood loss and providing emergency care with the high -speed stage.

The organizers note that the program took into account the evidence of the battle and requests of the Ukrainian military. During the training of the students, they also studied how best to optimize their own health to be ready for combat conditions, and how close to real combat scenarios to test the knowledge in practice to gain confidence in the effective use of skills in the forefront. They include:

  • mass examination of the wounded with various injuries;

  • providing assistance to victims with serious injuries caused by shooting with small arms;

  • ways of safe evacuation of victims of civil and military transport;

  • evacuation of the wounded under fire.

!(Images/AРМІЯINFORM/2023-06-29T51-00-00-04-00/356636163_613474277632321_5277639290003837670_n-150x150.jpg)

In the next few days of study, Ukrainian military servicemen will learn to provide first aid to other military armed forces of Ukraine after returning to the forefront.

The current course is the first of the three programs of combat medical training, and about 50 Ukrainian servicemen are planned to be prepared during the Quarantee.

Category: News

In the Kherson region, as of June 29, the Udnipri water level entered the natural direction near the Kherson post.

The fluctuations of the level correspond to the natural fluctuations of this time of year, reportat the headquarters of elimination of consequences by Russian terrorists of the Kakhovka hydroelectric power station.

One settlement is currently flooded in the area(one house)on the right bank of the Dnieper and 17 settlements on a temporarily occupying territory.

Rescuers continue to pump water.

“66.5 thousand tons of water from 22 cellars have been pumped out during the last day. Since the beginning of work, more than 439 thousand tons of water have been pumped out of 945 houses and cellars, ”the headquarters are assigned.

At the same time, 47 tons of water were brought to the region, of which 36 tons - drinking and 11 tons - technical water.

Images: ['347238423_613734824272933_1528983450146888220_n.jpg']

Tags: []

Category: News

Illustrative Photo 🔥 Situation on Russian invasion

About it reportsThe General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine.

“The enemy continues to focus the main efforts in the Liman, Bakhmut Tamarin directions - 40 combat clashes took place during the day.

In Volyn and Polissya directions Operational situation without significant changes.

In the Siversky and Slobozhansky directions the enemy struck an aircraft hatch in the area of the Russian Lozova Kharkiv region. He made mortars of Tartileer shelling of more than 25 settlements. Among them the Leonivka Chernihiv region; Novovasilovka, Znob-Novgorod, Nova Guta, Vovkasum region, as well as veterinary, Kozacha Lopan, small aisles, Gatyshche, Pletenivka, Bochkovo, Unterty, Round and Budarka in Kharkiv.

In the Lyman direction the enemy performed unsuccessful offensive actions by Wrydolivka. Drew air strikes in the areas of Bigorivka of Luhansk region of Zanivka and seizure of Donetsk region. More than 10 settlements, including Nevskoye, Bigorivka in Luhansk and Torke, Verkamyanskoye and Rozdolivka of Donetsk region, have been fired.

In the Bakhmut direction the enemy conducted unsuccessful offensive actions in the area of the Higher-Vasylivka, Bogdanivka and White Mountains. He struck Bellyn York Donetsk region. 15 settlements, including Vasyukivka, Orikhovo-Vasylivka, Markove, Chrome, Yar, Ivanivske, Ivanovskaya, Ozarivka and Southern, were injured from enemy artillery shellings.

In the Avdeevsky direction the enemy performed unsuccessful offensive actions in the Avdiivka and Severny. At the same time, he fired at the Avdiyivka district, fired at the artillery with more than 10 settlements, in particular, Berdichi, Avdiivka, Vodane, Karlovka and Pervomaisk. In the mineral direction the enemy performed unsuccessful offensive actions of the novomikhailivka. He struck air strikes near the Prechistivka and Makarivkaidonetsk region. He fired more than 20 settlements, including Kokostyantynivka, Paraskovka, Novomikhailivka, Prychistivka, Golden Niva, Vilnapole, Storozhevo, Blessed, Makarivka and Rivnopil of Donetsk region.

In Zaporizhzhya and Kherson directions the enemy concentrates the main assets on preventing the promotion of our troops. The enemy caused the Air Force to the Leda and Little Tokmachka of Zaporizhzhya region. About 30 settlements are carried out. Among them are Levadne, Olgiv, Gulyaypole, Railway, Magic of Zaporizhzhya region; Mikhailivka, Gavrilovka, Obradokamyanka, Mykolaivka, Olgivka, Burguka, Lviv, Ivanivka, Naddnipryansk, Antonovka, Kherson, Komyshans, Dnipro, Amber, Berehove, Tomina Balka, Sofiyivka Kherson region and Ochakov.

The armed rebellion will have a direct impact on the level of morality of the occupying troops - Alexander Musienko

Author: ['АРМІЯINFORM']

Time: 2023-06-29T58:00:00-04:00

Description: The zbroinoi stabbed the Wagner PVK at the Tli Assumption for the forces of the defense at the Substarpsy Lights Ta ... the war with Ukraine 2022, the war with Ukraine is the latest news today, the News War with Ukraine 2022 is the last today, will there be a war between Ukraine and Russia and when, war, war With Ukraine in 2022 it will be or not, will there be a war with Ukraine in the near future, they say, the war with Ukraine, Ukrainian news today, Ukrainian news in Ukrainian media in Russian

Images: ['photo_5253843342565951622_y-e1688038285644.jpg']

Tags: []

Category: News

The armed rebellion of Wagner PEC against the background of the success of defense forces in the important directions of the impunity of mercenaries for the murder of Russian servicemen will have a direct impact on the level of morality of the occupation troops.

This opinion during the roundtable "The Rebellion of Prigogine and its Impact of the Vallitic situation in Russia and the course of the Russo-Ukrainian War" in MilitaryMedia Center expressedAlexander Musienko, chairman of the NGO "Center for Military Legal Research".

He recalled that the rebellion unfolded on the background of reports of the successes of the defense forces of the southern and eastern directions.

In addition, in the course of their march on Moscow, "Wagnerivka" destroyed several air vessels of regular troops and killed 15 people and will not bear any responsibility.

“This condition will cause friction among the Russian military. Some will ask: why do Wagnerians can do so, and here they are tilted and make them go to the thighs in the assault? And secondly, there will be a part that will think: can we repeat something too? .. And that means that the moral state of the Russian military will fall, ”the expert said.

Reugly table is organized with the assistance of the World Congress of Ukrainians.

Zelensky: Countering Ecocide is one of the points of the Ukrainian peace formula

Authors: Ukrinform (Person)

Publisher: Укринформ (Organization)

Published Time: 2023-06-29T5:42:00+03:00

Modified Time: 2023-06-29T22:42:00+03:00

Description: Ecocide counteraction is one of the points of the Ukrainian peace formula, and we have to implement each of its points, all aspects of peace. - Ukrinform.

Images: ['630_360_16880...']

Tags: ['Звернення', 'Агресія РФ', 'Зеленський', 'Війна з Росією', 'Екоцид']

Type: Article

Anti -coccid is one of the points of the Ukrainian peace formula, and we have to implement its point, all aspects of peace.

About it in your appealAt the end of the 491st of the war, President of Ukraine Volodymyr Zelensky said.

_ I wish health, dear Ukrainians!_

I finish the day in the Verkhovna Rada - meeting with our speaker Ruslanstefanchuk. We work.

And now the report for this day, a busy day. Very long.

The meeting of the European Council is traditionally for Ukraine to be among the members of the Evrosouz. The agenda is obvious - our defense in this war, our path, the support from our partners, our security support for them for our Europe. Ukraine influences the power of Europe. This is a fact. And this year, on the basis of this and other similar facts, unity in Europe, including the beginning of negotiations on Ukraine's membership in the European Union.

Meeting with Mike Penso, 48th vice-resident, senator ... American support for Ukraine is vital for Ukraine-from all Americans, every American family, all US public forces, all political leaders, congress-both parties, of course, from US President Biden. Thank you for your feast!

He discussed our defense with Mr. Penso, our interaction - from the very beginning, pre -days between the Ukrainian and American peoples. They talked about the weapons, the projection of our soldiers, about our common values.

Meeting with members of the International Working Group on the Environmental Consequences of the War - Greta Tumbberg, Margot Walstrom and others. They talked primarily about Russian thermal and ecocide at the Kakhovskaya hydroelectric power station and, in general, about the work of our group, which will be designed by those issues that are directly related to the destructive influence of Russian aggression on nature. Ecocide counteraction is one of the points of the Ukrainian peace formula, and we have to implement each of its points, all aspect.

Conversation with Guatemala President. The formula of peace, our collaboration with Latin asimate, help us in demining, it is very important - in the creation of a tribunal of Russian aggression.

Meeting with representatives of our business is very important, very meaningful. I am greeted. They discussed how to stimulate economic activity now, in the face of our conditions. They talked about how to give more business protection, more cooperation and business. Now the first priority is defense, and it is obvious. But icing is also important.And, of course, our warriors, our protection. Today, in the appeal to the community, this is one of the leading world, British intellectual centers - I told that three new new decrees were prepared, very important, and 419 soldiers were awarding our soldiers. In total, more than 49,000 Ukrainian Ukrainians have already been awarded during the full -scale state awards!

I thank everyone and everyone who protects our country!Thank you to everyone who now, who has given us the best news today - about the advancement of Ukrainian positions. Glory to you, our characters!

Thank you all in the world who really helps us!

Glory to Ukraine!

Payment of servicemen of monthly additional remuneration during martial law is improved and enshrined in the legislative - Alexei Reznikov

Author: ['АРМІЯINFORM']

Time: 2023-06-29T60:00:00-04:00

Description: Verkhovna Rada of Ukraine circulated the law of Ukraine “About the introduction of Zmin to the Glasses of Ukraine ... War with Ukraine 2022, the war with Ukraine Latest news today, News War with Ukraine 2022 Last for today, will there be a war between Ukraine and Russia and when, war with In 2022, Ukraine will be or not, will there be a war with Ukraine in the near future, they say, the war with Ukraine, Ukraine’s news today, Ukrainian news in Ukrainian media in Russian

Images: ['200b141caa07844c9eb8cfc4a975e0c6ad63f2cc.jpg']

Tags: ['ВИПЛАТИ', 'ОЛЕКСІЙ РЕЗНІКОВ', 'ОФІЦІЙНО']

Category: News

The Verkhovna Rada of Ukraine approved the Law of Ukraine "On Amendments to Certain Laws of Ukraine on Certain Issues related to the passing of the military service during the martial law."

About it reportsMinistry of Defence Ukraine.

  • Now payment of monthly additional remuneration during the state of military status is enshrined in legislative, - said the Minister of Defense Alexei Reznikov.

According to him, this decision of the Parliament was made on the results of the work of the work group with the participation of specialists of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine and the general staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine.

The document, in particular, has improved payment of servicemen of monthly supply during martial law:

Servicemen involved in hostilities or measures necessary to ensure the defense of Ukraine - from 30 000 to 100 000 hryvnias, for term - 6 000 hryvnias, cadets - * 2 350 hryvnias , training centers instructors - from 15 000 to 30 000 UAH. *

The said Law guarantees the payment of additional remuneration in the amount of 20100 UAH to wounded servicemen who have not been able to perform military service in the relevant positions for health reasons.

The law regulates the issue of providing vacations to servicemen in the course of action(In particular, to the term and cadets)But the financial personnel for treatment or dismissal are significantly simplified.

The Minister of Defense of Ukraine reminded that since the beginning of the year the size of the thunderbolt of servicemen has increased, in particular the basic monetary supply has increased by 50%. Previously, the soldier received at least 13,000 UAH, since February 2023 he has from 20 100 UAH.

News Source: https://armyinform.com.ua/2023/06/29/vyplatu-vijskovosluzhbovczyam-shhomisyachnoyi-dodatkovoyi-vynagorody-pid-chas-diyi-voyennogo-stanu-udoskonaleno-ta-zakripleno-zakonodavcho-oleksij-reznikov/

Category: News

On June 28, 2023, more than UAH 1.1 million from the enterprise was collected to the State Budget of Ukraine in favor of the state budget of Ukraine in favor of the state budget of Ukraine, which violated the term of work within the term specified in the contract.

About it reportsThe press service of the Specialized Prosecutor's Office in the field of defense of the Central Region.

In the summer of 2021, a contract was drawn up between the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine and the state -owned enterprise for the purchase of military service for state funds for the state expense of services for repair and technical service of military vehicles. Contrary to the intended contract, the enterprise violated the deadline for the work within the term determined by the time.

The specialized prosecutor's office in the field of defense of the Central Region went to court in the interests of the state in the person of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine.

According to the results of the trial, the Commercial Court of Vinnytsia region, whose hangs and the panel of judges of the North-Western Appeal Court of Appeal, satisfied the claims of the Deputy Head of the Prosecutor's Office of the Region on the recovery of penalties from the enterprise.

Last week, the National Guards stormed the leading positions of the enemy, destroying his personnel and equipment

Author: ['Володимир Поліщук']

Time: 2023-06-29T65:00:00-04:00

Description: The forces of nonsense and the defense have to cross the strategic іniziastati, the war with Ukraine 2022, the war with Ukraine Latest news today, the news war with Ukraine 2022 Last today, will there be a war between Ukraine and Russia and when, the war with Ukraine in 2022 Will it be or not, will there be a war with Ukraine in the near future, they say, the war with Ukraine, Ukraine’s news today, Ukrainian news in Ukrainian media in Russian

Images: ['photo_2023-06-29_10-04-24.jpg']

Tags: ['ВТОРГНЕННЯ РФ', 'МИКОЛА УРШАЛОВИЧ', 'НАЦГВАРДІЯ', 'НГУ']

Category: News

Photo of NSU press service

Security and defense forces managed to intercept the strategic initiative and to take a way to Bakhmut, Melitopol and Berdyansk. However, losing territories there, the troops of the Russian Federation do not leave to try to control the Serebryansk forestry in the Luhansk region, through some way to reach the direction of Slavyansk - Kramatorsk.

During the week, using seven times aircraft and more than 500 times tanks, a barrel and jet artillery, an enemy who tried to displace the divisional guard from the Serebryansky Forestry, received a decent repel. The losses of the National Guards were not allowed.

This was reported in a comment by the correspondent of the ArmyinformForm. Colonel Mykola Urshalovich announced the deputy director of planning of the use of the Main Directorate of the National Guard.

-During the performance of combat missions in the territory of Serebryansky forestry of the Vlugan region as a result of the skillful interaction of units of the 5th and 31st brigades, as well as the 50th regiment: UAV calculations and artillery units were conducted timely fire damage to the enemy, which planned the assault dies of the region Which, for its part, led to the dispensing of significant losses of personnel and technique of the enemy and slowing down the offensive actions, - said the representative of the State Technical University of NSU.

He also noted that the National Guard warriors have success in other preferences. In particular, at the Kupyansky fight of a separate detachment of a special appointment with two drones-Kamikadze during the movement they struck the enemy BTR-82 with an inspiration. Also, NSU servicemen on small arms shot down the lancet unmanned aircraft.

  • In the Melitopol and Berdyansk directions, the National Guards, together with other syllable defense forces, continue the offensive operation. In addition, the assault groups of the 15th operational brigade with the support of tank artillery carried out assault actions. They were successful, in some plots, they were raised to a depth of up to 350 meters and mastered the advanced positions of the enemy, up to 450 meters long. They became entrenched on the busy border and are prepared to reflect the enemy's counterattack, - said Colonel Urshalovich. —This week, the Guards continued to cause losses to the occupiers in live and equipment. Thus, the units of operational purpose confirmed the disposal of 228 invaders, of which more than 100 are forever.Our special forces work quite effectively, who destroyed 20 invaders, two tanks, three combat armored vehicles and three cars in the Liman Tadonnets.

-Qualitatively worked by NSU air intelligence groups, which during the week found: three tanks, three SAUs, eight combat armored vehicles, two complex-electronic struggle "Borisoglebsk-2" and six units of automobile equipment,-Mykola Urshalovich added. - The artillerymen of the National Guard during the time of defense units, which defended themselves on the Lymansky taveli offensive actions in the Melitopol directions, were neutralized by about 70 persons, of which 17 - irreversibly.

News Source: https://armyinform.com.ua/2023/06/29/mynulogo-tyzhnya-naczgvardijczi-shturmuvaly-peredovi-pozycziyi-voroga-znyshhuvaly-jogo-osobovyj-sklad-ta-tehniku/

Veterans can get up to 3 million UAH for their own business

Author: ['АРМІЯINFORM']

Time: 2023-06-29T66:00:00-04:00

Description: Ukrainian veteran fund of the Fіnancuvannya Business Veterani, member of the Simei ... War with Ukraine 2022, War with Ukraine Latest News today, News War with Ukraine 2022 Last today, will there be a war between Ukraine and Russia and when, the war with Ukraine in 2022 Will it be or not, will there be a war with Ukraine in the near future, they say, the war with Ukraine, Ukraine’s news today, Ukrainian news in Ukrainian media in Russian

Images: ['356427843_265138666111135_6721295443905271879_n-e1688042017548.jpg']

Tags: ['МІНВЕТЕРАНІВ']

Category: News

The Ukrainian Veteran Fund will provide funding for veterans business, members of the families of the dead(the dead)veterans of war and members of the families of dead(the dead)Defenders and defenders of Ukraine on a competitive basis. The sum of the projects - from 500 thousand to 3 million hryvnias .

About it reportedin the veteran fund.

Last day of receipt - July 13 2023. Details and submission on that reference.

Фінансову підтримку можуть отримати:

  • ветерани, члени сімей загиблих (the dead)war veterans and members of the families of dead(the dead)defenders and defenders of Ukraine, which are registered in accordance with the requirements of the legislation as individuals-entrepreneurs; * Legal entities registered not later than two years before receiving financial support, founded by veterans, members of families of dead(the dead)war veterans and members of the families of dead(the dead)defenders and defenders of Ukraine.

The program will take place in the competitive format. Participants will protect the business prosectors in front of the Expert Council.

It should be noted that the Ukrainian Veteran Foundation for Ministry of Veterans has been holding a veteran business for over a year. For 2022, 269 veterans and members of the family defenders and defenders received financial reinforcement. The organization will support the veterans both at the start and in the development of their own business.

News Source: https://armyinform.com.ua/2023/06/29/veterany-mozhut-otrymaty-do-3-mln-grn-na-vlasnyj-biznes/

Category: News

Defense Minister Lloyd Austin met with the Federal Minister of Defense Boris Pistorius as part of the first visit of the head of the German Obrona Office to America.

This is stated in messagePentagon press service.

Both leaders discussed the unfair and deliberate invasion of Russia in Ukraine, each of the leaders noted the stability and determination of the Ukrainian people of the Armed Forces of Ukraine.

“We have discussed strong bilateral relations between the US and Germany and the opportunity for future cooperation. I thanked him for the leadership of Germany in NATO and its support to Ukraine, ”saidLloyd Austin.

The head of the Pentagon thanked Boris Pistorius for his considerable assistance and contributions to Ukraine. He also thanked the support of Germany in the strengthening of the NATO -Eastern Flank, including support for the deployment of US and NATO forces.

Category: News

Ukraine from the future NATO summit, which will take place in Vilnius July 11-12, awaits maximum security for security guarantees for the state.

NSDC Secretary Alexei Danilov [wrote] about it(https://twitter.com/OleksiyDanilov/status/1674381957977841664)Utwitter, noting that without resolving Ukraine's security issues, it is impossible to stability.

According to him, the third mistake of NATO after the collapse of the "Budapest Memorandum", a failed Bucharest Summit of NATO can be critical.

"The collapse of the" Budapest Memorandum "(1994), Bukharest Smithnato(2008)were consistent steps to encourage Russian attack by Science. The third error can be critical. It is proven by history - without solving the safe issues of Ukraine, world stability is impossible. We expect the maximum specifics in the style of "anti-Budapest" from the future Summit,-Alexei Danilov wrote.

Demand of Ukraine: per day of pyrotechnics neutralized 328 explosive objects

Author: ['АРМІЯINFORM']

Time: 2023-06-29T69:00:00-04:00

Description: The last minute of the Kirotechnici Pilled Service of Ukraine was Zvozvichah ... War with Ukraine 2022, War with Ukraine Latest News Today, News War with Ukraine 2022 The last ones for today, will there be a war between Ukraine and Russia and when, the war with Ukraine in 2022 Will it be or not, will there be a war with Ukraine in the near future, they say, the war with Ukraine, Ukraine’s news today, Ukrainian news in Ukrainian media in Russian

Images: ['626bf4da61ec9-1-1.jpeg']

Tags: ['АГРЕСІЯ РФ', 'ВТОРГНЕННЯ РФ', 'ДСНС УКРАЇНИ', 'ПІРОТЕХНІЧНІ ПІДРОЗДІЛИ', 'РОЗМІНУВАННЯ']

Category: News

During the last day, the pyrotechnic units of the State Service of Ukraine of Uncertain situations 144 times were involved in the implementation of the tasks of change.

About it reportsSESU of Ukraine.

Pyrotechnical units found, seized and neutralized 328 explosive subjects , surveyed the territory of 36 hectares.

Most often pyrotechnic units worked: in the Kharkiv region 19 840 times, in Kyiv region - 8062, Donetsk region - 6338, Mykolaiv region - 5294, Kherson region - 5900, Chernihiv - 4747, Sumy - 2231, Cherkasy region - 1127.

Reference. In total, since the beginning of the large -scale military invasion of the Russian Federation in the territory of Ukraine, the 405 758 extinguished objects and 2891 kg of explosive substance, including 30 43 aviation No bombs **. The territory of more than 90 674 gecters was surveyed.

We would like to remind you if you find suspicious objects similar to wreckage from rockets or rockets, in no case touch your finds yourself and do not allow it to be tired. And:

· Do not move objects, do not try to disassemble them, bring them into the premises, bury them in the ground, throw them in reservoirs, etc.,

· Do not take pictures or post pictures on the Internet,

· Mark the place of the find,

· Depart from the suspicious object as far as possible.

Immediately report the finding of the SES units - 101 or police - 102. Report experts and indicate the location of the suspicious name.

News Source: https://armyinform.com.ua/2023/06/29/rozminuvannya-ukrayiny-za-dobu-pirotehniky-zneshkodyly-328-vybuhonebezpechnyh-predmetiv/

Tags: ['ВІЙСЬКОВІ НАВЧАННЯ', 'ВМС БРИТАНІЇ', 'ВМС УКРАЇНИ', 'МІЖНАРОДНІ НАВЧАННЯ ВМС', 'НАВЧАННЯ ВМС', 'СІ БРИЗ 2023']

Category: News

"This is a photo of ships involved in the training complex within the SI series," - it readsin the message of the Armed Forces of the Armed Forces.

Recall how reportedThe Navy of Ukraine, June 26, in Glasgow, Scotland, which is part of the United Kingdom and Northern Ireland, has begun in the framework of the SI Breeze series.

Representatives of 18 participating countries take part in the exercises. From the Ukrainian page, the commander of the flotilla captain of the 1st rank Yuri Fedash is managed by the training.

!(Images/AРМІЯINFORM/2023-06-29T6-00-00-04-00/356873587_613384750974607_5890591829860308019_n-150x150.jpg)

The main task of the training complex within the framework of the training "SI Breeze - 2023" is the preparation for planning and conducting mine action. The main emphasis is on the preparation of the headquarters of the tactical group of mine action for planning and maintaining mine action(Operations)In accordance with the standards and procedures with the involvement of weapons and military equipment, which was held from partner countries. Equally important are the preparation of the Sandown "Cherkasy" and "Chernihiv" and Chernihiv Classrooms of the Ukrainian Navy, and Chernihiv Chernihiv, and submarine unmanageable apparatus for complications of tactical groups.

The experience that the crews of Ukrainian mine ships have already gained, and the professionalism of the participating countries will ensure high efficiency of training. The main result of training in the training "SI Breeze - 2023" will be the readiness of multinational forces to carry out operations for the release of the Black Sea from the mine danger and the restoration of safe navigation.

During the war, the President awarded more than 49,000 Ukrainians

Authors: Ukrinform (Person)

Publisher: Укринформ (Organization)

Published Time: 2023-06-29T6:50:00+03:00

Modified Time: 2023-06-29T22:50:00+03:00

Description: President of Ukraine Volodymyr Zelensky celebrated more than 49,000 Ukrainians with high state awards during the full -scale war. - Ukrinform.

Images: ['630_360_16623...']

Tags: ['Нагорода', 'Військові', 'Зеленський', 'Війна з Росією']

Type: Article

President of Ukraine Volodymyr Zelensky, during a full -scale war, celebrated more than 49 thousand Ukrainians with high state awards.

He told about it in his evening video., reports Ukrinform.

"Today, in the appeal to the Chatham House community, it is one of the leading world, British intellectual centers - I told that three new new decrees were prepared, very important, about awardsOur soldiers - 419 soldiers. In total, more than 49 thousand Ukrainians and Ukrainian women have already been awarded state awards during the full -scale war, ”the President said.

Viso: op

He thanked everyone who defends Ukraine today. "Thank you to everyone who now, who also gave us the best news today - about promoting the Ukrainian positions. Glory to you, our heroes!" - said Zelensky.

Read also: [Commander of the Air Intelligence Unit "Birds of the Magyara" awarded and honorary breastfeed(https://www.ukrinform.ua/rubric-regions/3729536-komandira-pidrozdilu-aerorozvidki-ptahi-madara-nagorodili-pocesnim-nagrudnim-znakom.html)As reported Ukrinform, The forces of defense continue to move forward with the Nastavrian direction. Here, the Russian troops lost almost three mouths killed by the killed hypoatically, and 19 units of military equipment were destroyed.

Defense forces of Ukraine from February 24, 2022 to June 29, 2023 eliminated about 227 thousand 780 Russian invadersIn particular, 680 people are last day.

Images: ['dity6.jpeg']

Tags: ['АГРЕСІЯ РФ', 'ДЕПОРТОВАНІ В РФ ДІТИ', 'МІНРЕІНТЕГРАЦІЯ']

Category: News

The Russian authorities illegally transferred 1184 children deported from the Ukrainian temporarily occupied territories. This is three times more than the occupiers were declared publicly.

About it reportsMinistry of Reintegration of the Occupied Territories of Ukraine.

At the end of 2022, the Commissioner for the Rights of the Child in Russia, Maria Lviv-Belovasasaskaskasnia, was held in the family 380 children exported from Ukraine.

However, according to the report of the Government of the Rostov region for 2022, 1184 children who arrived "without legal representatives of the Donbass and Ukraine".

This figure may include orphans who lived in children's homes in temporary and lost parents during the war.

The given data once again indicate the scale of Russian crimes. Unlawful transmission is a flashy crime against Ukrainian children.

Tags: ['ВОРОЖІ ОБСТРІЛИ', 'ЮРІЙ ІГНАТ']

Category: News

Colonel Ignatius Ignatius Colonel. Illustrative photo

Tonight was recorded a take-off of enemy TU-22M3 from the Aerodrome Schikovka(from the north)and from the southern regions(Mood). Також противник застосував ракетиС-300 у Харківській та Запорізьких областях. Про це заявив речник КомандуванняПовітряних Сил ЗС України полковник Юрій Ігнат в ефірі телевізійного марафону«Єдині новини». Він зазначив, що застосування ракет із бомбардувальників небуло. Інформація щодо наслідків застосування С-300 наразі уточняються.

Юрій Ігнат розповів про те, що повітряна тривога оголошується за відповіднимиалгоритмами згідно із тими загрозами, які існують. Відповідно цевідображається на мапі повітряних тривог. Проте інколи стаються технічні збоїу додатку.

— До прикладу, вчорашній день, коли тривога була оголошена по всій Україні,лише Сумська область не запалилась червоним кольором у додатку. Потрібнорозуміти, що не завжди може спрацювати система, є певні технічні моменти. Томунамагаємось в ТГ-каналі Повітряних Сил повідомляти про ті ризики і загрози,які виникають, по напрямках. Пишемо — загроза застосування балістичногоозброєння на тому чи іншому напрямку, або є загроза застосування керованихавіабомб чи ракет з цього напрямку одразу кільком областям. Тому требареагувати на всі сигнали, які надаються, і йти в укриття.

Окрім того, офіцер зауважив, що російські окупанти продовжують постійно шукатиякомога легших шляхів, щоб менше потрапляти в зону української протиповітряноїоборони, прокладаючи маршрути по різних напрямках, використовуючи рельєфмісцевості, русла річок тощо.

— Ворог застосовує всі методи, вони не нові, використовувались і рік тому підчас повітряних атак з різних напрямків. Так само застосовуються і дрони-камікадзе. Противник намагається обходити потенційні місця перебування нашоїППО, щоб якомога більше ракет та дронів долітало до заздалегідь встановленихцілей.

Також офіцер розповів про радіолокаційні станції, які працюють в комплексісистем ППО, зокрема й отримані від західних партнерів.

The speakers of the Baltic countries have made a statement to increase Ukraine's support and to strengthen sanctions against Belarus

Author: ['АРМІЯINFORM']

Time: 2023-06-29T72:00:00-04:00

Description: SPIKERIA PARLAMEV LITTIA, Latviy Tunsitoni was visible to the yaki names ... War with Ukraine 2022, War with Ukraine Latest News today, News War with Ukraine 2022 Last for today, will there be a war between Ukraine and Russia and when, War With Ukraine in 2022 it will be or not, will there be a war with Ukraine in the near future, they say, the war with Ukraine, Ukrainian news today, Ukrainian news in Ukrainian media in Russian

Images: ['image-5.jpg']

Tags: ['ВІЙНА', 'ЕСТОНІЯ', 'ЛИТВА', 'ПВК ВАГНЕРА', 'САНКЦІЇ', 'СЕЙМ ЛАТВІЇ']

Category: News

The speakers of the parliaments of Lithuania, Latvia and Estonia have made a joint conscience that called on the international community to increase Ukraine's support for sanctions against Belarus, as well as NATO leaders to start a substantive process of Ukraine's invitation to join the Alliance at a summit in Vilnius.

About this it is referredOn the site of the Diet of Latvia.

“We are convinced that in the end, Ukraine's security in the long -term perpetrator can be best guaranteed by NATO's collective defense. We urge NATO leaders to start a meaningful process of inviting Ukraine to join Donato at a summit in Vilnius, ”the statement reads.

The speaker of the Latvia Seimas Edwards Smildten, Speaker of the Estonia Parliament Lauri Husar Taspicker Lithuania Victoria Chmilite-Nielsen urges all international lawfulness to increase Ukraine's support in its struggle for freedom.

Speakers are also urged to create a special international tribunal under the UN General Genus Assembly to be held accountable for crime provisions committed by the leadership of the Russian Federation.

In their statement, the speakers noted that the recent "march of justice" of the Namoskovsky Group Group "Wagner" is the internal business of Russia, it is another sign of Russia's unpredictability.

The speakers called for constant vigilance, stating that it was necessary to continue to fulfill collective defense and restraint, as well as the safety of the borders of the NATO -border flank, bordering on Russia and Belarus.

"We look forward to specific actions on this goal in the future Samitinato in Vilnius," the statement said.

The speakers of the Baltic Parliaments have repeated their call to the EU to include Wagner Groups in the list of persons, groups and organizations involved in the terrorist acts, in particular through violence and instability, which are distributed in the African continent and in other places.

“The advent of the Wagner mercenaries in Belarus can make the security situation of NATO and the EU even more shaky. We again condemn the regime in Belarus for the support of Russia's war against Ukraine. The concealment of the Wagner group is unacceptable and malls to further strengthen sanctions against Belarus, ”the Baltic Parliament Parliaments say.

News Source: https://armyinform.com.ua/2023/06/29/spikery-krayin-baltiyi-vystupyly-iz-zayavoyu-zbilshyty-pidtrymku-ukrayiny-ta-posylyty-sankcziyi-proty-bilorusi/

Alexei Danilov: NATO Summit in Vilnius should bring effective security guarantees to Ukraine

Author: ['АРМІЯINFORM']

Time: 2023-06-29T73:00:00-04:00

Description: The Kiwi was a conference “Klakhnana that NATO is in the front of the one ... War with Ukraine 2022, war with Ukraine Latest news today, News War with Ukraine 2022 Last today, there will be a war between Ukraine and Russia and when, the war with Ukraine in 2022 Whether there will be a year or not, will there be a war with Ukraine in the near future, they say, the war with Ukraine, Ukraine’s news today, Ukrainian news in Ukrainian media in Russian

Images: ['conference_27062023_3.jpg']

Tags: ['ВІЛЬНЮСЬКИЙ САМІТ', 'ОЛЕКСІЙ ДАНІЛОВ', 'РНБО УКРАЇНИ', 'САМІТ НАТО']

Category: News

In Kiev, the International Conference "Ukraine and NATO of the NATO Predivilnya Summit: from support through the victory for membership" was held, during which the Secretary of the National Security and Defense Council of Ukraine Alexei Danilov expressed his belief that he should bring effective security guarantees in Vilnius in Vilnius in Vilnius in July this year.

About it reportsNational Security and Defense of Ukraine.

During his speech within the panel discussion on security guarantees that Ukraine could receive during the war with Russia, Alexei Danilov emphasized that during the creation of NATO "democratic values were primary", for which the Alliance was formed.

"Now, in the 21st century, we are discussing the question that we need to increase the production of weapons to kill people," he said, adding that "no one is bad to think about how it happened."

Considering the issues of the so -called "rebellion of Prigogine", the Secretary of the NSDC of Ukraine summarized that the collapse of the USSR in 1991 as well as for many Western countries became a specialist.

“What do we see today? On Friday, there were events that showed that Russia, as a state, did not exist, ”he said. - There is a completely controlled territory over which there is no power, there is no presidential ... This is the beginning of the end, " - said Alexei Danilov, adding that the world depends on the world.

At the same time, he stressed that the issue of Ukraine's victory in aggressive, resolved by the Russian Federation is a "issue of natural fragmentation not only".

The NSDC Secretary expressed his belief that NATO Summit in Vilnius should bring effective security guarantees to our country.

"I am more than sure that the breakthrough should be if we talk about values, justice, humanity - in relation to our people, our children," he said.

In this context, Alexei Danilov emphasized that Ukraine proved that "no one should be afraid, worthy and defending the truth."

"We are on the side of the truth now, and we need help to get justice as soon as possible," he said.

Category: News

In the last day in the Tavriysk direction, the loss of the Russian enemy killed by masters constitute almost three mouths.

About it reportedCommander of the operational-strategic group of Tavriya troops Brigadny General Alexandernavsky.

He noted that the forces of defense continue to move forward on the Tavriyskaya.

“19 units of military equipment of the enemy were destroyed. In particular, 2 tanks, Brem, MTLB, BRM, UABL "Orlan-10", UAV "Zala", self-propelled artillery installation 2C3 "Acacia", howitzer 2A65 "MSTA-B" and automotive equipment ",-it reads.

Subdivisions of missile troops and artillery per day performed 1337 firing facilities.

In the temporarily occupied territories, Russians are arrested by citizens allegedly through cooperation with the Defense Forces of Ukraine

Author: ['АРМІЯINFORM']

Time: 2023-06-29T75:00:00-04:00

Description: At Timchasovo perpipable Ukrainian, Vikhorovtsovsovsovsovsovsovsovsovsovsovsovsovsovsovsovsovsovsovsovsovsovsovsovyki ... War with Ukraine 2022, War with Ukraine Latest News today, News War with Ukraine 2022 Last today, will there be a war between Ukraine and Russia and when the war with Ukraine will be in 2022 Or not, will there be a war with Ukraine in the near future, they say, the war with Ukraine, Ukraine’s news today, Ukrainian news in Ukrainian media in Russian

Images: ['ganna-malyar.jpg']

Tags: ['ГАННА МАЛЯР', 'РОСІЙСЬКІ ОКУПАНТИ', 'ТИМЧАСОВО ОКУПОВАНІ ТЕРИТОРІЇ']

Category: News

In the temporarily occupied territory of Ukraine, military personnel of the Armed Forces of the RFIVSCOSPACIA for their own enrichment.

About this Deputy Minister of Defense of Ukraine Anna Malyar wroteIn his telegram.

In particular, under the pretext of counterintelligence, arrests of citizens, mainly among entrepreneurs and other wealthy local residents, are carried out, a formal basis for which is accused of working with the forces of Ukraine's defense forces.

According to Anna Malyar, for the release of detainees, the occupiers require considerable money from their relatives or loved ones.

As of the beginning of this week, in the settlement of Nizhny Syrogoz in the temporary -industrial territory in the Kherson region, about a hundred such persons were occupied in the Kherson region.

News Source: https://armyinform.com.ua/2023/06/29/na-tymchasovo-okupovanyh-terytoriyah-rosiyany-provodyat-areshty-gromadyan-nibyto-cherez-spivpraczyu-iz-sylamy-oborony-ukrayiny/

Author: ['АРМІЯINFORM']

Images: ['6b1167b7374efff5ab67e59c6e2e5777.jpeg']

Tags: ['АГЕНТ РФ', 'ПОПЛІЧНИК ОКУПАНТІВ', 'СБУ']

Category: News

In the Kirovograd region, as a result of operational measures, the FSB agent was detained, which was drawn to the preparation of new air strikes of the Russian Federation on the aviation infrastructure of the VOBlast.

About it reportsSecurity Service of Ukraine.

The detainee is a resident of Kropyvnytskyi, whom the special service of the Russian Federation recruited at the beginning of this year. In the field of view of the FSB, he got through his anti-Ukrainian display in one of the pro-Kremlin telegrams.

“For the implementation of the intelligence, the Russian agent gathered the maximum information of the protective condition of the Ukrainian airfields and the possible availability of combat aircraft of warehouses with ammunition of the Armed Forces. The attacker also tried to identify fire defense of the air defense system near Ukrainian aircraft entities, ”the message reads.

In addition, the Russian intelligence service wanted to find out because of its agent the total number of possible traffic on the airframe infrastructure of the region.

It is established that the "current expenses" of the person involved received from the FSB "transfers" of shelter(up to 10 thousand in hryvnia equivalent).

У разі отримання закритих відомостей, окупанти планували використати їх дляздійснення повторних повітряних атак на інфраструктуру Сил оборони.

Втім, співробітники Служби безпеки спрацювали на випередження і затрималиворожого поплічника «на гарячому» під час відеозйомки ним території однієї звійськових частин ЗСУ.

У затриманого вилучено мобільний телефон, який він використовував для фіксації«потрібних» цілей та спілкування з фсб.

На підставі зібраних доказів затриманому повідомлено про підозру у державнійзраді, вчиненій в умовах воєнного стану. Зловмиснику загрожує довічнеув’язнення.

More than 200 persons have been informed of suspicion of dissemination of information on air defense and defense forces

Author: ['АРМІЯINFORM']

Time: 2023-06-29T79:00:00-04:00

Description: The cups of the large -scale invasion of the Russian Federation have been gone about Pіdozra of the Navad 200 Fihurants, ... the war with Ukraine 2022, the war with Ukraine is the latest news today, the News War with Ukraine 2022 is the last for today, will there be a war between Ukraine and Russia and when, the war with Ukraine in It will be or not, whether there will be a war with Ukraine in the near future, the war with Ukraine, Ukrainian news today, Ukrainian news in Ukrainian media in Russian will be in Russian

Images: ['sbu.jpg']

Tags: ['КОРЕГУВАЛЬНИК', 'НЕСАНКЦІОНОВАНЕ ПОШИРЕННЯ ІНФОРМАЦІЇ', 'СБУ']

Category: News

Since the beginning of a large -scale invasion of the Russian Federation, more than 200 figures have been reported to the Russian Federation who illegally disseminated information about the Defense Forces of Ukraine.

About it reportsSecurity Service of Ukraine.

In fact, these individuals helped the enemy to prepare, carry out and adjust air strikes in our territory, in particular with the use of winged Idronov-Kamikadze missiles. The suspicion has been declared for unauthorized dissemination of information on the direction, movement of weapons, Armed Forces of Ukraine or other military forms.

In terms of 190 of these persons, the indictments were sent to court. The intruders have been imprisoned up to 12 years in prison.

According to the investigation, in most cases, citizens purposefully transfer information about the places of base and movement of units of the Armed Forces, the State Border Service and the National Guard.

First of all, the enemy was interested in the coordinates of the points of temporary deployment, routes and fortifications of Ukrainian defenders. Also, the firing positions of Ukrainian artillery and air defense systems were found.

For example, at the end of May this year in Donetsk, the informative management of the General Staff of the Armed Forces of the Russian Federation was detained(better known as a game). Фігурантнамагався приховано зафіксувати рух українських військових колон, якіпереправлялись через р. Сіверський Донець у напрямку Бахмута.

Крім того, співробітники Служби безпеки оперативно встановили особи шістьохмешканців столиці, які незаконно поширювали інформацію про роботу сил ППО підчас масованої атаки рф на Київ у ніч на 16 травня.

Чотирьом фігурантам вже повідомлено про підозру у вчиненні злочину. Щодо двохз них — обвинувальні акти скеровано до суду. Стосовно інших — триваєрозслідування.

Служба безпеки вкотре наголошує на забороні знімати та оприлюднювати відео- іфотоматеріали про діяльність Сил оборони і наслідки російських обстрілів. Їхпоширення (conscious or unconscious)It is regarded as an adjustment of enemy fire is a crime punishable in accordance with the law.

The SBU also calls on the owners of street webcams to turn off the online broadcasting to help the Russian Federation to "cite" rockets, and citizens-to report the detection from such cameras to official chatbot.

This is a historical time to start negotiations on Ukraine's membership in the European Union - Volodymyr Zelenskyy

Author: ['АРМІЯINFORM']

Images: ['54adb4c2f13e1bcb3b38fe752e6e72d5_1688051235-scaled.jpeg', '51630232e98b65cfc1cadfe2681b947d_1688051235-scaled.jpeg', 'a96efa7646556627968f6097d6a9fbfe_1688051232-scaled.jpeg']

Tags: ['ВИСТУП ПРЕЗИДЕНТА УКРАЇНИ', 'ВОЛОДИМИР ЗЕЛЕНСЬКИЙ', 'ЄВРОПЕЙСЬКА РАДА', 'ЄВРОПЕЙСЬКИЙ СОЮЗ']

Category: News

_ HEARD CHARLY, dear colleagues!_

Thank you very much!Congratulations to all of you, thank you for the invitation!

This week I started a trip to the front to two of our regions - Donetsk Tazapozhka. The most combat operations are now concentrated there - both sensitive and defense. High intensity of fighting, the highest heroic people!

Our warriors are absolute fellows, and I am proud of them, everyone and everyone who is contagious, who reflects Russian assaults and destroys Russian terrorists. We manage to release our land and people from the occupiers, and this is the most important thing.

The more successful our warriors will now be, the more Russia will cease to be a dangerous for both Ukraine and all of our Europe.

History demonstrates that unsuccessful aggression always makes dictatorships weak. We are now we see in Russia - we see such weakness we need. The weakness of Russia will be safe for others, and its defeat overcomes the problem of this war.

_ Dear colleagues, partners!_

I am grateful to all of you who help our defense against Russian aggression!Thank you every air defense system - they really save lives. It's true. Thank the European initiative for a million shells for Ukraine, for our tanking and for all the defensive packages that were provided to our country. This is all true of historical cooperation to protect Europe.

In particular, Ukraine is grateful to Lithuania and Poland, and we will not allow Russia or its terrorist groups to even try to break the safety and Polish peoples from Belarus. For Ukraine, partners' safety is also safety.

Yesterday, a visit to Ukraine was Mr. President of Lithuania Nausede and Mr President Duda, and we exchanged with them assessments of the situation in the territory of Belarus Tanavana.

Ukraine's position is quite clear: any attempt to blackmail Europe, any passage of a test of something against Europe should be perceived equally to the whole of Europe. If someone will threaten a particular people in Europe somewhere, it is absolutely natural - to join this people and eliminate the threat.

Another thing that is important to say today in a security context is sanctions.It is important not to stop in sanctions. The smaller the pauses, the less Russia will adapt to the pressure on it and come up with less than how to bypass sanctions. Thank you that the111 sanction package pays attention to the efforts of Russia to bypass the sanctions across the country, and this attention should be strengthened in the 12th EU sanction package.

Unfortunately, many rockets that Russian terrorists now use against life in Ukraine have recently been produced and contain critical components that are made by the free world companies. You cannot put up with this. We must combine the use of the free world technologies for the sake of aggression opposite freedom.

It is impossible to endure what Russia does with our Zaporizhzhya nuclear plant. Let me remind you that it is the largest nuclear power plant in Europe. Russian terrorists found it. We have specific information from our intelligence, and we have presented, in particular, diplomats of European countries. As it is, by the way, information of Russia's prosecution for foreign components for missile production. The Russian anatomical industry deserves sanctions in response to Russian radiation blackmail.

Dear colleagues!

Tomorrow is coming to the EU Swedish presidency, and I want to thank Sweden to Mr. Prime Minister Christverson for their effective work. For these six months, it became stronger. I am sure of that.

On behalf of all Ukrainians, I want to thank you, dear leaders, and you, Charles, you, Ursulo, you, Roberto, for making extremely important economic and political decisions that help us protect freedom and Europe.

Unfortunately, there are things that don't help us. But if solidarity is sufficient, if our security and economic cooperation is not broken by artificial illegal restrictions, if the long -term and principled decisions of Europe, Ynadali, will signals the world that Europe believes in peace, then this war will definitely be worried.Finally, a few thoughts about the next six months for Europe. I believe that this Saturday, on the first day of Spain's presidency in the EU, for my request, Ukraine will visit Mr. Prime Minister of Spain Sanchez. It is a lot about how important it is for our Europe.

It is a historical time to start negotiations on Ukraine's membership in the European Union. Evrop of values, free and strong Europe, Europe of peace is unthinkable without Ukraine. We are ready for membership negotiations, and our progress is necessary to record the European Commission. Ukraine is set up as soon as possible to prepare for the start of merging about membership, and we will do it.

Peace has no alternatives. Therefore, the maximum unity in Europe has no alternatives.

Thank you for your attention!Thank you for the support, friends!

Glory to Ukraine!

Source: Presidential Office of Ukraine

The President met with members of the International Working Group - discussed the environmental consequences of the war

Author: ['АРМІЯINFORM']

Time: 2023-06-29T84:00:00-04:00

Description: President of Ukraine Volodymyr Zelensky Zustvych Iz members of the Mission Robocho ... War with Ukraine 2022, War with Ukraine Latest News Today, News War with Ukraine 2022 Last for today, will there be a war between Ukraine and Russia and when, the war with Ukraine in 2022 Will it be or not, will there be a war with Ukraine in the near future, they say, the war with Ukraine, Ukraine’s news today, Ukrainian news in Ukrainian media in Russian

Images: ['a1b729cd8a6e2f6d700c6117e53bb445_1688050341_extra_large.jpeg']

Tags: ['ЕКОЛОГІЧНА КАТАСТРОФА', 'ЕКОЦИД', 'ПІДРИВ КАХОВСЬКОЇ ГЕС', 'ПРЕЗИДЕНТ УКРАЇНИ']

Category: News

President of Ukraine Volodymyr Zelensky met with members of the International Warning Group on the environmental consequences of the war.

About it reportsOffice of the President of Ukraine.

Among them is the former Vice Prime Minister and the former Minister of Foreign Driple Margot Walstrem, Vice President of the European Parliament Gydigatala, Ireland President in 1990-1997 Mary Robinson and Eco-Activistkagrett.

The head of state attracted the attention of the interlocutors to the catastrophic consequences of the heating of the Dams of the Kakhovka Hydroelectric Power Plant, which the residents of Kherson region collided. This crime also caused significant damage to the agricultural sphere and biodiversity.

He noted that many people in the occupied troops of settlements were killed as a result of the catastrophe, where the Russians did not exaltate from flooded territories at all.

“It is important to offer a set of specific measures to help Ukrainian from temporarily occupied settlements. These are our people who have to keep the necessary support at such a difficult moment, ”Vladimirzelensky emphasized.

For its part, the co -chair of the International Working Group Margot Walstremna has depicted, which is important to provide the world's wide support for the main ways of the international working group. It is a assessment of damage caused to the environment as a result of Russian aggression, the prosecution of reference for environmental crimes and compensation of losses, as well as the development of environmental plans in Ukraine and the transition to a "green" economy.

Greta Tunberg's eco -activist thanked for the invitation and emphasized that he would be able to attract representatives of environmental public organizations to the dialogue of the main tasks of the international working group and to draw attention to the pre -ecological consequences of the war.

Mary Robinson noted great efforts that Ukraine is making to overcome ecological problems during the war.

“The invasion of Russia into Ukraine demonstrated the severity of crimes against the environment of the whole war; In the Ukrainian legislation, this is uniquely ecocide. The statement of responsibility for these crimes should be resolved both at the national and international level, ”said the Vice President of the European Parliamentuida Gutala.

Images: ['photo_5255944565121208082_x.jpg']

Tags: ['ВОРОЖИЙ', 'ОФІС ГЕНЕРАЛЬНОГО ПРОКУРОРА УКРАЇНИ', 'ХЕРСОН']

Category: News

As a result of the Russian blow, two civilians were killed in Kherson and two more.

About it reportsOffice of the Prosecutor General of Ukraine.

“According to the investigation, on June 29, 2023, about 1:00 pm, Russian military enlighteners were firing at Kherson. Two people were killed as a result of sighting. Two more civilians were hospitalized with burns, ”the testimony reads.

The fire destroyed warehouses, damaged other objectical infrastructure.

About Nataliyagmenyuk, the head of the United Careful Press Center of Defense forces of the South, told about the operational situation in the south of Ukraine and, in the Black Sea Ship group in Black and Azov Sea. As of now, the total number of ships is 10 and2 respectively. In the Black Sea for combat duty after a two -day pause removed the water rocket launcher, whose equipment is up to 8 calibers.

  • At this point, the situation remains constant. We continue to track it. We see that the enemy activates unmanned reconnaissance along the front line of the front to penetrate deeper into the rear regions. Such actions in some way indicate the probable preparation for the following rocket strokes. Also, during the last two days, the enemy activity was observed, especially at night of confident regions. This means that in a way, the enemy has reformed his zuzzles, apparently, studied the opportunities and seeking tactics that would be bulmedly effective. At the same time, we remember that they very often make up for the lack of effectiveness on the front line with the rear "victories", causing strokes on peaceful objects.

According to the officer, now the enemy tries to increase the pressure on the right bank, firing it as much as possible, and seeks to engage in the accumulation of people. This indicates that their main target is not military objects, but pressure of the population.

  • In particular, on the left bank, settlements suffer from enemy shelling, despite the fact that they are just under the occupation of the Russians, so to speak, in their launch. The enemy continues the tactics when he pulls his guns away from the painter, covers him with fire, and then returns and explains that the then made the forces of defense, trying to break forward. Again, it shows how the enemy continues to pass the local population and translate it to their side.

The enemy also exacerbates night shelling. This may indicate that in the daytime occupants are re -equipped with their positions and hidden overbodarial struggle of the Ukrainian units.

Category: News

This was stated during a press conference as part of a European Council of President of the European Parliament Robert Metzola, correspondentarmianfor from Brussels reports.

On June 29-30, a meeting of the European Council is ongoing in Brussels, where the leaders of the 27th European Union discuss the issues of further support of Ukraine's tavregulating challenges of illegal migration to the EU. Last week, the elaboration between the Wagner Commander Prigazin and the Russian authorities was a topic of discussion in Brussels.

“Recent events in Russia have raised many questions. First of all, it affects the inner dynamics in Russia, the invasion of Ukraine and the European security as a whole. What we can be sure is that Ukraine should remain a prioritomator alone.

Our political strategies(EU - ed.)They work, Putin is weaker, and Ukraine is repulsive. In this case, we welcome the approval of the eleventh packet of sanctions and additional 50 billion to support the restoration of Ukraine - as it was announced last week, ”said Robert Metzola.

Now Ukraine is in the process of implementing seven recommendations of the EU Ph.D., which our state received in June 2022. In the fall of 2023, a report of the European Extension Commission - a document, Deukraine will be published for the first time with others who are in the EU process.

According to Roberta Motzolla, Ukraine demonstrates significant progress in the reform states, so we can hope that negotiations on entry into the EU will start at the end of 2023.

“The success of Ukraine in reforms is extraordinary, especially during the war. The requirements of the reform must be fulfilled, and then we answer. I remain optimistic that this(Start of entry negotiations - ed.)Maybe this year can be aware of this year, ”said Robert Motzol.

Also, EU leaders discussed illegal migration to the EU, which remains a security challenge for the EU. At the same time, there were discussions on the EU and political mechanisms within the European Union.

Category: News

Prosecutors of the Ternopil Regional Prosecutor's Office were sent to court by an indictment against a resident of one of the villages of Kakhovsky district on the fact(Part 1 of Art. 111-2 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine). Про цеповідомляєOffice of the Prosecutor General of Ukraine.

The investigation found that a citizen of Ukraine from April to July 2022 he helped the aggressor state and its armed forces in the territory of the temporarily occupied village of Knyaze-Grigorivka of Kherson region.

He voluntarily formed a list of people from the pro -Ukrainian persons to prevent the movement of resistance in the village. He also informed the Russian military service of the serviceman of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, a participant of the ATO/Otsta about the presence of a car in him to confiscate for needers.

The accused systematically provided the occupation troops of the aggressor state and gave them their own home for rest.

Special pre -trial investigations were carried out by investigators of the SBU of the Uternopil region.

Note: According to Art. 62 of the Constitution of Ukraine, a person is considered to be not subject to criminal punishment until his guilt is proved legally and established by the conviction of the court.

Category: News

Norway has made a grant contribution to the targeted fund support, restoration, reform and reform of Ukraine of $ 190 million.

About it reportsWorld Bank press service.

“The Norway Government has made a grant contribution to the targeted support, restoration, reform and reform of Ukraine of the World Bank for the amount($ 190 million USA)To support the ability of the Government of Ukraine to provide services, including investments for repairing the destroyed infrastructure, ”the message goes.

It is noted that this is the second tranche provided with Norway after a grant contribution of all US $ 100 million/

“Ukraine needs urgent financing. The current assistance will help support critical infrastructure and provide daily provision of basic public services. The world bank is also a contribution to the process of reforms required to promote economic growth, as well as to restore and integrate the postwar. This contribution is part of a five -year support package of Norway of Ukraine, it is a sign of our long -term support for Ukraine, ”said Norwegian Ministry of Decree Annikin Guitfeldt.

The aircraft performed the PS752 flight, heading Tehran to Kiev. There were 167 passengers and nine members on board. They all died. The sever of the dead is 11 citizens of Ukraine(In particular, the crew members), 82 Iran citizen, 63 - Canada, 10 - Sweden, 4 - Afghanistan, 3 - Germany and the United Kingdom.

Dear friends!

I am grateful for your attention to Ukraine and for your respect for Ukraine.

Ukrainian soldiers, all our beautiful people really deserve the highest reason. Millions of our people are fighting and working for our freedom, common freedom, not only Ukrainian but all free nations. I am sure that we will save freedom. And your distinction, in particular ... Chatham House distinction for Ukraine is another proof that the world believes in Ukraine, believes in Ukrainians, believes in our victory.

Ladies and Gentlemen!

Thousands and thousands of our warriors were distinguished in battles against the occupiers. Today, my helpers have prepared three new decrees on celebrating state awards. Immediately 419 of our soldiers, men and women who are at the cost of their Crow, pain, and losses of brothers fight for freedom.

I want you to know that every day we have success on the front lines thanks to our heroic soldiers and, of course, thanks to the support of our partners. And the United Kingdom is one of the obvious leaders of support. Thank you very much!

Every day, our warriors reflect Russian assaults, release the gowns and people step by step, every day we make Russian tyranny weaker - as it is to be to be safe. During the full -scale war, more than 49,000 of our soldiers have been awarded state awards for bravery in battles.245 the warriors were awarded the title of Hero of Ukraine. Imagine what intense battles are and what our people are!Such a number of well -deserved awards are a personal courage and courage reflects truly mass courage and courage.

Please always support our people - they deserve it. And Yaviri, that a day can soon come when the Ukrainian contribution to the global consciousness and the strength of our people will be marked by the legal recognition of our government with the ally of your state and all the free nations, NATO members.Glory to all Ukrainian heroes!Thank you for this day!Thank you for your support!Thank you, the United Kingdom!

Glory to Ukraine!

Author: ['АРМІЯINFORM']

Time: 2023-06-29T96:00:00-04:00

Description: At the TROOX regions of Ukraine - Zaporizkiy, Dnipropetrovskiy Tu Khersonciy - Rounded ... War with Ukraine 2022, War with Ukraine Latest News today, News War with Ukraine 2022 The last for today, will there be a war between Ukraine and Russia and when, the war with Ukraine in It will be or not, whether there will be a war with Ukraine in the near future, the war with Ukraine, Ukrainian news today, Ukrainian news in Ukrainian media in Russian will be in Russian

Images: ['photo_5253692146832230932_y.jpg', 'photo_5253692146832230934_y.jpg', 'photo_5253692146832230937_y.jpg', 'photo_5253692146832230936_y.jpg']

Tags: ['ЗАПОРІЗЬКА АЕС', 'ІГОР КЛИМЕНКО', 'МВС', 'НАВЧАННЯ']

Category: News

In the three regions of Ukraine - Zaporizhzhya, Dnipropetrovsk and Kherson - large -scale special training was aimed at preparing a home -made terrorist attack at a temporarily occupied Zaporizhzhya nuclear power plant.

About it reportsGovernment portal.

These events involve about eight thousand people. In particular, these are local governments, law enforcement officers, volunteers, doctors and representatives of all services of government -housing authorities responsible for the general civil protection system.

In addition, about 350 units of special vehicles and 400 buses were involved.

“We understand that the Zaporizhzhya NPP occupied by the enemy presents a great danger, especially for the citizens of the Dnieper, Zaporizhzhya and Kherson regions. But we are working out possible scenarios, for example, that a radioactive cloud can continue to be completed, to the region of our country, ”the Minister of Internal Affairs Igorklimenko said.

He noted that these exercises are close to real events. The legend is a protrusion from one of the units of the Zaporizhzhya Nuclear Power Plant.

The head of the Ministry of Internal Affairs informed that within the limits of training measures deployed-controlled-sanitary posts to check the transport, which leaves from inhabited donations. There is a technique for measurements of radiation background, and the processing of cars and evacuated people is inspected.

“Despite the fact that the enemy is near, we understand that we must be ready for any intention. We will come to the rescue in time, the authorities will respond to any crop, ”Igor Klimenko summarized.

I finish the day in the Verkhovna Rada - meeting with our speaker Ruslanstefanchuk. We work.

And now the report for this day, a busy day. Very long.

The meeting of the European Council is traditionally for Ukraine to be among the members of the Evrosouz. The agenda is obvious - our defense in this war, our path, the support from our partners, our security support for them, for our Europe. Ukraine influences the power of Europe. This is a fact. And this year, on the basis of this and other similar facts, unity in Europe, including the beginning of negotiations on Ukraine's membership in the European Union.

Meeting with Mike Penso, 48th Vice President of the United States, Senator ... American support for Ukraine is vital for all Americans, every American family, all US public forces, all political leaders, congress-both parties, of course, from US President Biden. Thank you for your feast!

He discussed our defense with Mr. Penso, our interaction - from the very beginning, pre -days between the Ukrainian and American peoples. They talked about the weapons, the projection of our soldiers, about our common values.

Meeting with members of the International Working Group on the Environmental Consequences of the War - Greta Tumbberg, Margot Walstrom and others. They talked primarily about Russian thermal and ecocide at the Kakhovskaya hydroelectric power station and, in general, about the work of our group, which will be designed by those issues that are directly related to the destructive influence of Russian aggression on nature. The opposition of ecocide is one of the points in the Ukrainian formula of peace, and we have to implement each of it, all aspect.

Conversation with Guatemala President. The formula of peace, our collaboration with Latin ascetic, help us in demining, it is very important - in the creation of a tribunal of Russian aggression.

Meeting with representatives of our business is very important, very meaningful. I am greeted. They discussed how to stimulate economic activity now, in the face of our conditions. They talked about how to give more business protection, more cooperation and business. Now the first priority is defense, and it is obvious. But icon economics is also important.

I am grateful to all who work for the sake of Ukraine, Ukrainians, who keeps and creates jobs, who pays taxes and who are already preparing for our restoration, for a large -scale transformation program of Ukraine, which we will be obliged after our victory.I thank everyone and everyone who protects our country!Thank you to everyone who now, who has given us the best news today - about promoting Ukrainian positions. Glory to you, our characters!

Thank you all in the world who really helps us!

Glory to Ukraine!

Source: Presidential Office

News Source: https://armyinform.com.ua/2023/06/29/protydiya-ekoczydu-cze-odyn-iz-punktiv-ukrayinskoyi-formuly-myru-volodymyr-zelenskyj/

Ukraine received $ 1.2 billion in US and Finland

Author: ['АРМІЯINFORM']

Time: 2023-06-29T98:00:00-04:00

Description: Minfin Zaleduchi, 1.215 billion US dularys of grant fіnannuvannya vid Spocules of states ... War with Ukraine 2022, War with Ukraine Latest News Today, News War with Ukraine 2022 Last for today, will there be a war between Ukraine and Russia and when, the war with Ukraine in 2022 Whether there will be a year or not, will there be a war with Ukraine in the near future, they say, the war with Ukraine, Ukraine’s news today, Ukrainian news in Ukrainian media in Russian

Images: ['ukrainian-american-money-pile-banknots-49441130.webp']

Tags: ['ГРАНТОВА ДОПОМОГА', 'МІНФІН', 'США', 'ФІНЛЯНДІЯ']

Category: News

The Ministry of Finance attracted $ 1.215 billion in grant funding from the United States of America and the Finland Republic.

About it reportsGovernment portal.

It is reported that grant funds have been provided as part of the fifth additional financing within the framework of the project “Supporting government expenditures for securing a state administration in Ukraine”(PEACE in Ukraine). Метою проекту єчасткова компенсація видатків державного бюджету, зокрема соціальних тагуманітарних, що не пов’язані зі сферою безпеки і оборони.

Зазначається, що залучене грантове фінансування буде спрямовано на оплатупраці працівників державних органів та педагогічних працівників, пенсійнихвиплат, а також виплати за окремими програмами державної соціальної допомоги(IDPs, persons with disabilities, low-income families and payment of housing and communal subsidies).

«Вдячний Урядам США, Фінляндії та команді Світового банку за плідну співпрацюі вагому підтримку у частині забезпечення гуманітарних та соціальних видатківпід час повномасштабної війни. Фінансування у формі грантів дозволяє незбільшувати боргове навантаження та сприяє фінансовій стабільності України», —зазначив міністр фінансів України Сергій Марченко.

Наразі в Україні впроваджується спільний з Міжнародним банком реконструкції тарозвитку (IBRD)and the International Development Association(Dream)Project “Supporting State Expenditures for Sustainable Public Administration in Ukraine” totaling $ 16.5 billion and EUR 1.4 billion(IBRD loans, loans, grants of the target fund of many donors).

News Source: https://armyinform.com.ua/2023/06/29/ukrayina-otrymala-12-mlrd-grantovyh-koshtiv-vid-ssha-ta-finlyandiyi/

On the night of 29 to June 30, Russian terrorists launched "Shahda" in the territory of Ukraine.

This was reported by the Air Force of the Armed Forces, Ukrinform reports.

"Shahamed type UAV in the direction of Zaporizhzhya from the north!Urgently go vulpies!", - write the PS.

As of 01:00, air alarm was declared in Dnipropetrovsk and Zaporizhzhya region.

Air Force declared work air defense .
