States in the UN: Western weapons for Ukraine prevents conflict rather than deepening it

Authors: Ukrinform (Person)

Publisher: Укринформ (Organization)

Published Time: 2023-06-30T-3:57:00+03:00

Modified Time: 2023-06-30T00:57:00+03:00

Description: The United States responded to its rhetoric that Ukraine's military support seems to be "deepened" by the West, and stressed that Western weapons only prevents Russian aggression spread and allows to protect peaceful Ukrainians better. - Ukrinform.

Images: ['630_360_16844...']

Tags: ['США', 'Україна', 'Зброя', 'Агресія РФ', 'Радбез ООН', 'Війна з Росією']

Type: Article

Russia was in its rhetoric that Ukraine's military support from the side of the entrance seems to "deepen" the conflict, and emphasized that Western weapons are only overcoming Russian aggression and allowing civilians to protect better.

This statement was made on Thursday at a UN Security Council meeting by US Deputy Permanent Representative Ambassador Robert Wood, Ukrinform reports his own correspondent.

“The United States and more than 50 Member States responded to the call of Ukraine to support its protection against Russian aggression. And we will continue to make the cella as much as it takes, ”the United States spokesman.

Read also: UN leadership on the Radbezi once again indicated Russia that it was receiving weapons from abroad

He stressed that these weapons do not continue the conflict, the responsibility for which only the Kremlin would.

"These weapons prevents further cruelty against Ukrainian citizens,"- said a diplomat.

He emphasized that the continuous attacks of the Russian Federation on Ukraine and its civilian population, as well as the "too familiar" flow of false accusations from the Russian Federation, "there is only another demonstration that President Putin is not interested in meaningful diplomacy."

Read also: USA prepare a new military assistance package to Ukraine for $ 500 million

As reported by Ukrinform, on Thursday the Russian delegation initiated the UN Security Council to discuss issues of supply of Western weapons. This is not the Kremlin's first attempt to "condemn" at the UN level Western Deliveries weapons Ukraine. Instead, other councils have repeatedly indicated Russia that she was receiving weapons from Iranu North Korea.

News Source: https://www.ukrinform.ua/rubric-polytics/3729562-stati-v-oon-zahidna-zbroa-dla-ukraini-zapobigae-konfliktu-a-ne-pogliblue-jogo.html

The European Congress of Ukrainians and the Ukrainian Security Center open a representative office in Kiev

Authors: Ukrinform (Person)

Publisher: Укринформ (Organization)

Published Time: 2023-06-30T-4:43:00+03:00

Modified Time: 2023-06-30T00:43:00+03:00

Description: The European Congress of Ukrainians (ECU) and the Ukrainian Center for Security and Cooperation (UCSBS) open a joint representation in Kiev, and also launch cooperation on counteracting Russian influences in the world. - Ukrinform.

Images: ['630_360_16855...']

Tags: ['Діаспора', 'Європа', 'Війна з Росією']

Type: Article

European Congress of Ukrainians(Eku)and Ukrainian Security and Cooperation Center(UCBS)They open a joint mission in Kiev, as well as to work on the Russian influences in the world.

According to Ukrinform, about it on FacebookThe Ukrainian Security and Cooperation Center reported.

“The Ukrainian World Community is a reliable shoulder of our country during the UCSBS War, since 2014 has cooperated with the Ukrainians of the world and the greatest organizations that represent them in the Western countries. From the beginning of the full -scale invasion, we also started working with newly formed Ukrainian communities. Today, we are happy to announce the deepening of our work with the largest organization of Ukrainians in Europe, which brings together more than 20 organizations in 20 countries - EuroPean Congress of Ukraine / European Congress of Ukrainians, ”the post reads.

Recall that in Berlin on May 27-28 took placeXIV Congress of the European Congress of Ukrainians(Eku), which was attended by 50 representatives of Ukrainian citizens and guests of the organization. During the event, a new organization of organization was chosen and new organizations were adopted.

Their greetings of the newly elected department of the European Congress of Ukrainians expressedThe World Congress of Ukrainians, led by his President Pavel Grod.

Foto: European Congress of Ukrainians

News Source: https://www.ukrinform.ua/rubric-diaspora/3729517-evropejskij-kongres-ukrainciv-i-ukrainskij-centr-bezpeki-vidkrivaut-predstavnictvo-v-kievi.html

Kislytsa called on the UN Radbez to follow the Russian crisis to avoid threats to the world

Authors: Ukrinform (Person)

Publisher: Укринформ (Organization)

Published Time: 2023-06-30T-5:35:00+03:00

Modified Time: 2023-06-30T00:35:00+03:00

Description: The Permanent Representative of Ukraine to the UN Sergey Kislytsa called on the UN Security Council "Carefully monitor the Russian crisis and take the necessary steps to eliminate numerous inevitable threats and challenges that this incapable state is for the world." - Ukrinform.

Images: ['630_360_16196...']

Tags: ['Білорусь', 'Путін', 'ПВК "Вагнера"', 'Кислиця', 'Радбез ООН', 'Війна з Росією']

Type: Article

The UN Kyslytsia permanent representative of Ukraine called on the UN Security Council "to care for the Russian crisis and take the necessary steps to eliminate numerous numerous threats and challenges that this incapable state is for the world."

According to Ukrinform correspondent, he stated this on Friday by Nazasidniya UN Security Council, convened by Russia for another attempt to condemn the weapons of weapons to Ukraine.

According to Kislytsia, after attempts, the international community should make several lessons in Russia on June 23-24.

“In proving its inadequacy by continuing the war against Ukraine without any success for success, the Putin regime demonstrated that it was no longer able to control its own country. The Saturday offensive on Moscow was stopped only by the decision of the leader of the Wagner after the intervention of the Belarusian dictatorulukashenko, ”Kyslytsy said.

Read also: satellite shows probable databases of Wagner PEC in Belarus- Reuters

The Putin regime was built on lies and hypocrisy, he noted, reminding that the Russian president had been lied to repeatedly, as if the state was not present to the Wagner PEC, and then confessed that about $ 1 billion was allocated from the budget of the Russian Federation.

"Putin and his associates are unreliable and unpredictable even a step forward. This regime continues to pose an existential threat not only to its neighborhoods and other regions around the world, but for Russia itself," - said.

Read also: "Wagnerivtsi" in Belarus: Nauseda hopes that the loose will decide to strengthen NATO's eastern flank

According to him, the Putin regime will continue to degrade, generating new crises and threats until it finally falls.

"Therefore, the international community should consider the crisis in the Russian Federation as one of the opposite issues," he said, adding that the military defeat of Russia in Ukraine, ensuring responsibility for committing crimes and international control over the Russian military arsenal should be necessary elements of the Russian crisis. Read also: Poland sees a threat in moving in Belarus of nuclear weapons and "Wagner" - MEVEREPATATATATES

According to media reports, during the rebellion, Putin fled Moscow to St. Petersburg.

News Source: https://www.ukrinform.ua/rubric-polytics/3729561-kislica-zaklikav-radbez-oon-steziti-za-rosijskou-krizou-abi-uniknuti-zagroz-dla-svitu.html

The next viewing of the IMF program for Ukraine is scheduled for November-December

Authors: Ukrinform (Person)

Publisher: Укринформ (Organization)

Published Time: 2023-06-30T-6:24:00+03:00

Modified Time: 2023-06-30T00:24:00+03:00

Description: The International Monetary Fund plans to conduct a second review of the EFF extended financing program for Ukraine, which will make a decision to allocate the next tranche in the last month of this year. - Ukrinform.

Images: ['630_360_15495...']

Tags: ['Економіка', 'МВФ', 'Україна']

Type: Article

The International Monetary Fund plans to conduct a second review of the EFF extended financing program for Ukraine, during which the decision to deduce the next tranche will be made in the last month of this year.

This was stated on Thursday by the IMF Mission in Ukraine Gavin Gray, Ukrinform's own correspondent reports.

"I expect it to happen in late November-early December," the Foundation's representative said.

Read also: IMF explained which reforms expected from Ukraine to identify the next tranches

In this context, he also noted that during the following months, the IMFSO will be rented on the implementation of the planned structural reforms by the Ukrainian authorities, in particular, in the field of government and corruption.

Read also: IMF has improved expectations for the macroeconomic promise of Ukraine in 2023

As reported by Ukrinform, the IMF approved the EFF extended funding program for Ukraine of $ 15.6 billion at the end of March. The program is designed for 48 months.

Her first revision was completed on Thursday, July 29, which results in _ Foundation allocated another tranche to Ukraine worth $ 890 million. _

News Source: https://www.ukrinform.ua/rubric-economy/3729560-nastupnij-pereglad-programi-mvf-dla-ukraini-zaplanovanij-na-listopadgruden.html

Britain has announced new sanctions against Russia

Authors: Ukrinform (Person)

Publisher: Укринформ (Organization)

Published Time: 2023-06-30T-7:11:00+03:00

Modified Time: 2023-06-30T00:11:00+03:00

Description: Britain has announced a ban on persons and companies related to the Kremlin for access to British legal expertise. - Ukrinform.

Images: ['630_360_16814...']

Tags: ['Антиросійські санкції', 'Бізнес', 'Британія', 'Росія', 'Війна з Росією']

Type: Article

Britain has a good time for the ban on persons and companies related to the Kremlin to access a granted legal expertise.

This is reported by Ukrinform with reference to Sky News.Therefore, British lawyers will not be able to advise Russian companies in some business. This is the last step aimed at Moscow's economic cutting.

Read also: [Czech Republic has imposed sanctions against Russian oligarchyevtushenko and his son]](https://www.ukrinform.ua/rubric-world/3729421-cehia-vvela-sankcii-proti-rosijskogo-oligarha-evtusenkova-ta-jogo-sina.html)

"British officials stated that sanctions The competence of Russia may be influenced by legal consultations on all issues that have released agreements between global corporations to international loans, ”the message goes.

The Ministry of Justice, which announced this step, has stated that Russia depends on Western countries on legal expertise.

Read also: in the next package should be sanctions against "Rosatom"- Naussed

Earlier, the United Kingdom annually exported the legal services to Russian business worth about 56 million pounds.

News Source: https://www.ukrinform.ua/rubric-world/3729559-britania-ogolosila-pro-novi-sankcii-proti-rf.html

Russia has launched Shakhi, in the south of Ukraine there are air defense

Authors: Ukrinform (Person)

Publisher: Укринформ (Organization)

Published Time: 2023-06-30T01:05:00+03:00

Modified Time: 2023-06-30T01:05:00+03:00

Description: On the night of June 29 to June 30, Russian terrorists launched "Shahda" in the territory of Ukraine. - Ukrinform.

Images: ['630_360_16867...', '1688076217-73...']

Tags: ['Безпілотник', 'БПЛА', 'Війна з Росією', 'ППО']

Type: Article

On the night of 29 to June 30, Russian terrorists launched "Shahda" in the territory of Ukraine.

This was reported by the Air Force of the Armed Forces, Ukrinform reports.

"Shahamed type UAV in the direction of Zaporizhzhya from the north!Urgently go vulpies!", - write the PS.

As of 01:00, air alarm was declared in Dnipropetrovsk and Zaporizhzhya region.

Air Force declared work air defense .

SBU special forces in a week destroyed 50 units of Russian equipment

Authors: Ukrinform (Person)

Publisher: Укринформ (Organization)

Published Time: 2023-06-30T01:22:00+03:00

Modified Time: 2023-06-30T01:22:00+03:00

Description: Special forces of the SBU Special Operations Center destroyed 50 units of Russian equipment and more than half a hundred invaders in a week. - Ukrinform.

Images: ['630_360_16607...']

Tags: ['СБУ', 'Військова техніка', 'Війна з Росією']

Type: Article

Special forces of the SBU Special Operations Center destroyed 50 single -Russian equipment and more than half a hundred invaders in a week.

This is stated in the SBU message in telegram, reports Ukrinform.

In particular, list enemy The loss was full: 5 tanks, 3 CAU "Carnation", 2 anti-aircraft missile complexes, 2 Gubitside-30, radio electronic struggle, 16 armored vehicles, 23 transport buildings, 6 firing positions and more than half a hundred enemies.

Viso: SBU

In addition, together with the artillerymen of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, 25 units of equipment, 5 warehouses with ammunition, 15 fortifications, 4 willow positions and another 200 occupiers were additionally affected.

Read also: in the Tavriysk direction of defense forces forward forward - almost three mouths of the Russians were destroyed in a day

As _ * reported!

News Source: https://www.ukrinform.ua/rubric-ato/3729444-specpriznacenci-sbu-za-tizden-znisili-50-odinic-rosijskoi-tehniki.html

Authors: Ukrinform (Person)

Publisher: Укринформ (Organization)

Modified Time: 2023-06-30T01:34:00+03:00

Description: The current Secretary General of the North Atlantic Alliance Jens Stoltenberg is likely to remain in office for another year. - Ukrinform.

Images: ['630_360_16699...']

Tags: ['НАТО', 'Столтенберг']

Type: Article

The inter -General Secretary of the North Atlantic Alliance Jens Stoltenberg, rather, will remain in office for another year.

About it reports on Thursday edition PoliticoWith reference to four independent sources from the United States and a decision, Ukrinform reports.

“The US official representative said the continuation of authority(The current - ed.)Secretary -General is a "case." When asked if this is true, a high -ranking diplomat from Western Europe responded approvingly, adding that "will be officially designed next week," the publication said.

Read also: [Kuleba spoke with Stoltenberg: the time of clarity of Ukraine's dawn in NATO has come]](https://www.ukrinform.ua/rubric-polytics/3729269-kuleba-pogovoriv-zi-stoltenbergom-cas-asnosti-sodo-vstupu-ukraini-v-nato-nastav.html)

In addition, a high -ranking diplomat from Eastern Europe, and representatives confirmed the existence of a consensus in the Alliance to continue the powers of Stoltenberg.

It has been reported by allies by NATO They discussed the decision on whether to leave Jens Stoltenberg as a Secretary General, or to approve a new leader to NATO summit in Vilnius. Denmark Prime Minister Matte Frederixen was considered by the UK Defense Minister Ben Volles.

Read also: NATO Membership in NATO will discuss after the Summit Summit - Stoltenberg

Stoltenberg, the former Prime Minister of Norway, has been leading North Atlantic Alewiance since 2014, and has continued its powers several times.

Part of the Wagner PEC remains in the occupied territory of Ukraine - Pentagon

Authors: Ukrinform (Person)

Publisher: Укринформ (Organization)

Published Time: 2023-06-30T01:45:00+03:00

Modified Time: 2023-06-30T01:45:00+03:00

Description: The US Ministry of Defense has information that some of the mercenaries of the Russian PEC "Wagner" continue to stay in the territory of Ukraine occupied by Russia. - Ukrinform.

Images: ['630_360_16795...']

Tags: ['Пентагон', 'США', 'Україна', 'ПВК "Вагнера"', 'Війна з Росією']

Type: Article

The US Ministry of Defense has information that part of the Wagner Metane PEC continues to be in the territory of Ukraine occupied by Russia.

This was stated on Thursday during a briefing by a spokesman for the Ministry of Defense Shaterrik Ryder, reports Ukrinform's own correspondent.

“About [Wagner PVC]](https://www.ukrinform.ua/tag-pvk-vagnera) and its dislocations, I would say that we continue to see some elements of the Wagneran group by the Russian occupied territory of Ukraine, ”the US defense consciousness said.

Read also: Vagner's possible base in Belarus will consider the meeting of the rates - Danilov

He also commented on the media report that new structures have appeared in the satellite images of the military units in Belarus, which may be assigned to the location of Wagner PVC fighters.

“I saw these messages in the press. Obviously, this is what we will survive, ”the Ryder said.

Read also: a statement by Rudanova that the "Wagnerivtsi" will no longer fight in Ukraine, has a serious basis - GUR

The US defense agency also assured that US intelligence will be able to attend the activities of all cells of Wagner PEC in different regions of the world.

As reported by Ukrinform, the authorities of Poland _ decided to strengthen its border with Collisprends _ through the arrival of Wagner's Nanters.

Volodymyr Zelenskyy met with business representatives: among other things, they discussed Ukraine's rebuilding

Author: ['АРМІЯINFORM']

Time: 2023-06-30T96:00:00-04:00

Description: President of Ukraine Volodymyr Zelensky Zustych Iz representers of Vitchiznoye Ta ... war with Ukraine 2022, war with Ukraine Latest news today, News War with Ukraine 2022 Last today, will there be a war between Ukraine and Russia and when, a war with Ukraine in 2022 Will it be or not, will there be a war with Ukraine in the near future, they say, the war with Ukraine, Ukraine’s news today, Ukrainian news in Ukrainian media in Russian

Images: ['78658e677b81056daf577ac19c344a4f_1688040792_extra_large.jpeg']

Tags: ['БІЗНЕС', 'ВОЛОДИМИР ЗЕЛЕНСЬКИЙ', 'ЄОСЕЛЯ', 'ПРЕЗИДЕНТ УКРАЇНИ']

Category: News

President of Ukraine Volodymyr Zelensky has a meeting with representatives of the public and foreign business working in our country.

About it reportsOffice of the President of Ukraine.

The President stressed that the main priority for our country today is the War, and the role of business working in Ukraine is extraordinary.

“We are grateful to our external partners. In any case, strategically, financial people support us and help us. But we expect, first of all, ”he said.

The President also noted that the reconstruction of Ukraine is a major project, and the participation will be a Ukrainian and foreign business participation in it, which has worked and operated in our country, especially during the war.

During the meeting, they agreed on joint efforts, designed to reduce the problems of law enforcement agencies, discussed the situation in the tax sphere and perpetrator of its reform, touched on the issues of tax audits, increased efficiency of bodies that should stimulate the development of the economy.

A very interesting and prospect of the program of accessible lending of the "Eosel", initiated by the President of Ukraine, and the importance of its further scale, was noted.

During the conversation, business representatives proposed to create a coordination platform for communication to protect business rights and consideration of other issues.

“It is very important to create a playground where we would talk constantly. Because it is impossible to accumulate problems for years: we will simply not be able to overcome them, ”Volodymyr Zelenskyy reported.

News Source: https://armyinform.com.ua/2023/06/30/volodymyr-zelenskyj-zustrivsya-iz-predstavnykamy-biznesu-sered-inshogo-obgovoryly-vidbudovu-ukrayiny/

In "Action" there was an opportunity to change your place of residence

Author: ['АРМІЯINFORM']

Time: 2023-06-30T98:00:00-04:00

Description: Service "DIA" turned the can of the Zmіni Miss. The Oater of Odda is available in ... War with Ukraine 2022, the war with Ukraine latest news today, the News War with Ukraine 2022 is the last for today, will there be a war between Ukraine and Russia and when, the war with Ukraine in 2022 will be or not, there will be whether the war with Ukraine in the near future says, the war with Ukraine, Ukrainian news today, Ukrainian news in Ukrainian media in Russian

Images: ['diya.jpg']

Tags: ['ДІЯ', 'МІНЦИФРИ']

Category: News

The action "Action" returned the possibility of changing their place of residence. The service is still in advance of beta-test and not yet for conscripts.

About it reports Minzifri.

To change your place of residence, you no longer need to visit CNAPs and organizations - the system will be fully automated. It is noteworthy that the data of the pre -register will be entered without human intervention, which will reduce the risk of error or disadvantage of incorrect data.

To use the service, you must meet the following requirements:

  • have an ID card or foreign passport, tax number; * be older than 14 years, or older than 18, * if you change your child's place of residence; * not to be conscripted; * have the right of ownership of a housing that has been entered in the real estate register since 2013.

The Ministry of Defense has warned that the service would still be accessible to children, women of non -military -free Ukrainians.

To evaluate the function right now, you need to enroll in beta testers of the service.

Recently in the Ministry of Defense announced new services UDIAwhich are noticeably simplified, including motorists. For example, auto -online customs will soon be cleared, as well as deposit reimbursement and re -registration of the vehicle. Even education documents will be displayed in the online service.

News Source: https://armyinform.com.ua/2023/06/30/u-diyi-zyavylasya-mozhlyvist-zminy-misczya-prozhyvannya/
